I was in the middle of an episode of the middle when I had to leave for an appointment and it restarted the whole episode). This is a bug in the system that needs to be worked on because some people don’t have the patience to keep looking for their shows/episodes. Other than that, I loved it when it was HBO Max and I like the broader selection of shows without having to change apps.
Title: Not saving any of the shows to my continue watching list.

Content: If you’re running on some modern iPads, the “swipe” bar at the bottom of the screen and “resize” tool at the bottom right of the app doesn’t go away when watching full screen content. This is a bit of a deal breaker especially if you’re watching a movie or something in the dark. There are 2 very white bright elements distracting from the program or movie.  HBO Max didn’t have this. This is a failure of QA and product sign off and a basic feature of any video application. You can do better.  On a good note, the new combined content is good I guess. I like that HBO is broken off into its own channel as is the rest of the content. I’m nervous what the future will bring since I’m an old school HBO consumer.  I will continue to subscribe because the HBO content is stellar, but I think while some bugs are going to be ironed out, there’s no reason to have the full screen issue. It’s like getting a car and the seat reclines, but only 100% back.  You can do better, thank you for working hard on this.
Title: Full screen on iPad flawed

Content: Apple TV app keeps crashing. The 10-seconds skip forward and skip backwards buttons are not intuitive. Click once and the timeline appears on screen, and then click again to actually skip ahead or back. Small thing, but somehow really irritating. Every other app is just one-click and responsive.  The design of the app feels clunkier, heavy, and not as thoughtfully designed as the previous HBO Max app. For example, the welcome screen where you choose a profile is ugly / why are the profile pictures so massive? (I’m in graphic design, I can’t help but notice this). I wish they just changed the app name versus forcing you to re-download a new app that is worse in aesthetics and function.
Title: Uglier, Glitchy

Content: Recently, every time I start watching something on Max, and cast it to the tv. If the app is still open on my phone, and I unlock it, whatever I’m watching starts over. This happens even when I start my show and exit the app. If I go back into the app to pause or turn on subtitles, the app starts the show over. And in doing so, it never saves the spot I left off. Several shows in my continue watching are stuck in episodes that I have already seen. But won’t update to the new part of the show I’m in. I deleted the app and redownloaded but the problem still persists. I’m very disappointed, I watch a lot of history docs and I can never keep track of my spot in the shows because this app malfunctions every time.
Title: Major issue with casting to TV

Content: The best TV & movie app I’ve found … now. I Absolutely loved HBOMAX… great variety, tons of top quality shows - all my favorites! Had liberal, center and conservative documentary choices. The app worked smoothly and was easy user friendly, great layout etc .  Now it’s MAX, not quite the same or as good in all of those areas… especially some of the functions, like it’s difficult to Restart an episode (little bitty area you gotta touch just right) and the option is not automatically offered when you return to a show.  I love MAX almost as much; it’s still the best out there!!!.
Title: Great! But I liked HBOMAX better

Content: App is more user friendly than it was before, but I still have intermittent problems with casting to my streaming device.  None of the other streaming apps have the performance problems that this one does.  Tracking screen disappears constantly…and I have to disconnect and reconnect to see it again.  Constantly losing connection to the screen and has to reconnect and reload…goes for seconds or minutes and then happens again. It’s difficult to enjoy shows when it’s interrupted like this over and over.  Makes me question why I am paying for this.
Title: Better than before, but still has problems

Content: App seems faster than old HBO Max which is good.  Bunch of new disposable reality content now pushed above fiction shows.  Never gonna watch any of that. (I can’t see any reason to sunset a respected global brand like HBO for not so great name MAX which most people wonder if related to Cinemax—it’t not).  2 stars because there’s a bug in current version on iPad.  The white swipe up bar at the bottom of the screen and time date and battery percentage never disappear, even in full screen playback.  Not the end of the world, but distracting during long viewing.  Screen should be black except for show in full screen like ALL other media apps on iPad.
Title: iPad problems

Content: The HBO Max app (and website) allowed user to edit My Stuff and viewing history. That has changed. Also, if I’m watching a series, after each episode it shows a new suggested show, not the next episode. If I’m rewatching a series that I enjoy, instead of playing the next episode from the start, it plays from last played. So, If I stopped watching at the credits, it starts at that point and not at the beginning of the next episode. I tried removing watch history, but that doesn’t seem to be available. I liked having more control over my viewing, not being force fed what Max believes I should watch. They took a fine working app and downgraded it, making it more difficult to use. I wish they had left well enough alone.
Title: Not user friendly

Content: Old HBO Max app was much easier. It takes so much longer to find what I want. Example:  the old Expiring Soon showed everything expiring in the next 30 days and had the date under each titles thumbnail. Now there is Last Chance with no dates and different lists whether you are under the Home or Movies screen.  No Show All option to see the full list of content expiring.  And even in the movies detail page it doesn’t show the expire date.  I much preferred having the left menus to get to the Hub or category, then only scroll vertical then what it is now with the vertical AND horizontal scrolling.
Title: Navigation needs to be better

Content: So the hubs on the side are gone, which is kind of annoying. I still can’t zoom full screen on the AppleTV since you INSIST on using a customized video player. You want me to pay MORE to watch 4K content, which you barely have anyways. But the name change means you have to launch a new app? Why? Like seriously. Apps have changed names in the past. It’s.. not difficult. So why an entirely new app? Are you going to change the name again in two years and make a new app for it with an icon that now blends in with Prime Video? Did you ignore your consultants, or did you hire a terrible firm? Is the next step to axe another huge pool of content that used to define the HBO name and replace it with garbage original reality shows? Oh wait…
Title: Worse interface. Bad on AppleTV. Why a new app AGAIN?

Content: The movies and TV shows here are phenomenal. But I’m not here to write a review about my TV shows.   The app is awful. Forced us to move to a second app and completely took away the fine-tuning FF/Rewind that comes on the new AppleTVs, and every single time I try to watch something it starts it at the very end. I’d like to rewind all the way, but the scrolling instead of spinning is meticulous- if you don’t brush completely horizontally then it won’t work- and slow. AND the “play next episode button” pops up immediately so when you pause to rewind (since you *need* to on this app) it’ll immediately play the next episode. You know, the one you didn’t want to watch.   Absolutely awful. Honestly makes me want to unsubscribe to the service
Title: Service is Great, App is Awful

Content: Update: I received an invitation to speak to a developer and a request to update my review. Weird- would that somehow fix all the technical glitches and return the cancelled programming? This review is unchanged.  Crashes, glitches. I have had to re-sign in 6 or 7 times in the last few days. Putting aside the fact that there was no earthly reason to make these changes in the first place, now it’s incredibly annoying to use. There are no longer the wonderful hubs, and it’s super annoying to search for shows now. I totally get this was all a huge money grab to get out of paying residuals by claiming to be a new streaming service, but you’ve now lost a customer of many years. I’m cancelling my account
Title: Requires new sign it each time I use

Content: I love this app. It has all of my beloved shows and movies. The only thing lacking is the ability to reset a series that I’ve binged before in the past. Now that I’ve completed this series now it’ll bring me to the last few seconds of the next episode and if I’m not paying attention I’ll have to back out and restart the whole process. After that the auto play works just fine for every episode following. I just want a reset watch history button to clear the cache. Please Max??
Title: Watch history

Content: Why does this need to be a whole new app.   My 75 year old grandfather and I were on the phone for 2 hours trying to download it on all of his TV’s in his house. I am tech savvy and I had a problem at every single step of the download and sign in process. When I finally got the app downloaded on his TV, as soon as I first opened the app it asked for a password. For what account??? We put in 5 different passwords including the actual account password, his TV account password and other ones as well. The man just wants to watch Chuck in peace without having to get a new app on every single device he owns.   Now he calls me and tells me HBO Max doesn’t work, but I tell him every-time that it’s Max now not HBO max. I’m sure that most people had no problem downloading it and signing in but it was extremely unnecessary. Absolutely wasting everyones time be creating a new app. Anyone who has older family members/friends that are not tech savvy will understand my issue with the new app and they will probably agree with me. Thank you for your time.   The only reason that I will keep using this app is to watch The Sopranos.
Title: Wasting everyone’s time

Content: Watching “Kill Chain” on the Russian hacking of America’s election was clear and convincing; and “Inside Job” about financial collapse and the corruption and collusion among Leaders in Finance and Government is appalling  and has evidently not changed for the new billionaires…in contrast with how extraordinary  GREED and contempt for the lives of ordinary citizens remains largely ignored .  Good stuff, Max.  I remember The Wall Street Journal writing that. “Nobody understands Credit Default instruments…well,”Inside Job” does.  I recommend everyone, especially every American,  see these two significant films!
Title: The variety and depth of important documentaries

Content: First item on the agenda is how little thought was given to the naming of this product.  The name could give you the impression that you may have kidnapped a person?  “Hey, do you have Max?”  Anyway, this review is for Apple tvOS.  The transitions between top bar menu items and programming is atrocious.  For the love of my eyesight please introduce a fade in and out transition - not a sudden pop in and out.  Also, there is something terribly off with the frame rate while watching content on the app, after scanning through time.  It appears to almost play too slowly or quickly depending on if you have moved forward or backwards.  This doesn’t happen all of the time, but once is enough to make you feel slightly ill.  Lastly, why are categories of content so hard to locate?  It’s as if you don’t want your customers to be able to find content they would like.  The HBO and discovery apps both did better jobs of this.  Although it was not perfect, the discovery app still did a better job than the HBO app when it came to displaying content in a well layer out manner.
Title: tvOS App Review

Content: I use Max primarily for streaming to my google device/smart TV - literally anytime you open the app after starting a show - it will cause the app to shut down, while simultaneously starting your stream over at full volume. The shows ALL start at full volume too so it will put my TV at 100% each time I open the app (which lately with all the bugs it’s anytime I try to open the app at all mid stream). So you can imagine how NOT user friendly this app is when you maybe want to lower the volume and your app shuts down completely and restarts your stream at FULL volume each time. It’s almost as unusable as the AMC app - please fix this I never had this issue with the HBO Max app.
Title: App closes and restarts stream

Content: What happen to the home tool or whatever it was called, to look a features an upcoming?Only my stuff An search What happen to the third tool or whatever it say. the second one that was in the middle It was there yesterday Now my phone an the tv app are missing it.  Edited: it just pop up after I post this had to close app out multiple times 5+ times an it finally pop up. Why is app my  message not posting up the way I did it? I made spaces an click the return. I don’t like to put dotes an cross my T’s on messages
Title: What happen the one of the tools

Content: At first I wasn’t expecting much, it was just a free thing from being customers with at&t. As time went on, I witnessed the selection grow from “meh i guess” to “wow, what dont they have!” I dont use any other streaming service, since this has a great selection to pick from. The only weird thing is when I think “i wish they had this option.” Their response is “so you wish it, so i grant it.” And boom its in the content next time i hop on. I don’t know if theyre listening, but i dont mind since its benefiting me 😅
Title: Great Variety in Selection

Content: Others have already mentioned the dropped content and change in how you find what you’re looking for.  My issue was rather small:  UI elements don’t leave the screen while watching content.  My home bar at the bottom and status bar at the top of the screen remain on screen while video is playing.  This happens across multiple devices.  I’m more irritated now due to waiting in chat to discuss this with customer service and having chat ended twice without any response.  I was looking to waste my time watching content, not have you waste my time in the chat.
Title: The app and customer service need work

Content: This new version is just plain horrible. I can’t load anything. Nada. All I get are the graphic boxes with different categories and when I click on the box nothing comes up. When do a search for The Larry Sanders show it tells me that it is not in the catalogue. Even though I’ve been watching it up to yesterday. I see it via Apple TV so when I try to get to it that way it doesn’t load. I get a prompt: Something went wrong. What the heck. It’s not working on iPhone and iPad. Fix it, please.
Title: Horrible

Content: I have had HBO for many years. I enjoy the shows and think it is good value. The app however has got to be the worst streaming app available compared to all the other apps I currently have access to. The music volume compared to voice volume is quite dramatic I often have to adjust the volume to due the music being exceptionally louder than voice volume. Also it will constantly start serial many episodes back from where I left off. I only use the app on my phone so it should remember my viewing history. It often disconnects freezes or just flat out doesn’t work causing me to watch my other video apps. Overall I love the content but they really need to invest in the infrastructure or the app.
Title: Worst streaming app

Content: I’m disappointed with the new Max app. With the latest update, I was able to go to continue watching, but the app wants me to start with the first show of the season I was watching. The biggest issue is a synching problem with audio and video. The video drags and the audio continues at the proper rate. This has happened with two series so far. The previous HBOMAX had issues, but not as many as I have found here. The main page is more difficult to navigate and I have had to put shows in my stuff and go to each episode to see where I left off. I’m sure it will be fixed in future updates, but just wish it had been fixed prior to launch.
Title: Very buggy

Content: I like the addition of new content but they have really taken a step backward in terms of organization/functionality. You can no longer sort your watchlist by alphabetical order, which is inconvenient, but that is nothing compared to the new way they have movies and series sorted. Now you can only search for movies/series by genre and not alphabetically. So just now instead  of being able to browse  A-Z, I had to search through every single  genre, where  some of movies appeared in multiple genres.  Who in their right minds thought this was a more convenient option? The only reason I even gave it two stars is because the app isn’t as glitchy.
Title: Major downgrade

Content: They jumped from a really good AppleTV app to a really bad one. Go to a section/group, like LGBT section, scroll down and try looking through the various lists, and it will randomly jump back to the top. They have their own custom video player which is missing scrub functionality. Something is wrong with the TV app Up Next integration - it’s either not working or buggy.  That’s just to start. Hard to believe that the new management would completely dump an existing app, which performed perfectly, and build this horrendously awful app just to accomplish rebrand. This is not the first thing that this new “combined“ company has done. I don’t think it promises much for the future. For the first time in years, I’m having to reconsider my subscription.
Title: Horrible

Content: I like how you guys put how many seasons a show has when you put it on ur List. Wish it told u even if it wasn’t on the List, but i’ll live, it’s fine. Also, i like the new icons for the ‘New’ and ‘New Episode’ boxes. They’re bigger which helps. I also like that you changed the buttons to 10 seconds instead of 15. But I do have a bone to pick tho… still no double tap to rewind/forward? Tsk tsk 😔  Also, regarding ur website when using a laptop, please add the whole type ‘F’ for full screen dealio.
Title: So far so good!

Content: This app takes longer to load than all the others, but at least it loads on the first try (unlike hbo now). But the selection on offer is very limited. If it weren’t for FRIENDS & The Nanny, I wouldn’t still have it. Currently, the “Continue Watching” section has stopped updating my stopping point & always reverts back to the same place in the same episodes. So I have to open the episode list & find where I actually stopped every time. Super annoying & no way to report the issue through the app. Literally came here to post this just hoping they’ll see it & fix the issue.
Title: Good but glitchy

Content: I like that everything is in one place now, but everything seems very disorganized, especially when I’m looking for things from HGTV.   The biggest issue, however, is when we cast it to the tv, no matter what our tv volume is, it automatically turns it up to 100%! Even when we just change episodes. We have to have the remote ready to go to turn the volume down. It makes us not want to cast to the tv, especially at night or when the kids are napping. Not sure if anyone else is having this issue. Our tv is a Vizio and we use chrome cast.
Title: Hard to Find Things and Tuns TV Volume to 100%

Content: Overall, I don’t like the changes or a lot of the new content. I’d like to be able to indicate that I’m not interested in certain things (like all the reality garbage) or select areas of interest. There’s so much stuff and it’s a pain to sift through.    I’d really like more options for managing and browsing saved items, like bumping things to the top.   And why the blue? The purple was nice. And I liked the initials for the profiles, not into the whole avatar thing. Those are the first couple experiences with the app and I went from liking them, and they set the app apart from others, and they ruined them.
Title: Meh…and bring back the purple please

Content: The content is great but the app just doesn’t work and I’ve got no response from emails sent for help. Same issues on Apple and Roku devices. Doesn’t track the episodes you’ve watched or where you left off. The continued watching section does not update so you have to search for what you were watching to pick up where you left off and hopefully you remember what episode you were on. What you’re watching will randomly restart and when it does it then doesn’t allow you to fast forward to get where you were so you have to close the app entirely to restart. Ultimately pointless to have the service right now because until they fix the issues you can’t enjoy watching anything.
Title: Great Content, Horrible App

Content: I’ve come to this app the day something new premiered one example is the new Superman show that premiered on Adult Swim the day it released for Max I literally had to search for it because it wasn’t highlighted at all the new apps algorithm is highlighting discovery content new and old while suppressing newer and more popular Warner content it’s like who ever is in charge is trying to devalue that content which can be backed by the fact that most content on the app has been licensed to other steamers like HBO and the new Netflix deal discovery content is staying exclusive and being made more accessible in the app while the same can’t be said for the Warner content
Title: Stop forcing Discovery content on people

Content: Seriously, what the heck y’all? Not only did y’all remove the sort A-Z feature so I could just browse everything (without having to know exactly what kind of movie I’m in the mood to watch!) but to top it off there isn’t a romance category? Are y’all nuts? That’s like having a bookstore with all the romance books just scattered in the fiction category. You took the most watched movie type and just threw it into other categories! To quote The Rainmaker, “You must be stupid, stupid, stupid.” Y’all took a great thing and ruined it with this new app. Selection is still amazing, but it’s hard to find a rom com without a category to select from! Please just fix it 😭
Title: Why ain’t there a Romance category????

Content: I paid for a subscription last year and it will expire in December of this year. When they switched from HBO max to Max The app wouldn’t download so I’m thinking I need to rescribe so I can continue watching movies. I assumed that someone would see I have a subscription and refund my money and it never happened. I sent messages and someone saw my problem and wanted my payment information which I sent. Another person texted me saying there was no error and they stopped responding. They still owe me $99
Title: Refund

Content: I love the fact that they included all my favorite black tv shows from the 90s ! They get left out ALOT!! Wish they add good times.   DIFFERENT WORLD  LIVING SINGLE (the show friends was based off of by the same man who said “ I I could have any show it would be living single “ the next year they were cancelled and friends came out stealing everything from living single. SMH  MARTIN -which I watch only on B.E.T along with the Wayne brothers. But HBO max or Max did a good job at supporting the top black tv shows that RAN the 90s + other black shows.
Title: The greats!!!

Content: I truly enjoy having Max! I’ve used this streaming service when it was first called “HBO Max” they always have a great selection of shows and movies! BUT if your a BIG sports fan of football and basketball like myself.. this is not it! I understand it’s fairly new the sports section but if you like keeping up with pro teams in the NFL and NBA your better off using a sports streaming service to watch any game! Hopefully in the near future the selection of live games grow but as it stand now it’s not great for sports.. at least not yet I hope!
Title: Love hate relationship..

Content: Max could be better and with the rumored changes that may come (like no more password sharing) it’s kinda going down. Love that they added sports and they have a decent collection. Plus a lot of the newer stuff is available in Spanish but if they start increasing the prices again or stop password sharing the app just isn’t worth it. The subscription won’t be worth it. For now it is, solid 4/5 but if they stop password sharing or increase price, it would go down to 3/5, if they increase price and stop sharing its at best 2/5
Title: Max is alright

Content: Why I choose Max by John. Max is just another video streaming site with an eclectic inventory. It is just one of these streaming service I subscribe to. What can I say about Max? It has some of the content that I like to watch and some of the contact I do not like to watch. The same issues with other streaming service. I can also find. While there is limited content to peak my interest, the bulk is across streaming service is the same. The majority of which are or I consider B or C rent Contant that you’re either never heard of or never wanted to see again. I am currently enjoying the few entries that I wish to see.
Title: Why I choose MAX

Content: Had no issues with HBO Max. Nothing but problems with this. It rarely remembers where you leave off. The “continue watching” feature only shows up ~30% of the time. I’m only watching one show. When I search the show, I have to scroll through and pick the episode myself and the place is never saved. Just now, volume cut out entirely however the SFX for the fast-forward / rewind remained. Luckily I don’t watch a lot of media because I’ve exposed myself to enough propaganda to last me several lifetimes. Just writing this because clearly I don’t value my time that much. Should probably fix these issues though.  Edit: I’d like to add that these issues are being experienced on two separate smart TVs.
Title: Littered with issues

Content: How much money did HBO spend to launch a new streaming service that’s not only worse than their previous one but also a million times worse than their streaming competitors? Out of the many complaints that I have about their new streaming service, the number one issue that makes me want to leave is that once a show finishes, the app freezes at the max logo screen which one can’t back out of to start a new search… it doesn’t take the user to a home page to select a new show, it doesn’t launch a list of recommendations; the only way to move forward is to close the app completely and reopen it again start a new search (so 2005). Fai
Title: Dumb

Content: If brain damage is your cup of tea, then this app has certainly provided me with a unique experience. It's a true marvel in the world of glitchy, buggy apps that appear to thrive on not functioning properly. Ever dreamed of an app that, during a TV screen cast, whimsically shifts languages to Spanish and refuses to revert or revels in English audio descriptions? You'll be delighted when, by some inexplicable miracle, it successfully casts to your TV, and the volume, like magic, soars to a whopping 100 randomly . And what's not to love about an app that kindly resets your movie every 5 minutes, treating you to an extra 2-minute dose of commercials on a paid service? If this sounds like your idea of a good time, then this app is your perfect match!
Title: Run far away from this trash.

Content: I didn’t even need to sign in with again. Downloaded the app on my iPhone and iPad and both were automatically signed in. After seeing the reviews, I was skeptical, but now I’m glad I didn’t have to sign in again. Hopefully others will be able to have their issues fixed soon. (I have xfinity as a tv provider and AT&T for my cellular provider just Incase this helps with anyone else who has issues signing in with those specific providers).
Title: Automatically signed in

Content: I have always enjoyed HBO Max, but ever since the switch to Max, I am no longer able to continue watching my shows from where I left off. Every time I want to continue watching the Big Bang Theory, I have to scroll through my list, find the show, select the season, select the episode, and then rewind the episode to the beginning. It is a huge pain, especially when I used to be able to just hit Continue Watching and it would pick up right where I left off. I don’t know what happened during the changeover, but someone please fix this issue!
Title: One big issue with the new version of Max!

Content: Why doesn’t this app save the progress you make in watching a series? It’s so annoying! Ever since they went from HBO Max to just Max, it’s been a headache. It just says to start watching Season 1 episode 1 of whatever I’m trying to watch despite being several episodes in. It also deleted shows off of my list that I had not finished watching. I’ve tried logging out & logging back in, deleting and redownloading the app & nothing works! Just bring back the Continue Watching section! I don’t understand why that’s so hard for them to do. They’re just angering their customers & making them want to take their business elsewhere. Fix it!
Title: Doesn’t Save Progress

Content: They took off some of the cool features like the random button on shows. some shows i put on for background noise and have seen them enough that i don't need to follow the plot so i liked the random button cause it would play the episodes in random order, (did it mostly for comedy shows) other than that just seems like the same app kinda disappointing. I also don't like that movies with sub and dub are now two separate movies instead of being able to just switch the audio makes the whole thing unnecessarily difficult And why have to download a whole different app why not just update the app that was already in use?
Title: Its just ehh

Content: I watch this mostly on my iPad, and as a creature of habit I like to fall asleep to the same shows. So if I go back in a show’s season and choose an episode I’ve already watched, it thinks I want to watch the end credits. What? The most annoying thing is the full screen/theater mode. For some reason, now the clock and battery display doesn’t turn off automatically and is very distracting. I find I have to turn on Split View and then turn it back to make the top bar disappear but the bottom slider to access apps is still there and very bright. Like this is elementary stuff, come on.
Title: Simple things, out the door

Content: How is it you guys can’t get the continue watching part of this right? I have several TVs and I might watch something on 3 different floors in my house and yet when I log back in I don’t have the show available to pick up where I left off and if it is it shows me the first episode in the series.. just so many wasted clicks and time. Please fix!!! Netflix is a good model to follow.. it’s 2023 why is this app still working like it’s 20 years old? Where is all the old HBO content? HBO had a whole library of movies they made in the 80s and 90s and yet it’s never made it on the platform. I never asked for Discovery or TCM… please give us more HBO and less reality TV…
Title: New HBO Max but same old problems

Content: A new Max iPhone app upgrade came out today, and problems I’ve raised with their agents remain broken.  It’s been more than a month since notifying staff of episode numbers being wrong for the 2022 seasons of Real Sports with Bryant Gumbel and Real Time with Bill Maher.   Somehow it causes the Nov and Dec episodes of Real Sports to be flat-out missing and unavailable.   More critically for iPhone users who rely on an unlimited 5G cellular plan and Apple’s Lightning to Digital AV adapter (to watch as a group on a larger screen) the bug introduced in the previous Max upgrade is unfixed.   A downloaded show cannot be viewed, only audio comes through.  Streaming a show does display to the larger screen, but one can of course experience buffering at times when the 5G service is at peak demand or otherwise overloaded.    I was told all these problems were passed into developers but I now doubt that.  MAX has good stuff but the customer service is questionable.
Title: New app still with critical iPhone flaw & more

Content: The audio description bug is driving me insane. No matter how many times I switch the audio to English, the app keeps switching back to English audio descriptions and playing over my contents audio. I’ve gone into settings and made sure I have audio descriptions turned off but it does nothing. I’ve turned off my phone, deleted the app, reinstalled it, logged in and out, but I still can’t turn it off. The worst part is I never even turned audio descriptions on in the first place - the app updated on its own and now it’s stuck like this. It’s great that they have this feature, I bet it’s really helpful for people who need it, but what’s the point of using MAX if it’s too broken to use?
Title: Audio Description Bug.

Content: First, why couldn’t the old app just update to the new MAX app? It doesn’t make much sense to have to delete the old on and download a new one,  Also, if your going to do that, create a grace period of a month or so where both can be used…had difficulty getting the new app to work as we get it provided by a cellphone provider with service. The launch page is ok, except it should right away continue with what you are watching and new episodes of what you are most recent watching.
Title: poor rollout of new app, maybe a little faster?

Content: HBO used to be my go to for streaming top quality shows and movies. Now it’s just another giant streaming platform with 10 million shows, yet nothing to watch. I am not sure who told all the “streaming giants” that more shows regardless of quality is better, it’s not, when you’re only adding old bad network tv shows, that now have to be sifted thru to find the few good shows. Also, The new interface is much harder to navigate. I pull up the app on my Roku several times a day look thru the terrible new shows, get frustrated with all the garbage content, then go to a different app to find something to watch. If I didn’t pay for the year up front I’d already have cancelled this subscription.
Title: HBO at its worst

Content: On the phone is alright but on the Apple Tv the ability to scroll between scenes needs work. It is worst than how it was with the HBO Max app, you can’t scroll smoothly. Also there an the annoying dark bar on the top that shows the rating of the movie/series for a few seconds after you play a movie or show. It is annoying to see that unnecessary thing covering part of the picture. That wasn’t there before why add it now. It is a dumb an annoying way to remind people of the rating of the content. There are other ways to do it without it being so intrusive.
Title: Apple tv app needs work

Content: I LOVE this app, especially now that it’s merged with Discovery Plus, but it would be nice to have the option to filter my list by movies and television series via a drop menu where you can view all (default) or filter by shows or movies.  It because a bit wild when you go to your watch list and there’s a tons of stuff to sift through with no options to make that view a bit more orderly and easy to navigate.  I hope the developers see this and make that minor adjustment.
Title: Please give option to filter My List by TV and Movies

Content: The app works very well. It integrates with my cellular client login seamlessly. Having access to movies exclusively while they are in the theaters is a great benefit.. The only complaint I would have is a lot of the proprietary content Max creates is in the woke genre. Not as much for mass audiences or even the critically acclaimed arena; just not my cup of tea. Although, the HBO brand has always been that way, so I’m not shocked. Who would’ve thought Bill Maher would be the least woke HBO Max content lol
Title: App works great, early access to movies, too much woke content

Content: It’s pretty cool. I haven’t experienced any bugs that others are however it doesn’t mean I won’t. I do like that we have more stuff to watch so that’s a plus. I was going back and forth from HBO to Discovery and now it’s all in one. That’s a plus. Overall, I can’t complain. It’s nice to kinda have everything in one app. The UI could be better but for an app that just launched, I love it. I’ll use it everyday just like I have been with HBO. And you know what, it’s still cheaper than cable!
Title: I like it

Content: I really like Max and all the things I can watch!!! However, I wish there were more options with animation-specifically Max should spend less of its money on shows like Velma and more on stories warrant a show. Original animated shows that are just reboots of beloved classics perhaps? I would also prefer more anime options but I know it’s not on Max to provide that…  I was surprised that we could pick a character for a profile. It seems like Mac is trying to copy Disney Plus. I don’t mind it though.   Don’t get me wrong- I love the options of anime here! But maybe they could consider adding a few back..
Title: Anime where?

Content: Every time I screen mirror like the smaller screen in the bigger one every time I finish an episode of something that I’m watching on Max. I have to go back into the app and I click next episode I’m kind of annoyed😒 by that I wish you would just like automatically start the episode after that one, so I think you should fix that, but overall I like the quality of max and how many shows you can get and I just love it except for that because I think it’s kind of annoying so yeah
Title: Need to fix but over all good 👍

Content: This app’s design is much improved over its predecessor’s; however, I have had almost zero success trying to watch downloaded videos without a network connection. Most of my time watching shows/movies is when I’m traveling and have limited internet availability, so this functionality being broken severely limits the usefulness of this app for me. The app always gives me an error when trying to play an episode/movie while offline. The Netflix app plays videos offline flawlessly, so it’s clear that this is a bugged implementation in the Max app, rather than some legal or technical limitation.
Title: Much improved, offline viewing broken

Content: Obviously a goated selection of shows and movies but the transfer from hbo max to max was dumb because of the bugs, had to start new accounts and get rid of old ones and the obvious pay wall for no ads is outrageous because it’s what made the platform the best in the past, just one price for no ads, and not to mention the less amount of devices that can be watching on the same time, although it’s not really a big issue the fact that I can’t watch downloaded episodes because 2 people at home are logged in is absolutely nutts,
Title: I Hope max Doesn’t Keep Heading Down this path

Content: Love the app, I have it on all my TVs but ever since it got updated to MAX, it doesn’t save my progress on whatever I’m watching. There is no ‘Continue watching’ section and when I open one of the shows I was watching the night before, it takes me back to S1E1. I have to go to the season and try to remember what episode I was at. It’s a little frustrating, I hope it gets fixed with the next update. Other than that, I enjoy it, especially when this is the only streaming platform that has TVD for me to rewatch :))
Title: Since the update to MAX

Content: I have been able to use this app fine for over a year and it randomly logged me out. I tried to sign back in with my provider, but it directs you to a page to sign in, which I do, and then it just sits there. The only way to back out is to press “Cancel” which then leads to an error message. Signing in won’t redirect you to the app it just stays on the webpage where you cannot do anything further. Until this is fixed the app is unusable for Xfinity users, or at least me. The app is fully updated as well so maybe there’s a bug or something but it’s pretty ridiculous to be paying for the subscription and it randomly not work anymore.
Title: Won’t let you sign in with provider

Content: I used to use this app but now they changed it and ruined the best features I’m not one to fight change if it’s for the better but this price raising is unjustified and quite frankly not worth it you used to be able to look at what’s on the app but now you buy first look later I wanna see what I’m getting at least before I overpay for just the base price on this app it was a good value around 10$ for no ads you’ve removed most of the good qualities about the app and then shoved a higher than acceptable price point for the same stuff we already had lower the quality higher the price absolute sham of a company at this point
Title: Very Dissatisfied

Content: I love the app for the most part. Discovery+ and HBO Max wrapped up in one app along with other Warner offerings. But there is one HUGE problem. The default settings can not be adjusted or changed to fit your household. The weird thing is the defaults are different between devices. The same issues that plug the Apple TV app do not affect the iPhone or iPad version, even though the apps cross perform. I hate that every time I start watching a new show the CC is on and then I have to take the time to go in and turn it off. If this gets fixed and it is set up to allow users to change defaults in settings I would happily rate this app higher.
Title: Defaults need a change

Content: Forced to download a totally different app to watch the finale of Succession, and at the end of the episode (well, NOT at the end but with around NINE MINUTES left) it shrinks the show/credits and I get to see a bright white, stupidly difficult to navigate advertisement screen for other HBO shows, with no apparent way to get BACK to the SHOW I WAS WATCHING and continue it in full screen. The way this app takes over like that with no simple way to go back, is absurd. And don’t click back, or it’ll just bring you to the main generic home screen on the app. Terrible experience. I’m specifically talking about the Apple TV app (can’t review on the Apple TV), but the point stands. This app stinks, and it’s inferior to the old HBO Max app.
Title: Forced to use an inferior app.

Content: App switched from HBO Max to Max. Thought this update would fix all the bugs and problems with the old app. But it’s even worse.  The app has trouble casting, can’t skip intro anymore, can’t skip recap like before. Occasionally the font of the “HBO Max” logo changes to like a cheap courier new font and the font of the title of the series you’re watching also changes occasionally indicating there are some bugs to be fixed. Sometimes it randomly plays in Spanish and you don’t have the option to change the language to English or any preferred language. Takes forever to fix and start watching any series or movie.  Sometimes it works fine but it’s happened too many times.
Title: Need to improve

Content: I added a star because it’s much better than the previous app but the ad situation is just about intolerable. If I pause a show in the middle of the episode and have to come back to it later, I lose my place and cannot fast forward to the spot I was at because it stops me and makes me rewatch all the ads again. Then starts me after the ad, I fast forward again and several minutes of more ads, and eventually I repeat the process until I am over it and just turn it off because it’s not worth it to watch 40 ads just to get back to the spot I was at in a show.
Title: HBO is still the worst streaming service

Content: I just hate how this service and app went from the best content of the classic pay channel of all time, hello HBO, fazed their name out (leaving Max, an allusion to B List Cinemax???  But WORST of all, app is flooded with reality show trash and other garbage since they merged with Discovery - like TLC and others, a once reputable service with quality content  - turned bottom feeding purveyor of the worst TV has to offer.  Also they are a dropping some original HBO shows and movies, again debasing a world class product brand, selling of signature content for some quick cash.  And every time the home page shows more plastic reality show humanoids I want to puke.
Title: They dumped HBO focus?

Content: I’m just tired of what HBO Max and now just Max keeps on doing, like last year they removed infinity train and other shows which is just terrible because after canceling infinity train they removed it which was such an amazing show. Now they are even removing other things like some important episodes of adventure time, some Ben 10 series, Dexters laboratory, and many more to where at this point it’s just ridiculous. Also I don’t really see the point of changing HBO Max to just Max, like all I think of when I think of Max is a person, and also changed the color to a worse color which doesn’t matter, but still I find it somewhat annoying.
Title: Max is just terrible now with how they remove things

Content: This is not a complaint for the iPhone version but for the Roku TV version. I’m currently on season 4 of a tv show that I’m watching. Ever since I started watching the show it hasn’t saved the progress on the “continue watching” option and I have to search it every time and remember where I left off. Again, this is not for the iPhone version but for the Roku tv version. Please fix this, it’s very annoying to have to search the show every time and remember which exact episode I left off at. Thank you
Title: Overall great

Content: I like the addition of more shows to watch. I’m watching tv shows that I’ve never seen before bc I didn’t have those channels or just didn’t watch them. HBO is highlighting shows from channels that are not available on the other platforms so it helps to broadens my choices available. I only wish that I could rate the shows I watch, so HBO could learn more about the types of show people are interested in and could create their own versions.
Title: Like new app

Content: This is the single worst streaming app I have ever used. When I’m not casting to a TV it is OK. When I cast, which is most of the time, it barely works. If I go back into the app while I’m casting, it will restart the whole episode. It randomly turns on audio description or dubbing in another language when my settings are in English with no audio description. Skipping 10 seconds a couple times in a row will make the whole thing crash. Randomly it doesn’t save my watching progress. It is actually mind blowing to me that a rebranded app is this bad. They went backwards and it is extremely frustrating. If I didn’t love the show I’m watching that is Max exclusive, I wouldn’t be a subscriber.
Title: Absolutely awful

Content: I have been trying to log into the app since it launched. I keep getting messages that it cannot verify my account through my provider.  Then I contact the app for support and they want me to send proof that I have HBO, which I’ve had for years through DirectTV.  I don’t feel I should have to “prove” I’m a subscriber when I didn’t have this issue with HBO Max.  So yeah, not pleased and i am not paying an extra plan to get when I’m told I can access it at no charge.  No stars😡
Title: App issues

Content: I looooooves HBO! Cinemax was always mediocre. The diversity, range, and quality of content on HBO was always ahead of the game - insecure, succession, the comeback, watchmen, euphoria, big little lies, I may destroy you, random acts of flyness 🙌🏽🙌🏽🙌🏽 - all so good!!! Cinemax hasn’t really kept up in my opinion, so the merger felt moot. The main issues I have now are all the glitches in the app when trying to cast and find what I want, and what feels like a watering down of the content. I really hope that doesn’t happen. Also the HBO interface and materials were just sexier. Big fan here, but you’re losing me a bit.
Title: Why backwards?

Content: Your user-face platform is getting better! But Max please go back to your purple branding. I keep hitting Disney plus by accident because it’s literally the same color. Why choose the same color as one of your streaming competitors? Don’t you want to stand out?  Either way thank you for giving a chance on animated adult shows. It’s a underrated genre that many fear are doomed to just get 2 seasons and then cancelation. There is an audience and there always will be.
Title: Miss the purple

Content: why HBO - the golden child of high quality scripted dramas; and Discovery+ - the schlocky reality tv service; decided to merge is beyond me. there's a reason i had an HBO max account and no discovery+ account. i appreciate the expanded selection because of a handful of shows, but i dislike the new interface and wish they would've just done what spotify/hulu/showtime did for their student bundle, which is to just allow one site's login credentials to work on the others. separate apps, no new interface, no messed up buggy roll out, no painfully unwanted media being forcefully advertised while i'm just trying to watch succession. oh the irony.
Title: literally who asked for this?

Content: HBO puts out quality television and Max is just a different name for the same thing. Shows like The Sopranos, The Wire, and Succession will stand the test of time and always be top tier entertainment. Even a show that doesn’t stick the landing such as Game of Thrones is still a phenomenal series. True Detective, anything they’ve done with Danny McBride, Barry, WestWorld, the entire Miyazaki/Studio GHIBLI collection — all landmark series in their respective genres. All on HBO/Max. If you like good TV, you’ve already downloaded this app
Title: HBO has always been the best

Content: If anyone acquires your password, they can log in and change the password to the app. There is no external confirmation via email link or 2FA text message. This is a major security problem on top of an already non-functional app.  Add to that, “continue watching” options that don’t resume where you were at or mark shows as completed, Pause functions that keep the show playing and force you to resume at later points in the show, and a migraine inducing library interface, and you have the least functional streaming service on the market, which is saying something given the wretched state of DTC streaming services.  Thanks for breaking the industry, WBD
Title: MAJOR security problem

Content: I was on the fence with paying 15 a month for hbomax, but I’d never spend that for max.   I hate that hbo max had to create a whole other app just to change the company name. This app is never easy to use and always ends up making mistakes UNLESS you watch it on your phone. It doesn’t have chrome cast capability unless you have the console and you download it there. The subtitles will play from other shows instead of the one you chose and at some points it even freezes up the app! I tried watching sopranos but it kept playing the audio with the descriptive properties and wouldn’t give an option to change it. Don’t like the app and I don’t like the company; I’m cancelling
Title: Cancelling for good

Content: I’ll say that Max is a good app, I just simple don’t understand why they has do upgrade HBO max when it was working perfectly fine. There was no need for it to get “fixed” or improved. There is one problem that I hate: you can’t SharePlay with Max, unlike HBO max. I love being on FaceTime with friends and boyfriend and watching HBO max at the same time. Now I am unable to as there is no SharePlay future. When will SharePlay start? Or is there ever going to be a SharePlay feature, like there was on HBO max?
Title: SharePlay (FaceTime)

Content: Max has the best of hbo and discovery +. Not only does it have the best, it has it all in just one app now . If I were Netflix or other competitors I’d be afraid of max . Honestly I cancelled Netflix earlier this year . Max has the double the amount of great content for a cheaper price (I had 4K in Netflix ,now hd ad free with max). Netflix just wasn’t worth the money for the low quality content they put out . Max im here to stay with you . I’m ecstatic !!! HOD! TLOU!! Ghost adventures !!!! My faves goes on !!!
Title: Other streaming services should be intimated

Content: The transition from HBOmax to Max was always expected to be an adjustment, but what I didn’t foresee is for the decline of the platform to be this great. The content seems to be completely disorganized. One of biggest plus the HBOmax platform had was the fact that even though the amount of content was soooo extensive, you always had the hubs and menus on the side to direct you straight to where you wanted to go, with Max it just seems like they just dumped all the content and created a free for all.
Title: Should have just added to the HBOmax platform

Content: While this app is enjoyable to browse and watch content on, it disappointed us when we were vacation and was unable to view our downloaded content due to the app telling us we had to update our app. This normally wouldn’t be a problem but we had no signal and I had just downloaded a couple of movies to watch offline the day prior to leaving. There should be an option to bypass the update wall to watch downloaded content for those that have no signal in their areas and such.
Title: Update won’t let us watch our downloaded

Content: The old hbo max app was horrible, but the new updated app isn’t too much better. God forbid I unlock my phone or open the app in the middle of watching something. It’ll restart whatever movie or episode I’m watching. Half the time it doesn’t save the progress I’ve made in watching something so I have to write down what season, episode, and timestamp I left off on. The subtitles sometimes randomly end up in the corner of the screen, cut off where you can’t even read them. Still, I’ll take this version of the app over the godawful old version, but it’s still so buggy for me.
Title: App is a slight improvement but still a pain

Content: It will be nice if it had volume when does show the previews and  still have some glitches like when you’re watching a show and then it doesn’t upload into  keeps going back to stock for a few minutes don’t know if it’s my Internet but it doesn’t happen with any of the app just with that one kind of goes like  when we have record and they got a scratch just keep repeating and repeating but It’s big improvement in general.
Title: It’s a big improvement to whatever started

Content: So far I’ve experienced less hassle with the app losing connection like hbo max did. It was awful like any time I would move my phone the app would say there’s no connection. I’ve had it happen maybe one or two times with this new app since the switch. But my biggest issue that maybe doesn’t bother other people is when I rewatch a show and I click on a episode I’ve watched before it picks up on the ending credits and about to auto play the next episode. HBOmax always started over which I loved. So hopefully they add some sort of restart episode button
Title: It’s okay

Content: Less material of quality, a horrible lesser user interface, and a lot of just plain trash is now on here. Trademark excrement one has come to expect from davis zaslav’s mismanagement of a great library of film and television over 100 years old. We need more classic films, more classic tv, and less of this trashy reality rubbish. We left cable television because of david zaslav’s trashing of it. Now he has been placed in the power of destroying the whole Warner/HBO catalog. Please Fire this idiot. He has no place here. He ruined Discovery. He ruined TLC. He ruined  He ruined Sci-Fi Channel. He ruined Trio. He ruined Bravo. His entire career has been dedicated to destroying quality television. He has now ruined HBOMax and CNN. He should be fired and publicly humiliated.
Title: Huge downgrade

Content: Now, I understand that you were transitioning and no longer HBO Max and that is awesome. I love the new layout and everything about the app. The only I have noticed is that shows/movies that I used to watch or that I want to watch that used to originally be on HBO Max are now missing can you please explain why or is this an error /update: it has turned out that I accidentally had kids mode turn on, and it has prevented me from watching certain shows. Thank you for your time.
Title: Shows that used to be on HBO Max now missing

Content: As much as I️ enjoy “MAX” and as well as my children there’s something I️ am not pleased with. I️ typically watch MAX on my Roku TV. Anything that I️ start watching would play from the beginning and won’t resume where I️ left off after closing the app for a while. It’s really frustrating having to fast forward every time I️ decide to continue my movie or having to find the season and episode I️ was last on. I️ think that’s my biggest issue. I️ didn’t have any problems with HBO MAX so I️ am definitely noticing a difference in performance which I️ hope gets corrected soon.
Title: HBO MAX vs MAX

Content: The app is great, glad everything switched over and nothing was lost from HBO Max. But it is annoying that I have to sign in almost every single time I want to watch something, wether it’s on my iPhone or my Apple TV or gaming console. It’s tiresome not sure if there’s a way to change that or with the recent update it fixed that. But overall great app, lots of new stuff and almost haven’t used any of the other streaming apps cause of it. Just annoying with the signing in every single time.
Title: Great App, annoying log in

Content: So I originally had HBO max in South America while visiting family. Worked great! Came back to US, worked great. Now they want me to cancel my subscription to HBO max, create a new account and new subscription in Max, where I would loose all my saved programs. And also when I go to visit my family back in South American… max doesn’t work there so I would need to cancel my Max subscription and re subscribe to HBO max. All because HBO max is no longer available in US, only max is available in US, and because Max is not available in all countries, only in US. ITS THE SAME STUPID COMPANY! Dumbest thing I have ever heard. Canceling my subscription and not resubscribing until they put an end to ridicules nonsense like this.
Title: Dumbest transition ever

Content: They got rid of the hubs, they added advertising plan options that will cost a person $100 a year to have commercials, or about $150 for no commercials. They are pushing a bunch of reality shows. This is like when MTV stopped doing music videos. I have not seen or heard of new seasons of shows that I did like, or new ones that are enticing. If you watch National Lampoon’s European Vacation, it dubs out the F word. Can they not find uncensored content to show the original version? I am going to get the Criterion Collection again. Same price, no ads, probably a lot of special features and best yet, it will provide the content that I want to see.
Title: Time to Bid Adieu

Content: So downloaded the new max app and so far no issues streaming, but I noticed all our profile pictures were set to basic and when trying to change the profile pic found out we can’t upload our own pictures like we could on HBO Max app and can only use their shows/movies pictures. Not a fan of this, we had fun using goofy photos of our cat as our profile pics so very disappointed with not being able to continue to use our pictures for our profiles.
Title: Miss being able to use my pictures for my profile pic

Content: I’m not one to write reviews, but my frustration with this app has me at my wits end. There isn’t a single time I use this app that I don’t experience some kind of complication. Audio descriptions randomly turn on, streaming freezes or goes in and out, and it doesn’t remember where I’ve left off in episodes/ entire series. I can’t tell you how many times I’ve deleted the app and redownloaded to try to get it to work better or just to turn off certain things. The last app did not have these problems. What did y’all do?! I love the shows but this is getting ridiculous. Do better please.
Title: Disappointed

Content: Everything went smooth for me. Logged in and have been watching whatever I want as usual. Only bummer is that some stuff moving over from Discovery+ like Lost Tapes and Fatal Attractions aren’t on this app. Hopefully they get uploaded along with everything I have on my watchlist on Discovery+. Most are on here so I’m contemplating keeping that app since everything will be on here. But other than that I’m happy. Don’t know what problems some are having.
Title: Works fine for me

Content: why does MAX recommend and push that I watch a slew of reality tv? From my watch history the APP should know what I am interested in seeing. it s all narrative story telling and actual documentaries. It’s is aggravating to have to sift through piles of reality shows about kitchen makeovers that probably have to be re done by a professional, marrying a stranger, making a inedible cake that looks like a motorcycle, and on and on and on. I don’t watch this content. Stop putting it in front of me. The amount of content I will never watch on my main feed almost makes the app unusable.  Are you serious MAX?  I gave real feed back. And you responded with an automated reply? Telling me to provide feedback? Either give with a legitimate response or don’t respond and all. It’s fine not to respond.   Here is the reply MAX sent for reference.   “ Hi there, thanks for sharing your thoughts and suggestions. We value your feedback and encourage you to share your ideas for how to improve Max using our feedback form her”
Title: Stop pushing content I will never watch.

Content: So it asked me for a rating on if I was enjoying before I had a chance to watch anything which should be changed. But that doesn’t really matter because I have it on my tv so I do know that it is good. One problem is that every once in a while yor watching a show and it has a swirling circle then it rewinds gose back to where it was and rewinds again that gose on forever if you don’t fix it by winding it forward so that’s all so just a little laggy but I still completely advise that you get it
Title: Good.

Content: Even after spending 2 separate hours chatting with tech support, for some reason, since the last update my app will only stream to my tv in Spanish. It will be English on my phone and English on my desktop, the moment is stream it to my tv it switches to Spanish and gives no other option for audio. All other audio options disappear when it’s streaming to my tv. I have an iPhone 13 Pro Max and my phone is completely updated as well as the app with all the latest versions. Even tech couldn’t figure it out. Please fix this. I don’t want to watch my shows on a 4” screen.
Title: Only streaming in Spanish

Content: One why would you make an almost identical app but change to name and color? Two I don’t like how when I’m doing other stuff on my phone and tablet and when the Big Bang theory episode is over it just disappears so I have to go and re-open it for the tiny screen!!! Plus I have anxiety and change gives me a lot of it so this could be the anxiety talking from the change rattling me up from your stupid decision!!! Other than that I see no difference or improvement if anything it’s set you back.
Title: I like it but why change to a different app just for a name?

Content: HBO Max (or Mac now) has ALWAYS been FANTASTIC with the content it keeps (Big Bang Theory, Friends, GOT, House of the Dragon, comedies, romcoms) — I LOVE how they pick up all the cult favorites that Netflix drops. BUUT I hate the brand change. I can begrudgingly accept the name changing from ‘HBO Max’ to ‘Max’, but PLEASE change the color back to purple/blue!!! It reminds me of it’s HBO origins, like GOT. But now that it’s solely blue, it looks like any basic app (Disney +, Paramount +, Peacock, Zoom, freaking Venmo.) Max is still my favorite streaming platform, but I will forever be against this color change — the blue doesn’t do this streaming platform justice.
Title: Bring back the purple HBO theme!!!

Content: On launch day I opened hbo max and saw the upgrade to max screen. Followed the download button link, downloaded, opened Max and was automatically signed into my account! All my profiles, watch history, and even watch list we’re all right there where I left. So much more great content to choose, already started binging a new show! Browsing speed feels smooth and fast as well. Looking forward to seeing what else max brings to us.
Title: Seamless sign in

Content: I love the variety of shows and movies on this app, I enjoy it very much due to me working on night shift at my job… binge watching comes easy! Only thing I do not like is if I just my Max on the television where I want to stream on the bigger screen any show or movie I’m watching will continue to skip and slowly load, whereas if I’m watching something on my phone the quality is top tier with no skipping or slow loading. Not really sure what this is caused by but if this could be fixed or taken care of there would be no absolute complaints at all!
Title: Skipping

Content: The platform doesn’t allow me to rewind when watching shows. Trying to rewind past previous ad breaks crashes the platform and gives an error message before kicking me out of the show I was watching.  The audio/subtitle menus are in reverse places across TV & mobile, so weird inconsistency when I change between devices. It never saves my subtitle preferences on TV either so I have to reset it every time. Main menu doesn’t have many options for filtering. Overall just an underwhelming app that I don’t bother with unless I know exactly what I’m looking for.
Title: Rewind doesn’t work and ads cause app to crash

Content: I don’t normally leave reviews but I miss the old HBO. Idk why they have to mess with a good thing. Max is harder to navigate. No more convenient “last chance” or “just added” sections to choose from the menu. The old HBO was worth the $15/month, but this lower quality “updated” one is making me question keeping it. Every time I scroll down the list of movies, after about 15 seconds it brings me all the way back up to the top of the list. Super annoying. After it happens a few times I give up trying to find something to watch and switch to a different streaming service.
Title: Not worth it anymore

Content: I used HBO Max every night to watch the Sopranos. iPhone to chromecast. Aside from out of sync subtitles, it worked well.   Now, for whatever reason, it doesn’t work on this set up. It’ll connect to the chromecast, but when I hit play it tries to play it on my iPhone and chromecast at the same time. I ‘X’ out of it on my phone and it plays on the tv/chromecast, but it only about 8-10 seconds at a time and then pauses to load for multiple seconds. I’ve tried it multiple nights. And it’s definitely not an internet issue, because I do the same thing with Netflix or any other app with no problem.   Unfortunately, until they fix it, it’s unwatchable on this set up.
Title: In Soprano’s Withdrawal

Content: HBOMax was my go-to for all my favorite shows, so I didn’t expect much user difference with the switch. However, while it was easy to log in and my shows were all there in Max, IT DOESN’T SAVE MY WATCH HISTORY! Now, every time I log in, I have to find the show I was watching, find the season I was on, and then hunt down the episode. Once I get there, I have to hit * to restart the episode & then fast forward to where I was. This is so incredibly annoying and has caused me to stop using the app. I’ve tried signing out, deleting & reloading, hard restart—all the things. Hopefully they’ll fix this glitch soon. It isn’t worth the $$ I pay for this kind of inconvenience.
Title: What was wrong with HBOMax?

Content: Frankly it’s disappointing to say the least that as a company you can’t uphold your end of the deal! I purchased a yearly plan for an ad free and 4K compatible subscription and now all of a sudden with the rebranding I don’t have that same access. It’s NOT my fault pricing and tiers were changed so I believe that I should STILL be able to watch 4K content until my yearly subscription is up. I really hope to hear back because it’s not very good for your ‘new look’. I was expecting better from this new app but I’m just frustrated and mad to be completely honest! A company with so much money and they just are basically stealing from customers at this point….
Title: New app a serious disappointment

Content: This app is so seamless. The wide variety of shows and movies with new ones added so often make it a great platform. If you thought they couldn’t improve on HBO Go, then you were wrong. Twice. It has stuff for the whole family: horror movies, family movies, classics, and shows to drool over. I’m watching through Friends right now, and I tell you, if I start, I cannot stop. Again and again and again, Max continues to amaze me. Thanks, HBO!
Title: Love this!

Content: Another name change and a new app with zero differences to the previous versions. They promote Max as if it’s something new when no one can tell the difference from before. There is no additional functionality or a way to give any feedback about the titles. Netflix let’s us give a thumbs up or down. HBO probably just looks at views and has no idea that many of the title are no good. Terrible business model. I also don’t love how they throw so much of their agenda in our faces. Just terrible.
Title: Poses too much content we don’t want and no way to give feedback

Content: I phoned last night to try to get imax on my tv. The rep, who I could hardly understand as he did not know what I was talking about instructed me to put it on my iPhone, which I can hardly see. He had no idea how to place on tv. Finally he hung up on me. I get my service through the community and called for help because I am entitled to it through my association fees. Why can’t you hire workers from our country who we can understand us and we can understand them?? Please hire help who can speak English. I was on phone with different agents who couldn’t understand English and I didn’t understand a word they said. Please have an English speaking rep call me. I am entitled to max through my community
Title: Max

Content: One of the features I miss from HBO Max is the “continue watching” section. It’s gone. I have to search for the content I want to watch using the hearth bar or my watchlist and go from there. So inconvenient. Other streaming platforms have this feature available by default.  Also, time stamps are off, some buttons and commands do not function, and it crashes constantly. I often get a message notifying me that “an unexpected error has occurred”. I’m just gonna have to unsubscribe in a month from today if they don’t acknowledge and fix the issues that so many of us are experiencing 😕
Title: Simple features gone

Content: Why change the app in the first place? I didn’t know, didn’t bother me. HBO is my most used streaming service by a landslide.  I use it on my cellphone and three TVs. With the new app, whatever the last show I was watching will disappear completely from the “Continue Watching” section. I’ll have to search for the show, find the episode I was last on, which will be reset like I never watched it. So I’ll have to fast forward to the last spot I was on every time I want to start the show back. This is consistent with every show and it’s made Max such a headache for what used to be one of the best streaming apps.
Title: Max for Massive Headache

Content: I have always enjoyed the selection of shows and movies on hbo, it’s the app I know will have something to watch if I couldn’t find anything on my other steaming apps. The only issue with the old hbo app it was glitchy and would cut out mid movie or show. It was annoying but not bad enough to cancel. This new app has completely eliminated that issue and is much better overall with the viewing experience.
Title: Much improved

Content: Amazing content everybody I think with the current update the app performs very good, especially since I stream it on my phone but two shows that I haven’t seen which I would like to our dark tails with Don Wildman and true terror with Robert Englund so if you could add that to your service, that would be great other than that keep up the good work I enjoy the DC horror and other content you provide
Title: Amazing content and two shows I want to see

Content: I recently started using Max because I felt like Netflix has been moving away from movies that I typically enjoy and getting more independent films, which is great if that’s what you enjoy. For me, I would never watch it.   Now I find myself getting excited to watch movies! I love enjoying movies alone, while cleaning, family time, and more! Max has really been the best change in streaming services!!! Netflix what?!  Max is a here it’s at!
Title: Incredible Change

Content: Max definitely has bugs, it’s super slow even with good internet connection. Then it also constantly logs you out on multiple devices and makes you have to log back in. Then it’ll ask you to chose a plan all over again even though your original one hasn’t ended, and it auto charges so that shouldn’t even be an issue. Then there’s the crazy price on it. 100% over charging people. The only good things it has is the dc collection even though it incomplete and the the old Cartoon Network shows from when we were kids. It has partnerships with both companies and still has a limited collection on both.
Title: Not good.

Content: An absolute terrible streaming app, a 1 hour episode take 3-4 hours to watch due to the buffering issue. The app is updated all other streaming apps work fine. This app is the only issue. You would think a company that has been around as long as H.B.O. would have a quality product. Especially with the success of Game of Thrones, Sopranos, etc has had. I know they aren't hurting for money, and can afford to make something with quality. Companies that have been out for a fraction of the time are better than this company. STEP IT Up and stop being a company that is screwing people over by charging a premium price for inferior product.
Title: Wish no stars was an option

Content: Max AKA HBO max is a great app that you can you use on your iPad, iPhone and television. I prefer Tv better than iPhone or iPad, Just because you get a bigger screen and view. You can watch almost anything that pops in your head. Like DC or Horror like the evil dead rise or something else. Anime is also I pick, They don’t have lot of anime’s like the action movies they have but it is a good category to choose from. Max is better then any streaming app. You try it out
Title: My review

Content: Menu loud you to scroll in block of four, the new series menu. How do you scroll all the way to the right. It’s have 20+ episodes. Also the restart back to the beginning of each episode. The only way to restart a serious episode is to first quick on the episode, then back out and select restart. The old app seem to function, more user-friendly for a lot of series options.
Title: Please Update the Series Menus

Content: Not sure exactly what was wrong with the original app. I could get around the globe much more easily. I travel between countries a lot and never had much problems with the original HBO max app. Now they made me download the Max app and all of a sudden I’m out of my favorite shows whenever I’m in Brazil. The other app worked just fine - so I’m not sure how rights to the content in the app would’ve turned a complete 180° so fast in the sense that one day I could watch all my content, and on the other day y’all mandate an app switch to something that is not even available in my region. Well, if it’s not available, why demand the switch?
Title: “Not available in my region”

Content: The last app was absolute garbage. Wouldn’t cast, wouldn’t load shows, crashes constantly. Then this was came out, wow it’s even worse. Still won’t cast but if you’re lucky enough to get it to cast and actually get an episode to play, it won’t play anymore after. Same error message appears that it can cast the content so you have to close out and try it again only to play the same f@cling game again. On chromecast, the app is just painfully slow and constantly stops to reload. Last time I counted it was 15 times in a 40 minute episode. So glad I’m unable to watch the content I pay for
Title: Didn’t think it was possible this app could get any worse

Content: Rebrand the name. Change the entire app. Delete the old. Install the new.  Make a big deal about something no one cares about and then the new app is horrible.  Never saves anything you watch to continue later.  Try to hit the “Forward/Back 10 seconds” and it is super delayed and freezes.   Disappointed. Feels like some “higher ups” pushed an unreasonable deadline on some poor programmers because upper management made promises.
Title: Garbage Rebrand

Content: The Max app does not accurately keep track of where I left off watching a program. The HBO Max was able to do that and had a number of other features which I appreciated as compared to the new app. I can understand rebranding since they’re bringing all this other programming, most of which doesn’t interesting me, and is just clutter, but the overall experience of using the app should not have been a downgrade. I use the app on the newest generation of an Apple TV device.
Title: New Max app is a downgrade from HBO Max app

Content: I love watching South Park and other shows and Max is the best platform to watch it on. You get barley any ads and lots of new shows to enjoy and watch. South Park is my favorite show and I’m a huge kin for the whole show and characters and I enjoy watching it here since it isn’t shown on my other TV apps. Great platform to watch shows and movies but it could cut down from the ads and how long you have to wait for the ad to finish.
Title: Great platform!

Content: I feel like I was super content with this app at first because there were so many improvements compare to the last. However , it started to crack under use and I’m now facing very annoying issues that were as janky as HBO. One very annoying example is the app completely restarting whatever I’m watching from the very beginning every time I close and open the app while casting. It makes watching movies and shows difficult as I can’t just close the app and re open it to fix small things such as subtitles or volume due to the app completely restarting what I’m watching. I’m aware of others facing this same issue when casting.
Title: HBO flashbacks

Content: I love this “new” app. Although it is similar to HBO Max it is easy to navigate and have all my shows and movies in one place. Although this app is really convenient to have it is missing one feature that I used a lot and I’m sure others used on the previous app. SharePlay needs to be added to this because I enjoyed watching shows and movies with my family and friends while on a FaceTime call. Having them choose something to watch or vice versa. Please add this in the future.
Title: Needs SharePlay

Content: Terrible performance ever since they dropped the most crucial part of their name. “Max” is a trash app with increasingly worse content. This show is doing slightly worse than last season?
