Cancel it.  Im very disappointed with this change in ownership. HBO used to be my go-to brand for anything in television. Now, I’d rather use Peacock, and that’s really saying something.  I encourage others to review bomb this terrible app, so they actually do something about it. Im sure this review will get buried immediately, but if anyone does see this, let’s try to force their hand. I support SAG and the WGA and think this whole thing is disgusting. Zaslov is a trash human being and needs to be let go.
Title: Max is less

Content: Max is much less friendly that HBO Max was for finding something to watch by category.  Few options and incomplete listings.  Before you could search Just Added for all shows recently added. Now it is just those they feature and not a complete list.  Pretty sad that I have to do a google search to get the list of shows added that month because they are too lazy to provide it in-app.  The old app also had a just added by category. Also eliminated.  Also lost downsized were the searchable genre categories and being able to click on the title for the row to bring up the entire listing in that category. Now you are stuck scrolling to the right and it has just a few in that category.  So much harder to find a movie to watch that I spend less time on this app and more time on prime.  Overall the Max app was a premature launch with limited functionality compared to its predecessor.
Title: Going backward on navigation

Content: This thing freezes and buffers so much I feel like I’m trapped in 1995. The subtitles don’t work, the volume doesn’t work, the videos freeze and close. Do you guys even have software developers, or maintenance, or are they also on strike because you don’t pay them either?  Updating this to add that now it is auto adjusting the volume to 100% every time I hit play on anything and it absolutely scares the heck out of all of us, is wildly unpleasant, and no matter how fast you try to adjust it, you’re not going to be fast enough to prevent the actual headache that occurs from something being so insanely loud
Title: Garbage- volume auto adjusts to 100% and scares everyone every time

Content: 1️⃣First off, movies don’t have extras anymore, only tv shows do now…not ok. Second, in regards to the information of quality for a movie/show, there is none—unless it’s in 4k, in which then it tells you all the details (including audio quality and whatnot). It’d be nice if ALL movies/shows would specify their quality…whether it be 4K, HD, SD, and so on, etc. etc.—just be upfront. 2️⃣Second, all the content in the Extras tab for “The Last Of Us” (for example) is completely out of order, nothing makes sense in the way it’s listed. Like, the Podcast episodes are randomly mixed with the behind-the-scenes episodes, just to name an example.
Title: HBO Max was organized better…

Content: Im tired of constantly having to log out because the system glitches and it won’t show me any shows or even what I’m watching. It’s so annoying. It’s already an entire process to connect it on the tv so for it to constantly glitch like this when you’re just paying to stream is ridiculous. I really hope they fix this, I never had this many issues with the other app which is why I didn’t give it one star. Love the shows on it, I just wish they would update and fix these issues.
Title: Tired of this app

Content: Since the update to “MAX” the continue watching feature has been buggy and not working for shows that I’m currently watching, though old items are still there that I have started but have no desire to finish (and wish I could remove). I have signed out of Max, restarted my Roku TV and logged back in and that fixed the problem for the time and now, the next day, I’m back to having to search for the series and episode that I was watching. First world problem but still annoying.
Title: Continue Watching Not Working

Content: Not able write reviews for Apple TV Max app. So writing the review here. With the change from HBO Max to a new Max app. The media player is no longer the native tvOS media player or no longer behaves like the native tvOS player. This makes it harder to rewind and fast forward. Also not able to use the clickpad ring on the remote to easily scrub through timeline to the exact point in the video. Please change back to native tvOS media player.   Also the sound when the app launches can be irritating, disrupting, and harmful especially depending on the volume level of headphones or sound systems.  Please give the option to disable the sound.  Thanks.
Title: Native tvOS Player Not Used for Apple TV app

Content: Haven’t had the displeasure of updating to Max on all my devices, but the app is terrible on iPad OS. For reference, I’m running the app on a 2022 iPad Pro with the latest OS update.  The app struggles with full screen mode. Sometimes leaving the dock bar visible, sometimes the clock/date/battery, sometimes both. Controls for play/pause, etc. permanently disappear, leaving the only route to play/pause content through the control center. Sometime the curser goes away, sometimes it stays indefinitely. When I zoom view (no black bars) it struggles to back to widescreen again and lags video when doing so.   Aesthetically the app is meh. I’m sure there were IP-related reason for creating the new app but there are zero enhancements in my opinion to the UX/UI over the outgoing HBO Max app. I would not have updated if given the choice and will begrudgingly update the rest of my devices to keep watching my shows.   I’m sure the app issues will get resolved in a future update but the QA of this initial release was awful.
Title: Terrible on iPad

Content: I was told that the switch from HBO Max to Max would be easy, but here I am not able to sign in and when I went to customer support all I get is no help from them, I kept waiting for help but just got different people saying that they were looking up my problem. What has with this app it used to be my favorite but now I’m thinking of canceling my subscription before I get charge for another month.
Title: Not working

Content: OK I like the app it’s just a little bit like the search letters are a bit too small and how I do like the way things are organized. I just please make the slightly bigger because it is hard when I am sitting at the back of my living room, and I just cannot see when I’m trying to search and don’t tell me just get a bigger TV. My TV is perfectly big thank you goodbye ❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️ PS if there is is if there is a way to do this on Settings please let me know. Thank you goodbye.
Title: A pretty good review

Content: The player software is almost unusable.   You can’t use any Apple TV 4K shortcuts, like changing to “Reduce Loud Sounds” for late night play. You must quit the app and plunge deep into System Settings to activate it.  Then quit, back, back, back (you been there too, eh?)  If you want to see an episode again?  It starts waaay at the end of the episode, and never resets — even episodes from GOT I have not seen in years still begin at the very end of the episode! And no quick choice like in ALL apps that use Apple’s built-in player to “Begin Again”.  If you watch a show episode or a movie, and ten minutes in you think “yuck, this is horrible, forget this!”   Max keeps it in your “Recently Watched” area with NO recourse to remove it..   It’s like they are PUNISHING ME for watching a movie I didn’t enjoy…  And Search?  Don’t even go there, I been complaining way more than I ever do in an app review. So I’ll stop here by saying, TWO STARS.  Barely.
Title: Terrible App on Apple TV 4K

Content: I really appreciate having to download a new app on each of my devices just so that Warner Media could drop one word from the name of their streaming service, and give it a stupid decided by committee slogan.  I also look forward to having to download “ax’- this is the one’ in 2025, and “x’-please don’t stop giving us money’ in 2027.  All of which wouldn’t be an issue if they bothered to fix their broken app with the rollout. But that would have required them to focus resources on the technical side, instead of paying 30 marketers to rub all five of their collective neurons together so they could come up with something as inspired as “the one to watch”.
Title: Why is this a new app?

Content: We’ve been asking for you to follow basic ui/ux concepts, but you seem determined to reinvent the wheel. You had chance to start anew—you built a new app—and you still missed the mark. Buttons don’t look like buttons. The ones that do are tiny. Playback of a previously watched show/movie starts at the last second on the timeline, causing it to end and go back to the menu. Episode cards are so large that only 2.5-3 fit on the screen. For why, HBO? For why?
Title: Still managed to screw it up

Content: Seems pointless and inconvenient for users…especially if you have the HBO Max app already installed on several devices, like an Apple TV, Smart tv, IPad , IPhone ….so now you have to download and re connect to you account on all those devices, not to mention having to delete the old app from all those devices…. And honestly speaking…for what seems to be really no benefit….seems like the same shows as before…just a different interface, and I personally liked the old one better. Doesn’t feel like some kind of new and better experience…..really…..what was the point??? I don’t get it.
Title: Just…..why????

Content: Lol, what a joke! I’m not even a Lakers or Celtics fan, but how do you call a series “Winning Time”, base it on the Laker Dynasty, get the viewing audience to buy in, and then CANCEL it midway through following the most devastating playoff defeat in Laker history?  I really despise when networks cancel series for shock value, and that’s clearly what happened here. Netflix started this stupid trend and lost untold amounts of brand loyalty in the process. Now mindless HBO….er, “MAX” (lol) has decided to act the part of trained mynah birds and do the exact same thing. It’s a pathetic tactic, and while you’ll surely grab the headlines you seek, you can do it without my dollars going forward. Subscription cancelled and app deleted.
Title: Cancel “Winning Time”? See ya never

Content: I have been trying to sign in to my account and the service is not accepting my password on one of my TVs and my phone. It is signed in to two other devices with this same password and working fine. I tried to get a password reset email several times and one never came. There is no number to contact customer service and I am not interested in waiting for an email reply for a solution to my problem. I ultimately decided to cancel the service for this reason. It’s a shame because I like the selection of shows and movies.
Title: Great selection, nonexistent customer service

Content: I haven’t noticed any changes after the change from HBO Max. The only issue I’ve noticed is when you use your iPhone to stream. Starting two weeks ago, the voice narration come on automatically. When you try to turn it off , the option isn’t there while casting/streaming. When you play on the iPhone, the option is there, but shows as not selected.  If you’re going to use the app to stream to your television, use another device.
Title: B+

Content: Content is pretty good. Seems to be relying more on dark, “evil”, supernatural and the sensational, rather than the HBO of old that had movies and series that were thought provoking and original. I miss that. In fairness, there are a few exceptions. My biggest issue is with the interface. It can be more difficult than it should be to get back to something you’re watching after you’ve left the app and come back. On other streaming services, it’s the first thing you see, or easily found on a drop down list.
Title: Needs some work

Content: Update: Somehow the app has gone backwards. Now every time I watch something on the iPad it always shows the bright white line on the bottom and the time info etc on top. It on constantly and extremely distracting. Why get rid of the HBO name that took years to build and earned a great reputation as the destination for quality. The app is a massive downgrade in quality. Plus, if I wanted discovery group of channels I would have signed up for it. This change makes no sense at all. Makes me rethink my streaming subscriptions. Update 2:  Max said to remove and download still not working properly. Almost unwatchable on iPad with everything still on the screen.
Title: Why?!?!

Content: The app is terrible. There’s no working Continue Watching feature, which is Streaming 101. If you hunt under My Stuff, it tells you you don’t have any programs in progress even though you do, so you then have to search for the show you’re watching, which wants to start with S1:E1 even though you’re already on S3, and then the episode starts at the end credits so you have to rewind it. The iPad version has a white bar at the bottom of the screen and three dots at the top that you cannot get rid of. Max powers that be: Expect the mass exodus you deserve for destroying a perfectly good app. Many executives need to lose their jobs for this debacle. GET IT TOGETHER!!!
Title: Absolute Trash

Content: I first wanted to watch horror movies like Halloween, scream 1996 obviously bc Billy loomis, and Friday the thirteenth but you had to pay for it all.  I already had paramount plus but it didn’t have everything. Maybe two scream movies and that’s all. But I wanted to watch other things other than those every. Single. Day. So it said the things that I’m looking for are all on max! So thank you soooo much! You actually helped me a lot.
Title: Max is amazing!!!!

Content: The new Max app no longer remembers where you left off. I just started a tv show and am on season 2, but the app doesn’t show it in the Continue Watching section. I’m forced to navigate to the tv show and select the episode I want. Qlso, previously watched episodes don’t have the white bar underneath, indicating that they’ve been watched.   Speaking of Continue Watching, I’ve only been able to remove *some* titles from the list. Not only that, but there’s lot of titles on there that I already finished months ago. There are a handful of titles that can’t be removed, no matter how many times I hit the remove button.
Title: Buggy since the name change

Content: Ever since the change from HBO Max to Max app, the app has been nothing but buggy. In the last couple weeks it’s started to automatically enable audio description when I cast on Google Chromecast. I have updated both the app and chromecast. Tried all the audio/ stereo settings on chromecast. When watching on my phone, I see the English Audio Description setting option however when casting, the audio settings only show English but I assume it’s setting it to Audio Description in the backend. Please fix this as I cannot watch shows and movies otherwise.
Title: Audio description issue

Content: I didn’t think the shift to “max” would have much meaning since they’re just trading three-letter words but it matters. Navigating HBO was super smooth and responsive. Max seems slower. Did y’all get rid of the bonus content at the end of every episode of Succession? I can no longer watch actor/director/show runner interviews and it’s super disappointing. How much content did we lose in your shift to max? I love HBO! It was always a big deal to have it back in the 80’s. Cinemax was known as “skin-a-max” because of the racy late-night soft core porn they always featured. HBO should have taken over cinema, not the other way around.
Title: HBO Nostalgia

Content: I believe Max has probably one of the worst user interfaces for a streaming service platform. Constantly buggy and can never remember where you left off on a show/movie if you pause it and leave the app. I do like the content on max however after only a few short months I decided to cancel my subscription after its frustrating performance. Another thing that I really didn’t like is how they would skip a payment for the month and then collect 2 payments the next month to make up for it. HBO Max was a thousand times better.
Title: Garbage User Interface

Content: This app is very easy to use. However, I am trying to log in with my provider and it is not taking me to the correct page after selecting my provider. Instead, it just shows me the page advertising to sign up for HBO Max through XFINITY and when I log in, it does nothing. PLEASE correct this issue!!! It has been very frustrating to not be able to even log in to use the app.
Title: Weird Bug

Content: This app has been a pain since it came out I had to go back on everything and update everything then had to turn around and make a new account so it deleted all of my progress on my shows even though I already had max and now trying to log in on all my devices we had to change the password and it won’t let us get your stuff together if your gonna change the app at least make it better than your last one I’ve never had any problems out of HBO max and ever since this max came out it’s been non stop issue after issue it’s making me really debate on canceling my subscription.
Title: Trouble logging in

Content: I’m not sure why they needed a whole new app, the old one seemed to work just fine. I just got the new app on my tv and in the last two hours trying to watch a movie with my kids it had sucked! We’ve had lag every few minutes and we have to pause the movie for it to fix itself. But that only lasts for a few minutes then we have to do it again. I was really enjoying the HBO Max app and didn’t kind the cost. But if this doesn’t get fixed asap I’ll be stopping my subscription and I fell like many others will too. HBO you need to work out this problem asap before you starting loosing money left and right!
Title: Why a New App

Content: Max has EVERYTHING on it. It has like this section on it called brand Highlights or something like that but on that section it has like ID,HBO OGS,Max OGS,and stuff like that. I love ID because I love true crime and horror and stuff. Yesterday I clicked on ID and found Body Cam and I was soooooooo happy it was on there because I can’t find that show anywhere anymore. Max has movies like The Goonies,Coraline,Stephan King’s It,Robots, it even has Naked and Afraid on there too. But the overall conclusion is that I LOVE Max
Title: I love Max

Content: I’m not a review-writing person, but this app is too terrible for me to ignore. It loses all control options when streaming: - Accessibility controls often disappear, losing subtitle options (which is non-compliant!).  - No volume control. Changes volume between streams without anyone touching the devices… - Often experience “unexpected errors” when trying to stream. Disconnects with no warning.  - App fails to react to prompts. I’ll go to disconnect it (because of all of these issues), and the app becomes unresponsive.  I’ve tried closing the app, signing out and in, redownloading. Nothing changes. And it’s clear these issues are the app, not the device(s), because all the other streaming apps work just fine.  We often end up watching something else on a different app just out of frustration, which is annoying because the HBO content is far superior, but no content justifies this headache.   The HBO Max app had its glitches, but nothing as disruptive as this.
Title: Terrible streaming functionality.

Content: If somebody from the design side is reading this, please fix this channel so when you're looking at the overview of the episodes you can select which episode you'd like and it gives you an option to restart after you've already finished. It only allows you to restart episodes your currently watching. And when you choose an episode you've already watched even if you finished until the very end, it'll automatically start at the very end and you have to be quick to rewind or it'll go into the next episode. I feel like I'm in 1998 rewinding Disney VHS tapes. The old HBOmax didn't have this issue. Please fix!
Title: Max on Roku

Content: If you would’ve asked me what my preferred streaming platform was a year ago.. I would’ve said Netflix but Max continues to bring the best content. From my day to day binge of Friends for comfort, the anticipation for the next season of Just Like That and nail biters like Love and Death… I’m hooked and have cancelled every other subscription service but my live TV subscription! Also stoked on the ease of use with the upgraded app!!
Title: Truly is the ONE to watch.

Content: First you have to pay so much for a months subscription and the movies constantly freeze the app always has issues on loading and it’s definitely not my WiFi because none of my other apps give as much issues as this one. I hate the fact that I’m trying to watch a Spanish movie with no subtitles and you guys still have it in it so I see huge words when I know Spanish and don’t need subtitles it’s ridiculous. Also it would be nice to have better movies added if I’m going to be paying more than $15 for the subscription.
Title: Needs Improvement

Content: The Max app launched in May and was immediately panned for lacking many features of the old app. The layout is worse and some features, like being able to shuffle episodes of a show, are still missing months after release. What’s also bad is that outside of the US, HBO max still functions, so everyone else gets better features and a more established app. Until I feel this app matches what the old one did, it will be one star from me. I won’t give positive marks to steps taken backwards.   1 star without shuffle. 5 stars when it returns. Simple as that!
Title: Less features than old HBO max. 1 star until shuffle feature is back.

Content: I’m giving this 2 stars because it was working better then the last version.  For the last several days I’ve been trying to get on the app on my tv and it just keeps kicking me back to the main menu screen.  I tried resetting the WiFi several times and it sort of worked but could only watch 1 thing and if I backed out of the app it would have the same problem of kicking back to the main screen.  Frustrating!  HBO has never been able to get their apps working properly with any kind of consistency since HBO Go.
Title: Problem for days

Content: Loving the new update to the app. It’s better and faster. Just have one problem the serious lack of Japanese, Chinese and Korean anime and Tv shows which by the way are 2 total different genres could use a lot of work. I now I’m probably not the only one with this issue. And if I am oh well. It would be nice if you guys to add these. And separate all the American cartoon from the Ghibli studios movies please and thank you
Title: It’s better

Content: Ever since they switched the app to “max” I can no longer watch it on my older iPads or iPhones that have iOS 12 because the older app no longer functions because they disabled the hbo max version that did work. for no reason..it no longer lets you log in.. and “max” requires iOS 14. I don’t see why they make the requirement so high for something as simple as a streaming app. Shouldn’t need the newest iOS or device in order to do something so simple that doesn’t necessitate the need for a new device or OS. Not thrilled with this nonsensical anti consumer move.. they must be working with apple for planned obsolescence.
Title: No longer works on some devices.

Content: 1) The excitement about the HBO+Max rebranding is all about you. Customers don't care. If there's a benefit to this switch, I have yet to find it. The MAX app is obviously the original HBO app with some new logos. Yay.  / 2) No Apple Magic Keyboard support. Your users (remember us?) have keyboards and would like to be able to do simple things like skip backward/forward/pause with the space bar and arrow keys. It's not hard. Call me if you need help. Or refer to the dev docs.  / 3) New bugs, including the transport overlay remaining on screen and having to be manually dismissed. This wouldn't be a big deal if the rest of MAX worked properly. It's easy to overlook a few bugs, but your entire app is a bug.  / 4) Summary: Your marketing team is probably patting itself on the back for swapping out "HBO" assets for "MAX": Your customers *don't care*. There's nothing like paying for a premium service and seeing the dough invested in all the wrong things. Your priorities are a joke.
Title: Rebranding: *Nobody cares*: Fix the app first!

Content: Only thing I want to say is bring back all the classic Ben 10 plz. My son was watching it and then you took it off the next day he was upset and I love the classics. Bring them all back on. You’ll get more reviews and they’ll be better. A lot of people like the old time shows we watched as kids. Like pink panther. Pop eye. All of those and more bring them back. It’ll make a lot of people happy
Title: Bring it all back plz

Content: First, had the HBO Max app for years and it was great!  No issues as of late.  Had to switch to the new “Max” App and we have had nothing but problems. We have noticed about 30 minutes into steaming a show, it gets stuck…. spinning wheel... stuck again…. longer spinning wheel….. then perpetually stuck.  Have to reboot everything g and start all over.  No, it does not remember where we left off….. we have to figure that out and scroll to the episode and spot within the episode, and then it gets stuck again.  Absolutely frustrating!  Refusing to use it until things are fixed because it’s a  waste of our time.
Title: “Max” stinks!

Content: The most irritating thing about the change is my programs aren’t being remembered anymore. I’m in the middle of a couple of series and I have to go to the search and find the season and episode each time I want to watch. When it was still HBOMax, it used to mark my spot of whatever I was watching every time. If I’m paying for something, I expect to get my money’s worth. Frustration has set in, and I’m about at my wits end with the service. I know it’s ‘new’, and the content is great, but please fix the issues.
Title: Frustrating

Content: The app runs well, there is a lot of content available, The shows and the menus look great, and everything transferred from HBO max without a problem so I’m enjoying it right now. The only issues I have is that certain features from the old app is missing here, like the ability to download the iPad version on the Mac, or being able to watch with friends on FaceTime. If you could implement these past features soon that would make a great improvement to the experience.
Title: Good app but lacking features

Content: Very pleased with content. There doesn’t seem to be much missing. I’ve only been looking for my favorite series so far and they’re all here. I would strongly recommend better search options. There is SOOOO much content on this site that if you do a keyword search you’re getting 20 pages of everything from mythbusters to Sesame Street to Sex in the City. Would be nice if there were ways to search just in discovery or hbo etc.
Title: Advanced search options would be great

Content: Its a really good app and they have great movies and shows on it! However i really wish they had like a rate what you’ve just seen like Netflix or other streaming services offer! Because i feel like that really does help personalize like your recommendations on what to watch next! And that really does help especially if you’re someone like me who will sit and watch like 3 hours of trailers trying to find something good to watch but then never end up actually watching anything!
Title: Great streaming service, besides one thing

Content: The content quality has gone down hill. Love that Rick and Morty are on here. We are going to take a break for a while until something decent comes on, like Dune part 2.  Wish they had not messed up the last season of Game of Thrones. We use to re watch that all the time. We stopped re watching it after season 6 , hard to rewatch one of your favorite shows when you know they rune it in the end. They really should have thought that through. Better to wait than rush crap and wreck something. Hopefully they learned their lesson.
Title: Quality of shows has gone downhill

Content: The old HBO Max was pretty decent for maneuvering the menus and shows, episodes were in 4 columns, there was a shuffle option for shows with more than X episodes which was very nice, and you had the option to start over a movie or show when you clicked it.  Now there is no shuffle, there's just one super long line of episodes instead of columns, and you have to access a submenu instead of clicking on an episode to start it over. Just a  pain to navigate around the menu now.   Please bring back columns, shuffle, and an option to restart without having to go into the options for an episode
Title: Horrible UI. Please Revert

Content: Personally I like the update I know a lot of people are having issues with it but I’m enjoying it. I do however wish it stayed the color purple just because of the fact it was the only streaming service with the color purple and I found that very unique. Especially because HBO max was saving discovery so I believe it’s should’ve stayed purple.   But other than that I’m enjoying the new merging of the two apps.
Title: HBO Max >> Max

Content: I opened the HBO Max app today to be greeted with a message telling me to download their new app. I was forced to comply only to be disappointed. After waiting for the download and logging into the “max” app (super creative new name), I didn’t see any real improvements from their previous app. Now maybe I missed some changes because it was a short matter of time before it logged me out and refused to let me log back in. The online support was useless, and if I knew this was all going to happen, I would’ve just cancelled my subscription yesterday to avoid it all. Don’t waste your time with this garbage subscription service or app.
Title: Unnecessarily Inconvenienced

Content: I love how in all the movies they always have a happy ending and they’re just amazing. I didn’t know Harry Potter cricket, so good this is one of the greatest movies ever and I never watched right now. I am only last movie and I feel like I’m gonna love it all of the scary, sad and happy parts but all in all. there was a good The part I hated most probably when Dumbledore died. It was really sad, especially since Snape killed him was supposed to.
Title: Harry Potter movies

Content: HBO continues to have the worst tech of all of the streaming services. 20+ mins to get logged into the new - and completely unnecessary- app, all bc you can’t connect with your provider through your smart tv and they hide the information about needing to connect through the (new) app in the subsection of a hidden “help” page. God forbid they have a customer service phone number where you can connect with an actual human being to trouble shoot the issue, probably bc they’ve replaced all of their employees with AI in addition to refusing to pay their writers all in the name of preserving their bottom line and paying exorbitant amounts of money to their CEOs
Title: Worst Technology

Content: App is good, worth the fee…. Only issue still is movies come in to dark and shows, app doesn’t have the ability to adjust the brightness like Netflix app does which is disappointing, being this has been an issue since hbo max started … and I have repeatedly have said this to hbo max and no updates to fix this issue 🤨😩🤬 which takes away from viewing experience.
Title: Great

Content: Having access to all the food network shows and house building shows along with what HBO brought to the table is undeniably a big plus. The new app also seems to load a lot faster on my Apple TV.   I do wish they kept all the categories(adult swim, max originals, etc) to the side instead of me scrolling to the bottom but hopefully I can adjust to that.
Title: So far I think it’s an improvement.

Content: It’s very cool cause it’s not just HBO, it’s to the max. So take whatever show you might like, say Game of Thrones, and with this app it’s GOT Max. You get more than even George RR Martin could envision, it’s like George RR Max Martin. It might get confusing if another show had Max in the title, for instance Mad Max, because it would become Mad Max Max. It might make sense for HBO to avoid shows with the name Max in the title. Actively working to prevent this type of a snafu would be best for the bottom Max line.
Title: Very cool Max

Content: I loved HBO Max, and didn’t really understand the need for a change. I’m sure someone bought out someone and the people in charge changed - blah blah woof woof. As with anything new, there are glitches. Shows keep pausing to load, fast forward and rewind options are slow…. And before you say “it’s your internet” … my husband is a gamer and we have the fastest Internet available. None of which are affecting my overall life. It’s just really annoying and once again… I don’t really understand the need for a change.
Title: Meh

Content: Terrible low rent version of a well working interface - AppleTV seemed like an afterthought - subtitles don’t stay on so have to be selected for each episode of something even - continue watching doesn’t always show most recent episode watched if you’ve watched on two different devices - if you try to rewatch the most recent episode it just defaults back out to the menu as if it doesn’t want you to rewatch it - so many issues for anyone with hearing issues/sensory issues (hello! That blue is terrible) only upside has been that I got to cancel the arbitrary Discovery+ sub we had since 95% of the stuff we watch is available on Max.
Title: Terrible

Content: Honestly, I like the Max app better than the original app, because it’s less glitchy and the chromecast experience is better. However, I’ve noticed it tends to forget your current place in a show by ~2 minutes occasionally. My biggest complaint is that you cannot access downloaded shows without Wi-Fi (ie. on airplane mode). What’s the point of downloading shows if the app won’t load them when you aren’t connected? Please consider making this possible.
Title: Better than HBO max but could improve

Content: HBO has been there with games of thrones . I am sorry if you hate me or the show ! But yes that was the only reason I came to hbo that being said … I am shallow when I watch gossip girl yea I know the writing is ew . But I’m a fan .. I am a DC F-fest I love dc everything as long as it’s good writing .  Some  anime is blah , but for the most part ! And true crime !!!!! Come on forensic files !!!!!    So Sansa can kick the f out of Batman any given day  while leaving clues so animal planet knows it was her !
Title: Why I love max

Content: Does not save my progress of the show I am rewatching. It's not listed on the "continue watching" section of the home page so I have to manually search for the show every time and then try to figure out what episode I left off with. To top it off, since this is a rewatch, every time I click the episode I want to start it skips to the last ~10 seconds of the episode and starts immediately trying to skip to the following episode. It is absolutely infuriating to use this app, to the point I almost want to cancel until they get it together.
Title: SAVE MY PROGRESS!

Content: There’s a lot wrong with this, and the HBO max app was way better. The app is harder to navigate and use and definitely still in an experimental stage. The main issue I have is SharePlay doesn’t work anymore. Me and my boyfriend are long distance and SharePlay makes it easier for us to feel connected and HBO max was one of our favorite apps to use. I know they removed stuff and stoped production of a lot of already green lit shows and movies (including the amazing world of gumball movie) but I didn’t think they would get rid of to many features like SharePlay. Extremely disappointed.

I was pumped for this app. Big disappointment. Shuffling episodes went away. Then I noticed when an episode ends and the next one starts, when you go back to the home menu it starts the series at season 1 episode 1. For example if I watched season 3 episode 2 of veep and episode 3 starts, if I decide I want to watch something else, the main series page will say "watch season 1 episode 1" and it'll be removed from my watch history. I now need to remember what episode I just watched in order to continue where I left off. So disappointing
Title: No shuffling and doesn't retain "keep watching"

Content: Does anyone else notice that shows you just watched will remain in your “Continue Watching” row? I have to go through and restart and fast forward to the end to get them to go away. Many won’t go away until you fast forward through the credits. Weird.  Also, a lot of the new shows are so trashy. “My feet are killing me” is a reality show about foot doctors that has 4 seasons!!! Who wants to sift through shows like that to find something quality to watch? Sometimes less is more.
Title: Continue Watching

Content: Since you create a new version a week ago to “fix bugs” your app took me out of my account not allowing me to sign in and showing this device sync error,I contacted your support team and they were unable to help me,I even tried to create another account but nothing seems to work the same error keeps popping up. So sadly I am afraid I won’t be able to create another account cuz you won’t let me and after almost 2 years of using HBO you forced me to request a refund for my last payment month of subscription which I won’t be able to use so why should I pay for it.
Title: Your new version don’t work

Content: I cannot play a single movie on the ps4 I’ve done digging and neither can anyone else. It will play the same two or single ad in a very dodgy quality ab it’s not my WiFi everyone on ps4 is having the same problem they can’t watch movies or shows bc it started buffering immediately after the ad and refuses to play it they only way I could entertain the idea more was wait and it took an entire hour to load then it just restarted again and again. I have to give two stars since it simply doesn’t even work on this platform
Title: Serious issue

Content: I have two AppleTVs in my home. On one of them, Max automatically started working correctly without a hitch. Unfortunately, that’s the guest room TV. On our main TV, Max just didn’t want to let us in and refused to connect with my paid cable provider subscription. On hold with customer service for hours. I vaguely recall how they also botched the last transition from HBO to HBOmax where I lost my complete favorites list. Didn’t learn a thing apparently. These guys still don’t understand technology.  Adding boilerplate „developer responses“ after a month doesn’t help either.   I temporarily solved the problem by swapping the two Apple TV units. After 2 weeks, I finally got through to support and they “reset the blockage“ in the account, whatever that means, which enabled me to reconnect the second unit. My email query finally received a response another week later.   If these guys were technically more competent, they would eat Netflix‘s lunch. But like this, meh.
Title: Yet another botched transition

Content: When the new app launched, I was easily able to switch over to Max and had no problems. Until yesterday. I went to go on the app on my tv and it told me I had to sign in, so I tried. But it won’t let me log in. It says my information is incorrect. But every thing works on my iPad. I’ve tried to do the reset email thing multiple times but I never get the email. I’ve tried troubleshooting and what not but nothing works. Idk how it worked one day and then stopped working the next. Which is great because I just got charged for the month. Yay.
Title: I have no clue what’s going on

Content: I had trouble with the HBOmax app but the Max app is even worse. It works okay on my TV and laptop although it won’t save my place on TV shows and put them in my continue watching. The mobile app is a disaster. I can’t use it at all, I immediately get the “something went wrong” error message when I try to watch anything. I’ve tried every single troubleshooting tip on the bell site, none of them work. Online customer service was useless as well. When I was connected to an actual “representative” I’m pretty sure it was still a bot, it was just regurgitating the same things form the help site
Title: This app is terrible

Content: It says if you have hbo max to use the same password so i sign in and it says no account can be find so hit the restore purchase button my account sign in but when my family ask for the information to get access there accounts it won’t accept it saying there no account I send them my information to log in it says the password is wrong and so I went to try and make a new password since I use the same one on hbo max it says password doesn’t match the account and it won’t let me create a new password
Title: Profile setup and password problem

Content: If I could give this negative stars, I would. First, HBO Max charges me 6 days ago for my normal subscription. Now that it’s Max it wouldn’t let me sign in. It said I needed to “renew” my subscription. So I did thinking it was just a formality with the name change. Nope. Charged me twice. And now it won’t even let me sign in! I hit forgot password and changed my password and it let me log in but it wouldn’t let me watch anything! It kept saying Error. So I exit out of it and tried again and it made me log back in! And it said my password didn’t match again! I just changed it less than 5 minutes ago! HOW?! This is ridiculous. I’m canceling.
Title: TERRIBLE

Content: I watched hbo go when my mom worked for a cable company. I got hooked and I signed up for hbo max and still loved it! Curb, friends, Seinfeld (for a second) and veep! I LOVED avenue 5 and it’s such a heartbreaking cancel. Thanks for including the discovery network because I love Alton and Bobby! The app is really awesome but some reason, friends will crash randomly but it’s been a while since I noticed. The best network, for the f-word LOL
Title: Started with GO, still here!

Content: Love the merging of all the brands and channels into one app. It’s great that you’re highlighting where there are “New Episodes”… that was an issue in the discovery+ app. The recommendations are helping us discover shows we didn’t know existed from the last few years. Overall, the major change bringing all these together in a single app is a great user experience. Than you!
Title: Great brand update and app from HBO Max to Max

Content: I get my Max subscription through att, and have for over a year. The app constantly signs me out, and then sends me through a loop each I try to sign in with my provider. Then I have to reach out to att to fix it. It is a terrible experience and completely destroys my trust in the service. Fix your login issues, please. No matter the method of subscribing, I shouldn’t face this much frustration just to watch a movie or tv show. Learn from your vast sea of competitors and make signing in the easiest part. Content doesn’t matter if I can’t get to it.
Title: Provider connection is broken

Content: If you don’t have HBO Max then where are you at like they have added old TV shows that Netflix has taken off and added it to this that’s a plus then they’re adding the new movies that are in movie theaters on here too. I’m like I don’t even have to go to the movies, I can watch it from the comfort of my home, but yes if you’re thinking about getting a subscription with HBO max, you should 100%
Title: Amazing

Content: Back when hbo max was new, it had so very many issues between movies and shows not loading — all the way to the app just closing. Since the update, all glitches and bugs have been fixed and there have been little to no issues and I’ve Been able to stream consistently without interruption. Very satisfied.
Title: Glitches: seen and repaired

Content: While I do like having Discovery+ content included, the HBO Max user experience was MUCH better. The most frustrating part is the Continue Watching. If your rewatching a show it doesn’t appearing under Continue Watching. Once you navigate to the to the show, specific season and click on the next episode, you then have to rewind it to the beginning because it starts at the end credits. Really annoying. I also experience buffering which never happened with HBO Max.
Title: HBO Max had a better user experience l

Content: I have a monthly subscription through Apple. Today suddenly when we attempt to watch from any device we get a “plan change unavailable…” message. I’ve been attempting to get help via chat agents for hours. I’ve logged off an on every device, been sent a password change link and tried it and still same message. The chat agents put you on hold forever, then just disconnect and you have to start all over. The one I have currently is rude and answering “alright!” Etc. I just want this fixed. Incredibly frustrating
Title: Worst customer service

Content: While I really appreciate the new shows, I’ve had nothing but issues with Max on my Roku.  It doesn’t save anything to my continue watching so if I stop watching something it takes me like 10 minutes just to figure out where I left off. This isn’t an issues with movies since I can just watch it through, but I tend to watch a lot of sitcoms.  I’ll wait to see if there is an update on this, but I can’t imagine continuing to pay for a service where continue watching isn’t working.  Even if I save the series to my list it takes me all the way back to the very beginning.  Beyond frustrating…
Title: Big Issue

Content: When it was HBO Max there were barely any ads. I could watch the sopranos with ease with no ads at all. Now all of a sudden there is a switch to MAX, that I didn’t ask for, which only adds shows that I will never watch and a plethora of ads at every turn. I can’t fast forward a show or rewind without having to rewatch an ad if there is an add break at that moment in the show or movie. This is ridiculous. I loved this app when it was HBO Max cause it was the best streaming service with so few ads, and now I’m just bombarded with ads at every moment.
Title: Shame with the ads

Content: Max has been absolutely horrible. The ad tier has so many ads it is crazy. In a 30 minute show I think there was 5 ad breaks. It makes watching shows and movies terrible. I. Addition about every 3 ads the stream will freeze and I have to back out then resume watching. During the shows/movies it will randomly buffer then jump back 10 seconds multiple times in a row. I thought it was my internet but I have no issues on other platforms. Overall HBO has taken a major step back in quality all in the name of screwing over customers to make an extra buck
Title: Streaming continues to get worse

Content: I am not a fan of this new app compared to the HBOmax app on the AppleTV. The HBOmax app had the content better organized than this new max app. It’s more difficult to find shows/movies. I liked the side bar on the HBOmax app where you could switch to different hubs. The other issue is when you’re in a hub, say Discovery, when you scroll down it’ll jump back up to the top of the page causing you to having to scroll back down. This does this continuously & is very annoying. I think this app could be far better & needs corrections.
Title: Unorganized Content

Content: Update: I received a support message regarding the issue below. However, it established no real contact with support staff, but instead just a referral to a generic guide to casting that failed to address the specific problem. Re-rated from three to two.  Going from HBO to Max should be fine, but with this first launch the developers neglected to include the ability to skip opening credits. I’m casting to a Chromecast from my iPhone, maybe that’s part of it. Disappointing but hopefully it won’t take too long to reinstate—pretty basic stuff here.
Title: Poor support and unresolved oversight

Content: Since updating from HBO Max to Max, the screen wants to auto default to a specific setting instead of the way the phone is set. If I touch any drop down menus to adjust brightness, check time, etc.. the screen flips back to its preferred spot, not the way the phone is sitting. While watching a show, I have to constantly flip phone over and back to get the screen to show upright.  Otherwise the app is great and a smooth transition, but the above mentioned bug is very irritating.
Title: Please fix screen tilt issue IOS 16.5

Content: I’m not sure why they changed the app but it no longer saves the shows I’m watching ( I now have to search for the show I’m watching and figure out which episode I last watched by starting the show and checking to see if it looks like I’ve already watched that episode). It’s a bit frustrating that they had someone that worked and changed it for something that doesn’t work.
Title: Incredibly frustrating app.

Content: In the scheme of everything going on in the world right now the HBO to MAX rebrand is really if any importance however. Just why? Why make everyone migrate to a new app and a new website? Why undo all the good changes HBO and HBO max have made? This is blatant greed and ignorance from corporate. HBO was one of the few remaining companies that produces good content and they’re going to throw that all away to add cheaper reality TV no one wants because it’s cheaper and makes the CEO more money? Greedy selfish people. And then to remove writer credits and make a half hearted apology that doesn’t even really accept fault? I am two seconds away from canceling my subscription. Also the blue is ugly.
Title: Why?

Content: When I cast the movie to a chrome device every time I leave the app and come back while the app is playing the movie starts over. This happens on IOS 17.0.3, not sure if it’s due to the update but it happens every time. I cast the movie I’m watching to my smart tv using Chrome cast, then I put the app in the background, then when I go back on the app the movie is still streaming but it just restarts unfortunately.
Title: Great Application when it works!

Content: Playing anything through the computer changes the audio to Spanish. I nor does anyone in my household speaks Spanish. So there is no one nor a reason for the app to start everything we watch in Spanish. Sometimes when we back out and then hit play again, the audio comes back to English. Sometimes it does not. Also after just watching a show in English I started a movie that began in Spanish.  This app has been nothing but bugs since the change over and we actually have less features than before.
Title: Playing through the computer changes the audio to Spanish

Content: I am loving Max because of the variety of shows/movies to watch. However, I wish the app was more organized and user friendly. For example, list the new releases as they come out.  Therefore, shows and movies are easier to find instead of having to sort through all the genres. Otherwise, MAX is amazing!
Title: I am loving Max just one since change I would make

Content: Hello! I absolutely love the app! I, myself, am a huge fan when it comes to horror, especially Stephen King’s IT. But since about a couple months ago I can’t find the miniseries, the 2017 movie, or IT Chapter 2. This film is, oddly enough, my comfort movie, and I am a bit disappointed that IT was removed. I feel like bringing the movies back should help to promote Welcome to Derry as well.. That’s all I have to say but thank you anyways for reading!❤️
Title: Could you possibly bring Stephen King’s IT back?

Content: I have been using this app since it first launched trying to update it anytime I can and ever since it launched I have not been able to cast from my iPhone 14 Pro to my Vizio smart TV without being able to change the audio from audio English with description to just English without descriptions. The English audio seems to be defaulted to audio with description without being able to change it to regular English. Spanish is an option, but I would prefer the English audio if somebody could please update once this issue has been cleared up.
Title: Casting only limited to English with description audio

Content: The overall look, ease of use and performance of the app is a major upgrade on the previous iteration. The app has a great look to it and responds better on all devices. It is easier to search for titles and the app now feels like it can rival the other streaming apps. I have found myself rewatching older HBO originals and trying out some that I never gave a try such as the sopranos.
Title: Great improvement on HBO MAX

Content: I reached out with a problem when traveling abroad where my downloads disappeared. After being passed from a couple representatives they told me a team would have to look into it further and would email me a response. I asked how long it would take to hear back and I was advised they work 24/7 and thus a response should not take long. It has been nearly five days and just no response. I followed all the FAQs to be able to watch downloaded content abroad and the information was just straight up wrong. And then when I asked for help they just didn’t bother to reply.
Title: Horrible Customer Service

Content: Max has such a wide variety of shows and movies to watch. A little bit of everything! I got really tired of the same old Netflix shows (in my opinion it’s more family based) max has so much to watch. From reality tv, to horror movies, to the newest movies in theaters! Absolutely love this streaming service and will recommend to all my friends and family!
Title: My favorite streaming service!

Content: The app, but on my phone and on my Roku TV, does not reliably store my viewing history. So, even I want to continue watching a series, I have to search for it and try to guess where I left off. The app on my phone also regularly signs me out, even though I’ve elected to stay signed in. The app on my phone also doesn’t reliably sync with the app on my TV, so I can’t start something in one place and continue it elsewhere like I could with the old app. Overall, it’s pretty bad.
Title: App didn’t store recently viewed

Content: Max is just an absurdly boring word with next to no meaning and zero connection to any of the content. It’s the kind of word an absurdly boring white male(s) with los much money they are completely out of touch with what any non-rich non-white person or “the kids” might actually think is interesting. Never having to be creative in your live while making money and a career off the creativity of others leads to things like an awful non-descriptive and dull word like “Max” taking over the most respected brand in all of television. Who give a crap how the app works “Max” is one of the dumbest names for anything the has ever been.
Title: HBO was the brand

Content: This new max app is awful. It wiped out the series that we were watching and won’t save them now.  (Although, it did save a show I haven’t been watching.). You have to search for the show you want every time, and it does not save where you left off. It always starts on season 1 episode 1, and you have to scroll through the whole thing to find the episode you left off on. It also starts at the end of the episode and jumps to the next. I cannot click on the episode I want, I have to click on the episode before it. The app used to work perfectly. Now, it is terrible.
Title: Ruined the app

Content: Just got the new app, and I am a bit disappointed. I really liked the old format and look, but I’m sure (as the title says) this one will be fine. The thing I’m most sad about it that we can’t have our own pictures for the profiles anymore, since that’s been something fun for my family and made this service stand out. I am glad my shows and progress through things carried over, so that’s a plus.
Title: It’s fine

Content: I don’t like the fact that you originally merged the HBO and Cinemax apps, yet not all of the Cinemax programming was included initially, and now to add insult to injury a lot of movies and TV series that were originally on Cinemax, and that should have been included with HBO Max are now in a separate app just for Cinemax!1 It just seems like a cash grab .The interface needs to be more like the HBO Max app, which was close to perfect. You should also add a “rate it” subroutine so viewers can rate the films.
Title: Streamlining

Content: I have no idea why this app is rated so high. It’s trash. You get kicked out every time you switch shows. It’s ridiculous. There was no reason for this new app when the old one was great. You could’ve just added the “new” content to the old app instead of roll this garbage out. Check your rating’s on Apple TV. The truth lies there. Just when I started to think it was an Apple issue I logged into my smart TV. After one day of watching HBO I couldn’t use the app AGAIN. Nothing but error messages. It won’t even let me login. At least Apple lets me login five times a day! Thee worst app ever zero stars if I could.
Title: Bring back HBOMax

Content: Even though they’ve made some changes, I’ve learned to accept change lol, I am starting to enjoy the shows that are showing up on MAX.  The subscription price is still a little higher than  I would normally pay, MAX does offer the entertainment I need for my style in movies I am a huge movie watcher.   This is the streaming app for you if your a movie fanatic like me, has the 80’s, 90’s and the classics, I do respect that.  Thank you MAX
Title: Good Selection

Content: Absolutely terrible for casting to a tv. There’s no ability to skip intros, recaps, or credits (which is honestly torture with the lengthy beginnings and endings of shows like GOT). When you try to manually rewind or fast forward using your phone there’s no image while you scroll so you just have to guess where to stop. It CONSTANTLY disconnects phone controls and you have to kill the app to regain controls, but then you only get a “pause/play” control and so you have to stop and restart casting all together to regain the ability to fast forward or rewind. It’s just so so so bad and frustrating.
Title: Awful for casting

Content: Did someone lose a high stakes poker game? The only logical reason I can assume resulted in using “Max” to name the results of the corporate merger. “Max?” My ten year old Chihuahua is named Max. Love my dog but he’s not the stuff used to name a mega corporation. When I hear “HBO” I think of the beginning of cable television entertainment. The HBO programming lead in was classic: horns honking, conversation buzzing, a drone flight down a bustling street in New York. You knew something exciting was coming up. Max? Max needs to go out to pee.
Title: I don’t get it

Content: This app is so frustrating.  From the beginning, it forces the user to turn off subtitles for every show.  There should be a default for the user that is a set it and forget it.  Secondly, for the past several days, the app is extremely slow to respond to the Apple TV remote, I mean it takes 30 seconds for the app to respond.  This has occurred on 2 different Apple TV boxes.  I have cleared the cache, signed out and back in, assured I have the most recent release, and even deleted the app and reinstalled it.  Nothing improves the response.      Never had these problems with the old HBO Max app.
Title: Are we using the same app?

Content: Who is this imposter? "Max" What a charade. Fools, ditching a surname for an attempt at some kind of shrewd politick. My mother would never. The future is so bright, and for this cloud of pollution to boil in, deranged as it is, choosing not to learn from the history of life and creation by spitting in the face of all philosophy and going against the sole absolute truth; life is the most beautiful accident. Play God. Do it. This will only solidify the essence of life in your death. Succumb to yourself, follow Twitter, Elon is waving with white. There have been yous before you. Wanna find them? You will. Just keep ignoring the culmination of knowledge, you'll catch up in no time.
Title: Tradition Goes Hand in Hand with Progress

Content: Updated review: after a few days of trying to log in and getting error messages, I was finally able to log in via my cable provider. App works great now and I was able to enjoy my shows while traveling. Thank you!  Update the app and I’m still unable to log in. I hope they fix this sooner than later.
Title: Finally able to log in!!

Content: When you’re tag has to be “the place to watch HBO” what was the point of changing the name to begin with. The app switching back to the old style video player that caused a bunch of issues after hbo max already fixed it. All the Discovery shows that were put on the app are just the same types of things I’d be reporting as spam if it showed up on my feed anywhere else so I really wish there was a way to have it separated or able to block it out, if my phone plan didn’t still include Max with it I wouldn’t even have an account with it still at this point.
Title: Downgrade in all aspects

Content: This app so far does seem to work better than the HBO app did, but it is much more annoying to me. I would love to tell it what I want choose from rather than being presented mostly shows and features that I don’t care for.   Also, I really like the old tabs where I could see a complete list of new movies and a complete list of movies that are leaving soon. Now there are difficult to find, partial lists. I would rather have a slightly glitchy app with what I want to see than this.
Title: I don’t care about Discovery stuff and where is Last Chance?

Content: Not an improvement. The “Continue Watching” section doesn’t come up consistently, and the app can’t remember where I was previously watching. I’m going through Dr. Who and it goes back to season 1 episode one every session. If I quit watching in the middle of an episode it shows that I’ve watched it all the way through. If I click on the episode I want to watch it goes to the next episode immediately. I’m really getting fed up. Someone fix this bug already. It does the SAME THING on my Roku! Clearly not just a mobile issue 😑
Title: Can’t remember watch history

Content: Just downloaded the app and was able to sign right in using my existing HBO Max credentials.  I was also pleasantly surprised to find that all my saved shows and movies were there.  For whatever reason, I didn’t have a lot of hope that this would be the case, but thankfully they were all there.  Look forward to checking the app out further.
Title: No Problems

Content: Previously on the HBO Max app, I would be able to watch movies at a much lower volume with more balanced sounds — now I have to listen to everything much louder with dialogue and effects completely off balance in volume. My continue watching queue also requires me to watch EVERYTHING to 0:00 for it to be removed from the queue — previously the HBO app would clear movies and shows after simply reaching the credits. Why the rebrand? Why the new app? I liked the purple better than blue and the HBO name much more than just a simple, corny “max.”
Title: Sound Quality Issues / Continue Watching

Content: I really enjoy Max, I’m finding all kind of enjoyable movies to watch. I’m loving it..! I didn’t know Max have very enjoyable movies. It almost hard for me to enjoy a good movie. With Max I’m getting a little of everything. Thank you Max…! Keep up the awesome job you’re doing… Thank you for being here. U tried to tap the stars again, it didn’t show up with my writing, you got a high 5” rating…!❤️
Title: 5 Stars

Content: Your chromecast experience is the worst of any app I’ve ever used. I’ve got a gen2 chromecast and whenever casting a show, if I open the app on my phone to pause the tv, the episode skips back to the very beginning of the episode 100% of the time. So I always need to remember “ok I’m like 32 minutes in, so I need to remember that since I’m trying to open the app and I’m gonna have to skip back to where I was…oh and all progress from my viewing sessions aren’t saved so later on an iPad or another tv I’ll need to manually skip back to where I was. The HBO Max app did not have these problems…
Title: Even worse than the last app

Content: I’ve been a subscriber for a year. The yearly subscription fee option is amazing , as it lets me not worry about my account being charged while I’m actively in college. Most of the best shows and movies are on HBO, and I don’t get a million in-necessary emails. They recently expanded and brought in even more content. I 100% am renewing my subscription when the yearly option opens back up in august!!
Title: I love MAX.

Content: Great to have HBO and other premium channels bundled and offering us currently running shows alongside the back catalogue for rediscovering canonic shows. Categories/channels and Interface could use some work, though, especially having to wade through the seasons menu to find single episodes 9why can’t it remember which season you are watching when looking up episodes. My Stuff is also not intuitive to find.
Title: Enjoying MAX

Content: Overall the app is fine. The shows are pretty good and there’s a good selection. I just hate the my app keep logging me out on every single one of my devices. Phones, tablets, TV’s… doesn’t matter what it is. I get Max free through my service with AT&T, so I have to use my AT&T info to log into the app. I’m not sure if that has something to do with why it makes me log in again every time I open the app. But I’m over it honestly. No one else I know seems to have this problem, but me!
Title: Keeps logging out

Content: When it was HBO Max I barely found content that I wanted to watch. But since becoming Max I decided to keep it because I love House Hunters and Chopped! So now I have plenty to watch until the other WB movies and HBO shows start up later! I love having “blue” entertainment on in the background where I don’t have to worry about something inappropriate on while my children are playing.
Title: Almost cancelled!!

Content: I don’t have any issues with the “new” version of this app as I’m new to HBO so I never expected the previous version and the app seems fine to me. Unsure what I missed. However, when I cast anything to my Sony TV, it takes the volume to 100 every single time. I don’t know what within the app would be causing this as I don’t have the issue with any other casting causing this to happen but when anything I pick to watch blows my speakers out, it’s a problem. Please look into this 🖤
Title: Casting issue

Content: Max, it’s just better because there’s way less glitches and if something goes wrong I can just reset it and everything will be what back to normal it’s way more enjoyable experience because HBO used to crash almost every hour and I’m a guy that likes to been South Park for a long time I’ve been watching it for like seven days now I’m almost done.
Title: Why max is just better than HBO max

Content: The reverse and fast forward options don’t really work well, it doesn’t skip or rewind and it takes almost a minute for the show to play on after you use it. Also, when I pause my show and close the app, it doesn’t start off from where I paused it when I return to the app. It always starts off 5 minutes from where I left off, I’m constantly having to fast forward to where I was. Max is cool but if they were gonna make us switch from HBO Max to this, it should’ve been on par if not better !!
Title: Still some bugs to fix

Content: Sense HBO max upgrade to max it’s had more TV shows and movies I hope for good ratings on this app when you want to watch a TV show as like every season, you can think of an episode i watched a lot of South Park on this app and I’m hoping to check out that gremlins TV series. That would be funny. You did a good job on the last of us TV show the zombies and everything was just like the video game.
Title: HBO Max upgrade to max

Content: HBO Max felt like a safe bet when it came to exploring new content. Incredibly high quality material and features across the board. Now it's swamped with z-grade guff from the Discovery Network. Not only that, but HBO Max's UI and features have all essentially been gutted. Even their “hubs” section has been rebranded as “brand spotlight” which makes the entire app feel cold and corporate. Why is it blue now? Oh, because it focus tested well. I don't know if they were able to focus test the streaming quality though because it does not stop buffering. Nearly doubled the run time of the show. Just incredibly disappointing.
Title: I'm Legitimately Disappointed

Content: I don’t wanna question the marketing expertise of a company that’s made billions by foisting Chip and Joanna Gaines on the world, but Disney is blue. Paramount is blue. Prime Video is blue. This app is as generic as Discovery’s bland reality TV programming. It’s less user friendly than HBO. And it’s cluttered with extra programming.   With prestige shows like Barry and Succession ending, I fear for the future of HBO as a place for must-see programming. The buzz about The Idol being re-written to appeal to more viewers doesn’t sound great. And Discovery runs shows for 8 million seasons. Will that happens with dramas on HBO now too?  We already have a place for shows that run too long…Showtime.
Title: Discovery Bought HBO to Destroy It’s Prestige

Content: Netflix has lost it’s shine for a while and Disney only has select things; I’ve always liked the franchises HBO has run, and their formula for the shows/movies they have is working well. I always find something I want to watch here - Cartoon Network shows from the ‘90s, DC movies, and the HBO series from the 2000s. Keep it up, whoever is making those choices
Title: Tbh this is the best streaming service

Content: I had to download the Max app on my Apple TV to replace the old app… and I hate the new one. The old app had content that was easy to find because of the hubs: here’s the DC Comics stuff, here’s the movie classics, here’s the Adult Swim, etc. And the new app just has it all lumped together. I can no longer browse content the way I could before. It’s a huge step backward and I’m very angry about it. I’m seriously thinking about dumping it altogether until it’s at least as usable as it was before. Just a few days ago, I was telling a friend that HBO Max was my favorite streamer. Now I’m thinking about dumping it altogether. Way to go, geniuses.
Title: A huge step backward

Content: Why do I need to log in and re-create an account every time that I want to use this app? It happens both on my TV, computer, and phone almost every time that I try to access max. I obviously have an account and I am able to log into it, but for some reason the app thinks that I need to re-create an account every time. Once I go through the silly process I am then told that there is “already an account under this email”. I already know this which is exactly why I used that email when logging in 😂
Title: Log-In Problems

Content: My biggest complaint with this is there is no setting for lighting.. it comes through so dark on iPhone that it’s almost pointless to watch. Idk why it’s like that but it really is quite annoying when you are trying to watch something and when it goes to any kind of darker setting or atmosphere it’s almost impossible to see.. and I’ve checked my other platforms to see if it’s just the show and it is not.. it is something to do with max. HBOmax also was fine. So max let’s get it figured out. You are too big and too old of a company not to know and do better!!
Title: It ok I guess

Content: I have tried every single streaming platform and none have the shows that I actually want to watch like Max. Hands down best one. The price is the only thing that bugs me if at all,  it I’ll suffer through it. As much as I try to dislike it for any reason, I can’t find many flaws it doesn’t make up for in variety of shows and movies.
Title: Best variety

Content: Max as my literal favorite shows but it’s so buggy. Currently it is randomly switching to dubbing over the show I’m watching in Spanish. Although this does feel like a funny prank…it’s less than ideal.  On and off it will skip episodes so when I come back to a show I was watching, it will be on a totally different episode. It also tends to remove shows from my currently watching. I love having to search for the show I was watching and try to find the episode I was on. TVs more enjoyable when you get to work for it.
Title: Could be better

Content: Love the app is great with alot of choices of movies and tv series, I recently find out that one of my favorite series is available in other countries and i would like to know when this series will be available for streaming in the US the name is (FLORICIENTA) very popular in the Latins Americans. And as a latins in the US and a subcriber to MAX would to watch it as well. Thank you so much and i hope you guys at MAX take this into consideration.
Title: PLEASED ADD SERIE FLORICIENTA

Content: I'm not sure why HBO tried to reinvent the wheel with a whole new app because it does not work as well as the previous ones. The downloads are unreliable. As soon as you start watching some thing it expires yesterday. And when you try to renew it's acting like you're trying to re-download from scratch, and most of the time fails with "failed to download" even though you're just trying to renew the contents and not actually trying to re-download it.
Title: Unreliable downloads

Content: The app hasn’t worked properly since I opened it. After several restarts, I can watch a program for a while, but if it is a series episode I’ve seen before, I can’t re-watch it, and the system gets hung.   The menu is basic—so searching become more complicated. Work out these glitches soon,  please. I won’t keep a service that doesn’t deliver.
Title: Poor Transition

Content: I’ve been trying to watch a show for a few days now and every time I finish watching an episode I back out, and then shut off the app in hopes of saving my place(like I’ve done for this app and other streaming services). When I open the app back up to look for my show it’s not on continue watching and I have to search it up and then it’s back on episode one. Ever since it switched to “max” I’ve had this problem. In the grand scheme of things it’s a dumb thing to complain about but whatever, I already typed it out. Just hopefully someone who knows how to fix that sees this lol
Title: Doesn’t save spot

Content: I had HBO and had to download HBO MAX and it’s horrible. It can’t retain shows I’m watching and I have to locate where I was when watching it, it doesn’t hold my shoes on the continue to watch list. It’s super annoying and seems like a bug that should be easy to fix. So how about do that! Also, really wish one of these streaming giants could figure out how to ALWAYS skip the intros. If I want to skip it once I want to skip it all the time. This doesn’t impact my rating but the lack of retention of shows I’m watching and where I was definitely does.
Title: What did you do?!

Content: I loved the original hbo max app, it hooked up to my projector through my iPhone perfectly. This app is garbage, everytime an ad plays it gets stuck and I have to close the app, restart, and get my show going. Meaning I have to do that 4 or 5 times in an hour long episode sometimes twice per ad. Its insane. Don’t consolidate apps if you don’t have the brainpower to test it first
Title: Fix airplay please

Content: It’s not just all talk with this update.  HBO said they were doubling the content availability and just looking through things, they definitely followed through.   Sooooo much more true crime is the major one I noticed, but then then I started looking through movies… more, documentaries…. more.  Same quality original HBO content + more of everything else. It’s all more of a good thing and you really can’t go wrong with that.
Title: So much more more content!

Content: I would rather have HBO max back than this. It does not save anything I watch into my continue watching and I have to go back and find which episode I left off on and either find my place or start the episode over because at the top it says resume S1E1 when I know I am much further then that. It’s stupid and I hope it can be fixed.
Title: Terrible update

Content: I was hoping this app would be a good replacement for HBO Max because of how terrible the app worked, but this is just more of the same. Constant connection issues, and downloads take forever and most times fail. Most of my downloads I can’t even watch without WiFi, so what’s the point of downloading it. Safe to say HBO won’t be getting anymore of my money because this is absolutely pathetic and if anyone at HBO cared about their consumers then they would’ve fixed this by now. All they care about is getting your money, and once they have it they don’t care about keeping you around. DO BETTER HBO!!!
Title: DO BETTER HBO!!!!!!!!!!!

Content: First I want to say that I really like the new app but for me it is not working correctly.  I have problems when I’m streaming and have to leave the app for some reason any reason and return to it what ever I’m watching restarts to the beginning. I stream from my iPhone and it is up to date the app is up to date. I have uninstalled and reinstalled app at least 8 times. This is been happening for around a month now.  The app is also not keeping track of what I’m watching when I finish a episode of what I’m watching it adds it back to my continue watching list.
Title: This app doesn’t work for me

Content: WT actual F. Chromecasting causes the volume to shoot to max every single time. The worst part is it’ll do it even when I’ve been watching the same show and it auto plays the next episode. So I can’t watch a series while I’m feeling a little sleepy because I might be awakened by my tv blasting whatever on full volume. I almost fell out of bed after nodding off and being startled awake by full blast series recap. The update didn’t fix this. Also a little annoying that it won’t save progress on the shows I watch half the time. But honestly thinking about canceling because of the volume thing.
Title: Volume

Content: Since the merger with Warner Brothers, Discovery decided to rebrand the HBOMAX app with this piece of crap. Apparently ALL of Discovery Plus’s content moved over to this app and mixed with HBO. The content is overwhelming and there’s a lot to watch and the way they categorize series and movies is a catastrophe it’s completely scattered. For example I finished watching The Last Of Us and then it recommended Sister Wives as a show I might like because of The Last Of Us. I didn’t watch it.
Title: Lots Of Content

Content: If anyone outside the United States can see this, please help us. Capitalism is failing and society is crumbling in front of us. What does that have to do with the US? Nothing, that’s why it gets four stars. It doesn’t get five because I am unaware of whether it’s owned by blackrock or not. If it is then redact my rating to a 1 star because zero stars is not available as an option. The app serves its purpose and does it well from what I’ve experienced.
Title: The state of America.

Content: It’s kind of insane that when you scroll back on an episode that you haven’t finished, you’re forced to watch the ads you’ve already seen. Incredibly frustrating as a simple accidental swipe leads to over several minutes of commercials that I already watched in the past twenty minutes.   I would understand if ads were shown again on separate sessions, but the fact that I’m being forced to watch ads over and over again is absolutely ridiculous and disgusting
