Title: Commercials worse than ever

Content: I really appreciate the addition of the new discovery shows but I have to ask why you guys took the A-Z browsing away?  I don’t always know what genre of movie/show I wasn’t to watch and it seems that if I just look at the genres and sub genre options I just get the same movies/shows over and over again. Without the A-Z search I don’t actually get to see the entirety of your catalog. Please bring it back.
Title: Bring back the A-Z search.

Content: Who in the marketing department made this decision to erase the brand name that took years to develop and changed it to a word that doesn't mean anything. I trusted content produced by HBO. This move is, in my opinion, purely an attempt to create buzz in the streaming industry, the useful features in the navigation drill down menu are gone - no more LAST CHANCE, COMING SOON, GENRE - which were useful for managing viewing schedule.
Title: Bad idea

Content: I am trying to watch a movie on the app and the first time I tried to watch it yesterday, the audio would not sync and the picture was zoomed in (not on my tv settings). I tried a different movie on the app, and the audio and video was normal. Today I’m trying to watch the same movie from yesterday again and the picture is back to normal but the audio still will not sync. Super frustrating. Don’t understand why they needed to change the app. It’s just gonna cause weird bugs and unnecessary problems. Annoyed.
Title: Audio won’t sync

Content: what is the point of creating an entirely new app if it’s going to be quite literally the same thing. if musically could do it with tiktok, then of all companies, i should expect hbo to be able to do the same thing. a multi billion dollar company should be able to update a simple name change into the ui. to make a completely new app, and expect customers to switch with no concern is quite absurd. if this is the way hbo expects to run, then they should expect a decline in their customer base. it’s nothing more than an inconvenience to users and offers no benefits whatsoever to download a totally new app for the same content.
Title: Max??

Content: This app is exceptionally difficult to use and even restarting it doesn’t fix the issue of audio accessibility refusing to turn off. It also randomly changed languages during the show, and insists on non-skippable 2 minute long ads on a platform that I already pay for. If I have to google how to use your app, you’re doing it wrong. I keep thinking you’ll launch an update fixing this issue but nope.
Title: Still waiting for the app update on audio description

Content: Love the variety of shows I’ve found on max, but there needs improvement with the bugs. The list of current shows I’m watching doesn’t update properly so episodes I’ve finished only show they’ve been half watched, causing the show to jump back to episodes I’ve already seen. Also have an issue with the volume jumping to 100% when I first start playing something on max or when I pick a new show.
Title: Good selection but lots of bugs

Content: Maybe I’m wrong but I swear you used to be able to browse around without paying and view a limited number of things for free. So I could tell a friend, “hey go check out the first episode(s) of Barry and if you like it you can pay for a subscription to watch some more of it.” Now you can’t, and my friend isn’t particularly interested in anything they know about on the service so I guess that’s one less potential customer for you. Seems a shame.  I’ll be back to close out the series but I don’t expect to stay.
Title: No more free access?

Content: I’ve literally been dealing with having to turn off the subtitles on every single movie and TV show that I ever want to watch on any platform. but it’s particularly annoying with the Apple TV version, I have to uninstall it and reinstall every single time I want to use the app. I really wish that somebody would develop a workaround for this particular bug by making it impossible for subtitles to turn on automatically without user intervention. This is just inexcusable, it’s been like this since HBO switched over to Max. I want to watch the movie/tv show not read it. Thanks.
Title: Subtitles that never go away

Content: As an existing customer of HBO I enjoyed the content but have always had an issue is the presentation as if I couldn’t find what I really wanted to see in general even though I know they have it. The new merge with discovery forced them to come up with a new app and it’s so much more pleasing than the other one and the competitors especially on the Roku I think it’s great
Title: Switch over from HBO to MaX

Content: The streaming services provides unbelievable content, that can keep you entertained for hours. while also justifying it’s price. However, I don’t like the interface and wish it easier to navigate. I have had issues with search on both IPhone, Apple TV, Roku, and iMac. I know your platform is still in the genesis stages but I hope you continue to improve the product.
Title: Premium streaming platforms

Content: Legit the worst update an app/service could ever had. HBO was much better than this. I’ve tried on phones, consoles and regular tv. None work. It baffles my mind why a company would want to take away the factor that makes it stand out. Many shows were known for HBO, and now it’s all gone. Not only has that factor been taken away, but so has performance quality. Each show I play on Max plays for thirty seconds before it says my connection is lost, even when Im clearly connected to the internet. This new update makes me want to unsubscribe to such a terrible service.
Title: Wish I could give this a ZERO.

Content: I want to like this new transition for HBO Max to Max, but it’d be so nice if I didn’t have to spend 10 minutes going through episodes trying to remember where I left off last every time I want to watch my show. Maybe 2 out of 10 times, there will be a “continue watching” spot, and it’ll take me to my show, but the majority of the time, I have to go physically search the show and flip through the episodes. It’s just getting really irritating and infuriating that it’s not saving my progress. Please fix.
Title: The continue watching is gone

Content: This app has THE BEST CONTENT! I feel the transition to MAX from HBO MAX was a little difficult on Apple devices and could’ve used more detailed instructions but once complete all is great. The logging in problem errors resolved in less than 1 hour for me, maybe there was a lot of traffic. Great picture quality. My annual subscription and all my lists were transferred over fine. I LOVE IT!!!
Title: Great Content

Content: To be clear, the app would have to be pretty abysmal (like AMC+) bad for me to not subscribe, just because I have such a deep love for HBO’s original content. That said, the app works pretty well for the most part. There are occasional bugs, but not frequent enough to be annoying. The app functions pretty much as well as it did when it was HBO Max, so no complaints there.
Title: Great content, pretty good app

Content: it’s honestly ridiculous at this point. i used to use hbo max all the time and ever since it was changed to max, my chromecast doesn’t work. everything says to “make sure you’re on the same wifi” (obviously) and “reset the app” or “reset your chromecast” or “reset your phone”which is crazy to me, because it works with every other streaming platform i use. it’s not really a usable app at this point. i can find anyone else having this problem either. my app is updated, my chromecast device works fine, YOU are the problem. fix it.
Title: chromecast never works

Content: I was a hbo max subscriber since the beginning. Once they became “Max” it went right down hill, one day I came home I had a year subscription already paid in full and they won’t let me log in with out a subscription. They wanted me to provide 4 forms of verification to get into my account and then told me it was through a different party. I bought the subscription through “hbo max” they can’t even keep their records straight and had awful customer service. I will be boycotting “max” for as long as I live and I hope you will too after reading this
Title: Max is the worst streaming site of all time

Content: Like the content, but the mix is so flattened that it is impossible to hear dialogue. When raising the volume to hear the dialogue, everything else is way too loud.  Update to respond to developer: it’s not a setting issue, I just checked. It’s because Max is requiring a delivery file that mixes for an average of the high and low sounds to create a smaller file. You need to mix for dialogue, even though it creates a larger file. It is impossible to hear your content correctly.
Title: Mix is terrible

Content: I’ll start with just two requests: 1 - a show / movie / episode is no longer “NEW” once it has been viewed so you can remove the tag. There’s not a new episode of Barry every day once we’ve watched it! 2 - let’s add original air date.  You’ve got the year so it’s a good start. The first episode of Chuck aired September 24, 2007 and it’s ok if you share that. We shouldn’t need IMDb because you know what they say, when you have to go somewhere else you might not ever come back!
Title: Off to a fair start

Content: So the previous HBO Max app couldn’t receive text input into its search field from a bluetooth keyboard. Simple programming that could be accomplished by a 1st year programming student, and a MAJOR FLAW (not a bug - a major error).  They NEVER fixed that in the old app - during years of service. Anyway it now seems to work in the new app. Congrats, you’ve accomplished basic unit testing and a major feature flaw fix. Congrats, hope the rest works as well.
Title: Finally fixed a major flaw, kudos

Content: User friendliness down 100%… keeps crashing during ads, then if I leave app and come back in it will restart the whole movie! Then if I try to fast forward it to where I left off it will either crash or just keep restarting from the beginning. The picture quality on the app looks weird.. everything about this app is terrible. I’m actually upset about all the good reviews this is receiving because I know they are not real .. fix this app so I can actually watch a full movie peacefully or I’m canceling my subscription.
Title: Nothing but problems since the change !

Content: I used and still use this streaming service a lot but ever since they made it into a new app and everything, it’s been completely horrible. There’s been one problem for the past week where It keeps on logging me out of my account, then when I try to sign back in, it loads, shows me a glimpse of all the profiles to choose who’s watching, then goes back to the, “Choose your plan.” screen, and SOMETIMES it will actually let me log in completely, but most of the time, including NOW it wont. I hate this new app.
Title: Go back to HBO Max

Content: I’m trying to watch Chernobyl through the app on the iPad pro( latest update) and it is too dark to watch. I own Chernobyl, so I can play it through Apple TV app and picture is great. Please fix this. And yes, my settings are set for best playback and brightness is turned all the way up.I honestly don’t know why you had to have a whole new app for a name change. HBO max app was fine, but now we get to play find the glitch with your new app. Also how has this won an award for editors choice when it’s been live for only like 16 hours??
Title: Playback too dark in iPad Pro

Content: I don’t get why the changed from hbo max to max. The previous app worked flawlessly. I have had so many issues with max connecting to my chromecast. Some shows it will have audio subtitles and read everything that’s happening, and he only way I can make it stop it to uninstall and redownload the app. I’ve also had issues with going out of the app into something else and when I go back into max it will restart my show from the beginning and make me watch the ads again. It’s extremely frustrating. If I could give it zero stars I would.
Title: So many bugs

Content: I’m so upset by the downgrade in app quality when hbomax became just max - the issue is most notable when casting to another device. If I ever switch to another app then go back to the max app, it resets whatever I’m watching. Basically that means I can’t try to pause something without trying to find where I was in the movie/ episode when it jumps back to the beginning. I’m willing to pay for the content at this point, but if it continues to be this frustrating, I may just look for other avenues.
Title: Consistent casting errors

Content: I am using this on an iPhone and casting it to my tv using chrome cast. When I go to resume my show it never resumes to the correct place.  It will start the show over or resume it from a previous resume. I am constantly having to rewind/fast forward to find my place. There is no thumbnail picture when doing that though so I can never tell where I was. If you are going to watch one thing then be done it is fine but so frustrating to watch a series. Please fix this HBO!
Title: Frustrating With Resume

Content: This is like the 3rd or 4th HBO app over the years youd think they would know how to make a decent streaming app at this point  I have plenty of complaints but the #1 issue is that for months now and this is the 3rd or 4th time ive had this happen when you update the app and have videos downloaded for offline viewing the app will ‘lose’ the videos and not show within the app but still have the storage space taken up. EX I have about 10gigs of movies downloaded for travel I updated the app because the crappy thing keeps crashing, all the videos are gone but im still missing 10gigs. The only way to resolve this is completely uninstall the app clear it off my ipad and reinstall.   Doesnt use the native apple video player accessing things like CC and audio settings arent the same as everything else in apples ecosystem  I could go on and on lucky i have hbo free because this app and hbo are garbage
Title: Max SUUCCCKS

Content: Great job improving the app from the original app. You went back to the drawing board and started fresh and it shows you really worked on your app. Haven’t had any major issues since the update and change it. No more signing out automatically and I love the new features such as new & notable. keep it up.
Title: Great job improving your app

Content: I renewed my subscription after HBO max became just MAX and it delinked my original account and then set up some random account with my Apple ID. The real kicker is this account has NO EMAIL OR PASSWORD LOGIN. I can only login by restoring purchase and it has none of my old watch history. -10/10 I do not recommend buying through the Apple App Store. I spent HOURS chatting to customer service on both ends and NEITHER could help. Awful service.
Title: Apple ID error

Content: Max has something for everyone in the family. Dive into your favorite shows like Succession (HBO), We’re Here (Max Original), The Nate & Jeremiah Home Project (Discovery +), The Whole Story With Anderson Cooper (CNN), U.S. Women’s National Soccer (Max Original), and more. Plus, if you have kids, then unlock content from Cartoon Network, Boomerang and more in the new kid section. This streaming service has all the content you love!
Title: Maximize Your Streaming with Max

Content: i will say before they did this new thing i LOVED hbo max but i have never hated a streaming service more. nothing loads, you can’t pick an episode to watch because it just switches to a different one. when you want to choose a certain episode it won’t show that one. you can’t rewind or nothing in the app will work in general. please fix your bugs before you go and delete what actually worked bc the bugs in this defeat the whole purpose of having this streaming service. on top of all this the look and everything is just so ugly.
Title: just get the other streaming services

Content: I love hbo max! They carry all of my favorite ghibli films. However, I used to be able to switch the preferred language on my ipad but now there is no option to change it. I have been through all of the settings. I can’t even find out where to change caption settings. Hope this problem gets fixed because this is my favorite streaming service.
Title: Language options disappeared?

Content: I liked the hbo max app better. I hate the blue, but that’s just a personal preference. It seems to take longer to look for movies and shows on this app than the hbo max app. I cannot have subtitles in this app. It says I can go into my settings & manage them there but there is no option for that in the settings. I have bad hearing, I need subtitles on, I will miss things if I don’t have them on. So, so far I cannot use it. I wish they would have just kept updating the old app, what was wrong with it? And why change it from hbo max to max? Were they just bored? I don’t get it. It’s very stupid lol.
Title: I don’t like it

Content: Even beyond the drastic changes to the content on HBO Max (which got rid of a bunch of good shows and movies and HBO originals and replaced them with Dr Pimple Popper), the app itself is so much worse than the HBO Max app, which is completely ridiculous. And not just on iOS, but on Apple TV too. Seeking barely works, discovery is now basically useless unless you want to watch one of the most popular shows, it does a bad job of syncing your progress on an episode across device, etc. WarnerMedia will make it as awful as they can as long as their board and shareholders think it will provide more value to them
Title: Solely bad changes

Content: HBOMAX never had this issue.  If you pause, rewind, play for a bit, then pause, rewind; it takes you back to first pause location.  Same with FF.  So frustrating to find where you left off if you have a few interruptions (personal) during a viewing. Bouncing around backwards…. Happened with 5 titles over past 2 days.
Title: Rewind/FF after pause is messed up

Content: Please fix the continue watching section of the app. It’s not retaining any of the show information. When I start a show it won’t save my spot and I have to remember where I left off. Also, shows that are being watched on other family members are being saved on all “continue watching” sections. Seems like a glitch that needs to be looked at since the old app worked just fine.
Title: Please fix the “Continue watching” section

Content: I could watch max all day and not get tired of it. I love the movie selection and the some of the best shows and documentaries I’ve seen. The new app is slightly less intuitive than HboMax tho…  Please stop with the pop up notifications…. I cannot think of a single reason why anyone would want to be forced to click out of a pop up to use a streaming app.
Title: Probably the best streaming content out there

Content: The new app is worse in many ways than the app it replaces. It uses a custom video player that is stutters and demonstrably worse than Apple’s default player, especially on AppleTV. The app itself has crashed several times so far. Also, look at the terrible privacy report card. Next thing you know they will want access to the camera and microphone, too. As for content WBM has really started to ruin HBO. We see far cheaper content and less of a focus on quality. If I didn’t get this service for free via AT&T there is no way I’d pay for it as it stands right now.
Title: The new Max app is hot garbage

Content: This app is terrible. Every time I open it the how I am casting changes episodes. When I select episodes they load then the next or previous one plays. I can’t seem to change my place in the episodes as when I open the casting options it changes. This is fixed in pretty much every other app but no HBO/ Max can’t figure it out. The app refuses to tack shows I am currently watching so I have to search them each time. I love the shows but they make it impossible to appreciate. I am deeply disappointed with the app and I wouldn’t recommend it to anyone.
Title: A large pile of …

Content: When auto play is on, the app skips the last minute-ish of the episode. If you want to rewatch an episode, it picks up at that last minute. So I have to rewind the episode and watch twice as many ads.  Also everytime I play a certain show, it starts on the exact same episode, the exact same scene. No matter how many times I play the show, it will always go back to that random episode and start in the middle of it. So every time I want to watch this show I have to go hunt down the actual episode I was on. I hate using this app so much.
Title: Very annoying issues with auto play

Content: I love the app bc of all the shows on it, however since it’s swapped over to MAX instead of HBO MAX, the only shows that show as last watched are the ones I was watching when the switch over happened. So now every time I was to watch friends or won’t pick up where I left off and I have to search for the show then go through all the episodes to figure it out.
Title: Issue with last watched

Content: Honestly, the three stars are for the content.  The app is annoying because it allows you to download things, but you still need a good connection to open the app and access it. It should have a default that will take you automatically to downloaded material if the app can’t open.  It’s also annoying to navigate, all the categories are random and you have to sort of dig around to find what you’re looking for.
Title: The app is…fine

Content: Max fka HBO makes great television however it’s overshadowed by the terrible app. The user interface is less than ideal and I’m plagued by random bouts descriptive audio that ruin the watching experience. I am unsubscribing and will delete the app until this is hopefully one day resolved.  Update after dev response:  Deleting and re-downloading did nothing for the issue. When streaming directly to the phone there is the option to turn off descriptive audio, but that option magically disappears when casting to an external device.
Title: Awful app

Content: The top thing I do on Max is put on Sesame Street for my toddlers. When I used HBO Max, I’d be able to pause an episode and restart where we left off. Since switching to Max, the app does not remember where it left off. I have to go to go to the Sesame Street page and scroll from season 1 to season 53 and find the episode we were watching and then press play. It never appears in the continue watching section. It’s not user friendly. Plus now there is a bunch of non-quality reality show junk that shows up on the main page I have zero interest in.
Title: HBO content is good. Usability is not.

Content: The show I’ve been watching won’t save to my continue watching now that it’s Max. The way the show is formatted when you scroll is more difficult too, because you used to scroll down and see all the episodes in the season but now you scroll one by one to the right. It takes a while to find episodes. Finally it always begins at the end and skips right to the next episode, never restarts the episode I want to watch.
Title: Glitches

Content: I think the variety of shows are really good but maneuvering around to find shows on the TV is confusing and difficult. Also skipping the recap is not as easy as Netflix doesnt run quite as smoothly to go to the next episode. Content is good and if I could find things easier I’d have given in 5 stars. Wish there was a chat feature to get help in getting around the site.
Title: New to Max

Content: There are small inconveniences like the side scrolling through seasons, all movies with the word the listed together, or just general app use. These are small annoyances and honestly going backwards for the user experience which are not great to start with. But then you add on that the functionality of the app is buggy and not just occasionally. Everytime I've started an episode I get a white snow screen within the 1st minute, the casting is now not easy, and the sound is cutting out throughout streaming shows.
Title: Hard to use and malfunctions

Content: To the excellent human reading this,  Well done:  E.) overall sleek / simple design looks good & is easy to use.  D.) Adding single episodes is awesome.  C.) Selections by brand very cool.  B.) Playback & acct sync across devices works quite nicely.   Room for improvement:  3.) Home screen customization would be great (option to remove SPORTS!! from my page / profile; especially not being at the VERY top Please.)  2.) The option to continue searching for show / movie while playing a selection in the background would enhance user experience as well as increase interest & engagement with MAX.   1.) Photos of the cast / crew in selection screen would be great. And search options by cast / crew would be better still.   & A.) Thank you.
Title: Watch & Search

Content: HBO has incredible stuff, no debate there. But the app itself even after the pivot to “Max” leaves a lot to desire. Simple things like viewing the episode list of a show are simply made less efficient than they need to be. Cast list, user ratings, trailers, are all not available when browsing shows.  The network has a stellar catalogue but it seems like the mobile devs have a poor understanding of the small things that really sell a streaming app.
Title: Great Network, Mediocre UI

Content: You can watch anything and everything on here! If i could only keep one subscription to a streamer it would be this one no doubt. And the app has made a lot of progress from the early HBO Max days. I think there is still some room for improvement in terms of recommendations and usability on the app, but the content for me is key.
Title: The best content!

Content: I have a  large collection of movies and tv shows to watch and with the option of ads or no ads.  You really can’t go wrong. There’s an account for everyone in my family and options for everyone to watch what they like. Definitely recommend if it’s in your budget.🥳
Title: Better than any other app

Content: So I believe it is a better updated version of HBO Max but to be honest it I think the HBO should have kept the name how it is and not create a entirely different app as that can just cause unnecessary technical difficulties switching over. Over all I do like the app and it’s new features, I just think for now on give the app updates instead of changing it entirely
Title: Nathan Montague’s opinion

Content: The parasitic CEO conglomerates of all these stream wars have just been ruining their platforms as time goes on (*cough* not to mention how they treat the actual industry talent the hungry hungry hippos siphon their riches from *cough*).   I felt blue as I watched what used to be a decent canon of the HBO & Cinemax (HBO Max) catalogues over the years then into a messy, glitchy, and overpriced mess of predominately Warner Discovery reality content curation…  The purple days were fairly solid, but poor Max here feels like a downgrade & if I had not been grandfathered in on the old 6 month contract renewal before the switch occurred I would of cancelled my subscription for sure.
Title: Another One Bites the Dust

Content: Thanks for the unnecessary change to a working app. Also, props on naming it something that makes sure people looking for HBO content, won’t recognize.  My “smart” TV won’t download the update, so now I can’t watch except on my phone… so I’ve got that going on too. If it’s not corrected by month’s end, I’ll cancel and just watch next season of GoT at a friend’s. 💸
Title: Pointless

Content: I was having problems with the HBO app but at least it played what I was trying to watch (not well but it played). I haven’t been able to watch anything on my ps4 only on my phone and I’m not paying the amount of money I am just to have it work on one small screen platform. The navigation set up was better with HBO as well. Other than that I haven’t had some other issues I’ve been reading about. Some minor tweaks may be necessary
Title: Disappointing

Content: The content is fine, and overall seems abojt the same as HBO max but with one annoying flaw- the updated MAX does not keep the continue watching row up to date/correct. Things a series that I have just started does not appear, and even when I search for it it does not pick up where I left off, just completely starts the whole series over. This is the same for every device.
Title: Watch history is not correct

Content: Rather going full in on restoring HBO to its greatness and restore old shows removed from HBO libraries from the 90s which were removed because rich people in New York complained because the old HBO shows made the areas they gentrified look bad they just removed hit HBO shows. Now the management team that ruined HBO before discovery took over have suggested a name change, why? Same woke pandering shows and not fixing what was broke. Bring back HBO but with less woke pandering shows and return the shoes that were removed to pander to the woke crowd  The new update doesn’t fix much
Title: A name change isn’t going to fix the problem

Content: What a time we live in - Out of all the streaming apps, HBO has always packed a punch of great movies, shows and series. Always have choices, which is what everyone needs without the hassle of paying extra for this feature or that feature - streaming everything in the highest definition when possible. 4 out of 5!!
Title: HBO on the go?!

Content: HBO’s app used to be awful, you fixed the issues, and decided to bring the issues back with Max? “Continue Watching” is not accurate. I have to google episode plots for the title so I can search them to continue where I left off. If I accidentally play something (because sometimes it doesn’t respond to a clock, and sometimes it’s a long delay) it’s in my continue watching forever. I can’t dislike suggested shows. You removed customizations, sound doesn’t sync up, crashes, subtitles are in the middle of the screen sometimes?
Title: More glitches, less features??

Content: A lot of the same content with some good additions. My problem is with the app itself. Huge buffering issues that the HBO Max app didn’t have. Honestly, it’s like running Peacock or Disney+. One 30-minute episode of a show has had 7 buffering moments lasting between 10 and 30 seconds. I know it has it’s kinks to work out, as it is only a day in to the new app. I just wish they would have kept their original app and just added the new content and name from there.
Title: Versus HBO Max

Content: They added pip and up next already, glad to see that wasn’t dropped those are critical features for me.   Dinging the rating a bit though because I feel like discovery and navigation in the app is just a little clunky. I really almost with the brands thing was a little higher up. It just seems hard to navigate if you don’t know exactly what you are looking for.
Title: Revising from previous review

Content: This app is so unbelievably frustrating. You try to stream and it connects automatically at 100 volume. No matter what phone we try to connect with. And the audio settings are impossible to fix. Their help section says to click the speech bubble to change captions, but nothing happens, no menu pops up. It either streams in Spanish or with audio descriptions off. So many ads. Every time it disconnects, you have to watch the ads all over again. NOT worth the cost. After using the app for years, ill not be renewing my annual subscription this October.
Title: Awful

Content: This is going to seem like a very minute detail in what can really be addressed for what is wrong with Max, but the placement of the episode restart button in the “details” of the streaming layout is just unnecessary compared to it just being placed within the individual episode I’m watching. Besides that, the current horizontal layout compared to the previous scroll one is just annoying.
Title: HBO MAX was superior

Content: I waited to see if devs would fix this issue but it’s been two weeks so here is the issue. Any time I play something on the app and cast it to my tv, the app will restart the video to the beginning if I open the app again afterwards. It will do this several times during a watch and I have to navigate manually where I left off.   Second, due to the above issue, Max is not remembering what I last watched at all. The content on Max is brilliant, but the bugs make the app unusable.
Title: App restarts show/movie constantly

Content: It’s just ok…with the additional discovery+ shows.  I should be allowed to add pins to my different even if they’re adults.  Why won’t you allow a pin for profile for additional privacy & security in general, not just to create a kids profile?  This is stupid!  This app is shared with adults who want their profiles pinned to prevent nosy housemates from viewing and changing you watchlist by “accidentally” clicking on your profile!  Will you please provide the user the pin option in general not just for parental control.  Please!!!
Title: Just Ok

Content: One thing that bothers me most is that ads keep popping up when I try to drag the progress bar to resume from when I stopped last time, when the video progress between different devices was not synched. It felt like getting punched for the mistake made by the developers, but as a paid customer, I have no choice but to swallow it.
Title: Ads when scrolling bar

Content: I've seen all the reviews on this and I have to say I've had the same issue. As soon as I downloaded MAX, all of the shows I had been watching on HBO Max disappeared. I love to binge, for example, The Middle and Young Sheldon. Every single time I want to watch these shows, I have to search it up again. It never appears in my continue watching section. This is horrendously annoying. Though I will still continue to watch the shows on this platform, it is something I think should be fixed.
Title: Annoying

Content: You would expect with an entire rebranding launch that the app functionality would remain the same or be enhanced. Unfortunately this is not the case with MAX. Previously you had the option to clear your watch history so if you completed a show and wanted to rewatch again it would show in your continue watching list. Now once a show is watched you have to search for the show and try to remember what episode you watched last every time you go in. Extremely frustrating, this is streaming 101. Please fix!
Title: Same price, more frustration

Content: Today, all of my downloads are gone. Two days ago, all of my daughter’s downloads were gone. We had to find all of them that are on my phone and redownload them onto hers. Now mine are gone. 🤦🏼‍♀️ And now, later tonight, my downloads wouldn’t open. So m, I thought maybe I’ll sign out and sign back in, maybe that will help. Now I’m getting an error that I need to restore my purchase, which is active until October 10, 2023. Today is September 27. So I can’t even sign in now. Update, November 10: same fkng problem! Fix it or I quit paying. 👍🏻
Title: Keeps deleting my downloads

Content: It forced me to download MAX and so far the app is working better than the previous HBO Max app. The previous app kept stopping and dropping movies I was watching and that problem is no longer with the new app. There are still a lot of commercials but then it returns to the movie without incident. My movie watching experience has improved.
Title: It is an improvement

Content: this app is fine overall but every time i begin casting to the tv, Max turns the volume on the tv ALL THE WAY UP TO 100. this is extremely annoying and beyond loud when normally we set the volume on the tv to 20. the old HBO max app did NOT do this. would really like this fixed so that what the volume on the tv is makes the app match that volume and not the tv match the full volume of the casting volume (which is always set to full volume)
Title: problem casting to tv

Content: This app is somehow worse then there old app. The shows are fine but the app interface is so bad. It doesn’t have a skip to next episode or skip theme song option. It doesn’t save where I left off on a show rather is stuck on the episode I began watching. I’ll happily change my review if this changes but for paying for this service the app needs to at least work as well as the other streaming options out there. I have higher expectations for HBO than this.
Title: Not as smooth as Netflix

Content: The Apple TV and iPad apps are terrible.  If you want to re-watch an episode it starts at the end of the episode and plays the last few seconds of that episode; you are left scrambling for the pause button and have to manually rewind it.  WHY would you do this, it makes no sense.  Playing downloaded content on the iPad app? good luck! 9 times out of 10 the app crashes and deletes all the content.  As a frequent traveler i can tell you that this has been an issue with HBO for YEARS….and yes I have wifi turned off to prevent it trying to connect to airplane wifi.
Title: Terrible App

Content: The developers need to fix this. There is just too much clutter out there. Trying to find something right now is a struggle. I don’t need multiple recommendations for the same show (I.e. Friends in five different places).  Bring back the side navigation and the hubs, tone down the colors.  Not everything needs to be on the landing page. It is a hot mess. It looks like something your interns created and you guys just said, “yeah, we can go with this”.  Separate the reality nonsense from the scripted shows too, it is really confusing. Right now, it is not fun trying to find things to watch anymore, especially with Jared from Subway in my face multiple times.   Another suggestion, please change the layout for TV episodes on Apple TV. The horizontal scroll is garbage. The vertical tiling on the old app was much better and easier to find a favorite episode. Essentially the entire season was visible.
Title: Terrible UI

Content: App is pretty much the same to me. Everyone else says more than just the name and look of the app changed but I guess I never noticed anything else.  My issue is, if you’re gonna revamp the entire platform, then at the very least, fix the episode order! Shows that had episodes out of order from the beginning STILL haven’t been fixed. I feel like that’s the easiest thing to fix and yet has never happened. I shouldn’t have to be playing a game of “which one is the actual next episode” when I watch stuff
Title: At least fix the basic things

Content: Well I pay way to much money for an app to not work at all. I cannot cast anything to my tv with this app! I had no issues with the old app but this one will go to cast and then tells me there is an error and can’t do it yet I can watch it just fine on my phone and what’s also killing me is I’m rewatching friends and the stupid app can’t remember at all where I’m at in the show. Like I’m not paying all this money for this app for it to not work and for it not to do what I want. Fix it or I’ll just get rid of it all together.
Title: About to drop MAX all together & reviews are a lie on it being good

Content: At first I was slightly annoyed because I’m unable to login into MAX on my tv, as easily as I did on my iPad, and I wasn’t sure how the conversation would work with paid subscription to HBOMax.  So, I still haven’t logged on to my tv yet; but I have been able to view the app changes on my ipad, and I like the “Disney” type, sectional- layout. Well done MAX.
Title: Things Change

Content: Overall app is ok. I didn’t have many issues others had. But two things were removed: 1) shuffling of episodes 2) in the details of the episode itself when playing an episode but paused the season is removed so instead of saying “s2, episode 4” it just says the episode. I don’t really care about that but just an observation.   I like the discovery plus integration but it doesn’t contain the entire d+ library. Just a best of
Title: Bring back shuffling of episodes

Content: When I tap on a show that I have previously watched, it opens to the last three seconds of the episode and then switches back to the main menu for the show. I have to then click the three dots and choose “restart”. Why doesn’t it know to start the episode from the beginning?
Title: Won’t replay episodes

Content: Ever since Max debuted we have experienced volume problems.  The is fine for an hour or two of viewing, but after that amount of time it starts to drop and.  Sometimes it stays at such a low level (and turning up the volume makes no difference) that we have to change to another app.  At other times it goes up and down which is more frustrating.  Max is the only streaming app where I have experienced this problem.
Title: Why does the volume drop unexpectedly???

Content: I’d love more control over my app notification settings. I get all my notifications about new episodes of shows through Apple TV so I don’t want these from Max but I’d love it if you could recommend new shows you think I’d like based on my viewing history. Please let me disable the former and add the latter  The recent “Click here for an adrenaline rush” notification is not what I had in mind though… still no controls for this
Title: Notification settings

Content: I’ve never had issues with previous HBO apps but for some reason the Max app does not save where I left off. If I go back into the app and press resume on a tv show or movie it starts from the beginning even if the bar on resume shows I had started it before and watched some already. This is frustrating because then I have to fast forward to where I think I left off before and hope I don’t spoil anything by going too far. Please fix this issue!
Title: Will not resume where I left off

Content: So I’m looking for a tv show I saw on tiktok called raised by wolves and it said it was on here, fairly annoyed I can’t actually check what movies they have from Google but whatever. I bought the subscription (the ad free version because who is paying for ads) looked up my show and boom I’m watch avatar 2 (the way of the water) so happy ( I’m not actually super happy but I’m pretty happy at least for tn)
Title: Looking for raised by wolves story

Content: I find the films on Max/HBOmax are generally poor in production value and the site relies upon a very few finely crafted series... the remainder of the content being obscure and some great but very few ... would save more money renting them directly.  An era of great films and thought provoking series from HBO is over ... anything new is a regurgitation of previous topics in different ways without top billing stats and the subject matter has been done to death and I'm referencing young adult topics shot in many different ways... invest in your product people
Title: Disappointing

Content: please either make HDR content brighter or add an option to turn HDR video off. content is completely unwatchable in any light that can be described as "bright" turning on power saving before starting streaming does disable HDR, but that's a workaround and not a solution, especially considering power saving also lowers the maximum screen brightness.  this is on an iPhone 14 pro, a device renowned for its impressive screen brightness. netflix and other services look much brighter
Title: HDR is WAY too dark.

Content: Since I the app changed over the subscription page tells me to go to my apple subscriptions to cancel but neither HBO max nor Max are showing up in my apple subscriptions.  The apple website has no help nor an email to write to for help.  The Max site has an automated help feature that railroads me into a preset response instructing me to repeat the above motions.  I want to cancel the subscription and their transformation has left enough bugs and problems so as to make it impossible and they have not actual tech help that I can speak to to attempt to resolve the issue.
Title: Cannot cancel

Content: It’s been pretty decent so far in my opinion. Only a couple stutters or app crashes since I’ve been using it. One thing I really hope they add is an option to customize the subtitles, for instance making the subtitles background invisible instead of black and also being able to change the font as well. Please add this, so many people would appreciate it.
Title: Has potential

Content: Who’s the marketing genius behind rebranding the streaming platform Max? You have two of the biggest, most successful, and universally identifiable entertainment brands to exploit — Warner Brothers and HBO - and “Max” is what you decide on? Seriously? Was Acme not available? Even the logo is completely uninspired. Coupled with a generic interface, navigating through what feels a like a bucket someone tossed a bunch of distinctly different brands into with no care or thought for how to present them. When you try to be for everyone, you wind up being for no one.
Title: Worst branding, terrible UI.

Content: Why someone would take an app that is working perfectly fine and turn it into a hellscape is beyond me. Regardless of all other complaints, my biggest issue is the fact that when you want to watch a tv show episode that you have seen before and you go to play it, it immediately starts where it left off, which is the end credits… every single time….Sometimes when I use this app I think about that quote from Mindy Kaling from the office ‘if i had created a website with this many problems, I’d kill myself’.
Title: you ruined your app

Content: this app has the best, most interesting and entertaining shows out of any others. my favorite show right now is definitely The Idol. everyone hates on Abel for being in this show, but again, it is just a show. So please show some respect. They didn't sacrifice their time and money and privacy just for people to hate on it. But I love the show so yeah. HBO>>>
Title: The BEST streaming app!

Content: There is some great shows and movies on Max for sure, but the app is still so buggy to try to use. If you close out of the app, as soon as you go into it it’ll start the movie or show completely from the beginning. If you turn on subtitles, at random points it’ll turn on audio descriptions and the only way to turn that off is to restart the show completely over. It doesn’t save the progress of the shows you’re watching, and doesn’t save spots in movies at all.
Title: Buggy

Content: Great shows, great selection.  God awful streaming quality. Especially on PS5 or TV. Every show consistently buffering, slow to load, and unclear when it does decide to actually stream. Sometimes unwatchable. Been this way for years and absolutely unacceptable. NO other streaming service has these issues and HBO seems to be doing nothing to fix it. Fix your streaming service. Especially how much you charge for your service, there should be no issues. Period. Fix it.
Title: Terrible quality

Content: This app. I swear. It is sooooo terrible, when I connect via AirPlay it changes from English to Spanish and I have to manually change it back. If I use another streamer it comes on at volume 100 every time, it now also has narration to all shows that I cannot turn off despite following everything I can find on turning them off. The app also skips to the next episode before your previous episode is over, so you miss the end of every episode. The ONLY good thing about hbo is the shows they offer, otherwise their app is trash.
Title: Worst streaming app everrrrrr

Content: I’ve always enjoyed HBO/Max now I’m loving MAX! There’s so many movies!! So many TV shows that I can watch!!!! It’s very nice! I am 48 yrs old so I grew up in the old days lol where you had to wait a week or even longer sometimes to watch some shows but now I DONT HAVE TO AND ITS AMAZING!!! And you use to have yo see a movie at the theater BUT NOT ANYMORE!!!! This is amazing & MAX is going above & beyond!!
Title: Have to love all these movies & Shows!!

Content: I never really had problems with the previous hbo max app. Worked overall decently well. The really frustrating thing about this app is while trying to rewatch a tv series (yea, I’m lame and repeating an old watch) it won’t include it in my continuing watching section. I guess it thinks because it’s been watched once my new watches don’t count? Never had this problem before but it’s pretty annoying, and disrupts the experience to the point of questioning is this subscription still worth it. Hope it improves, but currently kind of a shame.
Title: The last app was better 🙃

Content: I am overall excited about the merger of content for max. But this app itself leaves much to be desired. It’s extremely buggy, crashes frequently, and I am logged out across my various devices on a daily basis. I’m not sure if this is intentional on their part as a way to prevent account sharing, but it is incredibly annoying and inconvenient, and I don’t know if I the annoyance is worth my continued subscription. I’ll give it some time but I never experienced the level of issues with the old HBO Max app, so it’s surprising they released such a regression in user experience.
Title: Feels beta

Content: When they came onto the scene, Warner Bros streaming has always been trying to find what works. Max is the next version of that where they brought in more content, made their name shorter and simpler and it really seems like they are positioning themselves to be one of the streaming services everyone needs to have.
Title: The ugly duckling of streaming services

Content: The company recently switched from their HBOMax app to rebrand and use this new Max app and it’s awful. When I watch anything on the app, it doesn’t remember it across the site and therefore doesn’t save my progress on my other devices. The previews and description of tv show episodes are so tiny they are hard to see with my 20/20 vision. The set up is not optimal to use the app and the changes feel like they were just for the sake of change with the new app and and are harder to use and to see. Not impressed.
Title: Downgrade

Content: This is a great app it really is my only problem with the app is it never saves my place on the show that I watch so everything mine I go onto the app I have to search my show then skip to where I am at! This is really annoying to me because it is an inconvenience and I don’t want to sound like a Karen but it’s annoying! But it also has so many movie and show options and it works well most of the time so that is also a plus
Title: Save my place

Content: Ey ! It is possible to have as many series and tv shows as possible in Spanish as well ? I was rewatching Harry Potter saga again, but now the prisoner of Azkaban is only in English. It was in Spanish don't know what happened!, but anyways i would be awesome if we have Spanish options on every as you guys always do ! Thanks and just for your information WE LOVE THE APP 🙌🏻
Title: Update

Content: This new app doesn’t follow any of the standards set by… well, everyone else… when it comes to controls, simple scrubbing forward or back isn’t available, or even asking Siri to turn on subtitles. This app is simply the worst cast of laziness I’ve seen in a long while. It likes to randomly disconnect AirPods while playing (same issue on multiple headphones and on different platforms; eg iPhone Apple TV, etc). The interface is clunky and ugly and slow… wow, is it slow. Swipe left, wait, Max catches up. It’s horrible. Please fix.
Title: The new Max is a repeat of first launch: horrible

Content: Not sure why but HBO Max and Max has always had the worst offline functionality. It’s always been weird about connecting to the internet, and now today it reached a new low when i opened it on my 8 hour flight and all my downloads are missing. They’re still on the device - if i go to iPad Storage they’re all listed there - the app just doesn’t want to show them to me. Fix. This.
Title: Love getting on an 8 hour flight and realizing that all of your downloads are missing

Content: My account was hacked, and I contacted customer service as soon as I realized. Sohail, my customer service representative, was extremely helpful in getting my account back to me. Using the texting feature was also very convenient because I have a newborn baby I am caring for at the moment. Thank you so much, Sohail!
Title: Superb Customer Service

Content: It’s sad to see what they’ve done to my baby that was HBO Max.   There’s so much crap to wade through now. The interface is a mess, featuring a ton of things I have zero interest in watching. HBO has been sucky since they cancelled a bunch of shows and removed a bunch of content. I don’t need to see 20 variations on married couple reality shows. I don’t need things like shark week made front and center.   HBO Max used to be the app I used most, now Max is something I dread launching. If i wasn’t getting it for free, I wouldn’t pay for Max at all. Zaslav doesn’t deserve your business.
Title: Messy and Bloated - just like Zaslav

Content: look i’m not gonna put a whole shpeel about the app, i just have 1 complaint. Where’s the shuffle episodes button? as a person who like background sound while doing other stuff i like to rewatch shows/series with different plots each episode and once I have watched them multiple times I start to get tired of the sequence and the shuffle brings a nice change to the episode lineup. I just miss my shuffle button :(
Title: Shuffle episodes????

Content: Our image resolution is constantly wavering between blurry, more blurry, and crisp — being “more blurry” a majority of the time. (Even when our internet service is strong) We love the shows available on this platform, and we were hoping the transition to “Max” from “HBO Max” would fix the issue. However it has only gotten worse and we are questioning resuming our membership. For such an expensive streaming service, the resolution should be reliable. We expect much better.
Title: Poor resolution

Content: I loved HBO Max, but for some reason Max was supposed to be better. On HBO Max there were always timely updates of new movies and shows being brought in that you could find and see the ones that were leaving . On Max I have only seen 1 new movie in the last 3 weeks and several new tv shows. Several movies have left, but I gotta say the quality is leaving if you are replacing movies with tv shows. Maybe it will be different in the next couple of weeks but so far Max is not impressive in terms of new content.
Title: Not an Improvement for new content

Content: Reset the password through the email link, “password changed successful” goes to sign in with new password, “error wrong password”.   This is absolutely frustrating and customer service asked way to many personal questions for very useless responses, I was asked my account details and ip address (do not share that with them), just for responses like redownload the app. Very useless and also creepy company protocol.  Great content but my god please get the fundamentals right and make sure bugs like this get fixed. Did not have this issue in HBO.
Title: Password Reset doesn’t work

Content: I was excited for the addition of things from discovery+. The app in general needs a lot of work and I miss the layout HBO max had. Occasionally when I’m using the app on my fire stick it has completely frozen and eventually makes my fire stick totally turn off. I have to unplug my fire stick and plug it back in to get my fire stick to even turn back on. It’s extremely frustrating when I’m in the middle of watching something and I’ve refrained from using the app as often as I did when it was still HBO max.
Title: Freezes and shuts down fire stick.

Content: So far 24 hours in and the app is trash. Never had a problem with the HBO Max app playing Dolby Vision and Atmos, but none of the HDR and DV programs are playing as listed. And I had to restart the Apple TV to even get the app to open properly.  You know what they say - if it ain’t broke don’t fix it. Instead, Zaslav and company have screwed the pooch with this launch.
Title: App not playing proper resolution

Content: Please bring back the shuffle option. It was the best thing you guys ever did. Also, reverting to having episodes all in a line? It was better having episodes in rows so you can see more than 3 at a time. When watching an episode you’ve seen before, the app starts where you left off with no start over option on the video, just rewinding the entire thing. Little things that could go a long way.
Title: Went backward

Content: I honestly don’t really care for it anymore. I’m gonna keep it though, but it would be nice to be able to watch the news as it previously was live in Las Vegas and why do I want to watch the news for Los Angeles? I mean really it doesn’t concern me, but I would like to watch the news like I did before but yeah I’m so unhappy with it right now.
Title: My review

Content: Don’t bother if you use a chromecast, it just gets worse and worse. Either 30-40 second pauses constantly, or SAP overplay. Always one or the other, never streams without one of the 2 problems. Takes forever to load (even just on a device). Also has started re-playing episodes rather than going on two the next. Fighting slow speed and blaring commercials, takes forever to figure out what you saw and where you need to be. Also commercials blast volume. Paid for a year in advance—- grrrr. Have seen little.
Title: So frustrating

Content: Good show options but the app has been giving me so many problems. My shows constantly freeze, it skips back to the beginning of the episode I’m on instead of going to the next one, it doesn’t keep track of what episode I’m on in my shows so every time I go back to a show I have to guess what episode I left off on. I could honestly go on with more problems I’ve encountered I’m not pleased to be paying a monthly subscription for an app that barely works.
Title: Good show options

Content: I like the app a lot but why get rid of some of the Cartoon Network shows I love the CN shows and my kids do as well but why only a few shows why isn’t there cow and chicken, two stupid dogs and Johnny bravo? all the good old show not there. Paramount plus has all the nickelodeon shows. I was hoping Max has all Cartoon Network shows.
Title: Needs more CN shows

Content: HBO max wasn’t the best app but it had an amazing catalog that outshone everyone else. Now, after the discovery merger the app has gotten slightly worse (more clicks/scrolling, less intuitive, and glitchy on console specifically) but the catalog has dropped off a cliff. Max’s main spending cut was in its catalog and it shows- it now has an incredible amount of bloat and the recommended has turned into popcorn flicks rather than the dramas I feel like HBO is known for.
Title: It was good while it lasted…

Content: Great app.  Miss being able to fully customize the profile pics. Bring that back!  When watching an episode of downloaded content, you can’t just play next. It takes you back to the download screen and you have to navigate to the next episode. Recommend adding a play next button…and a play next and delete button.
Title: Downloaded content options, profile options

Content: Every time I finish an episode, the next episode I have to manually play (even thought I have auto-play on), the audio description feature is on and it narrates everything going on. This feature is for blind people so they understand what’s happening. I am not blind. The app is not giving me a choice to turn it off when I look at my options under “Audio.” And I’ve looked, like I said, I’m not blind. Every time this happens I have to completely delete the app and redownload it. This is becoming ridiculous.
Title: Audio description won’t turn off

Content: My account migrated to Max but I lost all my profiles and apparently created a ghost account without an email address. This is problematic since I cannot access the max account from a pc or any device that isn’t my main iOS account.  It took a while to get it resolved via support and I was informed my yearly subscription would be not be honored - still waiting for details on how that will work.  Overall, I don’t appreciate having to jump through all these roadblocks.
Title: Migration to Max is questionable

Content: I’m already subscribed to Max and it’s not allowing me to use the app because it says I need to renew my subscription. Please fix it soon this is a huge error.  Edit: I found the workaround if you cancel your subscription, and then enter the app it recognizes the subscription, and then re-subscribe everything works perfectly.
Title: Not working

Content: Quality is present but the app when casting content is extremely lack luster and missing key features you would expect from basic streaming services.  No option to skip intros No option to skip recaps No option to choose next episodes easily
Title: Lacking key features

Content: June 13, 2023. Scroll through the 5-star reviews for this app and you will see how obviously fake they are. It’s one word reviews posted by nonsensical user names. We can only assume that Max/Warner Bros Discovery is behind this?? Wow. Reprehensible.  And since my original review magically disappeared… I’ll state again the biggest issues with this app are the terrible playback controls (give us the Apple built in functionality!), you can’t use the scroll wheel to scrub through the timeline, lack of SharePlay, Picture in Picture, non standard closed captioning support.
Title: Mostly FAKE reviews!

Content: This is the glitchiest streaming app I have ever used. When I use it to stream on my Chromecast, it pauses/buffers about every 3 minutes and lasts about 30 seconds. I can (and do) immediately switch to a different streaming app and have no issues. It’s the same with the Firestick. I’ve read that it helps to have a wired connection but I don’t have to do that with any other app. I have access for free through my cellular service otherwise I would cancel it. Good selection though.
Title: Good selection, terribly glitchy

Content: So my mom got a promotion from buying cricket phones Not the entire company and that promotion gave us HBO max for free and I using it so I can watch villainess because that’s all I really got it for also when I did it, it worked when I made my login, it actually worked so 2 Gordon stars  sense I was going to give it three stars
Title: I really got this, so I can watch villainess

Content: Since the app switched from hbo max to just max the continue watching section doesn’t work at all. You can stop a show in the middle and still it won’t show up in continue watching. Also if you go to a show you know you’ve watched it doesn’t always show that you’ve already watched it.  It’s incredibly frustrating, makes knowing what you’ve watched and what you haven’t and where you left off pretty difficult and makes using this app incredibly tedious. Would not recommend.
Title: Continue watching doesn’t work anymore…

Content: Same app just slightly different name. Bad part is you can’t use custom avatars. You get what they give. Worse part is how unlike the original where episodes were in multiple rows, they are now one single line. Enjoy the search. Also seems to have an issue with watching episodes. When finished watching and going back to the Home Screen the show is no longer on the continue watching section.
Title: Nothing new.

Content: I tried to go on HBO Max today and it said some nonsense about how I have to download max now, well I go and download it just to find out it’s not available in Costa Rica 🇨🇷 I’m sure at some point it will be but for now I am not able to watch my favorite series and that suckssss, I’ll give it a 3 cuz I don’t want to try to tarnish the already bad ratings because of a silly reason likes this
Title: I cant even tell if anything is wrong with the app cuz it’s not available in my region yet

Content: I enjoy watching shows on this app on my phone. But as compared to the other streaming apps I have this ones connection is quite poor. The slightest change is service, not losing service but dropping 1 bar of 5g, and the entire app immediately stops and won’t reconnect. This apps sensitivity matches those of liberals on the day Trump was inaugurated. This app caters to those who can have a constant steady stream of connection without minor changes.
Title: Poor connection

Content: Why is it everytime you update the app something vital to the experience is either laggy or completely bugged out, a few months ago I couldn’t watch a movie because two different dialogues in two different languages would play at the same time, now it won’t load titles of shows or movies and won’t even play what I was already watching, it’ll just keep getting worse and if it’s not fixed in a the next month I’m deleting my subscription
Title: At this point these 5 star reviews are bots or they love to settle for less

Content: This app is sooooooooooooo worth it, if you like only the best of movies this is the app for you. I mean they have HBO, max originals, dc and so much more. This is totally worth the monthly fee. They are always updating the app, there is always new things to watch on max. Thank you so much for creating a place we’re all of my favorite movies and shows are all on one platform. Lesss gooooo!!!!🤘🤘
Title: Awesome

Content: The iOS app stops functioning on a regular basis.  I do not have hopes that it will improve.  It blares out audio description when I have not selected it.  It turns every TV to max volume each time I use Crome cast.  It’s help section is not useful for the user.  Using a search engine to find helpful information does not resolve issues.  The app does not load video pictures anymore when browsing.  This is the worst streaming app I have ever used.  I think your content is great, but there is no way to experience it without a decent app.
Title: Plagued with problems

Content: HBO changed to MAX in order to screw over all the syndication actors and writers. They were able to get out of their contracts by changing the name.   More importantly asva result of that, you can no longer use your MAX sub outside the US. With people more nomadic than ever, this is a psychotic action. Cancel immediately and stick with Netflix, they're better anyway.  Been an HBO subscriber for 15 years, ever since I first had the money to do so. At some point customers have to push back on these disgusting degenerates that run the companies. Cancel HBO immediately, be part of the movement.
Title: CANCEL YOUR SUB NOW

Content: Overall, I love Max because it has so many shows and movies I love and the price isn't bad. However,  I think one of the bugs that needs fixed is when an ad is playing - it will glitch at times and then restart the whole movie / show. I don’t know if this is other people’s problem -  but I know it’s been mine. This happens irregularly.
Title: Commercial restart

Content: Yet another terrible app experience from Max. The previous HBO max app was also not functional, but it seems that they had worked most of the issues out in the end. This time, the app crashes when I want to select specific episodes of a TV show. It also randomly deletes downloaded episodes. The whole point of the app is to have downloaded content while you’re off-line but this doesn’t work. In fact when off-line, the app, most of the time, doesn’t work at all. Total piece of garbage.
Title: Crashes constantly

Content: I love this all the DC and Scooby Doo, not to mention shows for kids everywhere, so it’s good for the family. I love their horror category I do recommend watching  “Batman Under The Red Hood” It’s a very good film I watched it when HBO was still around and loved it also the Lego movies are on here so if you haven’t watched them already then what are waiting for watch them their beautifully made movies and I love them all.
Title: There’s no 4.5 star

Content: I primarily watch MAX for the HBO hub of award winning series and TCM (Turner Classic Movies) hub .  I recommend the following shows:  Succession, Game of Thrones, Hacks, The White Lotus, Big Little Lies, Barry, I Know This Much Is True, Watchmen, Perry Mason, Julia, The Righteous Gemstones, Chernobyl, Peacemaker, Somebody Somewhere,  The Flight Attendant, and much more!  I always seem to have a series to look forward to streaming next when I turn on the MAX app.
Title: The One To Watch….Really!

Content: Have had repeated problems with the app remembering where I have left off in a series.  The series does not show up at all in “resume watching”.  When I finally find the series in the full list of things to watch, the main screen says “start at Season 1 Episode 1”.  If I then go to the Season I’m on the episode list shows some episodes watched, but it is often not up-to-date.  This has only been a problem since the changeover from HBO MAX to MAX.  I’m watching thru Roku.
Title: resume watching problems

Content: More baking contests from food network plz! Waited a long time to catch up ad free. I dont wanna switch to the cheaper discovery+ when i prefer max content EXCEPT that most of the fun dessert contests r absent except spring n summer. Thats the opposite of what keeping discovery+ an option is supposed to mean. Do better plz! Max should have everything from hbo n discovery+, not hbo n a few discovery+ teasers!
Title: SUGAR RUSH MISSING

Content: How hard was it to just change the name and logo? Now my shows do NOT pick up where left off. I am the type of viewer that likes to rewatch superior shows like Sopranos, Succession, etc. but once you’ve watched it one time, if you go to watch it again it will NOT save where you’ve left off-even if you select restart from beginning. Tried removing and adding back to “my list” and still will not work.  Avatars for user profiles are minimal and the option to add your own picture (like HBO offered) no longer exists.  Really disappointed.
Title: Really?

Content: If you’re looking for actual storytelling and good plot development and shows, HBO is definitely the go to. Even if HBO does not have as many shows as Netflix it has plenty more quality shows than Netflix definitely a solid choice and entertainment.
Title: Some of the best shows a person could watch

Content: Why did it change? Are you ******* kidding me. Why change a logo that doesn’t need to be changed? Also just “Max”? Who wants to use an app just called max? I’d rather get a lobotomy than open an app called “max” that BLUE. why get rid of the purple when there was NO reason to? Id rather step on a bed of nails on top of burning hot coals than open this app. I might as well just pirate movies from now on instead of keep this subscription (feds don’t come for me I’m obviously not being serious about that part) and I’m sure other would say the same. Goodluck loosing subscribers HBO…or should I say “max.”
Title: What

Content: Warner Brothers Discovery made one of their biggest mistakes by removing the #1 & 1st Premium channel's name from the app. HBO turned 50 & streaming got flushed down the drain.  This is one of the worst apps ever! Besides removal of HBO now it's annoying & frustrating to use. Downloaded movies are gone & searching for content is horrible. Also to combine unscripted b.s. from Discovery+ is ridiculous! Shouldn't have HGTV's stupid property brothers mixed in to the originality of HBO's creative & original content! WBD also stated how they wouldn't be bringing all of HBO's original content over to this p.o.s. Max & cancel HBO Max originals.
Title: Say goodbye to HBO the 50 year old Premium

Content: While it is a bit muddled with all the different content sources it is overall very well designed.  I’m a little disappointed Max has taken some HBO stuff out of circulation because they have some truly great content.  Overall very well run and clear in finding content.
Title: Very good design and product

Content: Please please fix this issue. Everything was fine until hbo max became max. Now when casting to tv subtitles are gone and it only allows you to select English subtitles. I have to stop casting, enable subtitles and cast again, sometimes this does not solve the issue and have to try all again. My mom can’t even do this trick herself and is unable to watch on her own because she needs Spanish subtitles. I never wrote anything as I expected this issue to be solved months ago.
Title: Subtitles gone when casting

Content: I really like it but they took of my evil dead movies and I got so mad that I punched a hole thru my plaster wall and broke every bone in my hand I may never have full function in my right hand ever again aside from that little incident I have had much fun watching thin while doing exercises that my physical therapist told me to do
Title: Great choice for viewing pleasure

Content: My original review is below, but since they fixed the issue I came back to give a five star rating.   Why won’t the white swipe up bar and the three small dots at the top of the screen go away when viewing on my iPad? Wasn’t there before and not on any other streaming service I use.
Title: Excellent

Content: The service allows context switching seamlessly between mobile devices, a pc, or tv.  There is fresh content relevant to you brought to your attention so you can minimize searching what you get a show hole finishing one.  The UX (User Experience) is better than Netflix or any other streaming platform I’ve seen/used.  Well done Max!
Title: Max is great!

Content: Ever since the switch from HBO to Max, there have been a multitude of issues. From being double charged to my pre-paid year subscription being ended with no reason or refund, please please please save yourself the grief and just watch other things until they get their platform figured out.  Update - it’s been weeks and my account is still locked. I’ve reached out to the support team multiple times and haven’t gotten a response. Every time I call they tell me to wait for an email from them.
Title: Service is riddled with issues

Content: Cancelled on my first show I tried to watch streaming from my phone to tv. So frustrated with audio. I’m 40 yes old btw. So I’m not too old for technology.. lol. I wanted English w/ subtitles but somehow got a narrator. Couldn’t figure out how to get the narrator off. Whenever I thought I got the narrator off on my phone, when streamed to my tv the narrator came back and/or played a different language completely with English subtitles..I googled. No resolve. This is the only app/ tv problem I’ve had with this. Everything else works fine so I know it’s not my tv. I gave up.
Title: Sound/ subtitle issue

Content: Max/ HBO the best app you can get! Tons of different types of movies, the best drama tv shows for the best price. Hands down better than Netflix. HBO max allows more than one family member to sign in! Which great, and as well with a non chargeable fee if you have more than one person using your account! Thank you MAX / HBO.   Keep it up.  Customer first !
Title: The  best.

Content: Twice I rebooted my iPhone yet I get “unexpected error trying to cast…” Then when it finally started to cast to my TV I had to watch the content with the error message STILL there in the middle of the screen—covering actors faces, etc…! I’ll try to remove the app and download it again. I also must say the graphic design of “Max” with the bright blue looks primitive and like a much earlier incarnation than the sophisticated “HBO Max” in classy purple. By just calling it “Max” you’ve lost the relationship to the HBO brand which I think is odd, surprising, and confusing to your audience.
Title: Beyond Just Glitches

Content: I’m on a trip and before leaving I’ve downloaded a  bunch of shows and some movies. Today I try to open HBO Max and the app forced me to download MAX. Fine, I downloaded it. I sign in and my downloads are gone.   I can’t open HBO MAX and watch the downloaded shows, and my downloads are not accessible through MAX.   Thanks for that HBO. There should have been a week grace period or some kind of a warning content will be deleted off my device.
Title: Force download.

Content: So far the app seems to be working just as well as HBO Max did before the change. Only thing I’m not really liking is the change to the new custom player as opposed to the TVOS native player. Also it doesn’t synchronize with the TV app like HBO Max did. Improvements on this and it’ll be 5 starts thanks to all the new content available and the quality upgrade on a lot of its movies and shows.
Title: Good

Content: I love that MAX combined HBO MAX and Discovery+! Now I have all my favorite shows on one platform! Although I do hope that customers like myself that were subscribed to both platforms get some sort of coupon or something upon our next renewal date since we are subscribed to both. I really do love the MAX platform!
Title: Love the new platform!

Content: There is nothing to recommend the new Max service. Apparently Warner has dropped much of its quality programming as a tax write off and to deprive its actors of residual income. What they think we want is insipid “reality/non-reality” programming, Sports that other providers do better, and other lower value programming from the Discovery service which couldn’t support itself.  Quality programs like Westworld are gone and not available elsewhere. Others like Band of Brothers are farmed out to Netflix. Bad move, Max! You won’t keep my subscription this way!
Title: “Max” has sold its soul

Content: I’ve had nothing but issues with this app and everything to do with “Max”. The new player is slower and more glitchy than any other streaming service I’ve encountered. When chrome casting, the episode will restart from the beginning whenever I open the app. Max does not keep track of where I left off on any series, therefore I spend the first 10 minutes trying to figure out what episode I’m on. I’m completely embarrassed to pay for HBO and see the quality of support my money is supporting.
Title: HBO continues to fail

Content: I watched movies all week on my tv. Decided to give this app a try, and even though I have 4 stand alone speakers, and receiver set to stereo on all 5 speakers, not surround sound, I had to almost put my ear up to the speaker to hear talking.  I tried a variety of movies, all with the same result. Played a movie I had purchased on Apple TV, the sound was fine. Played same movie on max, not good. Billion dollar  company needs to spend a little more money on app. I could hear talking if I put sound on my receiver to almost 90%.  I don’t want to blow receiver for a $9.00 app.
Title: Worst app ever

Content: I just think that Max needs to focus on their categories and how much content they have and then some of them barely have anything on how many sci-fi westerns does does really have anything in them and the stuff that they do have they keep for super long time and don’t bring in new Contant so you’re sitting there watching reruns, but regardless, they still do like it
Title: max review

Content: The app on mobile and TV stalls frequently unable to gauge bandwidth on high speed. The mobile app yesterday would play 5 seconds of content before erroring out it can’t find the rest. Even downloads won’t play more than 10seconds before erroring out. Updated today and now the screen just goes black after you select a movie from the homepage. Really poor quality. I may have to cancel my subscription if MAX can’t develop a useful app.
Title: Poor performance and reliability

Content: My closed captions just stopped working on my MAX only on my TV (ROKU). The captions were working but just stopped all of a sudden.
