Every other streaming channel is still functioning, and MAX captions are working on my IPhone. Also, the continuous play is no longer working on my iPhone, which is disruptive to my sleep. (Continuous playback works fine on the TV). Can MAX please get their stuff together? I pay for the premium package. I should not have these issues. The “help” section is useless.
Title: What happened?!?

Content: Because I loved having tcm hub and I don’t see a button for it any longer so that isn’t fun. I’m seeing movies from it but is it still part of max? And I along with allot of folks have the discovery plus so don’t need all the shows on here as well. So I just think this so called update doesn’t have anything that makes me think it’s better now
Title: Don’t love the new interface

Content: The other reviews are wrong. Nothing but glitches since the change from HBO max to MAX. The video randomly starts fast forwarding, shows continuously just turn off. Don’t really don’t understand the point of the changes; the same movies and shows. All this has done is negatively impact the viewing experience for the consumer. I cancelled. That bad.
Title: Don’t believe

Content: All my iPads are on the latest iOS and they all have the same issue watching movies on Max app. The battery health shows at the top right corner, time/date too left and the swipe bar shows at the bottom.   Even if using full screen it’s the same. Sometimes rotating will have the time/battery disappear but swipe up bar still shows. But once I touch the screen the indicators come back and stay on.   I thought it’ll be ok but after a while it gets very annoying to see those show up in on the screen.  It’s not a settings issue in the iPad because my Netflix, tubi, prime all have the indicators disappear  when watching on those apps.
Title: Good but issues with iPad

Content: So far so good with the changeup from HBOMAX. There’s generally more stuff than before, although most of what’s new isn’t all that impressive because it’s largely reality tv. There’s an element of subterfuge in the way the app is being managed; the distinction between an HBO Original and a Max Original is being deliberately dismantled, but it’s a minor nuisance. So far, so good.
Title: So far so good

Content: I totally forgot about the launch of max until this morning as I attempted to open the HBO max app. I was promoted to download this app and after doing so, I was automatically signed in and it works flawlessly. Not sure what other people are experiencing but I didn’t go through all of the hassle. Quite the opposite actually.
Title: Easy Conversion

Content: Ever since it became “Max” this app has gone downhill very fast they should have left it alone. When I log into my account I no longer have a recently watched list anymore on my profile but everything I recently watched would be on my mom's profile in her recently watched list. If I am watching several episodes at a time it all of a sudden will just zoom in on the tv and only does this on max no matter how many times I exit the app the only way to get it to reset is if I unplug the tv and plug it back HBO do better and fix this!!!
Title: Bugs

Content: Overall I think the new app is difficult to navigate since there are now so many different channels and all of their individual shows. I so so appreciate having the amount of options that we do - but I wish the app had the channels as categories to choose through when searching for something to watch. I feel like I’m im at a Cheesecake Factory flipping through their 20 page menu - overwhelmed & sticking to what i know.  Also the blue aesthetic is just not It, i miss the purple.
Title: Difficulty Navigating

Content: “hey let’s change our name from one of the most recognizable brands in the entire media industry, to just being ‘MAX’ which will require a conversation to introduce context, and prompt people to still call us HBO because the name change is f(censored) moronic. not only that, but our SEO will be ruined and literally everyone will hate it and call us idiots.”   “oh my, that idea sounds FANTASTIC. while we’re at it, how about we—instead of just updating our existing app—create a whole brand new app that is buggy, and won’t allow 70% of our users to log into.”     “FANTASTIC work, gentlemen, you’re both promoted!”  i plan on cancelling my subscription at the end of this month, no need to pay money to a company that cancels beloved shows and removes them from the app entirely, and uses their profits to implement the stupidest changes i have perhaps ever seen a company attempt. cheers.
Title: Absolutely STUPID Business Decision

Content: Are you sure you guys went to college? I don’t understand the marketing thought behind changing the HBO streaming app from HBO Max to just Max. You realize that when I want to use the search bar on my phone to open the HBO app, I can no longer type in “HBO”…. You know, like the name of the service I am paying for. it may seem little, but it’s pretty stupid on your part to remove the name of the company from the app. I bet this was some GenZ marketing execs that spent more time with social activism than actually learning marketing while in college.
Title: I don’t understand

Content: Great app so far, yet it keeps deleting the show under “Continue watching.” I have to go back and search for the series and find the episode versus picking up where it left off. Additionally, close captions keep disappearing, needs to be updated soon please (I have hard of hearing family members)
Title: Need a few Fixes

Content: This company is just poor.  They ruined both discovery plus and HBO Max to create this abomination.  They sucker people in with their prior programming then lock them into a auto renew year long contract.  The menu is a mess, they’ve cut so many shows it’s insane.  We never watch this yet we’re stuck in a no early termination contract. Stay far away from this garbage, you get better content on free apps like freevee and  Tubi. You’ve been warned..
Title: When tow good companies join and ruin themselves in the process over greed

Content: I can’t speak for the mobile app, I don’t watch shows on my phone, but the Roku app is awful. If you pause your show, prepare for it to go back several minutes when you push play. It’ll have a white mark showing where you were, but you have to fast forward to get there. If you leave the show and go back in, it completely starts over from the beginning. It doesn’t register where you were at all. Never had any issues with HBO Max so I don’t understand why this new app is so much worse.
Title: Roku Max is awful

Content: This may be unfair as I don’t know where I can review the MAX app on Roku but it has a major glitch that has been all over the internet for weeks yet no fix. If you pause a show and hit play it either completely restarts or rewinds back a good 30 plus minutes. Hitting the quick review or rewind :30 button works as a workaround but who remembers to do that most of the time? Please fix!
Title: Maybe unfair but Roku app has a glitch

Content: Casting to any device is shotty at best, can’t pause or control the volume with it so every time a new episode starts it automatically sets my volume to 100. Even the downloads arnt really downloads, you still need Wi-Fi or some kind of internet access to watch them, I thought the whole point was to watch without data especially when your on a 7 hour plane ride with no Wi-Fi. It has some great shows and movies but the customer experience is very sub par.
Title: Needs ALOT of work

Content: It would be really nice if we as users could filter our home page more. I personally do not want to see the horror movies and would like to be able to filter my homepage to where it only shows suggestions for the genres I enjoy. Also, please add an ignore/don’t show again/hide option under the add to list, so we don’t have to keep looking at shows/movies we don’t want to see.
Title: Please give users more filters

Content: I pay the monthly plan for no ads. After HBO went from HBO to max, I noticed at the start of shows before the intro, max has snuck in ads…on my ad free plan.   Called customer service and he said it was ads when at the bottom of my screen I have an option to “skip ad”.   Bottom line, I pay for ad free, but Max isn’t going to honor their end of the deal, so I will be going elsewhere for my streaming.
Title: Ad free plan but I max still sneaks in ads

Content: Every time i want to restart an episode of a show, it doesn’t actually restart it and it immediately goes it to the next episode. I thought when the line on the bottom of a show is full and you click on it it would restart the episode but it just goes to the last few seconds of an episode and goes to the next one it’s really annoying
Title: Restarting an Episode

Content: We run most of our streaming services through our iPhones to the Chomecasts on our TVs. Other apps perform seamlessly but the Max app is just horrible. When you try to pause or back up the app you’ll find the app has lost connection. Then you have to start the stream over and find your place. That’s the second big problem. The Max app doesn’t remember where you left off. It will pick up on the previous episode or jump ahead to the next. Fail.
Title: Pretty terrible app

Content: I am constantly getting “something went wrong error” while watching a series. I killed app, uninstalled and reinstalled issue still persists, no matter how many ways I tried issue didn’t fix. This is really frustrating, I am sure this would be my last month with this app, oh I also found another bug, when you pause a video and after unlock the app using facial recognition video rotates on its own until you pick up the device and tilt it to rotate again to its original position.
Title: Worst experience of Streaming App

Content: I don’t mind switching over apps, but the fact that this is the third time there has been a change over does not make sense to me. I would be happier about it if the SharePlay option did not completely disappear. My boyfriend and I are currently long distance, and being able to watch a movie or our favorite TV shows is a nice way to do something together. I wonder if it will be added back :/
Title: Where’s SharePlay??

Content: Thank you WBD for cleaning up the app. I love that you separated the HBO content for ease of access but also left it accessible in the other areas. The categories are now more subtly placed across the top and they simplified the main menu by a lot. Although the price hike is rough, I hope it comes with more content and continued success in the movie roster!
Title: Looks great!

Content: Was excited to explore the new interface. Logged into my xfinity box, started a movie, it crashed the system and went to blue screen within 10 minutes. Had to full restart. Will update review if product improves. First attempt pretty lousy thus far.
Title: Crashed almost immediately on xfinity box

Content: its actually so good i love it, its worth paying for they have so much more things than like starz and stuff, tho they dont really have like subtitles in other languages on SOME , others do im sure of it, and if u ever have to rewind past a add , it doesnt make you watch the add again, its like it knows that you already watched the add so its good.
Title: max

Content: So I go an download the app right and when it boots up it’s logged into some random account. So then I had to login to my actual account. That is not a smooth transfer. I only have one HBO account so it should have pulled up correctly but it did not. I don’t even know what account that was it didn’t show me and information on the account. The account I was logged into on HBO app was the one I had to enter MANUALLY into “Max” 🙄. It’s giving ghetto already.
Title: Max??????

Content: Maybe someone already reported this but if not, BEWARE of unlocking your phone after you’ve already started your movie or show in Max. We love this app and the content, BUT we will start a movie or show and continue about our movie night. When we open our phone to do anything else, our show/movie will restart. This is so annoying. I can re-rate and give more stars once this is fixed. We have iPhone 14s and the app is updated on our phones.
Title: PLEASE FIX…

Content: The app is pretty good. Sometimes a series or movie will be in the wrong genre. What would be great if we had the capability to name the devices that are using the app. The device names are basic like Xbox or Roku. When one of my Xboxes broke I had to sign all of them out. Then sign back in the other Xboxes. It would definitely save time with being able to name devices.
Title: Name Devices

Content: Up until 2 days ago, this app had been the most reliable for downloading shows and steaming later. But yesterday, all my Vampire Diaries episodes disappeared (I had just downloaded them last week). Now, I can’t even access the episode list to re-download them. This is the only show that seems to be affected, so that’s why I gave 2 stars. But it’s the show I’m most interested in watching right now and I’d like this problem to get fixed ASAP.
Title: Deleted my downloads

Content: I got Max because it housed some of my favorite shows, movies, and even pretty decent originals. For awhile, I had no complaints but as of the past few weeks, the audio has not been in sync more often then it is. I’ve powered off my device and even tried reinstalling the app which only serve to fix the issue temporarily. All in all, I hope the app itself improves so I can use this service to its fullest.
Title: Great catalog, terrible app

Content: I thought the old HBO app was a bit wonky but it got the job done the majority of the time. This new MAX version is unusable. I tried choosing a particular episode only to have the wrong one start playing repeatedly. Once I figured out a way around that issue this app could not find my chromecast even though every other streaming app I have was able to. Seems like they should quit worrying about the name of the platform and focus on delivering a smooth app that’s easily streamable. At least Netflix has that going for them.
Title: It got worse

Content: I love Max but I can't watch anything on here. I can only watch it on my TV.  I  miss HBO Max I can’t watch. scooby-doo on here only on my TV!! I want you guys to fix it but.  My parents can for I can watch stuff on Max. So I really really really love Max I just don’t know if I do but for. When I can watch I love it thank you for reading bye!
Title: The way I feel about this.

Content: I love the app and everything brings but it’s been two days and it’s still won’t work. I have tried everything deleting and reinstalling it signing out and restarting my electronic, and still nothing shows up. I even checked my internet speed and this problem is currently on all of my electronics. My iPhone, Xbox, IPad and my PS4 and still no luck. Please fix this quick I never had this issue with HBO MAX.
Title: App not working

Content: Very disappointed with this new app.  Did not automatically update my current HBO Max app.  Actually, it would not even allow the HBO max app to load.  It just crashed.  Could not find it in the App Store, until I searched for Max.  Once I installed it, it acted like I was a new customer.  Took me a while to restore my account.   Finally, when I opened the app there are all sorts of shows that are not HBO movies or shows.  Shows that look dumb are intermingled which look like reality shows.  I just want entertaining movies and tv.  Not reality shows.
Title: Why the name change

Content: Are we, the viewers, consuming so much media that we lose interest?   Are we desensitized to the spectacle of high budget productions?  Is there a media fatigue that has set in for the average consumer?  Has large media producers prioritized activist audiences or niche audiences over broader audiences?  Has entertainment become  a way for producers to promote an agenda or indoctrinate their audiences?  Is quantity prioritized over quality?
Title: What are we doing here?

Content: I have the app on my Samsung TV and it will go to the next episode before the current ends. It never saves my last view so I have to remember what was the last episode I watch and in what minute I left it. Trying to cast from my iPhone is imposible. Every time I open the app while casting it will restart the episode and play ads. If I scroll to any part of the episode it will restart it instead of taking me to the location I commanded. Impressive that this company as big as it is can’t produce a fair quality app.
Title: Buggy app

Content: Stop asking me to sign in almost every other time that I click on your app. HBO max was just changed to max, so why should I have to login every single time. The credentials have not changed nothing else is changed stop asking me. This is frustrating. The previous app wasn’t great and neither is this one.
Title: Dear Max

Content: Every episode / show I have to go in and click to turn on subtitles. There’s a note saying you can change this in settings, but there’s no actual option there? Along with this there’s no “play next episode” button most episodes so it needs up glitching and replaying the episode. It doesn’t save when it pauses mid episode so it restarts and I have to skim to the part I left at. Has great potential but feels rushed. Hoping new releases fix these issues
Title: Missing Features

Content: I’m loving the new app, particularly the access to more content. Just in a couple days of using the app I’ve found old shows that I’ve wanted to rewatch but couldn’t. Not sure what the issue was around people having problems with the app but I’ve had not problems with using it.
Title: More Content

Content: I’ve noticed this version of the app does not keep track of most of my shows progress. It’s very frustrating having to search for the show I want (even though I added it to my list, still doesn’t show up) and then proceed to find where I was in that show. It’s specifically annoying with South Park since I’m on season 17 and there are a ton to choose from.  I feel like it’s not asking much to just have my shows progress tracked like the old app. Hate all the rebranding nonsense 🤦🏻‍♂️
Title: Doesn’t save my shows progress

Content: The new max app has issues. Using on Sony A80J 77 Inch TV: BRAVIA XR OLED 4K Ultra HD Smart Google TV. Audio goes out of sync with video constantly by several seconds. Support hasn’t been much help. I’ve gotten disconnected from chat several times, and tired of doing the same reset your tv steps, and “is it only this 1 show” every time. Build in more telemetry into the app so you know it’s happening , with better ability to support. I’m hoping it’s just issues with the new app that are going to be resolved soon. If not I guess I’ll cancel my subscription.
Title: New max app has issues

Content: It’s already ridiculous that this company had one rebrand not too long ago. That said, with the seamless transition of the HBO Go/Now apps into one, many considered it a success. Of course, these people just can’t help themselves and have decided they need a second rebrand in one decade.   This new Max switch was a complete dud in comparison. Not only is the name dumb, removing the most iconic part of it (HBO), it requires you to download a completely separate app. We’ll see how it holds up in actual functionality, but so far two big thumbs down.
Title: Not as seamless as the Go/Now switch

Content: I honestly love HBO max, it’s a fair price, no ads, you don’t have to worry about limiting the number of screens you have running, it never clicks out, so it’ll play all day long without having to touch anything or click “are you still watching” unlike most other apps. And the wide variety of content is awesome!
Title: Love it

Content: All I have to say is thank you, I finally can watch what I want, when I want, and return to favorites and know they’re still there ready to be watched again. Also I’m a big sports fan and I’m excited to see games being broadcast here as well. I’m really enjoying MAX and I think you will to.
Title: No b to the S I love MAX

Content: I want to start off by saying that I LOVE HBO Max! But ever since the transition from HBO Max to Max I could not for the Life of me log-in to my account. I’ve tried resetting the password, uninstalling and reinstalling, updating, tried with different devices, and even texted the customer service number only to be told that I just have to “try again at a later time.” I can’t even pause my account because I cannot log in. So I’m hoping the developers can fix this problem ASAP because I really don’t want to cancel my subscription.
Title: Log-in malfunction??

Content: extremely buggy. I loved hbo max and would reccomend to everyone. not even 24 hours in and it has deleted ALL my watch history making finding an episode i was on a nightmare. and i thought maybe it would come back but no, it deletes any evidence that i even watched the episodes as soon as i close the app. the new Ui is horrible and you removed your best features. Clearly idiots run this company and i will be cancelling until further notice. if i could leave no stars i would
Title: did you even test your own app before launch?

Content: Well firstly the app is ok, but for some reason since way back hbo took off Spanish audio from a show I was watching and has then had me a bit upset. Checked to see if the audio was up and when I saw the description it apparently is but when I watch it the show only has English audio. I’d greatly appreciate if there was taken a look into such problem, oh and fyi the show is Mike and Molly.
Title: Need Audio Added

Content: The brightness is really bad on here- it’s super dark I can’t even see what I’m watching. the darkness is as if when you click on the screen to show the play button and it dims the screen. I’m not sure if it’s just a glitch but it’s really bad. Also not a fan of the blue color I miss the purple of HBOMax. And I hate that it’s called “max”. I’ve never left a review for an app before so this is kinda disappointing. However the movie selection is great though. Hopefully the darkness will get fixed
Title: Miss the colors of HBOMax

Content: That’s the message I receive as soon as I sign in to this new replacement for HBO Max. Please try again, you say? No thanks. I’ll go back to my HBO Max app which DOES work.   It amazes me that in 2023 software producers still do not know how to test apps…or don’t care to. at least it’s consistent. It fails on Apple TV and my iPhone. so congrats on that.  This app is useless. HBO or whoever spent weeks hyping this app called Max. And it just doesn’t work. What a joke. My only question is how did this become a Apple “editors pick” if it doesn’t even work??
Title: “An error occurred. Please try again”

Content: still don’t understand the rebranding to just max, kind of lame tbh like max is what you name a dog so idk why they changed it to that. i pay every month just for movies/shows to not play at all or i get logged out of my account randomly for no given reason. has a lot of my favorites tho so i gotta give them that, it’s the only reason i still subscribe.
Title: She’s cool

Content: in an attempt to expand their scope, HBO is now trying to bring sports and news into the app, which means more things to wade through with it's "time for some HBO".   in its current version, it also restarts your content from the beginning every time you open the app to go pause or adjust volume when casting to the TV, which is really disruptive. really hoping they fix that soon.
Title: info overload and buggy

Content: This is the best streaming app out there. Content is always current. Great selections old and new.  I would like to see more of the older HBO series available (Dream On being one). I have no complaints and have had no problems every since it was launched as HBO GO. Keep up the great work!!
Title: Not Sure why HBO changed the name to Max

Content: Love max a lot cause it’s got quite a bit of my favorites on it and it’s not too confusing to use and it’s recommended stuff is pretty spot on with the stuff I watch normally. And I also loveee the vampire diaries and pretty little liars and this is where both of them ended up lol definitely recommend 10/10
Title: Awesome!

Content: If there is a series I have already seen, when I go to rewatch it and pick and episode it skips the episode I picked and takes me to the next one.   In my “watching” section if I want to go to episode instead of watching where I am I have to search the series instead of being able to click right there.
Title: A couple changes.

Content: For a such a beloved and game-changing network like HBO, the user experience for “MAX” is sub-par. It’s actually pretty terrible and embarrassing. 75% of the time I’m reloading the app because it doesn’t load properly. One ongoing issue is that I would click on a show like Hard Knocks or Telemarketers and the screen would be black. Nothing to click or do on it. I’d have to reload and attempt it again, and still issues. This has been going on for weeks.
Title: Terrible user experience

Content: Gotta say, as a giant movie buff hbo or max or whatever you wanna call it has gotta say the best movie catalogue I’ve seen on streaming service. A great mix of classics and newer stuff, as someone who loves movies and is always trying to watch more this is my go to to scroll through and try and find something
Title: Best streaming service for big movie buffs

Content: I have a Max subscription through Xfinity and the newer updates made the iOS app unusable.  When I select Xfinity through the provider section, I am directed to an Xfinity home page where I am logged out.   If it would just use Safari to authenticate like it used to I would already be logged in, but it directs me through some built in Max web browser.   After I log in, the Max app browser does not reroute me back to the app to authenticate. It keeps me on the Xfinity homepage. If I then click cancel to close the browser, I still have not authenticated in the app. If I hit back on the Max app brier to try and re-load the authentication page, it successfully authenticates me now that I’ve logged in but TRIES TO STREAM MAX THROUGH THEIR CRAP IN-APP BROWSER RATHER THAN AUTHENTICATING MY LOGIN TO WATCH THROUGH THE APP!!! Wildly infuriating. Please test and fix this bug.
Title: Newest Update Makes App Unusable

Content: I had to restart the app 3-4 times yesterday just to get one episode to load properly. Shows either start with no sound or no visual playing, and the app will freeze my TV as I try to exit/restart. It also starts me on the wrong episode instead of playing the newest one like other streaming apps. I wish my show was just on Netflix so I could be done with this app. It got worse after it became MAX
Title: Poor functionality, non-user-friendly interface

Content: Since I downloaded MAX I’ve had issues only on my tv. I am trying to watch ANJLT or for example Avatar and the screen size will either be distorted or it crashes and shows a snowy screen. If I want to continue watching anything I have to use my iPad or phone. I’d love to watch from my tv more than my other devices but I can’t. I pay way too much for this service. I’ve tried troubleshooting like uninstalling the app and turning off the modem or wifi. Nothing fixes it. I am ready to cancel if things don’t get fixed soon.
Title: Crap

Content: Honestly, it’s cool that they added everything they own under one app but the app on my roku and my phone are terrible. It don’t remove things I have finished watching and if i started watching. The app refuses to put in my co tinue watching list and the episodes i did watch it doesn’t register them as watched. Please i hope they fix this issue which is utterly annoying.  Update: now it logged me out and won’t let me log back in. So I changed it to 2 to 1 star. What is even going on? Fix this issue.
Title: Nothing is working correctly

Content: Overall not a bad experience, good shows but for some reason MAX does not want to keep my shows in continue watching. I have been watching the big bang theory and every time I go back to watch it is no where to be found in continue watching (which is the most convenient.) I have to go search it up, which when i’m on my ROKU is just a PITA. I don’t know if this is something that can be fixed but it does tend to be pretty annoying.
Title: Continue Watching Issues

Content: Really? You got rid of the BEST feature I have ever seen on a streaming service? The thing I used every time I watched one of my comfort shows? The shuffle button was what put HBO above any other streaming service. I was telling everyone that it was what every app needed. On shows I’ve watched a million times in my life, I’d play the game of “can I guess the episode before the theme song.” Please bring it back. I’ll change my one star to a five because I really do like Max. But taking away a great feature just isn’t it.
Title: No shuffle button?

Content: You have great options, but your signal outreach can be pretty awful. Takes a long time to get going when you’re first pulling up the app and often have trouble keeping signal during shows/movies. Everything else is fabulous. You’re also a constant provider of all things Harry Potter which is major.
Title: Almost top notch

Content: HBO seems he’ll bent on cramming low grade content down my throat. All we want is a one stop shop for quality programming (the HBO we pay for) instead we get a firehouse of trash and god help you if you want to recreate the HBO Go experience.  Worse still it does not integrate with Apple’s up-next as all the previous versions did and of course it has also deleted my viewing history.    I’m probably just going to let my subscription lapse and go to Apple TV+ which has better programming anyway now that succession and Berry are both done.
Title: This app is hot garbage

Content: I came here for multiple shows for example infinity train. And I got into summer camp island. But almost all the shows I came to enjoy are gone now. Please bring them back. Also how dare you guys remove custom icons, it was one of the best things you had. I just realized you just removed dexters lab. This is going too far. My 1# use of this streaming service was to look at old cartoons that I haven’t seen much of. And now the it has almost no purpose for me.
Title: Removed all the shows I came for

Content: I've barely even used the app, and I've still had so many issues. It drains my battery even when my phone is plugged in, so it uses battery faster than my phone can charge. You can't double tap to fast forward/rewind. If I swipe down from the top of the screen, the video orientation flips upside down, and won't go back to normal unless I flip the entire phone that way and then back. It's a mess, objectively worse than HBO Max, and a company with this much money has no excuse releasing something so sloppy.
Title: Horrible functionality

Content: Bring back HBO!!!! Enough dumbing down your core user base — shoving Discovery garbage content from other platforms and studios in our faces via the Home Screen will not get us to consume it over HBO original elite programming, which deserves its own platform unsullied by low brow drivel.   The world rejects your shortsighted rebranding campaign.   Oh and to add insult to injury, the app is glitchy. Amongst other things already covered by countless previous reviews, my watch history isn't synced across different devices.
Title: I do not want to see Dr. Pimple Popper or Friends on the app I use for high quality HBO CONTENT.

Content: Please hurry and fix your login via AT&T when a user attempts to login from an Apple iPad (latest model and latest Apple and App update installed).  What’s the point for me to have this included as part of my AT&T Plan when you have an issue allowing users in and I can’t even use it? Very frustrating and I have changed different networks since it says that it’s a network issue to prove it’s not.  Once this updated I’ll update my star rating as I can’t use it at all so that’s a 1 star in my book.
Title: FIX YOUR LOGIN VIA AT&T

Content: Bring back the shuffle button!! Content is great(thrilled about the addition of How It’s Made), 4K works very well on my shield/TV, only thing that would make it perfect is bringing back the shuffle button! Shows like South Park, How It’s Made, and others with large episode numbers would be so much better with a shuffle button like HBOMax had.
Title: Just missing one thing…

Content: This app has many bugs that need to be fixed.  First off, the app doesn’t know where I’ve left off on the shows I watch. I could be in season 6 and it’s trying to start me back in an earlier season which is frustrating.  Second, whenever I cast my shows and leave the app, it glitches and restarts my whole episode after it plays an ad. Incredibly frustrating.  I’m really debating if this app is even worth it anymore. Why create an entirely new app when it’s just as bad as your last one?
Title: App glitches

Content: The app is alright but there’s an issue with pausing shows that makes the user experience a little bit annoying. I noticed that whenever I pause a show & leave it paused for a bit, when I press play it takes the show to the end. Which means I’d have to rewind it back to where I had initially paused it. Idk if this is a bug but please fix it! I didn’t have this issue with the HBO Max app.
Title: Annoying Bug

Content: I have all my DC movies & animated movies in one place!  I can down load them to watch later when I’m out of signal, which is amazing when the weather blows out  everything I still have it on my phone.  Has a ton of other great movies and shows well worth the subscription
Title: All my DC in One place

Content: it seems like after the update i’ve been having to sign in on my tv’s 3 times a week. it doesn’t help when your toddler is obsessed with scooby doo but you’re sick and tired of having to do the provider set up through your phone after two days of use. when i’m able to actually access it, it’s nice to be able to watch some of the shows i like for free that i would have to pay for on other channels.
Title: Have to sign in too much

Content: Honestly, when I heard that HBO Max had made a new F, I was kind of skeptical in the way that I thought they were likely losing their partner with HBO due to the name change, but I am close to surprise this ad actually offers. The commercials are true, they really do have “more of the tv and shows everybody wants to watch”!!
Title: Was skeptical but WOW

Content: For some reason it’ll get stuck on one part of an episode and just endlessly reload back a few seconds and play just that second or two over and over again. Besides that glaring issue this app works just fine.
Title: Play back issues

Content: The new app works well and stuff but one thing I really dislike is that they removed shareplay. That might not be a huge issue for most people but for some people this really affects what they can now watch with their friends. Many other steaming services support it, not to mention the old app used to support it so why take it off now?
Title: It works well..

Content: I would give it 5 stars but the shows I’ll be watching doesn’t pop up in my continue watching slot. I literally have to find my show.. go to the season I am on find the episode that I was on and fast forward to where I left off. It’s annoying honestly because I don’t pay attention to the episodes to just be like oh I was on season 3 episode 2 left off at 25 mins in. Like it’s annoying. Didn’t have this problem with HBO MAX. Please fix
Title: Continue watching

Content: Updating review along with their update. This one is partially on Apple, but the developer guidelines require a change log. Your update description is still just an advertisement for Max. You need to be listing the fixes and changes so we know what is being done. So far the user interface is horrible from a function standpoint (although much better than Roku, wasted screen space, doesn’t remember where you left off, you have to press * to get a description?!?!?!  Old HBO Max interface was leaped and bounds better)
Title: Updating Review

Content: Why was this feature removed? The default settings are hideous. We should be given more features, not taken away. If this is ever addressed I’ll change my rating.  Edit: I am tired of seeing all the discovery content cloud the premium HBO content which I’m subscribed for. Please add an option to turn discovery content off. At least add a “not interested” button you can click on for promoted content you wish not to be pushed on you harder than sal pushes H. At this point I would PAY more to have that content removed.
Title: Customizable Subtitles

Content: I love HBO max and all but what the heck. They change their name more than the Oakland A’s change their pitcher (the year is 2023). If they change their name one more time I might almost cancel. Geez golly gosh almighty. If they change their name one more time I might even get mad at Tony soprano. And I am a big soprano fan. What the flippity dang nabbit. Anyways the last season of GOT kinda wasn’t good at all. 2 stars bc I like y’all’s stuff
Title: I’m angry

Content: The new app seems a little unnecessary but I’m impressed at all the new content and the upgraded look is a good change. But why take away the one feature no other streaming service had? BRING BACK THE SHUFFE FEATURE! It’s so good! It makes casual viewing enjoyable and did the app really upgrade if they’re getting rid of the good features?
Title: Bring Shuffle Feature Back!

Content: I’m confused about all the negative reviews. All I did was download this new app, clicked start streaming and ur opened right up to my old subscription lol. No extra setup, no redoing anything I’ve already did on the old app and all my saved stuff is still there.   For those of u having problems with the task bar not disappearing on full screen just press F11 twice
Title: Confused

Content: Two features I loved about the HBOmax app are gone. The first and biggest issue being the shuffle button. I liked to watch tv series that I have seen before and the shuffle option always kept things interesting. Keep things interesting and bring back the shuffle! I also liked that you could search for shows based on the production company, such as Cartoon Network, studio ghibli, DC, etc. It’s the little things that make the experience more enjoyable!
Title: downgrade

Content: This app is so close to being perfect, I loved HBO Max, it has always been my preferred streaming service. So when a new and updated version of the app was announced and released it sounded good to me. There is only one problem. We lost HBO Max’s color scheme in the transition 😭😭. My only complaint. The previous design was visually more pleasing and that is my only issue with the new service.
Title: So close to perfect

Content: However I am sick and tired of having to log in everyday to my account. I never had this problem before the transition and it’s a for sure thing everyday sign up or log in it gets terribly annoying if it wasn’t included in my phone plan I wouldn’t have it just because after the entirety of the app’s existence i have logged in every single time!
Title: Decent change over

Content: So many of the titles I joined for are no longer available. And seeing all this extra other stuff, news and sports live, come in makes me concerned that the content that I joined for will slowly be pushed out and this will end up like every other streaming service. Can almost guarantee more consistent content from Tubi or Pluto than this. At least there I don’t have to pay for the wool.
Title: Great but…

Content: I live in the States, but my first language is Spanish, so in my house we watch movies and series in Spanish, some shows here have Spanish audio/subtitles but Adventure Time, Regular Show, Steven Universe, Teen Titans Go!, Total Drama, We Bare Bears or The Amazing World of Gumball doesn’t even have subtitles in Spanish, is a little bit annoying and I would really like that HBO Max have Spanish Audio and more languages in these series. Like I’m paying for it!
Title: Not bad, but not good

Content: I love the new version and I miss the old one but still but here is why I put it to 4 stars. When you want to delete a account it doesn’t show up for the new version but the old one had a delete option but not the new one so I hope you see this and please fix it! I still love the app.
Title: It’s an Awesome app but the creators forgot something…

Content: Overall the app is fine, it does function as a streaming app is expected. My biggest issue and the reason for my one star, give me a not interest/dislike feature. I’m sick of opening the app, to suggestions that I am not interesting in! Yet every time here we are, suggestions for scab shows with no option for me to stop seeing it. Just give me the option to  blacklist it, and get it off my screen. All other streaming platforms have this so it’d be great to see “max” do it as well.
Title: Dislike/not interested

Content: Ever since they changed to Max, it’s been horrible. If they can’t fix their issues I won’t be renewing. Shows don’t hold the episode u watch, when u pause certain episodes on some shows, when u unpause, it takes u back tot he beginning of the episode. When u want to go back and watch an earlier episode, it doesn’t restart. Shows I’m watching will disappear randomly from my “currently watching” list, and more! And this is on ALL my devices, so it’s not a tv or phone issue. I don’t recommend.
Title: New app is horrible

Content: For a paid service, your app is trash. Going to cancel probably as it doesn’t start where left off. For example, watching through chromecast, i watch a show for a few episodes and end on 4. The next time I open the app it is back on episode 1. Similar for movies. I could finish a movie and it will tell me to continue watching midway through. Or I’ll stop watching a movie 3/4 way finished, and when I come back it is starts at the movie intro. Seems pretty fundamental.
Title: Trash - doesn’t remember where show stopped.

Content: Since the change to Max, there’s been problems with the app on the Roku. The show will suddenly stop, the sound gets a strange sound to it and the volume increases on its own, and it won’t respond to the remote.    This happens with every show ~ every time.
Title: Since the change

Content: The app is still experiencing bugs or tech issues around audio and subtitles. I can’t choose out of English audio description- even though I didn’t choose it- it’s listed as English and it literally doesn’t list another option in the drop down menu. Also can’t choose other languages listed in the audio description for that particular title. This app is still poor quality and does not function well- is not user friendly. The support is not helpful either.
Title: Subtitles and Audio Errors

Content: Max is really a great an entertaining streaming platform!! It also has a lot quality of movies to tv shows and more to pick from to watch all hours too!! Also tones of other platforms that are included too!! You have to the word MAX for a reason and thank you so much!! 🎉❤️👍🥳🎈🎉
Title: Thank you!!

Content: Two big issues: (1) requires wifi to access downloads (so if you download a few episodes for a flight, you have no way to watch) (2) if you try to download multiple episodes, it often fails to download the first episode while prioritizing storage for the later episodes. It should try to prioritize the episode order rather than leaving you with episode 2 and 4 when you haven’t even watch episode 1 or 3.
Title: Still not great

Content: Overall the app is good.  A couple of tweaks are needed.  When I watch a series the episode I finish and leave the app, when I go back it doesn’t show the next episode in “continue watching” and the episode I just watched shows that I didn’t watch it.  I’m watching the Wire where it’s happening for me.
Title: Shows I watch doesn’t show up in “continue watching”

Content: If you’re going to force users into using MAX and completely having them dowload another app when the initial app was working perfectly fine… MAKE SURE THERE ARE NO BUGS OR ISSUES! APP IS SLOW and to add to that NOW it’s giving an error msg that is saying no subscription update available which is not allowing you to watch anything. I didn’t request an update anyhow. Being asked to “log in” to my account which I am already logged into and upon “logging in” the app still didn’t work. I am very close to canceling a subscription
Title: No

Content: So I’ll like this show called my adventures with Superman, the problem is that whenever I click on the show at all, turns off, and then kicks me out of the app however, the other shows are all fine
Title: When I try to watch “My adventures with Superman” the app shuts off

Content: It works pretty well on my phone, however it often freezes on the TV app. The spinning symbol often comes up and it takes forever for it to start again or it just doesn’t work. Sometimes a message comes up that says Max connection cannot connect or it mentions the internet service not connecting, but I checked and everything is connected. I also tried to install it again and now I can’t install it at all.
Title: TV app not great

Content: Ever since the update the app has been all kinds of wrong:  -When clicking on an episode, it plays the last two seconds then goes to the next ep.  -Currently Watching isn’t saving any shows, it acts like you finished the series.  -Every show I’ve watched since the update (Boardwalk Empire, Big Love, Barry) doesn’t save when you go to the show page; it goes right back to S1 Ep1 and the little line at the bottom that shows you already watched that episode is gone.   And btw, why take the HBO brand out of the name?? Max was always associated with Cinemax, and HBO was its own thing. And getting rid of the purple, which made it stand out from the blue on literally every other tv app? Fire your marketing team.
Title: Horrible Update

Content: I know it’s new, but since the app switched to Max, a show I’m currently watching will disappear from the Continue Watching section so I have to search for it and then figure out where I left off. One night, we had to get off the app because it was narrating everything that was happening with no way to turn it off. Thankfully, it had stopped doing that by the next night. One night, the captions weren’t on anymore and there was nowhere to turn them back on… it’s been a mess.
Title: Please get the kinks worked out!

Content: I really wish they would’ve made sure to troubleshoot more for this app before releasing it. On the original HBO Max app, I never had an issue with casting to my TV. Now, it continues to say there is an error and will skip through each episode of the show I am watching. It doesn’t matter the show, it’s happening with them all. It’s a very glitchy app altogether. I love HBO so it would be great if these issues could be fixed with an update!
Title: Very glitchy and continued error for Chromecast

Content: It’s really dumb that you need to download a new app. You could have easily just changed the name of the old app and been done with it. I still like the shows, but I hate the new format of the lobby. It also stopped saving my shows to continue watching, so I repeatedly have to search for the show I was watching, figure out with season I’m on, and find the correct episode every single time I want to continue watching a show that I click out of
Title: New app is dumb

Content: Actually had some hope for this thinking this was the reason why HBO Max has been lacking on updates and new shows/movies. Ultimately a let down as the selection seems to be the same, but the new app is buggy and the navigation and categorization are terrible in comparison to the collections available on HBO Max. Hope there will be some updates coming out soon because right now it’s almost not worth trying to watch on Max.
Title: Terrible App

Content: Will not be renewing my annual membership. You have completely destroyed everything that was magical about HBO. When I open your app now, I’m greeted by a barrage of trash reality shows and garbage like The Meg 2, row after row after row. You no longer offer any good movies, your app is a disaster, you’re charging more for 4K and Dolby Atmos. Merging the premium HBO brand with your gutter trash Discovery reality shows has wiped you from existence. I don’t use your app and after 30 years of HBO, I will not be renewing. This is not what I signed up for.
Title: 30 year subscriber canceling

Content: It makes sense that HBO was removed from HBO Max. Home box office has been ruined by the clunky nature of this full move to streaming.  It’s not mean to be watched at home anymore. Just phones and mobile screens. The gen xers  paying for all the subscriptions and just want to watch entertainment on their actual TVs are cast away for mobile addicts.  I’ve gone back to recording movies on HBO.  Being able to watch movies on demand with a television has become incredible annoying.
Title: Max has made HBO clunky for people who still like Tom use televisions.

Content: The app in the movie selection are top-tier. However, there is a slight inconvenience whenever I select the app and it’s stuck on the HBO Max programming that it automatically divert me to the App Store to download the app when I already have it downloaded, and it just sends me to the Max app anyways so if that Bug could be fixed to make it easier to access the app that be great other than that well done
Title: Slight annoyance

Content: Oh I can’t download because I don’t have iOS 14 we’ll some people don’t just buy new tech every single year! My iPad use to be my on the go streaming device, now can’t even download or sign into most streaming apps even though I pay for all of them, doesn’t take that much to open an app and stream something like wtaf. Just because I have an older iPad you’re literally making people have to pay thousands on a new device just to open a simple app. That’s absolute insanity.
Title: Yeah screw everyone who owns an iPad Air 1

Content: I have started watching a series on the app and EVERY time I go back to watch another episode I have to sign back in, but I can’t bypass any steps. No I have to completely sign out and sign back in! It takes about 5 min to go through the whole process as the app is really slow. When I’m done with this series I may have to cancel HBO. This is just too painful to do every time I watch it. If somebody knows how I can stay signed in please enlighten me.
Title: Omg this is the worst app

Content: Please allow the people who pay to use this to customize it, you have over 2/3’s of your for you (I’m guessing they are paid to be pushed in from if my face, if that’s the case then your services should be free) that does not apply to me. All is to remove the shows that we feel so not relate to us after we have seen what the forced options are. Other than that at this time the HBO application MAX is a good streaming program to use.
Title: Needs work

Content: The biggest problem with this app is that when you go to rewatch an episode, it takes you to the very end of the episode since this is where you “stopped” watching, even though it’s during credits. Competitor streaming apps solved this by assuming the user doesn’t want to return to the last couple minutes of the episode and just starts it over.
Title: Episode rewatch issue

Content: By far MAX is one of the more superior streaming services out there. With the selection of content it is hard not to find something to enjoy. What ever your in the mood for MAX has it. MAX is on my list of streaming apps I would suggest to anyone who’s looking for a great streaming service.
Title: Excellent streaming service

Content: For the love of God, if you watch an episode and later try to rewatch the episode, it picks up at the end of the episode and moves to the next one!! I have to go to the episode before the one I actually want to watch so I can watch. Or if you have enough time to rewind the whole way back, it thinks it’s a mistake and still plays from the end of the episode which takes you to the next one. UGGHHH
Title: FIX EPISODE RESTART

Content: When watching content on an iPad, the task bar (white line at the bottom of the screen) and status bar (showing the time and battery) should be hidden. It is very distracting having them visible. I’ll change my rating when you fix this.
Title: Fix your iPad app!

Content: I’m beyond frustrated with this whole ordeal of having to download and sign into a new app (I’m a Gen Z too). And to put the cherry on top, the app ALWAYS signs me out after I leave it. Today it is glitching and won’t even let me sign back in. I don’t understand why HBO did this, and frankly it’s absurd that I’m experiencing app development problems when it’s a new app. 3 stars, 2 because they haven’t taken Friends off of it.
Title: Doesn’t replace HBO Max

Content: I don’t get what the whole deal was with making a whole new app with the new name, it was probably to give them a higher rating since the last app had terrible reviews, but this app isn’t any better. In fact, I find that it’s even slower and has more issues: the pause function doesn’t work and there no longer seems to be a fast forward or rewind option. So you’re just screwed. You’d think HBO would be able to put out an app that isn’t such a dumpster fire.
Title: New Name, Worse Performance

Content: It’s good. The live news is probably the best feature they’ve added to app. Is a must have feature built in because so many have cut the cable networks. Great job keep it up! It’s smoooth working. I wish 4k content was included in all plans.
Title: It’s definitely come a long way

Content: It would be great if the continue watching feature would work. It’s really a pain to be watching a show or a movie and have to stop in the middle of it, only to come back and not have it in your continue watching and it basically restarts it for you, as if you were never watching it. That’s the biggest let down for me and it’s very frustrating.
Title: Continue watching

Content: Terrible app and worse content line up.   The MAX app doesn’t remember what you were watching, unlike old HBO MAX. Wanna see politics? Forget it. You won’t be able to stream timely shows like REAL TIME WITH BILL MAHER until they are no longer relevant or funny. Who wants to watch current-event-content 4-6 mos later?  HBO has used new branding of “MAX” to force its consumers to pay twice for its content. Pay for traditional HBO for most current content. Old leftovers for MAX.   Cancel cancel cancel. HBO is screwing its customers with this change.   If I could give it zero stars, I would.   Stand up and cancel your subscriptions to force HBO to they provide the content we HBO MAX users signed for before they screwed us over with “MAX”.   Also, HBO, find a better, more distinct name to call your “MINI” content site.  Maybe more accurately call it “MINIMAX.”  Or “SCREWCUSTOMERSMAX.”
Title: They rolled out a beta test

Content: Can you bring back the feature where you swipe at the left side of the screen to exit what you were watching/looking at? I really appreciated that.  Also can there be a next episode button  I can’t always scroll through the long rows of thumbnails. Other than that it’s a good app👍🏽
Title: Accessibility improvements?

Content: The app won’t accept my subscription. Whenever I sign in, after going through the sign in screens, it defaults back to the original “sign up now” screen and then dead ends to an error message. On iPhone and iPad both. And the old app no longer works. Explain to me why you would deactivate your old platform with no transition time, when the new platform isn’t ready yet? Can I presume I won’t be charged for the days when I can’t access the content I’ve been paying for every month?
Title: Doesn’t work

Content: So on my phone it’s great. My tv however it is not. I have a Roku. Signed on and the picture is always zoomed in to the top left corner of movie. I don’t get the full picture. It’s annoying. It’s only movies! Tv shows are full screen. It’s not my settings. I’ve kept messing with my tv setting and it’s just movies on here so I just think I’m going to cancel my subscription anyways on this.
Title: Tv is a problem

Content: As of Dec 5 they are now asking for $5 more per month because they added garbage tier content from their additional networks such as Discovery, TLC, etc.  So now they are trying to force legacy $15/month ad-free plan users into the more expensive $20/month plan by removing a user (2 instead of 3 at the same time) and limiting resolution to 1080P instead of 4K, no body asks for or wanted the mind rot they added but they decided to force it on everyone.  If I could I’d give no stars, this is almost as bad as Netflix.
Title: Don’t waste your time or money

Content: When using HBO Max, did you ever think that what the service really needed was an increase in price, decrease in premium content, and massive increase in low quality “unscripted” crap? If yes, then Max is for you! The new Max app somehow is significantly worse than the terrible HBO Max app. It has even worse controls on iOS and Apple TV. If only Warner would use the vastly superior, native iOS video controls... The apps do not feel at all like native apps on Apple devices. Everything looks and feels off.
Title: A step down from the terrible HBO Max app.

Content: It’s a really good streaming platform but I just wish they would have left it as HBO Max, I liked that set up better. The name was fine, the purple color was fine, there was nothing wrong with the previous app. I wish they would have just left a great thing alone but it is still really good I just fine the change unnecessary.
Title: Good but…

Content: Yes I know this is for the iOS and iPadOS, but… There doesn’t seem to be a way to write a review for the MAX Apple TV App, so here’s my beef.  The current version of MAX has some bugs that need to be addressed. Watching a series on TV, the normal behavior isn’t there. For instance; watching The Last of Us (or anything else), when the episode is near the end, it should allow one to watch the next episode without issue. But it doesn’t. Also, using the Apple TV (4K) remote, and clicking the upper left button, doesn’t go back one step. Instead, one HAS to return to the Apple TV *UP NEXT menu to see additional episodes. What a pain in the neck.  I hope MAX developers can see this Review and push out a new version.  Thanks.
Title: MAX Apple TV App

Content: App itself works as advertised, a little clunky when looking for HBO programming, but the most frustrating thing is while casting, any time I want to do anything with the app, the show I'm watching resets to the beginning. I can't pause, go back or skip ahead without taking 3 minutes to get the playback back to where I was just watching.   iPhone 12, iOS 16.7 App version 2.1.2
Title: Shows Reset While Casting

Content: I love the new layout and everything about it... Although, recently I have been getting logged out when i enter the app with my service off? Maybe just a coincidence... but it is annoying. All of my downloads are gone, then i have to download them again. The cycle repeats. This is frustrating because I use the downloads when i have no signal. Please fix this!
Title: Max

Content: Not sure why changing for the sake of change was necessary here, old app worked fine with better categories and very usable. New app scrolls way to fast, sometime takes me back to the top while browsing which is rather infuriating when you are 3/4 through current list.  Removed some categories from film/show search. Not a worthwhile change by a long shot.
Title: So unnecessary

Content: Boy they increased the price . I’ve been a subscriber since the very beginning , any way my plan can be grandfathered?  $16 a month for ad free content, and I thought Netflix was the worst. I dumped Netflix long time ago. Downgraded the HBO plan to see how bad they were with the ads. It became almost as worse as cable. The content is alright, but increasing the monthly price by $5 to keep what we used to have at the beginning, that’s just greed .
Title: Greedy

Content: Wish I could be like everyone else on here and rant or rave about how the new Max looks and operates, but can’t, since I can’t even get into the app. HBO Max worked just fine for so long, but now this new “Max” has decided it doesn’t want to play nice for some reason. Constantly getting the “something went wrong, please try again later” on the phone app. And of course their help page is no help at all. It just consist of suggestions of basically, “have you tried turning it off and on again”.
Title: Can’t get in

Content: I’m in love with MAX they have everything a sci- fi lover like me could want and during Covid they realy made going to the movies a real thing! It’s dependable and reliable and they don’t turn off your access the min your payment is due and you can’t pay until later that day or later in the week! I love you HBO MAX!!!!
Title: THE BEDT APP EVER!!!

Content: Love the app. Love the stuff that you can watch overall and how well varied it is.  I have been struggling with the screen flipping however. When I get a notification it flips upside down and no matter how much I try to get it to flip again to how I have my phone, it just doesn’t. I have to either exit out of the video or close down the app for it to work properly. Please solve this 😪😪
Title: Screen Flipping

Content: There seems to be issues when rotating the screen and the white bar won’t go away on screen. The app has lots of new shows and stuff but I wish they would fix the issues.  The TV app is absolutely horrid right now and the movie I tried to play made me think my TV was broken when in reality it was just the actual app. (Also super hard to skip around in the TV app)
Title: Lots of bugs rn

Content: Y’all have too much content to not have a dislike button. I think suggestions could also be more user fitted—it feels like the app just wants me to watch everything, and I don’t feel the same kind of audience accommodation I see in other libraries.   I also think a color other than blue would differentiate y’all from every other blue streaming app.   Y’all need to credit Writers and Directors as such, not lump them into some general “creators” category. This isn’t Tik Tok.
Title: So Much Blue

Content: The app seems to work well and as intended.  I did not want a bunch of Discovery, TLC etc content in my HBO. It’s like mixing sardines and peanut butter. Just wrong.  Also, the credits on screen that you could view in HBO Max when browsing movies/shows was *far* superior to the format on the new “Max” version with directors, writers, producers, roles and actors listed out clearly.   Please at least fix that.
Title: Works well

Content: The only reason i bought the membership for Max is for Game of Thrones, besides that the streaming service has Last of Us and Euphoria as main attractions. I believe with more original content the platform should be able to be consume on a monthly basis.
Title: Need More Big Hits on Original Content

Content: What’s the point of all this hype about changing HBO max to max. The only thing you’ve done is make it clearly obvious that your content is weak and you have introduced all kinds of scrolling bugs and poor app performance. The color scheme is gone from beautiful to insanely blah! Quite frankly, the title of Home Box Office fits your platform better than Max. At least Home Box Office makes sense especially with same-day-as-theater movie releases on the platform. This is what happens when you try to fix something that isn’t broke. Welcome to new coke. SMH!!
Title: What’s the point?

Content: Since HBO Max has now become Max we had to download the new app. The app will not download unless you have ios 14 or higher running. We never had a problem with HBO Max app running on any of our devices old and new. We can not download the new app on my childrens devices for the to watch their shows. There is no option to download the last compatible version either. Please fix this issue and allow us with older devices to use the app otherwise what are we paying for?
Title: Doesn’t work on older devices

Content: This app simply does not work on my iPhone. It asked me to sign in with my provider Xfinity, then tells me I’m logged in and ready to stream. The next screen asked me to connect to my provider again but immediately says there’s an unknown error when I try. I’ve reinstalled the app at least six times. I’ve restarted my phone several times. customer support askedAbout the email address I was using even though I kept telling them that I wasn’t asked for an email address when I connected to my provider.
Title: Unknown error

Content: Signed in with my credentials on AppleTv and nothing was there. None of my saved list items, no profiles, no watch history. Nothing.  It’s especially annoying when apps don’t display the original air date of a tv series episode or tell you when the next one will air. “2023” doesn’t mean diddly squat.  If I have to google it, your UX is worthless. I’m not gonna sign in just to see if it is there yet or not. I have allll the apps and can watch elsewhere.
Title: Nothing transferred from HBOMax

Content: As if cutting lots of great exclusive content for no reason besides boosting earnings reports and then RUINING the UI of the app wasn’t enough, the subscription price is now being raised for the second time this year.   A 25% price increase is one thing if you're getting more quality content, but the user experience and amount of quality content has FALLEN OFF A CLIFF since the Discovery merger, and its apparent all the execs care about is the bottom line.   Cancelled my subscription, I will not be returning. I suggest you all do the same.
Title: Ridiculous Price Hikes

Content: Treat. Learn. Cute. Share. Mean. Share. Tree. Learn. Sci. There. Advice. Listen. Scent. Try. Learn. After. Know. Self. Sense. Treaty. Several. Life. Educate. Hearing. Life under. Rested. Sharing. Meaning. Views. Settled. Younger. Scented. Advertising. Sensible. Rested. Limited. Assets. Cre. Meat. Ceiling.?  . Tree. Assess. Leaving. Resting. Mean. Tree. See. Meal. Shareable. Tel. Settle. Tre. Sets in. Let a bit in. Miner. Lofty. Err. Th. Safe. Head. Reading. Creative. Learned anything. Semper. Reading. Caught.
Title: Viln. Rest. Dec. safety. Inaugural. Friend.

Content: It works very well and the massive of shows/movies that offers its even better not matter the show or movie and a lots of languages that you can put to feel comfortable makes this app a great option to watch your favorite shows.
Title: A beautiful experience

Content: Please please help. Audio translation is turned off but it will continuously play on any show, movie, episode anything that plays. We can’t watch anything for 4 seconds before some flat toned voice loudly explains someone is getting up or turning their head. It’s been going on for days and nothing will fix the issue. This tool is beyond useful for the people who need it, you guys are the only platform I’ve seen have it and that is amazing but it is irritating for people who don’t need it
Title: Audio translation

Content: The “shuffle episodes” option was one of my favorite features of the HBO Max platform, and they removed it on their update, MAX. The app is still about the same but because the feature is no longer available - and was unique to the platform from what I observed - it’s still a favorite but, the best attribute of the service, is no longer available .
Title: No “shuffle episode” option

Content: No matter how many time I close out of the app, restart it or even delete and reinstall, it either will play in Spanish or will have audio descriptions on while it says it’s supposed to be on English with no audio description. Or those options don’t come up at all and it only gives you the option to turn on or off subtitles. Apparently this has been going on for awhile according to the countless websites I found trying to trouble shoot this issue since you guys started up.
Title: FIX THE AUDIO ISSUE

Content: 1) I don’t want cheap, reality t.v productions mixed into prestige shows. The whole app just seems tacky and cheap now.  2) The UI is a mess. I could easily find new releases on HBO Max. Now I cannot.  3) More content but nearly all trash. HBO was a vanguard in the premium tv space. New leadership has decimated that reputation for short term gains.   Bottom line, HBO Max is too expensive and too poorly designed compared to competitors. We all have streaming subscription fatigue, and I am cutting this one out first.
Title: Messy UI, downgraded content

Content: I’ve enjoyed many of my favorite shows on HBO, and will stay a customer with the expectation of more great content to come.   Max can improve with a better way for downloads to be played back.   About 2 days after I download anything, the app won’t let me play it- I just get error messages.
Title: Some great content- poor download playback

Content: The way of presentation is good but not much every icon is bit bigger and the way of giving folders like action ,crime ,documentaries is bit boring cause give a little tittle and present the list of that particular subject however whenever we want watch something you have to go that particular route to open the file is bit boring by the way the new editing looks good
Title: The presentation

Content: Since updating the app to Max, I have been having major issues with it playing shows, casting to tv’s, being able to pause while on a show, subtitles etc. it seems that there are still some performance issues that need to be fixed. I will continue to use the app, however, it is very frustrating and I am writing this review to help!
Title: Still love HBO Max but what happened?

Content: Had to stream from my phone because the TV would not accept my password. It only plays in Spanish. There is a glitch that won’t change the language to English. I am so upset. I can’t watch the one show I’m literally paying to see. I’m canceling my subscription.
Title: Terrible

Content: When it became MAX everything I watch on this app keeps buffering, like I have Wi-Fi issues.  Not the case. I go onto other streaming apps no problems at all.  This is still happening everyday! I try to watch shows but still buffers and play for a minute, then buffers and play, then buffers and play. I would let it play for over an hour thinking it would play smoothly, but does not improve and keeps buffering and play, buffering then play.  Please fix this issue.
Title: Program keeps buffering

Content: The rebrand was a bad move!  Interface, design, color, font - everything is a DOWNGRADE!  HBO Max was classy looking with beautiful purple and ease of navigation - superior to other streaming services.  Now it’s blue just like a million others - no distinction like before.  The drop-down menu not being in the new MAX app is inexcusable.  I always used the ‘last chance’ category.  The navigation is lousy - looks like Netflix now.  Yuk!  I don’t even want to use this cluttered, obnoxious mess of an app anymore!  I’ve been a subscriber since HBO Now days…
Title: Horrible!!

Content: I’m enjoying the shows on Max but for whatever reason if the show I’m watching is over it’s no longer in my continue watching section. I have to go search the show and flip through the seasons and episodes to start the next episode. However, if I stop it mid-show, it will show up on resume watching. I didn’t have this problem before it switched to MAX.
Title: Resuming show

Content: Menu is buggy on television, doesn’t line up with visual field of screen. Sporadic issue with “my list”. Interface when it was HBO max was better, this interface is a bit of a downgrade. Max content is great, love original shows.
Title: Like max but problems with menu

Content: Both HBO Max and Discovery+ support integration with Apple TV app to keep track of what you’ve watched. This is no longer supported in the brand-new Max app that’s supposed to replace these services. Why are you removing functionality? The video player is no longer the native player like it is in HBO Max. Again, why are you removing functionality? HBO Max already went through this two years ago! It took a few weeks or months to fix. This is not a great start.
Title: Features removed: Non-native video player, Apple TV app integration

Content: You get rid of good shows and cancel ones people love like Raised by Wolves but are buying Sesame Street episodes? That’s supposed to be a FREE educational show available to EVERYONE not some exclusive. I thought y’all were getting rid of kids shows and gearing towards more adult content but now this?! Makes absolutely no sense. Y’all would be better off sticking to original content and maybe bringing back classics people still watch to this day.
Title: What are y’all doing?

Content: There’s a lot of verities of things that you can watch movies and series I like watching. Would like for them to have more Spanish movies and Spanish and series. Some of the movies are only in English and I can’t switch the Audio to Spanish but other than that, I love it, recommend it. download it subscribe. Enjoy!
Title: What’s not to like? This is my favorite.

Content: In my opinion max is one of the if not the best streaming service it has a bunch of shows and movies that we all know and love plus there are all of the good kid shows so it will keep f Them entertained for hours this is my favorite streaming service I have ever use I would highly recommend
Title: Max is the best

Content: Ever since hbo turned into MAX the app has been a nightmare. I will turn a movie on and stream it to my tv from my phone and the movie will automatically be set to 100 volume. It’s LOUD!! And I’m afraid one day it will blow my speakers. Also  language will change and have an audio description playing in the background. So I go to change it and then it won’t work! I tried to stick it out so that y’all can update the app but it’s still the same. I’m not paying $10 a month for this. Terrible!
Title: HBO app worked batter

Content: I don’t know what happened with the switch from HBO Max to Max, but it hasn’t been a great experience. I’ve requested support on the matter and have only ever gotten copy paste responses on how to change my language, like I haven’t attempted to do this through my app, PC and television. My language constantly changes and all the solutions online haven’t worked for me. I had to resort to google since support is a joke. I’ll change my review when they can take the time to actually assist.
Title: Constantly changing language

Content: The company has lost a lot of the trust people had in it, especially after the CEO did to the company’s animated IPs! It was so bad that they had to rebrand themselves, yet they couldn’t even give us a free month to try to win back our trust! Wow, apparently there was a fire on the lot today. What an apt visual for what the CEO has been doing to the company since the merger.  Switching over to something less important. Please fix the M on the logo. It should be capitalized. It should be "Max" or "MAX" as it stands now, it somehow comes across as overly meek.
Title: No free month? REALLY?!

Content: Hate everything ableist this since the merger. Every time I search for an actor, it gives me a mess of crap that has nothing to do with them and/or gives me discovery DIY shows. There is absolutely no separation between the two entities anymore and instead is a Jumbled mess of chaos. Everything is so lumped together, disorganized and just a horrible UI. This merger was ridiculous anyway, but to combine the two apps, both with a tremendous amount of content into one? It’s just too much for a singular app. Might as well stay with cable.
Title: Hate MAX

Content: Used to love HBO max app and usually when companies change the app it’s for the better. This is not one of those scenarios, unfortunately. My girlfriend speaks Spanish so we like to use Spanish subtitles. Even though in the Max app it says it has Spanish subtitle for True detective. It is impossible to turn them on. I’ve looked through the entire app and can’t find any way to enable them.   Really shouldn’t be hard to fix but I’m cancelling until this app has at least the same functionality as HBO max.
Title: From first to worst

Content: Just don’t see new shows coming on a regular basis. It’s almost worth just having an active account for 3 months then stop service until the next year.   I just don’t get enough new shows on a regular basis.   I forgot to stop my service last year. But as soon as I’m finished with my list now, I will discontinue service for a year
Title: Service is only worth having 3 months per year

Content: HBO slays so hard. I hate how they made it "Max" and now it's blue. I mean it's still the same app but saying HBO and having the purple was really nice. Like just change it backkkk. It was so nice to if you had a roku TV but when you turn the tv on it's also purple! And they just went well together. Other all it slays but HBOMAX was better-
Title: SLAY BUT CHANGE IT BACK

Content: The app keeps the Apple TV screensaver from working because you use your own ugly dumb screensaver that shouldn’t even be allowed, which means it ALSO KEEPS THE APPLE TV FROM TURNING OFF WHICH KEEPS THE ACTUAL TV FROM TURNING OFF. This means if I fall asleep watching something, the TV will be on all night!!!    Otherwise, I just miss HBO Max in general. The purple color was more more pleasing and I didn’t get recommended dumb crap like 90 day fiancé or the other stupid “reality” romance things you show.
Title: Custom Apple TV Screensaver Keeps TV on Permanently

Content: not a fan the harsh blue color or profile photos i enjoyed the simplicity of the original app.  other than being extremely laggy and kicking me out every chance it gets i’m not a fan of the new set up at all.  now making it more difficult for people to find what they’re looking for  it shouldn’t take me time to figure out how to search for things, find my list, scroll categories it should be more readily assessable as it was before, huge mistake w the update in my opinion.
Title: HBO was better than MAX

Content: After the switch to max, I have lost the ability to save my spot in my shows, we were watching GOT one night then we went to watch the next day but it was no longer in my “currently watching” and didn’t save me place. Also your restart option doesn’t work either. HBO was my favorite till this, now HBO is frustrating to even try so I hope you guys fix it I see I’m not the only one with these problems.
Title: Technical issues

Content: I’m trying to watch South Park with my cousin but this thirsty money sucking app will not allow screen share because they are so desperate for money. How’s about we allow family to bond while watching online shows together because they are hundreds of miles apart.
Title: Stupid App

Content: Hopefully it doesn’t increase in price but over all good !!!! Love the fact we got more shows more movies better pictures for our profiles etc … most likely it will be a increase in pay but I’m thinking it’s worth it but that’s my opinion
Title: Review from a real person

Content: After installing this app and watching 1 movie the battery on my plugged in iPad Pro, 5th gen, went from 100% to 34%?!?
