The battery usage for 2.5 hours for the Max app out of 14 hours of total usage is 59% . The app doesn’t appear to recognize that the device is connected to a power source so is exclusively using the battery and at ridiculous levels. The app does work but needs improvement in the user interface/navigation.
Title: Draining battery!

Content: Definitely can’t call it an upgrade. Issues regularly since installed. Volume goes out randomly. The only way to fix it is to back out, but then I have to go searching for the movie or tv show I was watching and it usually starts over at the beginning when that happens.  Things were slowly getting better, but here we are again. I really am questioning the value of this app at this point.
Title: Horrible update

Content: One, some of the anime shows that I found a show that not been dub. Two, if some of the anime show that dub movie and shows but not all rust of has not a dub or a sub. three, there should be a setting for every anime show so please fix this situation for the next update
Title: Some of the anime shows needed dub please

Content: I would like to be able to find certain movies on here: hope floats, runaway bride just name a couple. But other than that I have found some old movies that I grew up watching. Thank you for having those and trying to keep the selections coming.
Title: Movies

Content: Touching any controls while playing something will kick you back to the start of whatever you’re watching, and it never remembers where you left off. On the basic plan that means you can end up watching a million ads just to try to get to where you were, and after that don’t even touch the volume control because you’ll end up at the beginning again. Extremely frustrating.
Title: Terrible for casting to chromecast from iPad mini 6

Content: Every time I try to cast my max to my tv via chrome cast I have to deal with my show being in every known language except for English. The very best I was able to get was English with audio description which is just awful. I’ve followed hbo max “advise” and delete and redownload app while disconnecting my chrome cast from the power which put simply does nothing. I’ll be moving on to a different streaming service if this simple problem doesn’t get fixed.
Title: Stuck in every language but English

Content: This app is amazing although I’m disappointed with the fact that I finished young Sheldon although I’m aware there is a season 6 they don’t have it on here which made me very disappointed because it was an amazing show and now I’m left with a cliff hanger which is really annoying I’m sure other people agree cliffhangers are annoying Aswell other than this issue though it’s a great app.
Title: Great app but…

Content: This app will forever be in my phone. Whenever I need storage I delete every app except this one. The shows are amazing and the movies are great too. The blue color is doing it for this app and I just can’t imagine my life without the best streaming app. Keep up the great work MAX and please bring more great things to come. 🫱🏾‍🫲🏽
Title: THE BEST APP EVER

Content: HBO/Discovery, or whatever it’s called now, has no intent of creating a stable streaming platform. They’re the anti-Netflix. Tons of good content, terrible platform. You can rebrand all you want, it’s not going to fix the glaring UI problems you’ve had from the beginning. Another example of people on top pocketing the money from people who make everything function. Pay your content providers and programmers, you useless nobodies.
Title: One Thing is Very Clear

Content: Playback has needed tweaking since the first hbo max app launch. I thought it would have changed for the better at least a little bit with this new branding and new app just “max” but it hasn’t. Really hope you guys figure that out soon because as far as I’m concerned max can completely outdo Netflix if they keep up the way they are going.
Title: Playback is awful still

Content: The MAX app is amazing when downloaded on the phone. When using this app on a tv or on my PS5 it always has an issue though. It was the same before when it used to be HBO MAX, always pausing or having issues watching anything I’m watching at that moment.
Title: Feed Back!

Content: Why does HBO continue to employ inferior staff? I suspect we will never know. I just wish they would send them away and employ a team that could make an app that is even close to the many other streaming apps available. We know the technology is available, so why can’t a behemoth company like HBO use it? I’d be open to government assistance for the inferiors, but they should not be allowed around computers ever again.
Title: Better than their previous app, but not by much

Content: I really love the app but I wish they brought the color of the HBO MAX and the title, also to fix the app to not stop by itself, meaning it says connection error or not connected to network but hopefully they fix that and easier to not have to wait for the show/ movie to play
Title: Bring BACK HBO MAX

Content: I liked HBOMAX and now that it’s just MAX I’m still learning my way around the new layout. One thing I was surprised by is the lack of Cinemax content. I hope that change is in the works because Cinemax has a lot of great movies. I’m also hoping that Discovery + will soon come onboard. Overall, it’s a great streaming experience and I’m very glad I have it.
Title: Where’s Cinemax

Content: Hav been using (HBO) MAX since 1 year ago and its been really cool.  Classic shows, movies, you know, good content. Something that I still don’t like is that most of these content is in English. It’s good tho, but I’m used to watch some of ‘em in Spanish and it’s really hard to enjoy it. Just because of that I don’t give 5 stars but everything else is perfect!
Title: Almost great but…

Content: Something so simple as revelry watched has been completely wrecked. Shows are not showing under continuously watching, episodes don’t start over if you are rewatching a series, and the app doesn’t keep track of what you watched, so you have to go through all the episodes just to get to the episode you wanted to pick up on. Do better. You forced us to change apps, because of this “name change”. No one asked for this. Fix your streaming service.
Title: Same as the other reviews

Content: The app has issues I was unable to move sideways on the open screen and was in able to see half of the titles when I was looking at them. If theses thing could be fixed that would be great. It was hard to find a movie because half of the titles were cut off when I was looking.
Title: Roku tv

Content: The original HBO Max worked perfectly, but ever since this update it’s been nothing but trouble. My shows don’t show up on the “continue watching” section, I have more problems with it freezing than any other TV app I use, and when it glitches it kicks me out entirely. The restart button doesn’t show up anymore and when I want to watch an episode of a show I watched several months ago, I have to start it over entirely. Every other app does it automatically.
Title: Nothing but trouble

Content: I’ve had to re-enter my login every time I open the app, even if I just closed it. Plus it won’t save my progress in what I’m watching. I have to manually remove movies I finish because the app still thinks I’m only 60% through it. I played around with it a bit and even if I just finished something and refresh the page it will not update my progress. It’ll probably get better but unimpressive start.
Title: Pretty Buggy so Far…

Content: I just wanted to say good luck with the project you guys got going on right now! It’s great to see a streaming service pushing boundaries to provide the best service for customers. Especially since most other companies are quite stagnant. Of course the app might not perfect now but I believe it will come close!
Title: Ambitious

Content: This streaming service is amazing. They have all the classic horror movies, tv shows, etc. I love how many shows and movie it has to offer. It has so many to choose from and in my opinion, its better than Netflix because Netflix is so so expensive per month.
Title: Amazing

Content: Was very excited for MAX to arrive and when it did it hardly works. Sluggish loading, miss match voices to the picture, crashes! I believe some developers and programmers need to do some Critical updates. UPDATE: voices are matching now and is less frustrating. Wish discovery content came over just like the HBO content it seems buried.
Title: Disappointed

Content: I have mixed feelings about this app. I love all the new content that came over. But, I would like to be able to find all the “Hubs” a lot easier. For example, in the HBO max app they have quick access to “Hubs” via that side bar. That’s just my suggestion for the next or future version. But over all the app isn’t bad and love the content.
Title: Mixed feelings

Content: I like the content on Max, but the current app is glitschy.  Can't scroll down the selection rows from the top on iPad (yes, current OS) without it zooming down all the way to the bottom row.  Then you have to hit the Home icon to get back up to the top row.  The only way to get to exactly the title or categories I want is to do a Search within the app.  Until this is fixed, I'm not even going to try except on the smart TV. Irritating.
Title: Current Glitch on iPad

Content: Seriously?  You are going sign people up for auto renew on a $149 plus tax subscription and not even let them know when they are coming up on that for renewal and then on top of that have a policy of no-refunds?  Well I can assure it will be the last charge I ever get from hbo or max.
Title: Cringe worthy

Content: Max isn’t deleting progress of what you watched it keeps all of your progress on what you watched even after deleting it from your continue watching, so if I’m trying to watch an episode I’ve already watch it it will push all the way to end the end of the episode and go to the next episode and will sometimes repeat itself until it wants to stop on whatever episode it wants to play!!!
Title: Max problems!

Content: We enjoy hbo max has a lot of good movies as well as series , that we like to watch and have missed since canceling our cable . Very affordable and easy to navigate on the app with. Highly recommend. Has a good variety of things to watch for everyone of all ages
Title: Five stars

Content: The app is def broken on Roku, browsing, scrolling thru the homepage, rewatching an already seen TV show episode, all of these things glitch out and are extremely difficult to do. I give the Roku experience a 1 out of 5.   I haven’t had many problems with the phone or desktop apps tho, so I give the phone and desktop experience a 4 out of 5.   Overall…… 2.5 but i can’t do half stars so let’s call it 2/5
Title: Kinda works kinda doesn’t

Content: Removing the HBO name is a sad and poor decision, it’s been in families homes prior to cd’s and dvd’s coming out! I watched all the great specials of the early 80’s on HBO not Max! It’s a name that everyone knows and has grown up with and is Synonymous with movies! Everyone is in a hurry to change our history and culture! Big mistake!
Title: Should keep the History

Content: The new Max is okay for the most part but I’m on S2 of GOT and it doesn’t show up on my continue watching. So then I have to look for the show, go to season 2 THEN rewind to the part I left off while sitting through ads of the same three shows. It’s really frustrating!
Title: GOT

Content: I really enjoy the streaming service I found it has a lot of movies and shows that I enjoy. It’s just one problem lately on the streaming service it has not been saving my progress on a movie or show I am watching, and when I go back to keep watching it it starts from the beginning.
Title: Good for the price

Content: Annoying that you can only fast forward 15 seconds at a time and when I select my most recent episode from my Chrome TV Home Screen it automatically starts it from the beginning again instead resuming where I left off. It’s also hard to tell which episodes you’ve already watched (needs a check mark or something).
Title: Sm

Content: I don’t mind the switch to MAX. I think it’s annoying that we had to download a whole new app for a rebrand that HBO was doing but it won’t ruin my life. I’m constantly trying to find shows I’ve started and am in the middle of watching and having to search for them in the search bar because they don’t appear in the continue watching, meanwhile shows I’ve finished keep starting over in my continue watching section.
Title: Honest Review

Content: I’ve been watching the Big Bang theory and I’m on season 3 but yet every time I open the app I have to find big bang theory, find the episode that hasn’t been watched next yet and click on it instead of being able to just resume. Otherwise it’s great that’s just a big annoying
Title: Doesn’t keep place in shows

Content: The one thing I could do on HBO Max was press play and have the show/movie play. On MAX it’s completely the opposite. Now anytime I want to watch something I have to finagle with the ff/rewind buttons for a couple minutes before anything plays. Because, if I don’t, the little loading circle will just spin eternally. So overall, not happy. Really liked being able to click play like normal and have the show actually play. You know, that functionality that every other streaming app has.
Title: Worse

Content: If you are someone who watches shows a lot on here like me, you won’t like the new update. It doesn’t save what episode you are on if you’re watching a show. So, if I happen to fall asleep while watching or forget where I was, I basically have to guess instead of having the ‘continue watching’. If MAX didn’t have my favorite shows, I would consider canceling the subscription.  Bring back the continue watching!!!!!
Title: RIP Continue watching

Content: I must say for the price i pay it is very inconvenient to have to go searching around for the last show i watched and haven't finished. It would also be nice to get reminders that i haven’t finished a show.  I think there could be a lot of improvements to this app.  I would also like more episodes of sex and the city 10 isnt enough. Oh and get rid of che. Thanks
Title: Add recently watched section

Content: Easy to use, login. Seen a couple janky bugs since moving from hbo max (and it won’t let me report issues in settings due to “not having set up email” despite my email being displayed on the same screen) but for the most part it’s good
Title: It’s pretty good

Content: The content is, i think the best of all of the streaming services and i have had many. But, the app itself tends to have major trouble regardless of what I watch it on, TV or iPad, or phone.  The trouble being freezing or completely kicking me off. Other than that little? issue I can’t get enough.
Title: Everything, but…

Content: I have tried to run the app on my chrome laptop and it just keeps crashing can long in and everything but it just crashes when the main page pops up works good on my phone tho
Title: Does not want to work with chrome

Content: 1 star for the poor transition. I’ve had HBO max for a couple years now and have been happy with the content and service. Even while traveling long term this worked great. With the change to MAX… no longer available in my region. So I’ve paid for a year of content and will miss out on almost 6 months of service. HBO was heavily advertised locally and now it seems to be removed from the region entirely.   Do I get a refund…
Title: Excited for the new content and completely disappointed in the changes.

Content: When I first downloaded this, I got in fine on my iPad but could not log in on my iPhone after several attempts.  Now the app is working great on all devices and remembering where I left off, watchlist, etc.  Excited to go through what extra programming is on the app now.
Title: So far so good

Content: I have no complaints . Have been using this app for a few years now this app is one of the best ones I use to watch a movie . If only we could have the movies from the theater back that would be a bigger bonus for this app.
Title: All I can say is

Content: Don’t know why I had to download a whole new app? Second when using a full screen iPad the multi tasking dots on the top of the screen and the home line on the bottom don’t vanish when playing content like other apps like Netflix so that should be fixed. Other then that great app and so psyched for grimlins!!!
Title: Great app but a few issues

Content: Wow, didn’t think DiscoveryWarner could actually make this app worse than it already is. But here you go even after Zaslav’s promise, that it would be a better experience, it actually comes out even worse! What a piece of garbage and we’re expected actually to pay MORE for this? Let’s talk about all the features that are missing from this.  No integration with Apple TV and its Up Next feature No native video player No Picture in Picture Frame rate issues Dynamic range issues Can’t scrub a video worth a crap with Siri Remote   Since my current subscription ends next month, I will probably go for a month and when there’s something worth watching, probably when the second season of the Last of Us premieres. This isn’t worth it.
Title: Didn’t think it possible to screw this up even more…

Content: As stated, there are several features that used to function perfectly fine in the former “HBO Max” app. The two features I’m talking about in particular are:  - Match Content (Dynamic Range/Frame Rate) - Apple TV app synchronization   Match Content is an important feature that allows the Apple TV to change the dynamic range (SDR/HDR/HDR10+/Dolby Vision) and frame rate (generally 24fps for movies and tv shows). Many people want the content to display in its proper dynamic range and frame rate.  Apple TV app integration allows you to view shows and movies that you’re watching in the “Up Next” section and continue watching them which would open the Max app and take you to the video.   Overall, while I like that there’s more UHD content in Max than there was with HBO Max, the app itself is a major downgrade.
Title: Many Apple TV app features are missing

Content: The app is much better but it still struggles to play downloaded shows. Also, navigating between different shows and episodes within a particular show is nowhere as easy at Netflix.
Title: Improved, but…

Content: I love that Max has a yearly subscription it is so worth the money!!  It offers such wonderful choices to enjoy for the whole family.  Everything you want with one push of a button.  Max is highly recommended by my family and myself!  Enjoy
Title: Max Review

Content: I find it mildly annoying when I search for a specific show/movie and it’s near the main bottom of the search results rather in the first 5. I realized this happens with shows like Over the Garden Wall and Adventure Time. I almost thought both had been removed. The navigation just doesn’t seem all that great.
Title: Navigation and Searching Problems

Content: So I love the app but is anybody had downloaded a movie the halfway through canceled it for my case it’s shazam fury of the gods. Every time I go into it as in where you see the details and you can play the movie there your screen goes black and max reloads
Title: Max show crashing probable bug

Content: I hate to admit it, but I prefer this app over the original. I like the lay-out better. It’s also more user-friendly and more cohesive in general. I feel like the old app was meant to be part of the experience whereas this app lets you get on with what you want to watch. Good job!
Title: Happily Surprised

Content: HBO max is great, and I enjoy most of the shows and movies on this app. I just wish that they made the app more compatible with using an iPad and Magic Keyboard, or Bluetooth keyboard for that matter. I know a number of people who would like this issue to be resolved. other than that I have no issues..
Title: Needs work for the iPad Magic Keyboard

Content: I love max and all but I wish they had more movies I loved and shows they only have a few of them and I think they should add more personality but I do love max and I love the movies and shows on there but I wish they had shows /movies like “The summer I turned pretty.” ,”Wild child.” And movies like that but this is my review and I hope they add those shows/movies
Title: My review

Content: Pretty much the same as the HBO Max app. It was a little annoying to download a new app but that’s not my main complaint.   My issue with the app is that the SharePlay feature no longer exists. With the HBO Max app I could SharePlay content on FaceTime, but that is no longer possible with Max. HBO Max was one of the few streaming apps capable of SharePlay, so I’m disappointed.
Title: No SharePlay with this app

Content: I honestly wish they would go back to HBO Max! Every time i click on any show or movie on this app it starts playing from the last second of the episode, even when i haven’t seen the episode before!! That means if i’m watching a show I have to select the episode before the one I want to watch, making it literally impossible to watch the first episode of any show! This is the worst streaming service ever and I don’t know why they didn’t just add their new titles to HBO Max.
Title: Worst Streaming Platform!

Content: This app isn’t nearly as bad as the Roku app, which barely functions. But across the platform, the “continue watching” display is entirely broken, which makes Max almost unusable. This is the most basic function of a streaming app, the bare minimum. It is amazing, and appalling, that this was actually approved for release- the executive that approved it should never work again. The catalog is still the best by a vast margin, but there are no other positives about Max right now. Dreadful app.
Title: Desperately needs major updates

Content: Ever since this new update or new app thing my hbo on my tv been extremely and annoyingly GLITCHY. I’ve been watching this show for a few seasons now and all of a sudden it wont even put it on my continue watching nor does it register that I’ve already watched the episode, my favorite is when u go to press play to resume where you left off it say’s restart n plays the very first episode. It’s ridiculous that they charge this much money for an app that doesn’t even run properly.
Title: Glitchy

Content: This is the worst version of HBO, HBO GO, HBO MAX, MAX, whatever it is. All the previous brands were completely fine. But now when I watch on my phone or on my tv, every “next episode” freezes and after the recap, just flat out stops working and you have to go in and out of the episode like 5 times to get it to work. This is by far the crappiest version. Bring back hbo max.  I am currently staring at my blacked out tv for the 4th time just trying to watch the next episode of my show.
Title: Doesn’t work

Content: I’m loving the new app, I just wish there was a way to filter and see series/movies that are new and/or have new episodes when simply exploring the app (genres, etc). I would like to see the new series/movies/episodes pushed to the top so it’s the first thing I see. If there’s already a way to do that manually/settings, it should be automatic upon downloading and accessing the app.
Title: Mobile App Tweak Suggestion

Content: Hbo has changed my life… they have SO MANY BANGERSSS; the title change is weird and the news articles got me scared that this might mean it might not have as many bangers???? I hope it’s not true but I LOVE this app! So many good series and movies!!! Stanley Kubrick is also one of my favorites and they have a lot of his stuff!
Title: Title change scary

Content: We downloaded some content to HBO max view while on a flight. Imagine our surprise to find that we were unable to access that content because HBO had moved to a new app and didn’t allow us to access the content we had already downloaded. No email notification. No warning. Surprise! The old app no longer works. And of course our downloaded content wasn’t accessible through the new app. And on a plane we weren’t able to download new content.
Title: Downloads on HBO Max

Content: Not really sure why they had to rebrand everything and make a new service but whatever, if you bought HBO Max you can use the same account for Max. Really just the same with new shows. I like HBO Max so I like Max too I guess. But yeah I prefer the design of HBO Max compared to Max but that could just be me nitpicking
Title: It’s HBO Max…

Content: Really hate the UI on the new Max app. I can no longer search movies or series in ABC order now. You can only search by preset categories and many times it makes no sense why certain movies or shows are in certain categories. All you needed to do was change the logo on the app and add/expand the content. There was no need to blow up the UI and make it extremely difficult to search for movies and shows in the app.
Title: Ugh. Bring back HBO Max

Content: Though I’ve subscribed to a variety of streaming services I find that max’s variety seems to satisfy me the most alongside prime video! They both have a lot to watch and most available movies/shows are something you genuinely might want to watch!
Title: Variety

Content: I use this app on my ipad mostly to watch content to-go.  Most of the time, I try to view the content and am met with a spinning white circle for 5 - 10 minutes as I open and close the app about 15 times with no success.  None of my other streaming services with downloaded content do this.
Title: Watching downloaded contact works only half of the time

Content: Netflix ran out of interesting content so I tried this and I’ve been very impressed with MAX options. I’ve been using it for almost two years consistently. Compare that to Netflix which I had about one year and got bored.
Title: Better than Netflix

Content: I love watching Scooby doo on here . Especially be cool Scooby do I know that this probably won’t happen but I was wondering if y’all can still make more episodes I know that they got canceled but it helped me get through so many things and I have watched it like a million times I love Scooby doo. Thank you
Title: Idk

Content: I used to watch Netflix all the time but then things started disappearing… the office, friends, Harry Potter etc… and then they started popping up here. I hate having to pay for both subscriptions but when it comes to classic TV and movies that hit that nostalgic spot, MAX has them all.
Title: Where have the good old shows/movies gone? MAX.

Content: The max app with shows and movies is  really good for the most part some of the most amazing original series  . Would like to see movies rotate out a bit more and something new come in or just added to the whole collection. Not sure why the tales from the crypt series isn’t on there  seems like it should be
Title: Tales

Content: I love the quality and diversity of Max original series. From “And Just Like That” to “Warrior” to “Sex Lives of College Girls” and on and on. Max has something for everyone. Plus the app very user friendly. The series is definitely worth the money. I highly recommend it. 👍🏾👍🏾👍🏾👏🏾👏🏾👏🏾
Title: Max is my Favorite Streaming Service

Content: Max has the best and most current TV shows and movies that will entertain you forever! They frequently update and add new movies to their collection and have new weekly tv shows that are released on satellite without having to pay for satellite tv too!
Title: Movies and TV shows galore!

Content: Max has been one of my main go to streaming apps for most dc related content aswell as the variety of movies and shows to choose from. Ever bored? Just hop on Max and see what they got cooking ✨ No but seriously great app and easy to use. Thanks for being awesome
Title: Max is my favorite site to stream from

Content: The fact that you cannot automatically continue watching shows while it’s in the little picture landscape so you can still do things on your phone is absolutely ridiculous. When the episode ends the box just disappears. It’s not a setting issue because it’s on auto next episode and STILL doesn’t do it.
Title: What happened ?!

Content: I choice HBO Max over Netflix because of the shows like impractical joker, Martin, fresh prince to name a few. But just today I saw 30 sec commercial popped up.  I like y’all “Max” but don’t start adding commercials or making it more expensive or yall will get left for Netflix.
Title: I just seen a commercial

Content: Without your writers and actors you’re nothing. Whether it’s HBO, Netflix, Universal, CBS, Fox, Paramount etc. without your actual talent you’re nothing but a talentless boardroom of useless hedge fund managers so get wise and pay your workers what they deserve. If not, well, study the French and Russian Revolution .   Solidarity with the WGA and SAG workers on strike
Title: Pay your writers and actors.

Content: I didn’t want or need anything greater than what I had in HBO Max. Now, I just have a bunch of stuff I didn’t want, didn’t need and still don’t want and don’t need…. Basically, I’m paying for a new form of cable packaging that I hope to replace by dropping Max and finding content elsewhere.   The whole Max “diversity” of selection just creates visual noise that makes it harder to find what I know I want to watch.
Title: HBO Max was enough, now the selection is too wide in scope

Content: Max is great but unfortunately I bought it through my iPad Apple account and now I have no way of sharing it with my family. Terrible. I’ll never buy anything through my Apple account again. They are thieves!  Thanks !
Title: Apple is a terrible way to purchase Max!

Content: The new app is nice and all but I enjoyed how the layout was easier for the older app and it was easier to navigate. I’m not saying it’s hard to navigate. I’m just saying everything was right there. I didn’t have to search for the categories I was quite fond of the simplicity of the older app. Still good app Overall
Title: New app

Content: When I switched over the process was seamless however since the first time I played a show it stopped in the middle of playing and glitches repeating the same five seconds over and over until I go back to the series home page. I go back to series home page and resume and then the audio doesn’t sync with the picture. This app is a huge backslide. I’m super disappointed I love the content but HBO max itself was the worst steaming service and now they are so much worst!
Title: Big Bugs

Content: Runs great on my Apple TV. On my iPad when I launch a movie/show, the full screen does not overlap the info bar at very top of screen like HBO Max version. While viewing on iPad, its showing the date, time and battery life. Would rather total full screen view.
Title: App runs well

Content: This is the most best way to watch south park or any other show. HBO max sometimes had glitches. But now this doesn’t have glitches and when I downloaded it, it instantly logged me into my account and I'm glad for that. Hopefully this doesn’t have any glitches
Title: Idk

Content: When I watch an episode or a movie, it does not stay connected to the TV. It will be streaming, but For instance, the screen on my phone does not match what is showing on the TV. I’m not sure why that happens. It makes it hard to pause the show immediately, or fast forward/rewind. This also occurred with hbomax.
Title: Streaming

Content: The top and bottom bars on the iPad are not minimized when using full screen. Literally every other streaming app does not have this issue. Hoping it is fixed soon.   Otherwise no major upgrades to their UI design, at best it’s similar to their previous app which was mostly fine. Not sure why they couldn’t just rename the old app and update the icon and avoid the annoying issues.
Title: Downgrade

Content: I am a firm believer in the “don’t fix it if it ain’t broke” mantra, and I think this really applies here. HboMax was fine as is—I feel like this new “Max” thing is just a very poor attempt at fixing I don't even know what. This a lot harder to use and navigate than HboMax, especially without the drop-down menu, which is ridiculous to me that it doesn’t exist anymore. Some things I like better than others, but all in all I’m disappointed in it
Title: why??

Content: Other people say that this app runs better but for me and everyone else in my household the app acts up way too much. For one, the show that I am currently watching it doesn’t save my progress anymore so I always have to go through some episodes just to find the last place I was in, which is frustrating. The show doesn’t even show up on the “Continue Watching” section, there’s times where it is there and sometimes it isn’t. That’s my main issue.
Title: HBO Max was just fine

Content: When I click on an episode that's 90% finished, it means I want to restart it, not watch the credits. Also, when I click on a show on recently watched, I dont want to watch the episode I want to visit the show's information to pick an episode. Also, to rewind, I want to be able to hold the button or hit a restart episode button - not click individually by 10 second intervals.
Title: Better UI, worse functionality

Content: I was frustrated by a bug at launch that prevented the app from being used, but Max extended the old HBO app until they got things working. All works smoothly now, although my kids are miffed at having lost their account icon pictures. Hopefully that gets reintroduced soon!
Title: Bugs at launch but working smooth now

Content: So theres a few problems that im sure will fix over time but i dont know if its common. I tried watching it on television. I press on a show and i cant skip the recap. And then when i just let it play it goes straight to an ad, then when the ad finishes it goes right back to the recap over and over again. But the only thing is that its functional on my phone.
Title: Replays

Content: As a lifelong fan of HBO, Ian’s. It a big fan of trashy reality RV, I truly miss the HBO max days when I knew everything would be my type of content. Since the refresh, it’s been harder to siphon out the garbage from the hood but I still enjoy the product and can appreciate the diversity of content for those who do enjoy those shows.
Title: Great App, Just Miss the HBO Of It

Content: There are some shows that are my favorite and like to go and rewatch every now and then. This new app never allows it to save on Continue watching from where I ended in the series. Where HBO max did allow it and any other streaming app does. I tried to troubleshoot the issue in their troubleshooting site and tried using their automated chat. It kept putting me in circles. Then when I tried to chat with customer service. It said high volume and ended my chat.
Title: Unable to rewatch shows

Content: The info buttons that give a brief description of the content are no longer available for many of the titles. You have to actually start watching before you can get a sense of whether whatever it is worthwhile.   Also, now the white multi-task dots at the top of the screen and the white line at the bottom of the of iPad Pro screen are there permanently. They no longer disappear when watching content.
Title: New app is a downgrade

Content: HBO Max was near perfect for a fan of both HBO and DC animation.   Gone are those pesky sidebar hubs which let you choose whether you wanted Studio Ghibli, Cartoon Network, DC Comics, or HBO content.  Gone are searching by ready made categories or any coherent sorting.   What we now have is what every fan wants: My 600 Pound Life right next to House of Dragon right next to 90 Day Fiancé right next to Superman: Under the Red Son right next to Sisterwives. No more will you have that awful experience of having all DC animation. Nope. Now all Adult Animation are shoved together. Except that they aren’t. Some are moved into action. Some into comedy. How will you know?   That’s a mystery you will need to call Zaslov about. Thanks John Stankey for negotiating the worst merger in entertainment history.
Title: Ruined what was once a near-perfect app

Content: This app just had an update just yesterday and , it’s having problems  with loading content ! Ever sense I’ve had the app constantly having issues with staying connected with the wifi for no reason!! Why can’t things just run smoothly like they are supposed to!!! There is no reason for this stupid crap!!!! Or when ur watching a show or a movie u should not have to constantly go to settings and change subtitles and mess with the audio!!! Very annoying
Title: Tweet

Content: Skipping forward or backwards is such a horrible experience that I actually avoid the app. When you skip forward or back, the whole thing pauses and you have to press play again. It seems minor but it is extremely frustrating and makes for one of the worst user experiences among streaming platforms in terms of navigating a video.  It’s baffling to me that this hasn’t been fixed yet several months after going live.
Title: Fix the player on Apple TV!!!!!!

Content: Max keeps trying to replace the native Apple playback options with their own. It didn’t work before and it’s just as bad now.   On the Apple TV, for example, you can press the play/pause button to stop playback. The same button will not resume playback. Why??  You have to tap the main button.   Play the next episode from the watch screen and it goes to the right episode, but if you’ve seen it before, it resumes it even if there is less than two minutes left. Why?  Maybe I’m watching it again?    Any option to start from the beginning? Nope. Have you scrub all the way back to the start.   Since there is zero value added by replacing the player, let’s not reinvent the wheel please?
Title: Max nuisance

Content: I don’t understand why Max/HBO/Discovery/whatever you are now can’t manage to remember which episodes of shows have been watched. I watch something halfway through on my bedroom Apple TV and go to finish it on my living room Apple TV and it starts from the beginning. None of my watched episodes are marked as watched on either device, but they are on my phone? Discovery+ has this problem, too, and it’s incredibly annoying.
Title: ATV App is Dreadful

Content: As others have said, hbo max use to work on my phone and on my Vizio tv and no will not work on either. The phone app just rapid scrolls through collections without letting me actually view any shows or movies or click anything to watch. The tv just gets opens settings when I click my profile and won’t let me access any content or leave settings. It just takes me back to the select profile page. I’m getting really aggravated.
Title: App doesn’t work at all

Content: We have had nothing but issues with this new app. If we finish watching at the end of episode 5, the next time we login, it says we’re at the end of episode 6, so we have to always remember exactly what episode and where we left off. Also, after the intro of the show, the entire screen glitches and goes static and we have to exit out of the episode and restart it. Plus, the screen will intermittently flicker from color to black and white.
Title: So many glitches

Content: I pay for this monthly service and can’t even watch it on my iPad mini because it doesn’t have the most updated software available to it. What a terrible business plan that requires people to buy a new device to watch something THAT I ALREADY PAY FOR! Will always be one star until this is fixed and I will tell everyone the app and content are awful. Thanks HBO, for showing consumers you’re all about money and not the user!
Title: Can’t Watch without Update

Content: Take the shuffle option away and make watching tv series harder especially when the show doesn’t really have story line and it’s just mind numbing bring back the shuffle option
Title: Why would you

Content: It’s not tv it’s HBO. Well now I don’t even know what it is anymore…It’s been rollercoaster. Eventually the quality of HBO series will diminish, and their focus and funding will be geared towards crappy TV content. Oh well end of an era I guess. All we can do is roll with it.   But seriously….can you all at least bring back the SHUFFLE OPTION. I would enjoy playing south park on shuffle and watch random episodes from the 25 + years of South Park.
Title: Don’t fix what’s not broken.

Content: I love watching cartoons mindlessly but it gets boring if you know what episode comes after the next. The shuffle button on HBOmax was a key feature that made the app stand out amongst other streaming platforms. My sister and I were disappointed when the feature didn’t make it on to Max. Please bring it back!
Title: Bring back the shuffle button

Content: Never had a service do this… i’ve been trying to finish rewatching a show and I believe since the system thinks i have already watched it once it cannot remain in my currently watching shows. Annoying and inconvenient, HBO would never  My second review….  WHY WOULD YOU NOTIFY PEOPLE OF NEW SHOWS AND EPISODES THAT ARE NOT ACCURATE. This is ridiculous, why in the world would your service send me a notification of a show that ended a year ago and say “Catch up on new episodes now 🚨” WITH THAT EMOJI.
Title: App constantly removes shows i’m watching

Content: The only complaint I have is that MAX got rid of series Vinyl and a few other series that only had one season. And I really wish that Vinyl had more seasons cause it’s such a great show.  And I wish you didn’t get rid of Minx either, also a good show.
Title: One Season Shows

Content: This app is good, however, there is something that should be fixed. I can’t seem to find a way to get rid of the home bar at the bottom and three dots at the top when watching full screen on my iPad. Netflix and Prime Video don’t have this issue, so why Max?
Title: Good, but needs full screen improvement

Content: The app does not list my shows in the continue watching section nor does it show where I have left off in episodes. Now when I watch shows if I leave the app and come back it looks as if I haven’t even started the show I am watching. I’m on season 2 of succession but if I leave the app and come back I’ll be on season 1 episode 1. This is happening both on Roku and on my phone. Please help!
Title: Continue Watching Not tracking

Content: Today, for the first time, I was able to start Max without it asking me to reinstall it. But now, before I can use it, I must tell it what Sex in the city character I am? The list only contains the four leading female characters. Sorry, a few of us males still maintain our original equipment, I won’t be declaring myself as female to get access to your mediocre programming. Good bye. BTW take a look at todays WSJ for a good article about how companies are avoiding boycotting by making more careful marketing choices.
Title: Not a female sex in the city character

Content: My experience with HBO Max before it was Max was very good, it was hardly ever buffering and it was overall very good.   Obviously I still love the app and all the movies and TV Shows, but now that it is Max it is buffering, and is laggier than before. It buffers when I cast to a TV, or when I’m just when the app.  Overall it is still a good app and I love the movies and TV Shows, as I have already mentioned. 3/5.
Title: A Step Down

Content: For some reason the continue watching will not update. I started a new show and it will not show up on my continue watching. I have to go and search for the show each time I log on and if I stop an episode partly watched I have to go through and find where I left off because it hasn’t saved. I really hope they solve this issue because it’s becoming more trouble than it’s worth.
Title: Continue watching

Content: Everything will be playing one day then the next I try and play something and it gets stuck on the loading screen forever. I tried everything to fix it but nothing would work. I eventually moved to a different tv which was fine until the next day it started doing the same thing. Never had any problems like this with HBO max and now it’s impossible for me to watch  any shows on it.
Title: Never had so many problems with a streaming app

Content: I’ve tried four times to sign in through xfinity in this app and every single time I log in, nothing happens. It takes me to my xfinity account page and the only option for the web page it opens is to click refresh or cancel. I assume if it worked correctly there would be a “done” option. So I click cancel and the max app says an error has occurred and takes me all the way back to the beginning.
Title: Sign in through provider not working

Content: Overall the app is good and combines two great services into one place. Although one thing I loved about HBO Max was the ability to Screenshare the show on facetime with your friend. I hope this is just a temporary problem and they’re working with Apple to implement it back, but if that is a lost feature with the transition it will be missed by me and many others.
Title: Missing features

Content: This “alternative” to HBO is quite pointless. What is even the point of forcing all of your users to switch to a completely different app that is, not to mention, barely functional. While steaming the show or movie lags frequently and any videos that you were in the middle of watching do not show up under the “continue watching” tab, meaning that you have to manually search anything that you wish to watch. I do not recommend this atrocity to anyone.
Title: Completely Usless

Content: I cannot fathom why anybody would even think (let alone suggest to a supervisor and get approved) to drop the HBO branding and use the Discovery/Max branding instead.  People tune in for Westworld, The Leftovers, Game of Thrones, The Sopranos, The Wire, Succession, Barry, Veep, and Chernobyl. I had to google a list of names for Max shows because the branding is so poor, and the original content from that side doesn’t seem much better. I certainly won’t be watching “Alaskan Killer Bigfoot” or “UFO Witness.” This is one of the worst marketing decisions that I’ve ever seen.
Title: Why Max? HBO is better

Content: Will not lie love Max got it when it was first HBO MAX just one suggestion is to push for better shows/originals mad by HBO for more subscribers as the app calls for more audience it’s best to bring comedy or drama shows to the domain! Lots of great movies and shows to watch already tho but this seems more like a review for what I want so I’ll end here!
Title: Take a look!

Content: Ever since switching to max, after the ads end, the subtitles that are shown are for a totally different episode. Before the advertisements start, the correct subtitles are displayed. It only happens after ads. It’s really difficult to reset the problem manually. Closing the app is usually the only fix…could be a bug.
Title: I love all the shows but…

Content: Okay so before I begin, I absolutely love HBO Max!!! But they have got to do something about the signing in crap. I am constantly having to sign in and I don’t understand why it’s so hard for them to keep my information so I don’t have to sign in every time I open the app. Hopefully they can fix this soon because that is the only problem that I have with HBO Max!!
Title: Signing in

Content: The app hasn’t given me any problems up until a week ago. Whenever I open the app, whether I’m casting it to my tv or just watching on my phone, none of my progress in my continue watching shows/movies have been saved. I tried uninstalling/reinstalling, updating the app and signing off and back on but nothing is fixing the issue. I have to start everything over from the beginning. Very very very very frustrating.
Title: Continue watching won’t work

Content: I download movies for the kid when we go camping and it fails to play them once we're off the grid. Its frustrating to the point I will probably switch to another streaming service that actually works.  Also, content for kids is very under par and they make it super hard to find. It's buried with no easy way to get to it unless you doom scroll far down the page until you can find "kids & family".
Title: Constantly fails to play downloaded content

Content: Always has worked but no longer even after uninstalling and reinstalling about 10 times. Rebooting phone. Hopefully just a glitch but will try later.
Title: Works great until it doesn’t

Content: HBO is one of the only streaming services I consistently use and think is actually worth the money. However I think the name just to just MAX is pretty stupid and they’re just copying the rest of the streaming services. Bring back HBO MAX and change the background back to Purple.
Title: Stupid name

Content: The accessibility issues have gotten much more worse ever since HBO max became max. Did they not take being accessible and inclusive into consideration. I pay  the same amount to view content. This app is very very hard to navigate using voiceover. There’s no reason why it cannot be made accessible. It’s just needs to be a priority to make accessibility a requirement within the app development.
Title: Major accessibility issue for voiceover user who is blind

Content: How y’all went from being the best, most cohesive app to the absolute worst boggles my mind. I don’t know who decided the interface needed to be the same as all the other ones. It was great as it was before, I could easily find movies and shows. I liked knowing what was “JUST ADDED” and what was “COMING SOON” or even what was leaving. Whoever made that decision to ruin the cohesion deserves nothing but warm pillows on both sides for the rest of their lives.   If it ain’t broke… so ridiculous.
Title: Finding something to watch…

Content: I was trying to watch Harry Potter and the prisoners of Azkaban, and it buffered at the opening scene and wouldn’t go past I had to of tried restarting about a hundred times and realized that it was probably my wifi, it wasn’t the connection speeds were plenty fast enough. So I had to watch it on peacock instead. Sorry HBO but if y’all could fix it would gladly change my rating to 5 stars because frankly I love this app.
Title: Buffering too much!

Content: I like the new layout of the app. It is easier to find, sort through, and filter through options now. I hope they stop changing the name of the service though. Personally I was a fan when they just called it HBO. Overall a great service that doesn’t break the bank.
Title: Max

Content: Overall the content is expanded and varied. App has a few issues with the integration of everyone from old HBO MAX, but definitely worth it. There is something for everyone, Adult Swim, TCM, DC, Discovery, TLC, Blippi, Sesame Street, Cartoon Network, etc., as well as the huge amount of HBO originals and their available movies and shows.
Title: Content is excellent, still a few glitches

Content: Max is now my most frequently used streaming app. There’s so much content - old and new. I rated 4 stars because for some reason, the app will keep me logged in for a few days and then it logs me out, so I have to login again. Ever since the launch, it never keeps me logged in on my iPhone, but it does on my AppleTV. 🤷🏽‍♀️
Title: So much content!

Content: Don’t know what y’all did but this app is way more functional. Idk what they changed though. It used to be HBO Now and HBOGO. Then HBO Max. Now just Max?? Phasing out HBO? So confused. So basically Max had to get rid of HBO to have an app that functions properly? Other than that, what did they change? Thanks
Title: Don’t know what took so long!

Content: I subscribed to HBOMAX prior to its launch, solely to watch Friends. I’ve enjoyed other HBO originals since. But my main draw continues to be Friends.   I rewatch the series in a loop. Since the switch to Max, the show no longer displays in the continue watching section. It displays in my list, but the app doesn’t remember where I left off, defaulting back to S1E1 each time I return to the app.   It’s extremely annoying. I have never experienced this issue on another streaming app, including HBOMAX.
Title: Disappointed with the new app

Content: Doesn’t do much good to have continue watching when the only things that stay in mine are shows that I stopped during a program before the change took place. Nothing I have been watching since the switch stays in continue watching now, and episodes that I have watched don’t show as having been watched so I have to try to remember where I left off. Fix this broken app that worked great before you had to be stupid and change it. 😡
Title: Broken app

Content: Any new show I start watching has no sound. I have to completely restart my Roku TV to get sound back.  Scrolling through show tiles on the app main page is a horrible experience. When you start scrolling down the rows of show tiles vertically you would hope the show tiles you have your cursor on would be in the middle of the screen but they aren’t. They’re at the bottom of the screen and they’re half cut off so you can’t fully see what your selecting
Title: What a piece of crap

Content: O don’t understand all of the controversy about max. Me personally it has been working for me absolutely tremendously, so if your worried on downloading max do it! It’s worth it, I am able to watch more movies and have not had any ads. So this is your sign to download max today! 🤩🤩🤩
Title: Why so much hate? 🤔

Content: This is way better than Netflix and Disney+ or any other Movie Platform! There are so so many different movies and shows to watch not to mention if you miss your favorite movie in theaters it will more than likely be on HBO Max Before Any Other Movie Platform! Highly Recommended!
Title: I LOVE HBO MAX

Content: I love Using Max It’s a great app to watch my favorite movies and there’s series to watch. But certain things I wish where on here like certain movies or series that aren’t on Max. But overall it’s a great app and I highly recommend it. Thank you for a great app to watch movies and series.
Title: Great App!

Content: HBO Max is very nice and it has some good shows but it needs more. There’s so many shows that I would like to watch but I can’t because they’re not on HBO max and that’s all we have so it would be nice if they could get more shows on this app!
Title: Needs more shows

Content: Have been using Max for the past couple months and have been overall impressed. A week ago I was logged out of Max and have not been able to log back in since. Whenever I try to log back in it just goes to a loading screen and does not change. Please fix this bug.
Title: Not able to log in

Content: Opening the app while watching *anything* causes the app to restart to the beginning of the episode. If the episode is paused manually, after about 30 seconds or so of inactivity, the episode restarts on its own. If I try to skip forward 10 seconds, I am only able to do so in 10-second chunks.   I have switched to using the app from my PS5 instead, as I only encounter these issues on iOS. I’ll return to edit this review once this app is usable again.
Title: Severely buggy

Content: I have always loved and used this app a lot. These new bugs since the last update… every time I start an episode it has an error message across it until I click it again and restart it. Also, anytime I go away from the app, when I go back it stops playing and starts from the beginning. It’s near unwatchable. Lastly, it is not tracking what I’ve watched so I have to remember where I left off on a season. Please fix this soon!
Title: Fix these new bugs!

Content: Out of 3 times hbo has transformed this streaming app, it has been trash every time. But this app takes the cake. Everytime i cast, an audio description is played and i’m unable to turn it off. each time i navigate to open the app while i’m casting, the episode starts over completely; and i’m forced to watch the same ad over and over and over. I’ve cancelled my subscription for good. Somebody let me know when they get together cause i’ll miss my shows
Title: Worst app to date

Content: Max is great and it’s much better than the old HBO Max app it loads much faster, and I find it easier to use. There is a lot of great content and the addition of all the discovery shows and movies is also great. I without a doubt recommend this app to everyone it’s great.
Title: MAX THE ONE TO WATCH

Content: I enjoy watching Max because of the movies and documentaries offered here. The only thing I miss is that latest Bill Maher show does not always show up. Otherwise, I am happy with the variety of good programs and the channels available here.
Title: Quality Media

Content: Too many old movies…..not enough movies of present.  Too many movies with non American language. When I try to change the language, the movie has to be playing and when I do that, it says default language and I can’t change it to English. This is America and I can’t watch a movie in English??????
Title: Outdated

Content: I think the switch from HBO Max to Max was sudden, but not a bad change at all. Plus all my favorites are here so who am I to complain. Though I do miss when you could look up the name of an episode and it would show, that was way easier. 👍
Title: Pretty good

Content: The only thing I would change is the fact that when you go back to continue watching it always takes you back to season 1 episode 1 never where you left off.
Title: Any Series

Content: This app takes all that was the previous HBO Max app and somehow makes it a more buggy and infuriating experience.   Some might like the “simplified” navigation, but for me that just translates to “makes everything harder to find.”  Also for me, there’s an extra bonus. Whenever a movie or tv series ends and the app minimizes the video to show you “similar” items, it automatically turns on the freaking subtitles! So, I’m constantly having to turn them back off. It’s frustrating and annoying and makes me not want to use the app at all.   You could accuse me of being dramatic with this, but it really is very frustrating having to reset the subtitles. I’m tired of having to compensate for the development team’s inability to test things like this.
Title: Somehow worse than the HBO Max app

Content: Watching episodes from a previously viewed series should not automatically resume with the end credits of an episode you’re attempting watch. If it was watched well into the end credits previously, the interface should automatically restart the episode in lieu of picking up at the end and then jumping to the next episode.
Title: Previously watched series

Content: The overall content and the functionality of the new app is great love it but however I’m very upset that I can add my own photos for the profile pic. I would greatly appreciate if we just added that tweak to it thank you be try much. Carry on..
Title: Rebranding

Content: While watching on this app, it continually zooms in on pivotal moments and shows. The screen gets Pixley and you can’t see anything. The old app used to work so well but now I can’t enjoy my favorite shows. Once my subscription ends, I will be leaving unless they fix these issues. I’d pay more for this streaming service and anything else, I expect better. Terrible way to rebrand yeah.
Title: Why fix something that isn’t broken

Content: Everything seems to run smoothly just like with HBO Max except for one thing; whenever I click on an episode of any show I’ve already watched it always starts at the end then automatically goes to the next episode so I only have a couple secs to go back. You should fix that default it is really annoying. HBO Max didn’t have this problem.
Title: Review

Content: HBO Max was constantly freezing on me and I would have to close it out and start the app all over again. So far Max has been great. I haven’t had any of the issues I used to have so far. Let’s hope it stays that way.
Title: Glad the app works better

Content: I have had HBOMax for several years. The upgrade to max was seamlessly smooth. Download and auto login worked swimmingly. The app itself is well organized with a favorites tab where I can find the series I watch. Love the new organization and app layout!❤️❤️❤️
Title: Max app upgrade

Content: The app is very glitchy. Subtitles of certain shows randomly turn off every five minutes and you have to close the show and reopen it to make them function again. Phone orientation is also problematic. When I turn my phone horizontally the app keeps switching the view to be upside down every few minutes. The UX is fine, easy to find shows, but the play back experience is awful, especially compared to the prior HBO Max app and Discovery+ app.
Title: Very Glitchy

Content: This whole HBO breaking up with max thing was unnecessary, first you guys removed the custom profile pictures and the South Park profile pictures, and the new layout is not the best and whenever I click on episodes having everything looked shrinked is just weird and the way you guys add the 1st and 3rd conjuring and not the 2nd like just why?? Me personally I’m very nit picky but if you don’t care about changes like this, Max is fine.
Title: Just no..

Content: I think the very last thing I wanted was to add a bunch of trash reality tv to HBO. And I love trash reality tv - but this isn’t it. 90 day fiancé and the last of us mingling together is just off putting. Maybe this is a testament to HBO’s branding prior to this merger.  The sections are a mess. The interface is ugly. I feel like I downgraded in quality, despite having more selection. I’m not sure how they managed to do it, but I don’t feel like paying for this app anymore and I’ve lost interest in HBO. It’s quite impressive!
Title: Mergers, monopolies, Max!

Content: I love that I can like certain shows or movies and it genuinely will show me similar titles and also the easiness of looking for hbo, Cinemax, showtime, dc etc and it has such a wide range, it’s extremely easy to use and a main reason I got rid of cable 💜👍
Title: Wonderfully entertaining

Content: I wanted to get the version of Max with ads to save some money but I was forced to upgrade due to episodes buffering and jumping ahead a few seconds after an ad was over. I then have to rewind to see what I missed. I upgraded to ad free to remedy this issue. I shouldn’t have had to though. Not cool HBO. Not cool.
Title: Do not get the ad version!

Content: The user interface still leaves a lot to be desired. When streaming, if I leave the app and go back in, I can’t access the player to adjust the video. My biggest complaint with this app is that each time I start a new video, it bumps my TV volume to the max and blasts me out. Why can’t it just start on TV’s current volume?
Title: Better, not great

Content: I don’t know what is causing this but I have to log into the app MULTIPLE times a day. My current record is 4 logins in a 12 hr period.  I don’t know if they only store the IP and that changes depending on where I am or actual use the devices unique number or what, but being unable to keep a device logged in for a whole day let alone more than is very unacceptable for a streaming platform. No such issues with any other streaming app
Title: Daily log in issues on mobile

Content: it has A lot of the movies i have been wanting to see but most of them are not there but usually is. i also don’t like how they change the name of it every year i don’t enjoy that considering you have to download the app every single time
Title: need some changes but still very good

Content: HBO max was great especially on my Apple TV 4K with HDR/Dolby Vision. Now that the “upgrade” has finally arrived now I don’t get frame matching or HDR. I have the top tier plan but no top tier performance on my Apple TV.   When the app is updated with frame matching and HDR I’ll update my review. Until then it’s a 1 star for me.
Title: Great app until…

Content: I’d love to know why they stopped their Apple TV integration. It made life so easy picking up where you leave on shows. I’m not finding the app easy to navigate in it comes to shows in my queue, etc.  The fact that they dropped ‘HBO’ from their name was a stupid business decision as well.   I really hope they reconsider their Apple TV integration. I believe in the long-run it will hurt them.
Title: Dumb Decisions

Content: Why on Earth would anyone think a merge of a Premier content provider and…well, just junk was a good idea?!?  I’m baffled.  To top it off, the actually good content is now only accessible through an unnecessary labyrinth of master menus.   I won’t even get into my thoughts on The Idol…too many landmines!  **Biggest app complaint—Ever since the change…the playback software has been glitchy at best.  I pick a title & choose “play again” only for it to return to the very end of credits; over & over.  So…one must be very nimble fingered (no so easy at my age) & quickly push and wait for a quick total rewind.    I’m sorry, but even PBS’s app has got the “resume or start from beginning” options down pat.  For the premium price, I’d hope for premium app function!
Title: Complete Nonsensical Downgrade!  Why???

Content: When the switch first happened I had no issues. Then for some reason late last week I couldn’t log in on my tv. Said I need to renew my subscription but it worked fine on my phone. Then I signed out on my phone and tried to sign back in and it dies the same thing. Won’t let me sign in says to renew my subscription. When I try to it just says sorry try again later. Get it together I won’t pay for something that doesn’t work
Title: Was good then not.

Content: I don’t understand why but every 5th time or so I launch the app, I have to log in again. This doesn’t happen with other streaming apps nor did it with the hbo app. Frustrating! That said I do like that they improved it so you can multitask and minimize this app and do other things while watching.
Title: Log in - again and again and again

Content: HBO max is my main streaming service and the new app is awful. The app will not save my place in shows anymore and I have to constantly find where I was. Navigating the new app in general is just awful miss the old app for sure!!
Title: The new app is terrible

Content: The App is great, but would be nice if when watching a series and u pause it and then stop the app, that when u go back into the app it’s in the same place u paused it, right now it starts the series back at episode 1 season 1
Title: Doesn’t start back where u left off

Content: Listen, I had this app for least a year now, but there’s a few things I would want so that it would be God tear out a few more shows some Family Guy, Ben 10 south, part of the movie, the Lego movie, two and a bunch more
Title: Good app just need a few changes

Content: It was very smooth transition from the older app. I was signed in right away and made my life easier !  And very smooth speed and display and organization of app is beautiful.  So big thumbs up to HBO because now I can find my app way easier on my IPhone and IPad! 👍👍😀😀😇❤️❤️❤️🙌🎊🔥
Title: Love the New Look

Content: App won’t remember where I am in episodes, have to rewind through entire episodes to try and remember where I am. Same 4 ads replay over and over, very annoying when I have to watch 2 ads every time I skip through more than ten minutes of footage. Shows no longer show up in “continue watching” tab either. Terrible update, max was an unnecessary change.
Title: Terrible Update

Content: Tell me why the app works on my iPhone but it doesn’t work on the google tv that I have. It loads and everything on my phone but it freezes on my tv. This app only have 1.6 star rating on the google tv that’s not good. Also, at least it works on my phone because I would be so mad if it didn’t
Title: Its ok

Content: None of the shows I watch ever save on my “continue watching” so I have to go search the show and back to the exact episode I was watching and it will restart the episode rather than continue where I left off  That’s my only complaint, it has older shows and no ads!!!😁
Title: Not bad! Buuut…

Content: This transition from HBO Max to MAX was not tested correctly in beta.   First of all the app glitches from one scene to another. (Most likely due to the space made for commercial for the ads monthly subscription) and second the SAP options for different spoken languages is not available on most new shows, unlike its predecessor.  Things were they don’t make sense and just a overall mess.  The QA team on this rollout definitely needs to be fired and we collectively need out money back.
Title: Inferior app

Content: This is now the third time in the past year the HBO has completely changed their app, forcing you to download another one of their apps and sign in. it’s clear to me that they are just money grabbers.
Title: Why make things more difficult?

Content: I dislike the addition of running ads. It’s annoying while watching a movie or my favorite show. Especially since the ads repeat themselves over and over again. I miss the old HBO.
Title: Regarding the ads

Content: I love this app but there are things i dislike about it. First when i skip forward it only goes 10 seconds but before it did 15 seconds. I liked the 15 second skip because of themes i can just skip over them. 2nd you still do not have uncle grandpa which is a shocker.
Title: Needs more

Content: The app doesn’t work properly on AppleTV. Just avoid it until they fix it. Audio comes out as PCM. Now, they want another $5 per month just to get 4K and good audio, except the audio is broken.   Speaking of price increases, they are now in premium offering territory at US $20/month for premium, but the app is missing basic features. For example, you can’t look up your watch history. A customer service person just told me it’s not an offered feature. Really?
Title: Avoid.

Content: I have watched the first episode of the second season of my favorite show. I have wanted to watch it again to see what I might’ve missed. It starts at the end so I let it run all the way through, then I go back in to watch it, and it starts the end again. I am just doing this review so that they know what’s wrong and can fix it. It’s getting very irritating.
Title: Max is better but still needs a few tweaks

Content: HBO max or just max is a great service and all but I hate the fact that I have multiple profiles and even if we make sure to use our own profiles, we still get each others watch history and it changes where we left off in shows if we watch the same ones. Kinda annoying.
Title: Great service but…

Content: Anytime I cast from my phone to the television it automatically turns the volume on my tv to 100. I have an infant so it’s extremely annoying to try and watch a show once she’s in bed and the tv wake her up because it’s at 100. Even when I change episodes it still puts the volume at 100. This is the only thing I’ve ever casted that does that so it isn’t my fault. Other then that it’s fine.
Title: Volume!!!

Content: The app is a great app. Organized better and more user friendly. They could tweak certain features but overall a better and more enjoyable app. I love how HBO performs better than any other app especially in quality and quantity.
Title: Updated App

Content: It would be nice it there was a separate list for “Favorites”. Adding shows and movies that I want to watch to my list and shows and movies that I like to rewatch would be a lot easier than having to go through a long list of both combined.
Title: Need to have a favorites section.

Content: Back when this app was HBO Max there were a few issues when trying to cast. It eventually set itself right after the initial tries. However, once it became solely MAX the casting has been horrendous. It glitches and stops pretty much anytime you try to cast a movie. On its own it work fine when streaming on a device but the casting bugs are really bad. Hopefully they can fix this
Title: Buggy when casting

Content: The app is garbage. I use it with a chromecast and every time I try to watch a show, it starts the show over every single time I open my phone. If I go to check a text the show is back to the beginning starting with ads again. It also randomly switches on audio subtitles and I can’t get rid of it no matter how many times I turn it off in settings. I will be cancelling my subscription because everything is unwatchable.
Title: Horrible connectivity

Content: I like Max, just like I liked HBO max. However, when I pause a show and then come back to it and push play, it immediately goes to the beginning of the episode. Very frustrating. On the HBO Max app, when I would hit pause, and then push play, it would push to the end of the episode. Please figure this out. It’s very very bad.
Title: Nice out with some problems

Content: I appreciate the variety of shows that are available. The functionality of the app is extremely user friendly. I recommend that you subscribe. There is something to watch for all ages.
Title: Eveything is here

Content: Something went wrong. Please try again. The flagship app of one of the largest entertainment companies on Earth is an absolute dumpster fire. This isn't about content, this the app. It is an absolute embarrassment. Watching a series? Want to check out a different episode from the one the app says you should be watching? NOPE. Wanna find ANY information about the episode? NOPE.  I could go on all day but this trash can called MAX has stolen too much of my time already. FIRE WHOEVER RUINED YOUR PRODUCT
Title: How could this fail so hard?

Content: The hbo max app was great. This re-do is awful. They have made a previously easy to use and peruse UI a Netflix-ish nightmare of endless rows of things to scroll through. The added insult is the new things to choose from are a boring pile of basic cable trash. It wasn’t broken. Why did they have to try and “fix it”?  Update: the app is sucking even harder. It is now losing functionality on top of being overburdened with stupid content I’m not interested in. Great job Darren Zaslov!
Title: Way to screw up a good thing

Content: For some reason, audio description is now a default setting that I cannot change. When I go to change it, the app says it is not playing audio description. I’ve redownloaded the app, removed caches. The app is now unusable until they push another update
Title: Clunky

Content: Everything seems to work pretty good, I do keep having issues where the video cuts out and it says there’s a playback issue but audio keeps playing. Aside from that love the selection and app, but please stop changing y’all’s name hahah
Title: Works good

Content: No matter what i do this app is always glitching now. Many of the shows audio doesn’t match with the picture, any time i try to fast forward or rewind everything freezes and exits. i’ve tried restarting the app, and even my whole roku. every other app on my roku works fine except Max. Doesn’t work on my phone either. Tried uninstalling & installing. Im honestly about to cancel my membership, it’s not even worth it if i cant even use it.
Title: Always Glitching

Content: Try as much as I can the app keeps freezing on the opening ad. I have to wait through the frozen app as the sound still plays, then I have to wait for the show I’m trying to watch play for a little bit (at least 2-3 minutes, all while still frozen on the ad) and then back out  turn off my television, reboot it and start it from the “continue watching” option. Officially lost my business
Title: Canceling my subscription due to this app

Content: I remember HBO back from when it was a thing that only some people had on their television. When I lived in New York I used to go to the Bryant Park HBO summer movies. HBO did that for free for anybody who wanted to show up. Really appreciate that they are still around and making amazing content.
Title: Seriously

Content: This new app is terrible compared to the original HBO Max app! Every time I try to watch a show on my phone, it plays the episodes in a different language. Then when I eventually get it to English, it plays the description version instead so I can’t even enjoy that. I don’t understand why they switch to a new up. I never had issues with the last one and now I’m thinking of canceling my subscription because I can’t even watch a show properly now.
Title: New Max

Content: Max is definitely a worse app than it’s predecessor. It keeps taking shows you’re currently watching off your “Continue Watching” list and tries to restart you at the beginning of the series if you just hit play. It does it to me and my parents. The ways to search up shows is shortened as well so we’re now removing features from the app. And for some of my friends, their Max accounts just doesn’t work with chromebooks.
Title: Definitely a leap in the wrong direction

Content: Are used to hardly ever watch HBO, but the new max version is really awesome and now it’s the platform I watch most often. It has all my favorite shows in real time with no commercials. I absolutely love it and watch it every day!
Title: Really great shows, no commercials.

Content: South Park plays on all of my devices except my tv, but the app and every other show/movie so far has worked. It’s only the South Park series that black screens on the tv. You can hear the episode but no visuals. It works on all my other devices just fine. Only occurred when the app updated on my firestick for the new max app. Can you help?
Title: Issues with a show playing.

Content: HBO Max changed into Max. The app is well-made, but there is one thing that throws the whole thing down to two stars. This is because the battery, time and date icons DO NOT disappear when watching a show on mobile devices. This needs to be changed ASAP because this is infuriating. If this was purposeful, please make an option to change this manually on the app. Not a great design choice.
Title: Would be a 5 star, but…

Content: It’s launch night and the new app will not let me sign in. I’m using the same credentials that still work in the original HBO Max app. Why did they have to release a new app anyway? Couldn’t the old one just have been updated? It would have made things a lot easier for the customers and fans of HBO.  “Unknown error requesting service. Please try again later”  I wasn’t thrilled to hear HBO Max was being rebranded to Max. Everyone knows what HBO is, what is Max??
Title: new app doesn’t work on launch, bad rebrand IMO

Content: Max has a wide selection of different television shows and movies. There will probably be something that appeals to you, whether it’s one of the food shows, the sitcoms, or the variety of sports programming. I would say that it’s a worthwhile investment if you like watching television.
Title: One of the better streaming services

Content: I love the new additions of CNN. Before today I would need to search for reliable news sources documents and videos online. It would take forever.  Now that CNN is on MAX this will be my first stop daily. Thank you!  PS, Hey James Gunn, we need some phenomenal DC content so let’s get on that.
Title: CNN

Content: Really makes you appreciate Netflix. It’s funny how you take for granted basic functionality until you experience the lack thereof. Where do I even begin?  The app never remembers where I am in a show. 100% of the time I have to manually go through a shows episodes to figure out where I left off. It seems to randomly latch on to episodes and get stuck there, sometimes multiple season back.
