If I open the app when I’m watching something, it restarts whatever I’m watching for no reason without clicking on anything.   There is no way to skip to the next episode. The only way to do this is to exit out of what you’re watching, go through the menus to find what you’re watching, and manually scroll through the episodes.
Title: This app is garbage

Content: There is a lot to chose from but on some shows there is a voice explaining what is happening on the show and there is no way to turn it off.
Title: Disappointed

Content: Hbo max(max) gets an automatic 9/10 for me I love how they add all the new movies that came out this year or the year prior and this app always keeps me entertained would recommend everyone who sees this review gets it’s worth trust me
Title: One of the best movie and tv shows app I’ve been on

Content: My family is enjoying Max. However if they continue to keep shoveling shows containing LGBTQ I will quit them just like I did Disney Plus and Netflix. I don’t want my children watching it and I have no interest in it. Go woke, go broke. Take notes!
Title: Enjoying Max However

Content: NEW UPDATE!!!!! Now the thing shut off mid episode and when I click try again it starts from the beginning. Complete garbage.  UPDATE!!!! Now as I’m streaming I get kicked off and it asks me to try again or hit a back button. I know there’s nothing wrong with my Internet. This is pretty decent and the selection is pretty good. I would give it a lot more stars if I didn’t have to login every other time that I go to use it. Really really really really really annoying! 😡
Title: Junk!!!!

Content: I honestly find it hard to find things i’m looking for without the hubs tab. The hubs tab was really useful for me and organized. As someone on the spectrum I start to get really upset if something isn’t organized and easy to find. I really would want the Cartoon Network, Studio Ghibli and other hub tabs back! It’s better, and the old style for HBO Max is way better, Max new style doesn’t sit right and I absolutely hate it.
Title: Hubs back?

Content: I want Max to work. I really do. I love the selection of movies and shows available. My issue is that now MAX doesn’t save where I am in movies and shows. I can’t get a continue watching section no matter what I’m watching. It always goes back to episode 1 when I’ve looked for the show. It’s really frustrating. Please fix this.
Title: Great Potential but Crappy Execution

Content: The app is way faster with speed and rarely buffers at all. My only complaint with the mobile app is that you have to re-login every time you get on. It’s just frustrating that it doesn’t keep your account or give you the option to, “remember me.”
Title: Faster!

Content: I do not think the people at HBOMAx understand what "downloads" entails, and why people download content. You will need wifi to access your downloads, and Max will randomly log you out (in order to access your downloads, you'll need to stay logged in) so that you can't access your downloads when connecting to wifi is not possible (for example on a flight). Terrible terrible user experience, UX team needs to do something about it.
Title: downloads

Content: The new app is terrible. It doesn’t use Apple’s native video player, so using the jog shuttle for going forward or back in the movie or show doesn’t work. Nor does “hey Siri what did they say?” work for automatically rewinding about 10 seconds and temporarily turning on subtitles if you miss something.   And how do you change the name from HBO to Max? HBO is a stellar brand that’s been around since the dawn of cable television. What are they thinking? This app is terrible.
Title: It isn’t just the new name that’s terrible…

Content: The latest iteration of HBO-Max finally puts all those disparate video chunks and properties into a cohesive unit. It has lots of great shows and movies to dig through, a comprehensive task for your couch potato master watcher !!  Exclusive content like the show “Barry” is just ONE ITEM out of many that keeps me dedicated to perusing this channel. Get it.
Title: MAX is TOPS

Content: I subscribe to several screening services. In fact, too many. Of them all, MAX and APPLE Plus consistently have the best options. Prime is good too but so many titles are pay per view in addition to the prime charge per year.
Title: good content. Something for everyone

Content: Ever since the new update to “MAX” happened the app on my ROKU lags, wont register anything new I start on “continue watching” and when I start scrolling down the selection is not even visible it’s past the screen it does not let you see what titles you’re selecting, like it’s not centered. I’m not sure if it’s an individual issue or if it’s happening to other users but it only started happening after the update and it’s very aggravating
Title: New update Frustrating to use.

Content: It would be nice if the clock would disappear when watching on an iPad.   The bar at the bottom of the screen stays on so does battery and the clock. Very annoying when you are watching something that is supposed to be dark like Spawn.
Title: Clock displays while playing video

Content: I remember the old HBO+ app and it was terrible to navigate. Then they came out with HBO Max and seemed to fix the app so that you could actually find things easily. Now it’s right back to terrible design like they had before. What happened to the hubs? Why can’t I go straight to the TCM section? Where is the leaving soon section? Why does every suggested category just have the same movies in different orders? Nobody asked for this change. This is the opposite of improvement.
Title: Nobody Asked For This

Content: Just miss some of the old features from the previous HBO Max app. Video setting during the movie/show that just made a more confident and the fact that the 10 second skip didn’t lag the whole video each time you pressed it.
Title: Nice, but just miss old features

Content: Annoying. Since the switch you are not able to continue watching tv shows and only options available are movies you want to continue watching. Then if you go into the tv show you were watching, instead of picking up where you left off, it only give options to start all over again or you need to figure out what episode you were in previously. Fix it please
Title: Cannot continue watching tv shows

Content: Ever since the app updates to “Max”, the tv shows I’ve already watched are not coming up in History, Continue Watching, or My List. I had to re-add all the tv shows I watch to My List, and when I try to watch them the app will NOT save what season or episode I left off. This also causes me to find the episode I was on, and manually rewind to the beginning since there is no Restart available either. Total crap app.
Title: No Continue Watching, Restart, or History

Content: On iPad, “Connect Your Provider” -> “An error occurred!” Since updating iPad OS to 16.5, I don’t even get a list of providers to choose from now, just a blank white pop-up dialog. Is it their idea of making you subscribe directly? No thanks. It’s not that exciting to get into the Mike Rowe-ization of HBO anyway. Nothing against him personally, but the board room-“inspired” amalgam doesn’t exactly sound like a continuation of HBO’s tradition of blockbuster must-see movies and TV. The “max” in “HBO Max” meant quality. The “max” in “Max” means quantity, diluted.
Title: Worthless

Content: MAX provides a tremendously diverse streaming service.  With an excellent collection of classics that are hard to find elsewhere and timelessly easy to enjoy, along with a wide range of recently released blockbusters as well as binge worthy original series's in every category.
Title: Review of MAX Streaming Service.

Content: The acting is superb. It makes you feel like you’re in on it they keep you wanting more Barry flight attendant curb your enthusiasm vicariously watching others live takes me away from the reality of today for me. It’s like having a movie theater in my home. Calm is so soothing, educational and it puts me to sleep at night I love HBO Max.
Title: Exciting stories

Content: The app will not allow me to login on my iPhone. Every time i enter my account credentials, i get an error stating “device time is out of sync.” My phone has the proper date and time, and i have tried everything their help center suggests several times. nothing will fix this bug and allow me to login. not really interested in a subscription that wont allow me to access the content paid for, very disappointed.
Title: Device Time is Out of Sync

Content: Definitely better than the original app, but needs much work, for instance; why is it that I find myself downloading the same episodes over and over again, all because the app deletes the episode itself within literal minutes of me downloading them? Makes no sense honestly
Title: Better, but still bad

Content: Buggy on portable devices. Constant buffering even with excellent signal. And please stop forcing update. Would prefer to update via wifi but have to choose between watching another streaming service until I get home or updating via cellular.
Title: Mostly okay

Content: This app is a laggy pile. It’s worse on my tv where it’s almost unwatchable. Things don’t fully load. There is massive lag. Shows will say “new episode “ even after you have caught up so you are never certain if there is a new episode or not. The roll back when you pause or restart a show is stupid and unnecessary.  There is a lot of content but the only streaming service that’s worse for the app is Netflix and that’s saying a lot.
Title: Horrible app.

Content: I love max and there’s so much I want to watch, but I keep having this problem where I can’t make audio descriptions stop!! It’s making max basically unusable because I find it so annoying. There isn’t a way to turn them off from the caption menu, looking forward to when they fix this
Title: Can’t make audio descriptions off

Content: This is by far my favorite app of all times  Only problem I have is there are to many old movies that have been on there since I started watching max and that’s been like 3/4 years now but other than tht Great app 20 star
Title: I Lov max to the max

Content: This app is a very good app but some movies that should be in the kids account aren’t showing there. Example: The movies Yogi Bear, TMNT, and Coraline aren’t showing up in the kids account for me. One of my favorite movies Napoleon Dynamite is a kids movie but won’t appear in the kids account at all. Great app 8/10.
Title: Great app but there’s some problems

Content: So I renewed my subscription and I haven’t been able to watch hbo i’m only able to watch it on my computer but other than phones,ipad or tv i can’t it says i don’t have a subscription and i have to renew it but i tried signing out and back in but it still doesn’t let me watch please fix this sooner.
Title: subscription issue

Content: I cast to my TV via wifi.  This app literally blows my speakers out every new episode, and it also adjusts the volume on my TV when it should always be set at 0 (using a sound bar instead of TV speakers).  I have no idea why it doesnt remember the volume settings and adjusts my TV's volume to some random number.  I also get a black box saying "unexpected error trying to cast the content" even after I have clicked a different episode.
Title: Cast to TV volume errors, unexpected errors

Content: I absolutely adore what they’ve done with HBO max turn into max. I enjoy the next year between 1000 lb pound sisters in the classic HBO programming. I just wish they would’ve canceled legendary. That was an amazing show and I wish you could’ve stayed on this platform.
Title: What is the skeptic for the new merger

Content: It doesn’t matter if I’m home watching something on the Wi-Fi or if I’m watching something on my phone with 5G, every few minutes, there’s a buffering issue where the video quality gets blurry OR I get the spinning circle.  It’s unbearable.  I mean, the content is great. Plenty to watch and all of that, but how can I watch a movie where I get a loading circle every few minutes?
Title: Spinning Circle or Blurry Video

Content: When playing a video in full screen on iPad, everything should disappear so you see ONLY the video. In this app, the menu bar, all its icons, battery percentage, the clock, date, etc does not disappear. Nor do the three dots at the top nor does the white line at the bottom of the screen. Very distracting when trying to watch something. Not to mention disappointing — this never happened with the HBO app.
Title: Menu bar, three dots, white line won’t turn off

Content: I like HBO it has a great selection in movies and now even more shows thanks to the merging with discovery. However the issue I have with this app is it doesn’t save my spot at all on shows. I leave off a show and it won’t pick up that I have already watched that episode or save my spot. I wish they could fix.
Title: It still needs some work

Content: The app is great, good titles, simple interface and design yet none of that matters because every movie and tv shows image size are super small, Im not sure if its just not optimized for the 12.9 iPad Pro Im viewing it on but its super small like squint to view small lol almost ruins the whole experience trying to focus rather than watch !
Title: Everything is great besides how you view it

Content: As with thE previous app, the download function is still buggy. I downloaded some videos to watch while traveling. However, the entire set of downloads suddenly disappeared for no reason. Very frustrating.
Title: Downloads still don’t work

Content: PLEASE, fix the download option. It is literally DISAPPEARING from the show or movie once you’ve started the content. If you haven’t clicked the show or movie yet, the option to download is there, but you totally mess yourself up if you watch some and then decide to download. FIX THIS PLEASE. I don’t want to be afraid to start a show at home and not be able to finish it on the go. This is a big issue I would think. Thanks.
Title: Download option gone after starting content

Content: I was a user of HBO max, now I am using Max. I loved HBO max, the graphics in Max is even better, however, I loved having options to shuffle different episodes for TV shows like ‘Friends’, I was very disappointed to see the shuffle option was removed. Are you going to bring back that option? I think it was one of the best features on the original version.
Title: Hi

Content: Before max came and it was just regular HBO max I had this profile pic of Cartman and I thought it was the funniest thing ever but it was actually really dumb. And I want to remove it because I share this account with my family and was like 12 when I set it to that but they took away the South Park pfp options so now I guess it’s rare?
Title: Why did they take away the South Park pfp options

Content: When I turn my phone clockwise to the side to watch, (charging port facing left) Ill receive a message or notification and swipe down to view it, but when I swipe up to resume watching, the portrait will flip upside down.
Title: Only one glitch

Content: For the most part it is good but one thing I don’t understand is why would they change it from hbo max to just max it was super confusing because when me and my mom went to go watch HBO Max one day I was like did they get rid of HBO max cause what is max? But other than this it’s one of my favorite streaming apps
Title: Max is mid

Content: I miss when you were able to make ur own profile pictures and changes the color layout they were ahead of their competition with their customization
Title: Bring back personal profile customization

Content: The content is the same and the UI is familiar, but I personally have developed a habit of pulling down on control center or notification center when i’m in full screen, and in a certain rotation, the screen comes back upside down. Other than that I have seen no other issues.
Title: Good with Quirks

Content: I wish it didn’t continue to play things. Like after 3 episodes of nothing being done to the tv or however it’s being watched, it stops playing. And with movies, it doesn’t play something once the movie is over
Title: Playing time

Content: I just received a email about decreasing my features on the app. I don’t see the justification for this due to the changes in the app. All the show I was watching are all on other platforms. Just like HBO original stuff. Plus the app is really buggy most of the time to the point I had to turn off automatic updates. You can take features but not I’m closer to canceling my subscription.
Title: Plan changes

Content: I tried to download a season of an HBO original show and ran into issues downloading the episodes forcing me to restart a lot of the individual downloads. Once finished, most of the episodes were corrupted about half way through, making them unwatchable. Then once I got to my destination, I couldn’t redownload because HBO isn’t available in that region.   And don’t get me started on the Apple TV app is much should be negative stars.
Title: Useless while traveling abroad

Content: Never had a streaming app this terrible before. No option to skip intro on shows. No preview when trying to fast forward or rewind. And if I leave the app during a show while streaming to my TV, even just to quickly respond to a text, once I go back to the app the episode always starts over. Then I have to guess where I was at since there is no image preview while scrolling through the episode.
Title: Worst streaming app ever

Content: I don’t like sex and the city. They actors and story line and dialogue irritate me. I wish I could delete it from the front page. It’s annoying to see something you don’t like. It makes me want to delete the whole app and save myself $25 per month. The theater is better anyway.
Title: Unable to unsee

Content: I don’t understand what’s happening. I’ll start watching a episode casting through our chromecast if I close my phone and then go to open the app again the show starts all over from the beginning.  I’ve contacted customer service to let them know as well. This last week has been super frustrating with this issue. Please please fix this issue.
Title: Bugs, issues

Content: It’s exactly the same and everything is perfect except that I can’t SharePlay on FaceTime anymore 😭😭😭. I already tried reaching out the app developers and submitted a suggestion. I just hope it gets updated quick so that I can return to watching Steven universe with my friends again.
Title: Why the update???

Content: When watching a video on the apple tv, if you double tap the touchpad, it will bring up the timeline and tell you what time (exactly) the video will end. The max app broke this. You double tap the remote, it jumps forward instead of telling you what time the video will end. It worked on the HBO app, so this must've been an intentional decision to break it. Fix it, and I'll change my rating. Also, the name is dumb.  Stop asking me what profile I want to use every time I launch the apple tv app.   It's me.   It's always me.  Every time I launch the app on this tv, it's me.   Just add an option for a default profile and we'll be good. That way every time I launch the app on a certain device, it'll take me straight to my profile and not ask me who is watching.
Title: Broke apple tv

Content: Previously an HBO Max user - never had any problems. Since it switched over to Max, I get audio descriptions randomly all the time and they won’t go away unless I uninstall and reinstall. Movies will play in Spanish and won’t swap to English unless I uninstall and reinstall. Movies randomly quit casting and then it doesn’t keep my spot in the movie - I have to just guess where I was before it closes out. This’ll be my last month paying for Max. I hate this app.
Title: This app blows

Content: The last 2 updates messed up the app. For example if I go to Abbott Elementary the app just crashes (black screen) so it won’t let me download shows. I can continue to the show I was watching but if I click on the top left back arrow again the app crashes. So there is no way to download a show. The update also deleted all the shows I had already downloaded.
Title: Update issues

Content: Ever since the switch to Max I have nothing but issues with glitches where I cannot fast forward or rewind. It will take me back to an episode I’ve seen already and I have no way of changing it back. It will glitch where you can’t go out of the show screen to look for other shows. I hope they update this app soon because it needs it badly.
Title: Glitching Constantly

Content: This app doesn’t save your progress properly in a series. This is extremely frustrating!! The HBO max app didn’t have this issue! I do not recommend this if you have other streaming options. I have to keep a list of where I leave off, because the app is so far from my actual place. Please fix this, and maybe I’ll fix the stars portion of my review 🤷🏻‍♀️
Title: Does not save your place accurately

Content: This app is the worst. How do you not have a queue on top for the next show in a series someone has been watching? Not even a “recently watched” at all!!! And the search function doesn’t remember either. Pathetic that I have to save a show to a list somewhere to be able to continue watching it. I never write reviews but after multiple nights of searching I was fed up.
Title: Terrible App, Great Content

Content: Movie on AppleTV goes completely dark, I hear the audio, subtitles display but screen is dark. Switched to different WiFi, updated software and same thing, no difference. This is an edit to the original review, after Max sent me an email with a link to their support, once there, its so confusing, service is automated with click after click without identifying my issue, I’m about to give up on this app completely.
Title: Movie is just dark

Content: So much great content removed, no innovation with the user interface, hardly any incentive to invest in watching anything since it would likely be cancelled at a moment’s notice. David Zaslav has ruined an entire company, it’s channels, its movie studio, and it’s streaming service. The only saving grace is the stuff we still have left over before he seized power.
Title: Ruined by corporate bologna

Content: I would like to see improvements in the New Max App. Every time I select the Max app it opens and redirects to a download page, which is tedious because the app is already downloaded. (On Mobile and Smart TV.)  The subscription fee was raised again, which is something else that the developers should look at before launching on platforms.
Title: Official App

Content: I can’t tell you how much I miss the old app (HBO) this has so many cliches it’s ridiculous. Again why did you fix / change the old app when there was nothing wrong with it.  Just to put the name Max on the app? Hmmm
Title: If it’s not broke why fix it

Content: Signs me out every time I exit, and it can’t find my email I used to literally buy a subscription so now I can’t sign in. Like why switch to or make a new service. Tried making me pay for 2 subscriptions
Title: Terrible

Content: If you have already watched a show and want to rewatch it… I don’t recommend doing so on this app. It won’t pop up on your continued watching and if you scroll to find it all the episodes are already watched so you can’t just pick up from where you were. Honestly debating on deleting it. But it’s the only place I can stream my 2 most rewatched shows.
Title: Fix the continue watching issue

Content: Absolute trash app. They intentionally make it as difficult as possible to cancel a subscription. The app of course won’t let you do it. It points you to their website, without actually giving a link. Then when you manually navigate to that website, after painstakingly tapping in the URL character-by-character, it redirects you back to the app. Gross incompetence or disgusting business practice? Either way they do  not deserve your money.
Title: Trash

Content: I think I’ve “replaced” this app no less than 3 times in the last year and a half due to rebranding or changes from AT&T, TW, etc. Not only is it annoying but really messes up downloaded content plus you have to sign back in, it’s all a big PIA and something that should be considered when this is done, especially when it’s only to change the name!!
Title: How many times can one app be changed

Content: Can’t get through a single episode of a show or watch 10 seconds of a movie without constant lagging, buffering, pausing, loading, and glitching. Have the fastest internet speed and have run connectivity tests but it is not my devices or internet at all. It is this horrible app and it has never worked fluidly and smoothly not even once across any device. Terrible terrible streaming app and that’s saying something.
Title: absolute worst streaming app around!!!!

Content: I don’t know who’s idea it was to change such a great legendary name HBO to Max but personally I think it’s the biggest blunder conceivable in the whole history of the entertainment world! To take the #1 media platform Home Box Office that’s been #1 since the early 70s and suddenly rename it Max? Ugh, just beyond dumb! This s my last month due to it all I’ve replaced it already. Sorry.
Title: Bring back HBO

Content: Everyone that did a 1 star complaining that they can’t get into there account is stupid they all forgot there passwords and is now blaming it on the app all of my logins worked perfectly fine haven’t had a single issue
Title: Max

Content: It was a terrible decision on the part of Warner Bros Discovery to use their own video player rather than use the native tvOS player. It’s frustratingly difficult to simply rewind or fast forward content, either in short 10 second bursts or scrub to find a particular spot. In 2023, this is unacceptable, especially when tvOS’ native player is almost perfect. Please switch back to tvOS native player!
Title: Terrible player controls

Content: A complete, straightforward, and updated version of HBO Max! Downloads are working fine! Watchlists all transferred successfully from the previous app.  Hope everyone has a smoother experience than before, free of any bugs and crashes!
Title: Looks good so far!

Content: I love being able to open up my phone an look for all the old movies I didn’t have a  chance to catch up on. I enjoy my subscription an look forward to new movies out  I can enjoy on Max
Title: Max Is Amazing

Content: I understand having a cheaper subscription with ads, but one every 5-10 minutes is ridiculous!  Not only are the frequent, but also absurdly long. On top of that the selection of shows and movies are horrendous. Only thing saving this app now is live sports. Max must be down bad and I hope that it’s competitors leave it in the dust. I wish I could give it zero stars, but the only justification is now they have live sports.
Title: Egregious Ads make me sad.

Content: Absolutely ridiculous that you have to download the app on your phone, even if it's already on your tv, to cancel your subscription. Cannot do anything on the website and bot won't give any cancellation help.
Title: Cancel

Content: Volume goes all the at up to 100 everytime a show starts. Can't get audio narration off, tried everything. Shows often start in different languages. It's hard to watch anything and enjoy it with the audio narration and having to switch languages and turn the volume all the way down everytime a show starts. The 2 stars are for content.
Title: Good content awful app

Content: I hate that you need to pay more for different shows, I wish you could just pay then be done. Also why name it max when it doesn’t have maximum things. Also why change the name to max instead of keeping it HBO-max? Just stop being roblox and adding and deleting unnecessary stuff.
Title: Why fix it if it’s not broken?

Content: like. i can’t cast. can’t turn on subtitles. when it does cast the quality is dookie and gives out after 2 mins. the app on literally every TV i’ve tried won’t even load up; you can only watch stuff via casting from ur phone but that also struggles and struggles and struggles. hbomax was my go to before the “max” launch. now i just wish it would work anywhere other than on my tiny phone
Title: i just want this application to function

Content: We just watched a movie we thought from the description we would like, but ended up NOT liking it at all. Its one of the few things we’ve watched, the first since the rebranding to “Max”. Now it keeps showing “more shows like”!  I don’t want more shows like that.  It seems like a serious design flaw in the whole Max system.  No like/dislike on the Sony/Google TV app or the website either. That’s why the low rating.
Title: No dislike/like option!!!!!

Content: Even though Disney Plus is my number one favorite streaming service, I think Max is a very useful streaming app to watch many shows and movies!   Those include HBO, Adult Swim, Cartoon Network, DC, Discovery, and more.    I really like this streaming service a lot!
Title: Very useful video streaming app!

Content: I got an email from max support saying my login may be disrupted because of multiple emails associated to my account. Try to login and could not.   Sent message to max support who claimed they could not help. Despite subscribing for 20+ years in various iterations of the app and cable providers  - and this company said it was surely a problem with Apple.   Then why did max send me an email and ask me to contact them??  Poor service. Will not resubscribe.
Title: Terrible app and poor service

Content: HBO Max was a lot better than Max.  The functions work, playback well and audio was in sync. Now Max does  the opposite. It’s difficult to search for an episode in a show. The audio is terribly sync. I thought it was my Roku or I restarted it multiple times only to find out it was Max. I’m not the only one with this problem. The only reason I still have max is to finish one show. After that, I’m canceling my subscription.
Title: Don’t fix things that don’t need fixing

Content: When picking up where you left back it’s a minute or so behind where you actually stop watching. Not major but gets annoying. Best shows on our here though for sure
Title: New app feedback

Content: The app doesn’t do a good job of picking up on a show where you leave off. I’ve had to search through episodes to get back to where a was (sometimes it’s minutes off, sometimes it’s a couple of episodes off). Other than that I love it!
Title: It’s alright.

Content: Buffers terribly, and I mean every 7-10 seconds it buffers. Doesn’t matter if the app is up to date, you have a good connection or reinstall the app. Nothing will work! Great job switching over from HBO Max!!
Title: Genuinely one of the worst streaming apps

Content: Still needs some work making it easier to find the classics of each network or franchise but it’s. It’s as if they need a button to see the all time popular rankings of all shows.
Title: So much better than HBO max

Content: Really like the app, it’s smooth, the menu looks good, and there is lots of 4K content to watch.  This said, I’d request the makers of the app to review one issue that users like myself are getting on the Apple TV (don’t know about other platforms).  I can’t get to watch any content in Dolby Vision on my Apple TV. Sure, the image is 4K and sound is Atmos, but there is no DV. (I’m talking about the Ultimate plan that includes 4k content)   Myself and other subscribers will be grateful if the people at Max or the app developers kindly rectify this issue and come up with an update.
Title: Great app, with some tweaking needed (for getting Dolby Vision on Apple TV)

Content: I’ve been trying to get assistance for more than a week. The only choice is to read and answer questions online help. Since I cannot read the very pale script, I am just frustrated that I have no option for phone assistance.  Older adults desire these movie/tv apps-I have several and have not encountered this much difficulty!
Title: Frustrated

Content: Since they have switch to “max” and charged me 18$! I have not been able to watch a full episode of anything without having to wait multiple times for it to load up or completely back out and go back in.. it’s not my internet service bc everything else works fine.. this can easily be the superior streaming service but the price is steep and it lags..
Title: Lagging

Content: Max is similar to the previous app HBO Max, but the way the menus are organized are different and it’s harder to find things.  There used to be a menu under Movies to find the genres, last chance and just added lists, but now you have to scroll through several different categories to find those sections.
Title: Max is Alright

Content: HBO Max with Discovery * Best partnership around. Only thing better than that is Disney with Marvel + National Geographic  But then again you can't compete with the OG's All I have to say is FFF Netflix and their lame wannabe home made shows with dumb actors that want to get payed more than the president for sucking at their jobs Anyone who still has Netflix is because your parents still pay for it and you haven't tried a real streaming program  Quick explanation in case you're wondering, Disney+ has All the Marvel movies HBO Max has All the DC Movies  Binge out

I love that MAX has a lot of the shows I love but when I try to watch it on my phone it doesn’t save where my place is under continue watching    It’s probably user error so correct me if I’m doing something wrong… otherwise this is one of my favorite apps!!!
Title: All the best shows but….

Content: Completely non-functional for me. Why didn’t they just update the old app with the new name and new color, if it was all that important to them? I’ve been fighting with the app for two days now, with zero help from MAX support (if it even exists), and all I get when I try to log in with my provider is “An error occurred! Something went wrong. Please try again.” WB/Discovery are well on their way to destroying the brand that created the very idea of prestige TV.
Title: Why why why

Content: I literally can’t even play a movie or show. The app both on tv and apple iPhone just don’t work! Nothing loads, no titles to click, nothing! The tv app just sits on the setting page and won’t let me navigate anywhere else to view shows/movies. The app just has genre titles but ZERO shows and movies under EVERY genre. There’s nothing on this app. I LOVED hbomax for Studio Ghibli before the app change. Now I’m terminating my service. This is complete trash.
Title: Won’t load any movie at all

Content: This is easily the worst rebranding I have ever seen. It no longer has the HBO brand recognition going do it and purple was a better color since Disney + and prime video already had blue. But you know what, at least this may be a better app, right? No! It literally looks exactly the same as HBO Max. Zaslav, what are you doing?! This guy really has no clue how to run an entertainment company in the 21st century. I swear I could run Warner Bros. Discovery 5x better with no experience in upper level management.
Title: Pointless rebranding

Content: The previous HBO app was so much better than the new MAX app.  The MAX app doesn’t save your spot in whatever you’re watching, so when you try to continue at a later time, it restarts from the beginning. It also does this when you lock your phone screen. If you lock and unlock your phone while in the app, it will restart whatever was playing and not save your spot.  MAX needs to fix this because it makes it super inconvenient to watch anything if you need to pause it or want to stop watching for the time being. I know multiple people who have this issue with the app.  What was the point of making a new app with a major glitch/issue if it is was going to ruin the user experience?
Title: MAX App Needs to be Fixed

Content: This app used to work great, and recently it’s been having some trouble. I will either leave the app, or switch apps, and my show starts completely over or sometimes hops back an episode. Or if I’m out of the app and go back into Max, it does the same thing. Hopefully this is being looked at by developers :)
Title: Glitchy

Content: I have this subscription through my phone carrier (AT&T)......this app USED to be somewhat "good" until they changed the name to MAX!!!! When it was the HBO app I rarely had to re-sign in due to updates or whatever would log it out. Now, with this garbage app, I have to go through the sign in process through my carrier and the Max app almost every single time it updates or I decide to use it. This happens on my iPhone AND on my TV both! So so so so so so so so ANNOYING!!!!
Title: So annoying!!!!

Content: The Max app randomly logged me out one day while i was at school and every time i try to log back in it takes forever. and with the app, i don’t like the way it’s set up, i feel as if it should be more organized and helpful to find what the person is looking for.  please fix these issues
Title: log in and app

Content: Enjoy the selection of the new and old. Easily able to navigate menu options. Definitely a deal for the selection available. Hope you enjoy as much as I have.
Title: Bang for my buck

Content: Auto play in Picture in Picture mode doesn’t work. Each time an episode is over I have to manually go back in the app to press play. This happens on my iPad and iPhone. Can this be fixed in the next update pleaseeee??
Title: Picture in Picture doesn’t work

Content: I’m not a fan of this so called update. I LOVED HBO Max! I DO NOT like Max so far. It constantly logs me out. It doesn’t matter if it’s my TV, phone, or game consoles (PlayStation/Xbox). It does it on all of them. I never had any issues like this before and it’s frustrating. I figured these bugs would be fixed by now but it’s still aggravating. Also in agreement with others, the setup and the loss of features is disappointing. The app is not better as promoted; its worse.
Title: Log Out Issues!

Content: AMAZING CATEGORIES there’s allot of good movies and it’s very organize nice opening etc. it’s a good way to find what you need to watch and how to watch has a LOT of languages to choose from the subtitles are not in the way nor to big or small it’s probably the most useful streaming app in my opinion. ;))))
Title: YES YES YES MAXX

Content: Might be the worst streaming app I’ve ever seen. Old HBOMax was good. Literally told me my password didn’t meet the requirements (was too short), but it was the saved HBOMax password that they told me to use. Keeps making me re download it, crashes, didn’t save more than half of my continue watching or saved Queue. It’s bad enough that as soon as we finish the show we’ve been watching, we will probably delete it amd unsubscribe.
Title: Should have tested before they released

Content: As much as I love having access to so much more content it’s annoying when none of the things I’ve started watching since this transition show up on my “continue watching” section, or that it won’t let me continue on the last episode I watched. It automatically tells me to restart at episode 1 even when I’m already on season 3, episode 6.
Title: So annoyed it compelled me to write my 1st review

Content: Really enjoying the amount of content!  Lots to choose fro with this rollout. Always concerned when it was being reported that shows and movies were being pulled. Not anymore!  Lots to choose from for the summer and beyond!
Title: Great Content

Content: For whatever reason since the merge, my continue watching never saves. So I have to remember what season & episode im on and manually select. I understand this is a total first world problem, but I’m spending money every month on the app that also recently started having ads.. I love that discovery and HBO came together to make the ultimate streaming app, but unfortunately there are still some kinks, all of this does discourage me from continuing to use the service
Title: The app lags

Content: As if I didn’t have enough subscriptions! I was worried about if I would have to pay for another platform to screen the Discovery of Witches and here we are! They have added it onto Max and I couldn’t be happier! 🥹
Title: No way!

Content: I had no trouble last night going onto HBO Max to then redirect me to download Max. It auto-logged me into my AT&T account on the new app so I immediately start downloading some shows for a flight. Morning of flight, I check Max app and I'm logged out. My login credentials are accurate but it says I have no existing account through my phone provider? What an inconvenience.
Title: Force logout, can't log back on with correct login info

Content: Looks great as before, but just wish with the new app you would have improved some stuff. Really wish when I clicked a title it didn’t resume the show automatically. I wish it went to the bio of the show or movie first. Other then that love it.
Title: Same app new look.

Content: The new Max app is a step backwards.   Maybe two steps.   The app has a hard time remembering exactly where you stopped playing a show when you return, a frustrating step backward.   The app doesn’t feel  as responsive as the old HBO Max app but that could be me.  I would give it me star but they did add the time remaining to the video player and that was needed.   And it seems to work.
Title: This is an upgrade?

Content: I have used HBO max for years and not had any problems going from my TV provider to my phone or iPad. Of course, now that they’ve changed the name they made you download a new app which constantly gives me an error message. Please think these things through before you change your system, very disappointed. Now, despite being ridiculous monthly fees through my cable provider, I cannot access the app anywhere.
Title: Crappy Transition

Content: Very disappointed with the new TVOS app that has been released. The lack of Apple’s native video player is one of many problems including the app not syncing with Up Next and not abiding by system wide settings with closed caption. Huge disappointment.   Equally disappointing is that we were misled to believe that all Discovery+ shows would be added to this platform and that does not appear to be the case with many shows missing.
Title: Break in functionality

Content: I primarily stream HBO from my phone to Sony Android’s built in chromeCast. Previous iterations of the HBO app worked fine; however, now with the new Max app, when starting a video, the volume defaults to max on the tv. so I have to play the game of lowering the volume fast enough before it wakes up my entire household, or trying to pause it before it makes a noise so that I can lower the volume. No other app has this issue with the ChromeCast software.
Title: Chromecast functionality bugged

Content: I have been an HBO subscriber for over 15 years, and the content is undeniably top tier in comparison to other streaming services.  Before they killed the old app, I used SharePlay every day to watch shows and movies with my friends. Since they switched the app to just “Max” they completely killed the SharePlay feature, and even worse, now advertise it as working when it absolutely does not. Please add this essential feature back to this app.
Title: NO SHAREPLAY. Great Content. Horrible App

Content: With HBO Max app I used to cast and had no issues except slow response. However, since Max took over everytime I cast I have issues using controls. For example- when I am casting a season and automatically the new episodes start playing, however, when I unlock the iPhone it will play from the first episode I started casting from. Also, sometimes an episode will start over if I return to the app while casting.
Title: Casting is a pain

Content: GOAT of the streaming apps hands down nothing else to say keep doing a great job with variety maybe we could work on adding more movies an tv series but overall on of the better ones out there.
Title: Review

Content: I’ve had HBO max or max for at least 2 years now and it’s the best services I’ve gotten constant new things to watch new movies to see and I love how dc movies come out on max as well, plus their amazing collection of HBO max originals. Also have to say if they have live sports NFL,MLB, and NBA they will never lose my subscription.
Title: Love it

Content: I like the app, it gives me all the shows I watch. My biggest issue is when I stream it to the tv it puts max volume every time I change the show. This is really a big issue when I stream at night and it wakes the kids. Would be 5 stars if they could figure that out.
Title: Like the app but has one big issue

Content: Needs to add a already watched button so my continue watching and recommendations gets updated. Also if I watched an episode or movie  offline it should update when I go back online. Other than that app works great
Title: Better performance but…

Content: Connectivity to log in is terrible. It logs you out of the platform every time you close it, then it won’t remember your password or provider. It will take you 10 minutes to troubleshoot and get “did not recognize provider” message several times until it will log you in. Seems like a ploy to trick people into renewing their subscription unnecessarily. I don’t even want to watch HBO anymore because of this app.
Title: Go back to HBOmax

Content: It should have different languages for series. For example in Cartoon Network there’s not a single cartoon in another language. I don’t know if there’s a specific reason for that but I would love to watch it in Spanish for example. But overall it’s good.
Title: Different languages

Content: Sure, I’m being asked to give a review, however I genuinely think that max has a great variety of movies and shows. Especially when it comes to adult animation and various sci fi and dystopian flicks. If you’re a fan of that. Will definitely keep subbing
Title: Hey

Content: I’m only giving 3 stars because the app performance has gone down. You never know where the program will pick up after pausing it. It’s frustrating. There is a pause option for a reason, right? You want to pick up where you left off. Not to mention other glitches.
Title: 3 out 5 Stars

Content: Great options but could do better with other movies in the same franchise. Like you have Taken 3 but not 1 or 2. Or even more original shows like West World. It’s and HBO show but not available to watch here.
Title: Great options

Content: Love the options for shows to watch. I like that they are always updating and adding relevant and entertaining content. Well worth the money especially compared to other streaming services.
Title: Max stream

Content: It’s great to have so many channels to see and to be able to re- watch sows from my favorite ones especially Anthony Bourdain I just love to see him I truly believe he will  go down in history as one of the best chefs in history ❤️‍🔥
Title: My view

Content: I got hbo before it turned into max and I loved it my fiancé and I watched on it all the time, since it has turned to max we can’t get through 5 minutes of an episode of any show without it freezing indefinitely. We have to completely exit out and re open it to get it to work again
Title: Frustrating

Content: I keep selecting episodes I have already watched and this app starts the episode with 1 second left then starts the following episode. I can't rewatch things easily and I haven't always had this problem until this new app. Also please bring back the shuffle option it was great!!
Title: Fine but rewatching is aggravating

Content: me and my family re-subscribed to it and it keeps on saying to renew it and the way we can watch it is there like searching up the movie on the fire stick please fix this it’s very hard to watch stuff
Title: Y

Content: It did the same thing with HBO MAX. same issues, new app. I don’t have wifi at home so I rely on downloading movies and shows to watch when I am home. I can’t download more then 2 episodes of a show without it saying I’ve hit my download limit. Like this app cost so much money!??! I don’t have this problem with any other platforms expect the one that cost the most. Fix this.
Title: No download space?

Content: Has so many choices has old schools Cartoon Network all the shows that I grew up with it has 90 day fiancé, of course, as well as the DC universe and it just has so much to offer outside of that. This is definitely an investment worthwhile.
Title: Great Selection

Content: This app has so many glitches since the switch. Shows don’t show up in continue watching and they don’t mark the time in the episode that you cut it off last. Crashes randomly. Episodes aren’t even in order for some shows.  Update after developer response: developer response wants me to go to troubleshoot their own faulty app. No thanks. I shouldn’t have to troubleshoot basic app functionality.
Title: Terrible since the switch

Content: Please allow offline access. I was on a flight ready to watch a movie but the app would not open past a blank blue screen while offline.  EDIT: Developer, Thanks your response but please re-read my feedback as it is very accurate to what the issue. Have you tested on your end before replying?
Title: Offline Access

Content: HBO max wasn’t a good app but at least it had basic functionality intact. Unfortunately they have that up and for some reason replaced it with an absolute garbage app incapable of things like pause and rewind.
Title: Worse than the app it replaced

Content: I’ve only really ran into one issue.  If I watch more than one episode, on any device, it does keep track or place the show in the continue watching.  Kinda is a pain finding where I was and getting to the spot I stopped.   Please fix this issue.
Title: Pretty decent app

Content: Constant crashes, audio glitches, random fast forwarding and the shows I start watching don’t stay in my continue watching list. Everything was fine until they change it to Max
Title: Less words, worse ap

Content: Audio is audio is very clear in the actual content I’m watching. Audio is bad specifically on ads, very muffled. I know it’s not my device because this muffled audio experience is the same regardless of the device I use to watch. I hope future updates have a fix because this is not good for my experience.
Title: Audio is bad

Content: I can’t even use the app. It keeps telling me an error occurred. Please try again, no matter how many times I tried to troubleshoot it or delete the app and re-download it I don’t know if it was something I did or if it’s just something wrong with the app itself. I’m very sad because I actually love HBO max but I can’t seem to do anything with this new app, I hope the issue gets fixed soon because I was really looking forward to this new app.
Title: Max review

Content: I loved hbo max and although I don’t have a huge issue with it being changed to max, it’s a pain to use especially on firetv. It randomly kicks me out of the app into the homepage and the layout is not the best to manage around. It’s just glitchy so I would love it if it was fixed. I love the shows tho just wish it was easier to use
Title: Whyyyy

Content: Ever since they change the app and merged with everything else there has been no continue watching feature so every time I wanna try to watch the show I have to go to search search search for it find the show and then try to remember which season episode I was on and then how far I was into it how hard is it to have a continue watching feature every single other app has one you need to fix it
Title: Horrible so far

Content: So you take away the definitive regal purple color and opt for the exact same blue as every other streaming app? I guess that matches what you’ve done to the content. HBO was an iconic,Long-standing, watershed filmmaker’s pinnacle, with top-tier ultimately superior quality content. Now it’s a low brow, discovery channel\lifetime\Hallmark movie-of-the-week debacle. Congratulations. You have turned a three-star Michelin restaurant experience into a fast food takeout joint just off the Jersey turnpike.
Title: Who’s the gEniUz behind this appalling turn of events?

Content: Literally just got my HBO max subscription less than two weeks ago now this is out and it wants me to renew my subscription after I just bought it. No thank you I think not.
Title: Wants me to renew my subscription after I just bought HBO

Content: I was so excited for this launch that combined hbo and discovery but ended up being so disappointed! The first day there was a lot of issues opening the app. When it finally opened, it does not save my show in the continue to watch section. Had to keep searching for the show and find which episode I was on. So annoying! I am still having that issue.
Title: Disappointed

Content: I sat on getting this for so long, but I shouldn’t have. So many great shows to watch, app runs great on all my devices, can download stuff without paying double for a single account. Just perfect. Please don’t change HBO max.

Such a downgrade from the HBO Max app.  The Just Added and Last Chance sections are half of what they used to be as you can only see a select number of shows and movies. Desperately needs a “see all” option or just go back to how it used to be. Also why remove the dates for when something is leaving the app?
Title: Downgrade

Content: I have a hard time using this app and it always restarts the movies. If we’re watching some thing and you can get back to where you were at you can change the settings for sub titles language. It’s just a terrible app whoever redid it just did a terrible work on it and needs to be revamped or read. I don’t know it needs a lot of work.
Title: This app needs tons of work

Content: Military dude here, HBO MAX really is the only thing that gets me through duty. I can confidently say better than those terrible Netflix series and what they have to offer. Better movie and show selection 10/10 best 15 bucks I’ve spent.
Title: Amazing

Content: Love I can find some of the movies that I can’t find in other platforms. And that I don’t have to purchase them or rent them. Since they come with the subscription at no cost. And can watch them any time.
Title: Satisfied

Content: Compared to all the other apps it’s got the most content for me. Adult swim, Harry Potter, and South Park. Plus some of their original content is good and they get some good movies put up randomly. Not really worth the price but neither is any streaming app currently, they’re all as bad as cable used to be now.
Title: It’s fine

Content: If you’re casting from the app to your TV and need to pause, my advice is to take note of how many minutes in you are because once you hit the pause button, the show will start over from the beginning every time. It’s super frustrating and it takes a bit to find where you were. Fix it please.
Title: Fine unless you want to pause

Content: The app does not remember sign on information and requires the user to logon to the app every few days.  What a hassle!  Also, app freezes frequently.  Have had issues with screen going blank in the app randomly too. Have had to delete and reinstall app a few times, which seems to help with the above issues.
Title: MAX App freezes and requires frequent sign on

Content: Love the shows and movies offered but on my TV, when I select a show, I get an error message repeatedly. Not on my IPad, only on TV. I’ve done all the troubleshooting but still get the error message.
Title: Glitchy problems

Content: Other streaming services have movies but not always the ones your looking for. Max has current hits. Past hits, and plus old hit television shows. Highly recommend this streaming service
Title: Great app

Content: The service should be called HBO, not MAX .. HBO created many great movies & programs with almost innumerable Emmy awards .. MAX? Not so much .. but what is worse is you don’t have a ‘timer’ .. I’ve used nearly all my data for the month unaware that MAX just keeps going until you turn it off .. you would do well to follow Prime Video’s example in this matter.
Title: HBO

Content: I firmly believe this app is some sort of black ops government test designed to test the limits of human patience. About 2-3 times a day, the max app says that my subscription has expired (max is included with AT&T subscription so literally can’t expire unless I switch phone providers) and requires a painstaking process to get working again. Honestly, I’d prefer the feds just come to my house and rip my boxers off to get there rocks off as opposed to work with Max dev team.
Title: App or government test

Content: The controls act weird on Apple TV. Also, you can’t use Siri to turn captions on and off. Why not just stick with the standard interface? Also, it seems weird that you can’t customize your profile photo. This isn’t really a performance comment, but rebranding to MAX was a terrible idea.
Title: Seems really basic

Content: So this app is great the one problem is more of an opinion when u fast forward it only fast forward u 10 seconds so if u need to get to the end of a episode or movie it can take a while but besides that THIS APP IS GREAT
Title: GREAT besides one problem

Content: Honestly max is probably the best app to watch shows on. But I just have 2 questions. Why did you guys change it to max. What happened to creed 1 and creed 2? But besides that I love it so so much it’s awesome. And I love boondocks, smiling friends, and stepbrothers. Those are my favorites.
Title: It’s Awesome!

Content: I dislike the new Max app. Every time I start browsing for something to watch, within about a minute or so, the app inexplicably auto scrolls all the way back to the top of the list. I have to pray I find something before I get booted back to the top of the menu. Infuriating. I’m using Max on the Apple TV. I also dislike how you removed the quick access sidebar that the original app had and placed much of this on top.
Title: Much worse than original HBOmax app

Content: Launching a new app with less usability just to drop three letters from the service name is baffling. There is no ‘Just Added’ under the Movie categories anymore. Under Series there is no ‘News’ category either - so is John Oliver not available anymore? Nor can I view the content library from TCM or DC - it is all mashed together. Did the UX designers think we’d use search? With a TV remote? Bring back HBO Max app.
Title: HBO Max App had better UI

Content: Just keeps crashing over and over again. Also it’s annoying that the screen automatically flips to horizontal view and I have to exit out to get my phone right side up. Can’t select an episode from a menu and can’t start beginning of a rewatched show without having to scramble to pull the bar back to get to the beginning without it automatically jumping to the next episode. Fix it!
Title: Won’t cast to chromecast

Content: HBO max was perfect already you don’t need to try and improve it  Sure it has never movies and shows HBO didn’t have  But some of the best shows are now not available anymore  Please change it back to HBO max
Title: Change it back

Content: The new Max app has an issue. On iPad Pro, when you watch a program, the three dots are on the top middle and the large white line is on the bottom. It should be black up top and down below. Fix it.
Title: Problem that it shows the three dots up top and line on bottom

Content: The HBO Max app ran nearly perfectly. Now, I have to re-select subtitles each time I watch a different show. Likewise, the stream stutters when a commercial break begins and ends, even on shows with no commercial breaks like Succession. This makes me think that the company is planning on introducing commercials to these once-premium shows in order to generate further revenue. A smart business decision that results in a frustrating customer experience.
Title: A Tough Adjustment

Content: I’ve had nothing but issues with this app. When i want to watch old episodes i literally have to click on the previous episode and wait until it plays the next one. The skip to next episode feature is in the way and i can’t even rewind if i want to rewatch the same episode. Bring back the old app, i never had any issues with that one
Title: Sucky app

Content: I personally loved hbo max but now that it’s max, it isn’t the same. I was trying to watch friends( personally my favorite show that’s streamed on there.) everything i try to click a specific episode it just loads forever and then sits on a dark black screen. i don’t know if it’s a lag/glitch. But whatever it is it’s ruining my experience with this “new and improved” app.
Title: works horribly on my xbox

Content: From 30+ years of original blockbusters & exclusives to a sea of reality barf swamp. Only keeping atm to finish hbo originals I have yet to watch but don’t expect anything new or beyond what’s greenlit. Will cancel when I’m caught up. The death of home box office, their household name recognition and their high bar for quality retired for mindless reality tv, a few streaming movie exclusives and probably ads in the near future. RIP HBO
Title: The death of quality entertainment RIP HBO

Content: The new MAX app doesn’t allow a show to be in the continue watching section if you have watched the series previously.  This means I have to search for it every time I want to watch and remember what episode I’m on.   I would like to see it go back to the old way of operating and allow my fully watched shows to continue on in my continue watching.
Title: Continue watching

Content: Sign in on the iPad was easy and seamless. That’s a plus. But as others have noted the actual functionality is somehow worse than HBO Max. The most obvious one is the lack of full screen support which is basic on a tablet nowadays. That a new app is a step backwards is baffling and disappointing. If they were so desperate to change the name just do that and leave well enough alone.
Title: Worse than the predecessor

Content: I Kind Of Feel That Discovery+ And HBO Max Where Better Separate Because Discovery Had Content From HGTV, Food Network, The Hub Or Discovery Family And HBO Had Content From DC, Cinemax, HBO, Cartoon Network, Adult Swim, And Turner Movie Classics, But Now That The 2 Have Merged, Movies Like The Amazing Spider-Man, The Incredible Hulk, And Deadpool That Were On HBO And Cinemax Respectively Have Subsequently Been Removed From The Streaming Platform.
Title: My Review

Content: Crashes less than HBO max app, also casts to Apple TV and chrome cast more seamlessly Weird though that this is the Third entirely new and separate app? HBO Go, HBO Max and now Max? Um…. What?  So confusing and so pointless? Also What about Cinemax?   Hey HBO did you know you can update apps? You don’t have to change the whole app every time…
Title: Max app is less wonky

Content: I hate to nitpick, but on my iPad those three little dots at the top of the screen (for split screen options) won’t go away like they do basically in every other app. The bar at the bottom of the screen won’t go away either. Incredibly distracting and basically ruins the viewing experience for me. How on earth did that make it past the developers?
Title: Surprised at the basic design flaws

Content: I absolutely hate that there are so many options for stuff to watch. From cartoons to horror, you can find almost everything you need. Keep up the great work MAX!
Title: To many options

Content: When I open up the app, the covers of the shows and their titles don’t show up. I think it’s just a bug but it will be better if it gets fixed
Title: Good, but one small thing

Content: Max is great for viewing movies and shows but recently I haven’t been able to see any movie or shows on my phone or tablet because every time i open the app any page just shows blank boxes so I never now what I can watch. No titles or images. I have to blindly choose something. Its very agitating.
Title: Good but not Great

Content: Searching for new related content or even having them suggested is not easy to come by. Seems very limited when searching even though I know HBO has a lot that I’ve always wanted to see
Title: Like most. Kinda hard finding new things

Content: The title says it all. Crime show binge watchers will love this app. It has shows that I haven’t seen on other apps (See No Evil, Evil Lives Here) and stuff. Cops shows like Dashcam or whatever it’s called. Movies could be better. But yea. It comes free with my phone service, so yup.
Title: Best App for Crime Show Junkies

Content: Whenever I try to watch a show that’s recently been released the program freezes. Either during the promos before the episode or during the recap. Very annoying. I have to restart my AppleTV. Navigate all the way back to the episode and try again. First started doing it during HoD, did it during TLOU, and now it’s doing it during The Gilded Age. Get it together HBO.
Title: Keeps Freezing

Content: I wish that HBO Max or Max had limited downloads but because it doesn’t it tells you to delete some of downloads that you have. I wish they could put a patch for this so a lot of people could watch the shows on the go or on vacation does not have Wi-Fi access.
Title: It’s not have unlimited downloads for Hago watching

Content: It has a lot of shows and movies I enjoy, but there are some problems, with my version at least, like downloads not showing up and other things. I paid extra for downloads, you think it would work right a way.
Title: I like the some of the content, but buggy

Content: Same as every other tv app, but I find it super annoying that I need two different logins if I am logging in through my tv provider. Just log in with my provider and that should automatically be my account like it used to. And it constantly logs me out.
Title: Kind of annoying that I have to sign in twice

Content: What a streaming service since it rebirth from HBO MAX! You would never have thought that HBO, CNN, DISCOVERY and FOOD NETWORK would be in the same family together, but they are! I just wished that  the entire DISCOVERY+ were folded in the mix as well. Otherwise I am so impressed!
Title: MAX RULES!!!

Content: 1. It has all my favorite tv shows and movies and even some I didn’t even know I wanted to watch 2. The UI is super simple and easy to navigate 3. It’s just an all around great redesign from the original hbomax
Title: Why this app is great

Content: This app is far slower to load than any of the other apps on my phone and insanely sensitive to the internet connection. This thing freezes every 20-30 seconds, when I have no issue streaming anywhere else. I had heard about this issue but hadn’t experienced it until now. The content is pretty good, but the functionality is poor.
Title: Slow…

Content: Why can’t I dislike or hide certain genres or series?? I’m not interested in woke sex in the city, stop putting it in my face. Let me block the show and series like it and actually view content I’m ACTUALLY interested in…
Title: Forced to see…

Content: This used to be a really good streamer with great titles, but the platform needed a little more stability to bump it up to the best streamer. Now it’s ruined and overrun with Discovery channel brain rot, and there are rarely any new HBO Max titles added to the rotation. The demographics for HBO and Discovery channel do not often intersect which is why this is so unacceptable. It is truly the dumbest decision ever, and I’m only keeping my subscription for now because I’m grandfathered in.
Title: Ruined

Content: I subscribe to MAX because it’s the only paying sites where you can choose old pictures at TCM. But the movie selection it’s not huge at should be, mostly the cost of those pictures for MAX it’s quite low compare with the new ones. You must extend your broad selection of old movies, mainly pictures between 1945 to  2000.   Regards   Max S. Appel
Title: NOT WHAT YOU EXPECT!!!

Content: I love the movies and shows. My only complain is how often it has to buffer. Every time it happens I have to exit the show or movie and select it again so it will continue playing.
Title: Great collection

Content: The app is good and definitely is an improvement from HBO Max. But it still does not play dolby Atmos quality. The movies and shows are very good, but how about adding classic TV shows like tales from the crypt, I'm sure a lot of people would like that.
Title: not bad

Content: This app much more smooth compared to the last iteration. One big issue I m facing is that resume function does not work , it start the episode from the beginning. Discovery, TLC, Ghibli, etc should be more easy to find. Give them their own quick select tab at the top of the screen. Add ratings to content.
Title: Upgrade over HBO max app

Content: I never really had issues when it was hbo max, but I am now. It won’t hold my place if I stop in the middle of a show and there is some other functionality stuff that makes it kind of annoying to use. Overall not the worst, but it needs to updates to be worth it to me.
Title: Needs some help

Content: So I know a lot of people have talked about having to get a whole new app so I won’t go into that but I have a had and issue with the app logging me out every week or so and then it takes my dad forever to get a chance to do the tedious process of logging in again. It’s just really frustrating.
Title: Log in issue

Content: I believe the application could use a similar design to HBO max the change feels dry and died from what it originally stood for. Meaning the reputation the history the nostalgia all missing from this design and layout even the black and white effect from when HBO started is gone now it feels again as i mentioned lifeless.
Title: I like the old logo and set up

Content: You search a movie it will show main characters movies that they play in like an Adam Sandler I didn’t even know click was on max but I was trying to find smt and found click
Title: Easy to find stuff

Content: I think the new app is fine and all but (I really don’t know how to describe it) when I watch a movie or episode and want to check the time or just change the lighting on my phone the screen orientation always wants to rotate and it’s getting on my nerves 😐(really the only reason i give it 2 stars I’m just really annoyed 😒) so I just don’t know if it just my iPhone or what
Title: Is it a me problem?⭐️⭐️

Content: Very annoyed with this new app…. Why do none of the shows i have been watching show up in continue watching? And when I do search the show it just shows s1e1 and I have to go through and find the exact episode i was on. Super annoying because once I’ve started watching a show it’s nice to easily pull it up! No one likes having to type on a tv….
Title: Annoying

Content: I love most of the content on Max. Plenty of options to choose from, and most of what I find to be good cinema/television can only be found on this platform. HOWEVER…it would be 5 stars, and hopefully someday will be, if I’m able to make some snacks, pour an iced cold soda, and watch David Ayer’s Suicide Squad. Maybe someday….
Title: It would be 5 stars…

Content: hbo max is my favorite streaming service but the new app is buggy. I try to forward 10 seconds and it won’t work unless I click twice. And my continue watching section doesn’t loads the last thing I watched. Other than that max is still my favorite place to stream
Title: New app has some bugs

Content: While I could load up and watch just about anything without issues on the old HBO max app, the ‘new and improved’ Max crashes on me every 5-10 seconds not allowing me to even view the materials I subscribed for in the first place. Start an episode and seconds into the ad it will crash and say ‘error please try again’ what am I paying you for if not a functional streaming service?
Title: Original app worked just fine

Content: Quick load times are about the only improvement on this app. Skip ahead plays a tone? UI is “slippery” and makes landing on a target difficult, keep flaying past it. Nice to have a HBO specific tab since it’s the only thing I care about. The need for DL a new app was just dumb. Could a rebrand have not just overwrote the old?  What is absolutely inexcusable is the failure to use Apple TV playback engine/controls?!  Didn’t we already live this mistake ?!
Title: Faster but terrible

Content: I’m paying for this app. I got a brand new tv and guess what, it doesn’t support this new “max” stuff. I can’t even use it on my old TV either, so I’m  basically just waisting my money cause my family loves to watch it and thats the only reason i was paying for it. HBO was literally fine and I loved everything about it, even the color. Now it looks like a wannabe HBO and you guys just made it complicated to login, change password, etc, etc.
Title: Terrible

Content: I was able to sign in and continue where I left off, I can continue to watch regular show, anyone that’s having problems, try to sign in again it could work
Title: Pretty good

Content: Honestly the UI changes are really nice the app seems smoother and slightly more responsive than the other app the skip ahead button is slightly delayed but it’s literally day 1 so I expect it to improve!! Keep it up MAX
Title: UI changes

Content: I love Max, but I feel it’s been for a while a little too inclusive. Equal representation is great and should be everywhere as long as it fits but it seems Max is pushing it to the max for lack of a better word
Title: Great app but not without its problems

Content: I’m not sure if anyone else is having this issue where it’s like the words they and sound affects aren’t lining up with what the actor is saying or doing. Only reason I give it 3 is because of that and it being a massive pet peeve. And the odd thing is it only started occurring after the last update…
Title: Good but time glitches

Content: Like I said the app works well. Great content, free through ATT. But can we get a share button to share content with the homies, instead of telling them to peep X content on the Max app.  They won’t.  They’re lazy 😒
Title: Great app! But can we get a share button

Content: The app used to work so well. Then I’m not sure what happened with every update making the app worse and worse.   I watch a movie, and when I open my phone (normally to the app) the entire movie will hard reset and restart the movie. Losing my spot. Very frustrating.
Title: Updates that break the app

Content: I luv this app because I love watching coraline it’s my fav movie I luv watching the cartoons there really I recommend this app to others because on Netflix u can’t even watch coraline like can u believe they removed power rangers there is many but they deleted my favorite so this is why I like the app. Sincerely yours,
Title: AMAZING APP!

Content: Since last update shows restart from beginning, the app stopped keeping track of episodes of shows I have watched, and it still doesn’t follow my choice in app settings to not auto play the next episode. New UI is also more cluttered, making it difficult to find things quickly.
Title: Functionality Issues

Content: Every time I connect this app to my chrome cast it automatically has the audio description and it doesn’t give you the option to disable it. Now, whenever I’m watching a show connected to my chrome cast, it restarts the whole episode to a previous episode I wasnt even on! This app is the worse app with constant problems and glitches. Y’all have so much money but fail to correct anything.
Title: Consistent problems

Content: Whenever I open and play and come back  into the app to fast forward or do any operation, the movie plays again from beginning or few seasons before episode which it marked as I completed though I watched couple seasons after that.
Title: The app crashes and doesn’t work properly

Content: I have never had it crash or not work. I had one issue with a movie and reached out and they tried to fix it.   It could be better if they added the next new episode date to the shows they post.
Title: Overall good

Content: I’m really enjoying Max. The programming available is vast and  I haven’t had problems setting up my account across multiple devices (which has been a headache with some other popular apps). So far, so great!
Title: Great App

Content: Pleassseee bring back the shuffle option you used to have on the HBOMax app!!! That went away when you did this new app thing and I love to watch friends at night on shuffle!!   BRING BACK THE SHUFFLE!!   but other than that it’s an amazing app!
Title: BRING BACK SHUFFLE

Content: As I said, I can’t figure out how to put the app on my Apple box so I have to go through my iPad every time I use it. It’s a bit of a pain in the neck.I want to cancel and be refunded
Title: I can’t figure out how to put the app on my Apple box

Content: MAX is #1 all my favorite tv shows and movies are in one place who needs cable tv my smart tv has the local channels for local news built in and the technology will get even better so max it up because there awesome
Title: Love max

Content: Liking it so far. Would really really love a dislike , like , love features. If I could clear out a lot of the content I don’t like, it would be easier to find things not only I do like but are in the mood for.  Multiple playlist features would rock to.
Title: Max review

Content: I recently stop using this app and deleted my account back in May on this year, I received a email from HBO max corp showing my account was deleted. Couple days ago, I knows I was charged twice for $17 and some change for this HBO max  which my email doesn’t  work to login in. Please be aware that if you close or delete your account to watch your bank account.
Title: Beware of unknown charges that HBO MAX will take out after closing your account.

Content: This new app is quite glitchy with Apple TV. It constantly goes to a dark screen for a couple of seconds while refreshing or something. While scrolling left/right, it regularly jumps two tiles over. While scrolling up/down, it slows down and speeds up the scroll pace. The layout of content is no better than before. It’s all annoying enough to just say why bother? Honestly, why the new app at all?
Title: New app glitches

Content: Offline downloads are really low quality and you can’t skip the intro in downloaded content, which you could in the old app and the HBOmax app use to have the best offline quality of all the streaming apps. Lots of old season of HBO shows are now gone. The recommended algorithm is horrendous, why do I keep getting recommended kids TV shows when I have never watched one or have kids.  Bring back the old HBOmax app!!!
Title: Rubbish compared to the HBOmax app

Content: i’m not going to lie, hbo max seemed perfect to me. the change in app and in provider as is seems completely unnecessary to me and every time i try to log in to the now new max with my email and password it doesn’t even let me. the change in aesthetic and color is also quite upsetting as it was really nice and pleasing during the hbo max phase, now max just seems dull and boring. i’ve also heard about the change of features inside the app and i don’t understand the need to also change something that worked even better before, there was no ‘fix’ needed. it’s quite disappointing that i can’t even use this to watch anything anymore because it just doesn’t even seem to work.
Title: cant even open max
