Content: Max has made something more exciting than hbo max did 3 years ago during the pandemic. I hope it does more shows and brings back movies and shows that we’re canceled.
Title: Max is the next steaming service

Content: I use to use HBO max and absolutely loved the variety of shows and movies that were available. Don’t get me wrong max still has the great variety but I’m not getting what I pay for. I pay for the package with no ads but for some reason since the switch I have to sit through ads. If I wanted to see them I would pay for the cheaper package. I don’t know what the deal is but I just want to watch my shows in ad free peace.
Title: Why am I seeing ads???

Content: When I am watching on my phone horizontally if I use my drag down menu to change settings on my phone it will flip the picture upside down.  This wasn’t an issue with the old hbo app so I assume it will be patchable. Hope to see it fixed, otherwise performance of the new app is good.
Title: Needs bug fix for iOS

Content: I thought that since they changed the entire app it would at least work this time. HBOMAX worked on my laptop no problem but MAX doesn’t even launch at all. whenever i click it it’ll make my computer glitchy and then send me back to my home screen.
Title: doesn’t work on laptop

Content: So before you couldn’t leave the app and continue the shows! Now you can!! Which was the main reason why I wasn’t using the previous app.
Title: Way better than it’s predecessor

Content: Every now and then the show in currently watching will be taken out of my continue watching cue, leading to have to look it up and remember what episode I was on. Also, load times can take a while. Other than that good streaming app.
Title: Some bugs

Content: Love the new controls and organization however I think the networks or categories should be on too that way if I’m looking for something I can access it quicker other than that excellent app
Title: Love the new app

Content: I’ve been rewatching South Park on Max on my Roku, but if I exit the app and go back in it’s not in the que of continued watching. I have to search for it, then it starts playing Season 1 episode 2 every time. All other titles I’ve watched are in the continent watching. So confusing  I’m still experiencing this issue. I tried to use the “contact us” option on the website but it lags and only gives me the same generic answer. Like what even is this???
Title: How to get help?

Content: The first time you have a problem is if you’re going through something and you’re trying something and you’re going to get a
Title: The only way

Content: It’s almost like this app downgraded in functionality. It doesn’t function well on my phone like it used to. It gets stuck on a show I’m watching and won’t let me go back to the main menu, fast forward, pause, etc. I have to restart the app all over again. BOOO, tomato, tomato
Title: Poor Functionality

Content: It has been a while since it switch from HBO Max app to this. Horrible, it’s not getting better. I used Google chrome cast, and there are tons of bugs on this app.  1. Spanish audio track even selected English 2. Read out transcription of the show can’t be turn off. So annoying it just ruined the show experience.  3. Ads breaking the screaming, start the video from beginning every time after the Ad
Title: Horrible app

Content: Shareplay doesn’t work properly, although we both paid subscriptions, it still gives one of us black screens. We tried problem solving, no luck.
Title: Apple shareplay

Content: I Love HBO MAX or MAX for short. It always comes I’m handy for those last minute movie date nights at the house. Great app I feel like everyone should download it and have there on experience with it. That’s just my honest review and opinion. 💯
Title: MAX

Content: We have a family of five Max has some thing for everyone in our family. That’s way better than Disney or any other platform!
Title: Max is #1 in our family

Content: When watching something (at least through chrome cast, which is how I watch on my tv), the episode will completely restart anytime I pull the app back up. So if my phone is sitting there and goes to sleep, when I pull it back up again for any reason, it will restart the episode from the very beginning. Restarting the app only temporarily helps. Extremely frustrating bug.
Title: Bugs ruining the app

Content: Would love to give it four or five stars but I have too many issues with playback when offline.  It seems to work just fine sometimes then out of nowhere it just decides to not open when I’m offline.  Very frustrating.  Aside from that, I’ve enjoyed it very much.
Title: Too many hiccups

Content: I was a huge fan of HBO max and had the occasional pick up here and there but nothing like I’m experiencing now. Max doesn’t load anything that I want to watch properly. I’ll have to exit out of the app and re-enter the app multiple times before it’ll start working. It works on my phone decently, but there’s nothing for my TV, I’m not interested in watching full movies on my phone so I’m considering canceling my membership
Title: Max will not work on my TV

Content: Please fix the audio description bug. It’s the only thing that tempts me to end my subscription every month. It’s annoying and been happening for like four months. I’m glad it’s a thing for blind people, but I’m not blind and it’s automatically on everything I watch when I’ve never selected it. I just want to enjoy my shows, my eyes explain it to my brain. I can’t turn it off simply by deselecting it.
Title: Audio Description Bug

Content: Who needs Netflix when you have max! All the best shows, best customer service and even better affordability! This is one simple luxury I will keep even when things get tight!
Title: Better then Netflix!!

Content: Ever since we switched from “HBO Max” to the “Max” app on my TV, we have to re-authenticate using my phone multiple times per week. It is a HUGE pain in the you-know-what, especially since I’m the only one who seems to be able to successfully do it; my family has to wait for me to get home. Why has Max made watching it so difficult and so frustrating? We’re close to dropping this service altogether.
Title: Painful authentication

Content: It’s even better than before. They’ve added so much new content so you don’t have to have multiple streaming services anymore. You can just have Max.
Title: It’s even better

Content: I subscribe to several subscription services, and I have to say I always end up on Max at some point. And that’s usually where I end up staying. All high-quality stuff! Long time listener, first time caller. I love me some MAX!!!
Title: The Landing Spot

Content: This app is amazing it has all my favorite shows and all my old favorites shows and really amazing I love using max because it brings my family close together every time watch something I love it
Title: Max

Content: I love HBOMAxX I enjoy thumbing through the library of movies and always finding something I enjoy watching. I just wish the two movies they would add to the list are , ready or not and dead clowns.
Title: It’s like a theater away from a theater.

Content: This streaming app has everything I think a person could possibly need. I watch most of my stuff on the platform. And they also have very good choices for your profile picture.
Title: Highly recommend subscribing to

Content: Earlier it worked perfectly fine when I was watching a movie. But, later on when I tried to resume the movie again it would freeze. I tried logging and logging out but it still didn’t work. The circle icon would still freeze at the same exact spot. ( I have checked my internet and it is working fine, please help me fix this problem )   Thank you :)
Title: New app, isn’t working properly

Content: This streaming app is amazing, we love the different verities of movie and show y’all provide. Not, only for adults but kids as well. If you don’t already have a subscription with Max. You should definitely look into it.
Title: MAX (hbo)

Content: It is so annoying that I have to type in my email address and password every single night when I open the app. The one time that it didn’t make me reenter it was when I just took a break and didn’t watch it for a week, so what’s up? If I watch it every night I just wanna open it and watch whatever I’m watching not have to login every time. Choosing other apps because of this.
Title: Makes me enter login info every day

Content: Im enjoying the movies. The only problem is that it doesn’t save my progress in my shows. It doesn’t save them in the ‘continue watching’ and when I look it up it wants to start me on S1E1. I have to guess to see what episode I’m was on
Title: Not saving series progress

Content: Love this app it has so many of my childhood favorites on there I can’t believe it it’s impossible to put down the phone when using this app I have a suggestion tho bring more Nickelodeon and Disney shows please
Title: Max 🫡❤️‍🔥❤️‍🔥

Content: I like HBO Max better because you were able to screen share while on face time. But on the Max app, you can’t do screen share which is so annoying because I want to watch all the Harry Potter movies with my friend and Max is the only app that has them. And nobody wants to say 1.2.3 play screen share was way easier and if they bring it back I would be so happy 😁
Title: I like the app but...

Content: I like the merge with discovery plus. It is nice to have all of it in one place. However… the app feels very bare. Hopefully it’s because it’s the first week since it released. I would like to see more category options and lay out effects like how each app had individually before the merge. It was easier to find a new show or movie.
Title: It’s okay

Content: I’ve always enjoyed the streaming service but the last app was very difficult to use. This app runs much smoother. As for the streaming, I think it has the best collection of movies and TV.
Title: Such an improvement!

Content: Great movies, but after updating I was surprised to see one of my best tv shows Moonshiners which I didn’t finish watching but now I can you guys have all the seasons I hope to see more tv shows like this great thank you !!!
Title: Moonshiners

Content: There wasn’t any issue with the existing HBO app. Now I’m getting nagged across three devices that I have to download a new app because…I don’t know? HBO out of nowhere decided they needed to ditch the branding that for 20 years of my life meant amazing TV shows and stories. And they managed to do it so incompetently that I’ve gotta download and organize a new app on all my devices. How silly.
Title: Confusing and pointless rename and redesign

Content: Missing the up next feature that HBOmax had. Also the switch from the system player to this poorly implemented custom player is a big disappointment. The ui seemes a bit more polished but the most important part of the service is viewing content which Max is a downgrade.
Title: TV app needs work

Content: The new app is great. However what was cool about HBOMAX was that we could put in our own picture for our profile so you should bring that option back.
Title: Profile picture

Content: I am in love with this app and it works perfectly! When you open the app at first it automatically logs you in. Also I am so happy about the new movies and shows on here! I am so excited about the new Harry Potter series coming up!
Title: Great app!

Content: Why are the Producers, the Writers, the Directors, and other specific members of the creative team listed under creators? Creator is a specific credit. There are union rules that deal with this. Is this Warner Discovery’s continued attempt to destroy an entire industry, career credits, an art form to make sure A.I. can eventually write, direct and act in mindless nonsense in order for multi-millionaires to pinch a penny? Seems like it. PS everyone google “David Zaslav Fleabag” screening.
Title: Was this made by people who don’t understand film/tv credits?

Content: I want the custom avatars and south Park avatars back. But besides that the app is still good I mean I can login fine and they still have the shows, movies, and cartoons I watch. So besides the removed profile picture options and new name, very nice app for streaming!
Title: Removed profile picture options

Content: I would say max is finally on par with Netflix - their app, their content breadth, their 4K/dolby Atmos support, its as good as it gets. If you want the pinnacle of streaming services, you can go with Max or Netflix, whatever has the content you want
Title: Up to par with Netflix

Content: The new App does not have the Just added and Last chance tab which was helpful to watch stuff before they leave the platform.  May be this can be brought back in future updates.
Title: Last chance tab removed from new App

Content: Normally I love HBO, theres a decent variety of shows and some of the best animated serice and fantasy tv shows, but recently watching Lovecraft country, epic show btw, has been rough because theres a bug in the app that removes all audio options except the audio description. For someone who isn’t visually impaired and has ADHD and is watching alone, this is extremely disruptive. I’m glad this feature exists but it should be optional.
Title: Audio Description bug

Content: I was surprised when they started showing Harold and Kumar escape from Guantánamo Bay, that epic thriller movie from back in the day that brings back so many memories along with so many titles that are not listed on other streaming applications
Title: Marvelous titles

Content: Love the shows but the app isn’t the best interface. Shows reset when I reopen my app when casting. Not a fan of the MAX content ads when I pay for no ads, super misleading and just because it’s supporting the platform it still counts as an ad
Title: Good shows

Content: Totally worth it! This service offers an impressive variety of content, from shows to sports and news, ensuring there's something for everyone. It's a great choice for those seeking diverse and exciting content.
Title: WoW, Great all-around!!

Content: The commercials always are the worst time during a movie, they are also longer than most streaming apps commercials… why have two commercials back to back in a movie? Make them short beginning or end of movie. Only one show I really like and I’m looking for opportunities to see it on another service so I can cancel Max.
Title: Longest commercials of any app

Content: This app has all of the movies and shows I have been trying to find. I have tried out so many movies on here and they have all turned out interesting.
Title: Top shows app

Content: It keeps logging me out. I have it through my provider. It’s like they are forcing me to pay for it through them. Or constantly have to sign in. And it doesn’t even allow me to sign in the first time. It loops back around about 5 times saying it can’t verify, until magically it can. So frustrating bc I love the shows on here.
Title: Keeps logging me out

Content: I love that they came out with a new sex and the city and I can watch it on this app.. Plus it’s a ton of stuff on here that you can’t watch anywhere else.. If you don’t have it please stop what your doing and download it now!!
Title: HBO Max

Content: This time, its chromecast. Casting takes forever. Once it starts, you can’t pause, can’t turn on subtitles. Every action resets the stream to the beginning. After couple of retries, have a error popup ‘Unexpected error trying to cast the content’ stuck on the TV with no way to get rid of it.  Also, why can’t we easily customizable subtitles. I dont want taking them so much real estate.
Title: Every app update breaks basic functionality

Content: I absolutely love max, it’s my favorite streaming service, but the change from hbo max to max took away one of my favorite features: the shuffle episodes button. I was absolutely devastated when I realized it was gone and I need it back please 🙏🏼
Title: One Important Component Missing

Content: Since I no longer have traditional cable and no other streaming apps, HBO MAX is now my cable. I must say there is a very good selection of movies and tv shows to watch. I’d say it’s worth it to have if you don’t already. It might be the only steaming app you need.
Title: Something To Enjoy😍

Content: A lot of great content with many great nostalgia shows for me. The only reason it is it at 4 stars and not 5 is because the MAX original show “Close Enough” was removed and no other streaming service has it available (that I know of)
Title: Exceptionally Well

Content: Love HBO Originals and wide variety of shows/movies. The streaming issues and functionality are so bad that’s it’s causing me to rate this app so low. I know I can’t be the only one that’s getting frustrated. I also know it’s not my internet as MAX is the only app that I experience this issues with. This app could be so much better if they made these minor improvements.
Title: Streaming issues

Content: I love the energy Max is bringing to the streaming space. And I am always excited to see what they’ve gotten cooked up!! Always a great selection to choose from and it’s getting better all the time 😎
Title: To the Max!

Content: I understand that marketing needs to target a younger generation but I can not believe that HBO is not HBO anymore. I ya not tv. It's HBO.  What a great slogan and the programming of the late 90s and early 00 was amazing. It now is max and I can not tell you why??  Who decided this.
Title: Name recognition is everything

Content: It isn’t updating on the Home Screen what shows I am watching. So I have to search the show I’m watching and remember what episode I am on. The old app (HBOMAX) would add my tv shows under continue watching. I have closed captions on but they are not showing up. Please fix ASAP

If I could make a suggestion I’ll like to say a “random” option for watching random episodes of a show would be more than great .. Sometimes after after the seasons of a show I think to myself it would be great to watch these at random. For example cartoons.
Title: Suggestion/request

Content: Why do I have to get a separate app for this? Cannot put subtitles on shows says “you can customize captions and subtitles in your device settings” but there is no such thing as device settings and captions cannot be turned on. I already pay too much for this service for lackluster shows and terrible quality. Fix your app and keep the stupid name changes to a minimum.
Title: Ridiculous name change

Content: Great app to watch movies and shows has tons of good movies tons of shows to keep up with HIGHLY recommend downloading to watch new movies or shows whatever your preference is either way good app to watch things on.
Title: Awesome/Great

Content: too many Issues just trying to get signed in. trying to tell me I’m signed in on too many devices. I have an iPhone, two iPad’s and an Apple tv, what do you want me to do pay for two subscriptions? I just won’t watch any of their content if they try to over police password sharing. They’re just scaring away the legitimate paying customer with this crap. One less subscription for me to worry about
Title: not letting me sign in

Content: Oh my God I love the variety of movies Max has!! I love how they go from very classical movies like the Wizard of Oz to my childhood favorites, like; look who’s talking and always the best series I’m fascinated by the production! If you’re looking for a good movie, Max is your number one choice!
Title: MAX the Max!!!

Content: If you want a app that closes all the time then get max the older hdo was better then is app it glitches and sometimes stop my phone from running so if you want app that crashes 👎🙅‍♀️💥
Title: HBO was better

Content: Since the app changed I get logged out constantly. Between having to resign in myself on my devices and then signing in my kids this is driving me crazy. Never used to have this problem.  Also if there are post credit scenes on anything the system is jumping to the next episode too early cutting off the end of the episode.
Title: Sick of logging in.

Content: I appreciate that my progress within each show was maintained and unlike others, the app works just as well as the HBO app did. A little chapped about the name change but understandably, MAX is an umbrella for what could be the adults Disney +
Title: Nb

Content: I love HBO Max because they have an amazing selection of movies and shows! BUT, it's $10 a month with ads... I'd have to pay $16 a month if I want it ad free and if I want to be able to download shows! I shouldn't have to pay to see ads. I love HBO max, but it's very annoying to have a bunch of ads while I'm trying to watch my favorite shows/movies. 😒
Title: Love HBO BUT...

Content: I had HBO Max. Then this new thing is launched. I had to download a new app? How is this one that different that I needed to recommit? And how did you design one that is worse?   If I binge watch something it does not acknowledge how many episodes I have actually watched. If I stop and come back, it says I left off at the end of Ep1. Seriously?   Please someone recognize we don’t watch the credits until the very end, so stop telling me it’s unfinished!   Overall really a bummer. I know the technology exists. Someone knows how to make these experiences better and can take away the dread of using them. Make it easy. Make it useful.  There are shows on here I do enjoy, but I am always weighing them against the benefits or pitfalls of the app.
Title: Not new

Content: I’m so frustrated with Max right now ! I was in the process of re watching GOT and now it doesn’t even keep my spot in continue watching . I have to go to my list find the show remember what season and episode and the icing on the cake is if I left off in the middle of an episode that’s not even saved !!! Was this supposed to be better than HBO max?? PLEASE fix the issues with this new version , this is ridiculous!
Title: This app is terrible

Content: This new app has so many functionality issues! Why did you change the app and not just change the name on the existing app that worked just fine? Play screen popping up when I am streaming has issues reopening and I lose the ability to pause, fast forward or rewind and there is no stop button, why not!
Title: Go back to hbomax

Content: Found out two things about downloads on Max while traveling.   First, there’s a 30 download max across all devices on an account. This sounds like a lot unless you’re traveling with kids that download many short cartoon episodes.   Also, we noticed that downloads expire 2 days after your start watching them.   Of course, you can avoid these limits of you pay even more on top of their already high subscription fees.   I’m not doing that. I canceled my account instead.   Also, changing the name to Max was a terrible idea from a branding standpoint. HBO has long been the TV brand with the best reputation and goodwill amongst viewers. Putting the Max brand as the main name was a real genius move.
Title: Ridiculous download limits

Content: I have always loved max and I am so happy it has come back.  I enjoy watching all the different series and all the movies.  It was so easy downloading the app and connecting to my internet.  Thank you so much for letting us enjoy Max.  Kathy S
Title: I like Max

Content: Every time i want to continue watching my show, I have to extensively look for the most recent episode I’ve watched. I have to search for the name, look for the season, then find the most recent episode I watched. Sometimes it will work but 9/10 times it won’t. It’ll always send me back to the pilot episode too.
Title: “Continue Watching” problem/bug

Content: I don’t think user experience was included with this change.  It’s sad that an app had multiple releases, failed then tries to copy a better app and does worse.  Where is play random, that was one of the best features on HBO Max.  Why do I have to make so many clicks to get to something like “restart” especially when if you get the show to the very end it won’t clear the watch bar it just gets stuck there.  This app is a rushed piece of garbage, and beyond Southpark which HBO won’t have forever the programming is subpar.  The only saving grace is discovery+ and the discovery+ app is far superior.  Stop changing the app when you haven’t solved the fundamental problem of why HBO isn’t making money.
Title: So many missing + extra clicks

Content: I was literally signed into hbo max and it automatically signed me into max but all of a sudden I was signed out and I need all this info to reset my password. Other platforms DO NOT make it that big of a pain. If y’all don’t want us using the app just say so. I don’t get why a brand new app is needed especially when it’s not even available on for Roku TVs. Just a pain all round. I wish I could give this crap 1/2 star. Garbage
Title: Resetting password every time

Content: No platform can have Netflix’s algorithm, I understand that now. Maybe if they put HBO back the application will function properly? Enjoying watching several ads after every button I press. Ad before anything starts. Ad after recap. Recap plays again. Ad again. Skip the intro not working well watch another Ad. Only thing consistent are the Ad’s & the white loading circle that keeps going around.
Title: Put HBO back in front of Max

Content: In Japan for vacation. Wanted to watch HBO but can’t because you’re not allowed to use HBO Max anymore and they want you to use MaX (great name change by the way really using name brand recognition there). But apparently they haven’t rolled out the app for Japan yet so guess I’m stuck by region lock. This is the third app I’ve downloaded for HBO and again they can’t make an app that functions for its users. Guess third times not the charm 🤷‍♂️
Title: Can’t even access the app

Content: I’ve come across several frustrating glitches on the new platform. Audio does not sync with certain shows, error codes come up, and shows will skip ahead or not show up as continue watching options. The variety of shows is great but it only counts if they can be watched without the app crashing or having problems.
Title: App is so so

Content: This app is mostly great but the fact there is no Watch Party feature is a bit disappointing. If this changes I would give at minimum 4 stars.
Title: Really Needs a Feature

Content: Unfortunately after this change to MAX it requires iOS 14 or later. The old hbo max app supported my iPad just fine. I can’t update because my iPad is older or I would. It should still support my iPad just like the old app did. I’m not buying new devices just for this app. All my other apps let me use them. This is ridiculous. Other than that the app worked great for me.
Title: Can’t download

Content: I can honestly say best app. I have never experienced any error messages, lagging, or “something went wrong” messages etc, nor bugs or glitches from App unlike others. IYKYK.  Great experience.
Title: MAX quality

Content: It wanted to make me sign in by Xfinity. I had to uninstall it twice, but then it worked. I am now connected without having to enter anything and all my profiles and everything are there. I have Max through AT&T.
Title: Took a few tries to connect but works now

Content: Great selection. Even have the 2009 watchmen movie, and beetlejuice. But they took off the original animated ralph bakshi lord of the rings. Bring it back, and maybe some other ralph bakshi classics too! The really deep ones, the controversial ones.
Title: They took off the ralph bakshi lotr

Content: I wish there was a way where we can connect the app to the app on the tv through Wi-Fi and find movies shows etc easier but that’s my suggestion for every platform. Love love love max though!
Title: Love it

Content: So far I am enjoying the ap. My only wish is that you would have kept the purple color of the -with a sea of apps on your phone the purple stands out far more than the common blue.
Title: Not a stand out

Content: HBO was perfectly fine by itself. They mixed in the trash from discovery with the award winning shows from HBO. It’s pretty bad.   The app itself is very glitchy. For instance, pausing a movie or show means that when you resume, the app will jump to some random part of the movie that is not where you pause it.   If you try to continue a show from where you left off, good luck. For me, the app just crashes my Apple TV or Roku .
Title: The worst streaming app

Content: Everything is so dark on Max. Much brighter on other venues. Also slower to load. Selection is getting worse. But I like that they added discovery but waiting for an increase in price as usual then I will cancel.
Title: Everything is darker screen on max

Content: I traveled to Portugal and open my account here to watch a TV show that is only on HBO. I got a subscription and to my surprise I cannot use it! App is not supported outside of the USA and when I try to open from browser it redirects to to the app (that is, again, not working here). So I’m just stuck and only one thing left is to cancel subscription and miss the TV show I really wanted to watch (bummer) :(  The TV show btw is 100 foot wave
Title: Really frustrating

Content: App would be great except it deleted my downloads an hour after downloading at the airport. I was watching the 2nd show, exited the app and when I went back in the downloaded shows were gone. This was a bummer in the air when I was hoping to watch and couldn’t redownload
Title: App deleted my downloaded

Content: I never had a problem with the old HBOMAX app. This new one won’t play video on my TV. I have an Apple brand HDMI dock. Everything mirrors fine to my TV except when I try to play a movie on this app. All I get is audio. I can browse movies and everything else until I try to play one. No video. Yes I’ve updated to the latest version and restarted the app. This is the only app that won’t work right with the HDMI dock. Worked great with the old app.
Title: They broke it

Content: Bring back HBO Max.  How can “upgrade” to a new at and it be 10x worse.  Even starting an episode it starts you like 15 min in and then jumps you around when you try to correct it.  Also continues to give you “connection issue” errors when all other apps work perfectly.   Figure it out HBO.  For a massive production company with great quality content this is a pretty terrible app.
Title: Significantly worse than the old app

Content: Should have kept HBO. Max makes me have to sign back in every time I open the app, so I have to go through a whole sign in when I just want to watch my movie and shows.
Title: Kinda annoying

Content: is apps amazing. I just got it to watch South Park but then I realized I could watch everything else I would’ve wanted to watch amazing app would recommend please buy.
Title: This is a good quality streaming service

Content: Every single time I open the app I have to sign in. I’ve had to sign in about 10 times already. I’m not sure if it needs an update or is a glitch but it’s a little inconvenient.
Title: Signing in

Content: I love this app! But I noticed that sometimes on my continue watching section, it will delete a show that I’m watching so I have to go back and look for it again to continue watching it.
Title: Love it!

Content: As far as I can see MAX has everything that hbomax had the only difference is you can choose a profile photo now but my favorite shows and cartoons are on here so I absolutely love it
Title: Extraordinary

Content: Wish when watching a series that the new MAX would keep track of last episode watched. I am having to constantly scroll through seasons to locate last episode watched to watch the next. And if I watch on a different TV it doesn’t seem to show there either.
Title: Series watch

Content: I can not fathom what would make a company take a perfectly good app, and redesign/replace it with a new identical one other than the fact that they must be trying to ride the wave of success of the two time world champion Max Verstappen.  This is the only logic.
Title: Wow

Content: I mean. They changed the name and I still see everything. It’s easy to find things and things play in excellent quality. Nothing to complain about. Aesthetically, it’s a very nice app too. On iPhone and Apple TV
Title: Smooth

Content: Needs an update to restart show from beginning after the entire episode has been previously watched.  Right now you have to re-launch and immediately pause (to stop from rolling to next episode) then manually drag back to beginning.
Title: Re-watch glitch

Content: HBO has made enormous improvements to their application. I watch movies on my phone almost every day and I can tell that pixel quality is one of the pleasant details that is visible. Highly appreciate the transition!
Title: League of their Own

Content: HBO Max had problems after AT&T re-designed the interface. They recovered that somewhat, but now with the rebranding to MAX, Discovery has ruined the premiere video streaming service. Where once I could find what I was looking for, or find out who directed a film, or who the composer on the film was,I can no longer find anything except the actors. The interface is a cacophony, trying to hide behind simplicity.  Total Disaster!
Title: They took an amazing brand and ruined it

Content: I was in the middle of rewatching a series and now it’s not on my continue to watching list at all and I can’t remember where I left off. Plus if I click on a episode to watch it skips it and goes to the next one and when I come back later to watch it’s gone again. I never had this issue with it was HBO MAX. Hopefully it gets fixed soon.
Title: Can’t rewatch

Content: I found the transition from HBO Max to Max to be pretty seamless and smooth. I understand why Warner Bros. would want to change the name given that there are plenty of productions on this app that are not owned by HBO. That being said, pay your writers more.
Title: Seamless transition

Content: Still a pretty cool service, just don’t appreciate how some ability’s like the Shuffle feature for shows is no longer available. Would like to see them go back to the original formula since there was no reason in the first place to change it anyway 🤷🏻‍♂️
Title: Why “max” should stay “HBOmax”

Content: I’ve noticed that there is only one episode of season 1 along with some season 2 episodes not being there I hope this isn’t permanent because regular show is one of my favorite shows
Title: Regular show episodes are being pulled

Content: I just downloaded and logged in with no problems at all on my iPad. It looks pretty much exactly the same as the old app. Works fine. No complaints here.
Title: Downloaded, logged in, works fine

Content: This is redunculous… now it cuts off the last  half of EVERY EPISODE??  If auto play is on, it wont even let u watch the last 15-45 seconds of an episode, the closed captions are right at the bottom of the screen so u cant move them AND u cant change any of the opacity of the letters or the background of them, u cant change the dang color of them nada  TRY ACTUALLY ENHANCING THE EXPERIENCE INSTEAD OF DOWNGRADING IT
Title: Lord can u guys do “anything right”

Content: I used to hate going from app to app for my true crime documentaries or to watch a good movie. Max is put them together even if I wanna watch something fix it up on Discovery Max is perfect it’s the only app for me. That saves me so much money.
Title: THE ONLY ONE FOR ME

Content: Very disappointed with HBO’s decision to split the streaming plans into resolution (HD vs 4K UHD) categories, like Netflix. This is ridiculous. It should be a single plan for HD/4K UHD.  Almost all flat-screen TV’s are 4K UHD. The only customers that need HD, let alone SD, are those with older models. A cheap base plan for SD streaming is understandable, but making customers pay more for 4K UHD when that is the standard is unacceptable. This just makes me want to subscribe less often.
Title: Like Netflix, MAX customers now have to pay more for 4K UHD

Content: I hate that I always have to re-login to my app.  Also that when I'm watching a series and it's screen in screen (like if I'm on another app) that the next episode doesn't automatically start.
Title: Always having to re-login

Content: So many titles to choose from. Many different categories. Great documentaries from acclaimed directors as well as writers. I highly recommend adding  Max. as one of your choices for the best in streaming as well as entertainment. R, Mirabilio “Tyranny”
Title: Max and You!!!

Content: The latest and definitely not greatest version of the app is alarmingly disappointing. Every time you try to pause a stream, it ends up starting the episode or film over the beginning. This also means having to rewatch a slew of ads again. Invest in better development and quality control. You have the money, use it.
Title: Latest Version is TRASH

Content: Love the consistent content. Quickly outpacing other streaming services in terms of great quality shows and movies. Some of the best original programs out there. Would highly recommend.
Title: Max is Goat

Content: I wish WB kept the old HBO Max app. It was so much better. Change purple to blue. Remove HBO from the logo. Add the additional content from the merger to the Hub and we’re done. Would’ve save money and millions of people from learning a new app that is sub par. I’ve only been designing graphical user interfaces for over 20 years.
Title: Out with the new, in the old.

Content: Randomly, I now have accessibility/audio descriptions auto playing in either Spanish or English.  I’ve confirmed the settings on Apple TV are turned off, but the app supposedly has an accessibility dialogue where you can turn off audio descriptions in app. That dialogue pops up, but doesn’t give the end user a way to turn off audio descriptions like the help documentation claims. TRASH.  Come on guys, it can’t be this hard.
Title: What happened now?

Content: This stream service has really made me happy they have lots of great adult animation and killer shows from hbo. Can’t go wrong I use this app more than any other streaming ap. Netflix isn’t even close.
Title: Honest review

Content: The sopranos… curb your enthusiasm… entourage… the wire, I could go on and on. Some of the best shows are on this platform, and it makes every cent worth it. Me and my family really enjoy watching max shows together
Title: Best show selection

Content: This app is horrible. Whenever you pause anything, it starts the show all over again. Then it has a voice over when you play something. There’s no feature to turn it off. You have to get out of whatever you’re watching numerous times, then go back in. I’m terribly frustrated with this app. I usually just end up watching another platform. Please fix these issues, HBO/Max 😑
Title: Horrible

Content: App seems to no longer remember which point I was in the show. So I keep needing to remember the minute mark. Also, to compound frustration, the ability to drag along the bottom bar to go forward or back in the program is sometimes missing. I then need to disconnect from Chromecast and start over again.
Title: App has gotten glitchier

Content: Has a lot of my favorite shows and movies and you don’t have to spend more time looking for something to watch rather than actually watching something hint hint.
Title: Very good

Content: Not as much content as some of the other streaming services, but dang…. Some really good stuff! The idol is great! GOT, Big bang , etc. create more content though so you can be competitive. You should merge with paramount or something.
Title: Great shows

Content: Ever since changing over to this new Max app it automatically logs me out every few days requiring me to manually input my log in info from my TV provider.  Super annoying, literally I’ll be watching a show in the morning, a few hours later I’ll go back and I’ll be logged out. There is no biometric login (that I saw) so I have to go find a user name and password I never have to use for this stupid app.
Title: Logs me out constantly

Content: I'm not entirely sure what to say about Max, you know? There are some bugs here and there with other stuff, but if you're looking to kick back and enjoy some shows, Max pretty much has all the stuff I'm into.
Title: I really don’t have any problems with Max

Content: The app won’t allow me to turn off Audio Descriptions while casting to a Chromecast. When watching directly in the app, the Subtitles/Audio Language menu give me options for “English / Spanish / English-Audio Description.” When casting, this menu shows only English / Spanish, but the audio also plays the description. I’ve updated the app to the current version. Please fix!
Title: Can’t Turn Off Audio Descriptions

Content: I pause my show and walk away for 15 minutes then come back and hit play. all of a sudden a commercial plays and then im on the next episode! sometimes there is a purple bar on the screen. i thought there was an issue with my iphone until my partner thought there was an issue with our ps5. same issue. i miss hbo max, the new max is not enough to be a replacement
Title: Don't pause if you don't want issues

Content: Can you guys please bring back the shuffle button, I feel like when it was added to HBO Max that it was just what I was looking for, and now with the new app change it’s missing. Now I am sad, please bring it back.
Title: Bring Back The Shuffle Button

Content: I for one love max the movies the shows are great and there are no ads you don’t have to pay and it’s not complicated to sign I I really recommend it has the funniest things on here 10/10 app
Title: Love it

Content: I’ve been using max for about a year now and I can’t get enough! The app has so many of my favorites for a very affordable price! I suggest everybody hop on the max train and enjoy all the content max has to offer!
Title: Love this app!

Content: Honestly I don’t understand the point of reformatting HBO Max but it’s whatever. I liked the ability to add a profile picture from your gallery and the purple color but other than that it’s okay.
Title: Max Review

Content: Main complaint is the inconsistency with which the app holds my place. When I return to watch a title I’ve already begun I often have to scroll forward or backwards quite a lot. Other than that, I’m not sure it was the wisest decision to drop the name HBO.
Title: Hold my place

Content: Turn it up and unwind to your favorite series and films. I’m new here, which allows a fresh angle - this has been a great user experience and with a selection that caters to all viewers. Come on in, it only gets better from here!
Title: MAX

Content: I love the new look, but I do have some issues. I started watching a new series after the new update came and now none of my progress will save. I have to remember what season and what episode. It doesn’t even show up as a recently watched. Which is an annoying. But besides that it’s been sweet.
Title: Love the new look

Content: I really enjoyed the wide variety of shows, movies, documentaries on Max…  I don’t watch anything but Max.  I love it because I’m in the military and I can take it with me anywhere.   Keep selecting great shows, movies etc…,
Title: Outstanding selection

Content: I keep getting prompts to log in to the app every single day at the same time everyday. I almost don’t even want to bother using the app on my phone because of this.   Other than that, the viewing experience is great. Just the daily logging in that is bothersome.
Title: Asked to log in every single day

Content: We would love previews to the movie and the use of the play button on the main screen. Going back to the description while the movie is playing is also more difficult than Netflix. Thanks! Love the selection!!
Title: Thoughts

Content: Long story short “HBO MAX” worked, content was clutch and I highly recommended it. MAX just released and while content is still good the app itself is 🗑️. It needs aggressive update patches because inaccurate/non existent continue watching and starting all of my series over from Season 1 episode 1 everyday is not it🤌.
Title: Needs EXPEDITIOUS update patches

Content: Why is it that if I’m watching a show & then maybe have to stop watching it let’s say if im leaving somewhere, so i pause the show & turn it off then come back later the show is not in the continue watching section. You guys should really fix that because it’s very annoying having to figure out what season/episode you stopped on.
Title: Weird

Content: Hoping they will add a like & don’t like rating. Also a way to remove from history. If I don't like it I don't want to see it.  On my TV the show gets stuck on refresh, plus some skipping like a record player & I have to push it forward.  Loving the option of shows.
Title: Expecting improvements

Content: it doesn’t sync with your apple tv settings so if you want to turn captions on you need to pause the episode just to get that part of the menu. i don’t know why they got rid of hbo max. the app worked better than most streamers. it’s like they took the worst features of discovery+ and shoved it in this. sick of low brow discovery content being shoved down my throat on this. it’s going to be even harder to find the good hbo shows now.
Title: terrible UI

Content: Great upgrade! When it push the fast forward or rewind 10 button, it seems a bit slow. But, hey, the update is still excellent, so why complain about that?
Title: Max In My Opinion

Content: This service is complete trash now. Was working just fine before and now ruined. Moves very slow and doesn’t continue watching any shows so you will have to search for the show every time and fast forward to the last place you were at. Terrible service and if I wasn’t getting it for free I would never pay for this. Such a shame when a company decides to ruin what’s working.
Title: So bad now

Content: Max says some of the best shows of all time, I consistently come here and find something great to watch. The same cannot be said for all the other streaming services in my humble opinion.
Title: Max!

Content: Getting errors, wasted so much time because my wife account isn’t working on the Apple TV setup under my name. HBO doesn’t care at all about it’s user, just screwing everybody over. I had to take a second subscription on my phone and guess what… it didn’t even work with a sad “Oops something went wrong”… $15 burnt for nothing. WE ARE DONE with HBO! Succession is almost over and was the last show we wanted to watch which is just good timing. Bye
Title: This so bad

Content: Would give 0 stars if I could. Worse product overall. Inexplicably buggy for what is literally the same app I was just using under a different name. And they took away access to 4K HDR content unless you pay extra. I expect the boos and jeers that greedy David Zaslav experienced at his commencement speech will follow him everywhere he goes. Make it worse and charge people more, the American way these days.
Title: Let’s make it worse and charge more!

Content: It accepts my credentials and recognizes my profile, but when I click the “Start Streaming” button, it states “An error occurred! Something went wrong. Please try again.”, and it freezes. I am unable to click the “OK” button to clear the error message, and I have to kill the app to try again. I’ve tried rebooting my iPad Pro, but the app does this 100% of the time so I am unable to access content.
Title: Crashes 100% of the time

Content: The “Real” Time with Bill Maher belongs on Fox News, not HBO. Used to watch it all the time, but now it has become a propaganda mouthpiece that only covers one side of the story. It’s shocking how cold hearted and hate filled this show has become.  The FBI reported that call centers from India scammed our elderly out of billions in 2022, yet this show doesn’t cover it. Why are they ignoring issues that directly affect the viewers?
Title: The “Real” Time with Bill Maher is a hateful propaganda show

Content: This app is AWFUL! Every time we open and try to start playing a show, the volume starts cranking up and it won’t stop until you find the remote and start clicking down.  Then there’s the fact that shows start randomly playing in other languages, and the option to change it back to English disappears. So frustrating I honestly think we’re going to stop paying for HBO.
Title: Worst App Ever

Content: App is really good but after last update is failing a lot, I try to go into some movie or series and screen goes black and app stops working and closes by itself please fix that

Let’s start with closed captioning / subtitles almost never working when streaming from the phone app. Then let’s move onto the fact that whenever we stream anything, the volume on our tv gets turned to 100. Absolutely blasting, and potentially damaging our speakers and eardrums in the process.   Please actually fix these things.
Title: Just why?

Content: When streaming from my phone app to Google Chromecast, if any interruption occurs, like phone is idle, you open a web browser or do anything on your phone, the show freezes and restarts this forcing you to rewatch all the friggin commercials you have already been subjected to….even though we are paying for the privilege.  😡
Title: Show Keeps Restarting

Content: I love that Hbo max has all the good tv shows!! I was looking everywhere else and there was nothing but now i have options! Right now i’m starting One Tree Hill (my fav ever) right now then i’m going on a list of shows!
Title: Tv Shows

Content: Really good it has a lot of classics but also new it’s a great place to watch cooking shows to when I was sick I was only watching stuff from hbo max and I had a great  time well not with being sick but it’s really good
Title: Max review

Content: I love it it’s easy to navigate and easy to find what movie or show you were looking for and honestly truly thank you for the audio description for blind people like me
Title: Excited

Content: I constantly travel to Mexico, and once this app turn into Max instead of HBO max, I wasn’t able to enjoy everything that this application has to offer.
Title: Why can I watch in Mexico

Content: Honestly was excited to see that HBO was getting a remodel. Too bad the app is just as bad as the old one. Not hard to navigate but just weird… not smooth.. especially on devices like fire stick or smarTV the app just doesn’t function smoothly. It seem the only things they changed were cosmetic.
Title: New “MAX” app

Content: Things work for the most part, and it’s getting better all the the time, but it’s still buggy some times. Certain movies just straight up won’t load, or menus buffer an inordinately long amount of time.
Title: A little buggy.

Content: Nice to have a thoroughly useless app that shows nothing but a blank screen with no controls when casting to a Google Chromecast Bluetooth device. I had to reinstall the chromecast twice and the app still doesn’t work with it. You developers took a fairly decent HBO Max app and made it a certifiable piece of crap. As a software developer myself, you fools should be ashamed.
Title: Lousy interface & spotty cast

Content: HBO Max had its share of performance issues when it first came out. I’m sad to see these issues follow on Max. It’s a pain to cast onto my TV, the audio description won’t turn off, it buffers every five seconds, half the buttons don’t work. I wish they didn’t fix what wasn’t broken.
Title: HBO Max just started working

Content: Rebrand is showing up and showing out, but the continue watching is awful. Our shows will be there one day and not the next. Fix this please! I keep making sure the apps are updated and uninstalled and reinstalled but it’s not helping.
Title: Continue watching refuses to work

Content: The expanded library is nice, but this is the worst shade of blue I think your team could have possibly chosen. Please get someone from your team to change it to something easier on the eyes
Title: Color

Content: You’ve made it impossible to find quality content.  Now I get to wade through low quality tv programming and content that you couldn’t pay me to watch. Reality tv shows, cooking shows that play in the background at the gym, some celebrity doing touristy things in London.  Don’t combine a million apps and channels together without a way for customers to find the programming that interests them.
Title: Crowded with low quality content

Content: Since the rebranding I’ve still been able to enjoy most of the shows I like to binge watch, but for some weird reason my “continue watching” won’t save no matter what… if there’s a setting i am missing, please send me an email.
Title: Max is awesome but…

Content: When I  try to continuously watch episodes of a show while on a different game the picture does not show on the next episode and every now and then it says something went wrong but otherwise it’s great
Title: It’s good but..

Content: You would get five stars from me easily, if only there wasn’t such a glitch. I’m having trouble tracking. My episodes watched. It’s not keeping up across different platforms. Also, I have shows missing on my continue watching list. Fix it and you get five stars from me.
Title: Glitch

Content: It has a lot of my favorite shows and movies it don’t get boring or repetitive and i honestly just love it. i’ve been on Max more than i’ve been on HBO Max even though they are kind of the same thing.
Title: Amazing

Content: On hbo max there was SharePlay but now on max me and my partner can’t watch movies tg due to the screen going black when we try to FaceTime and SharePlay if you could this I’m sure this all would be a 10/10
Title: Awesome app but one problem

Content: I love the new design! I love being able to browse by movie or Series. Sometimes you just want to watch something short and this helps you find what you need quickly!
Title: Love this App!

Content: hbo max was completely fine the way it was so why is this new and less polished app trying to take its place. it’s absolutely terrible with the amount of glitches it has. if an ad starts playing you might as well go ahead and close the app because the screen will go black and won’t turn back on. the audio will still be there but you won’t be able to pause it. sometimes when going from episode to episode it just loads infinitely and never comes back on. i wanted to test this and it has been loading for over an hour and a half on my ps4. terrible app don’t download until they fix it or go back to the original hbo max.
Title: hbo max wasn’t broke why try to fix it

Content: Hate the change to Max. The name is dumb, but besides that, some functionality, particularly in sorting, is now gone. And worse, now I have to sort through a bunch of CRAP that I have no interest in to get to the actual HBO content I’m subscribing for. Give me an option to NOT include the Discovery junk. Also, don’t charge me more for 4K content, something that wasn’t extra previously.
Title: Ugh

Content: It’s a great app with many features, movies and shows but whenever I leave it logs me out and I can’t get it to keep me logged in so I have to re enter my password every time but other than that I love it.
Title: It’s a great app

Content: A lot quicker than the original HBO max website and app. Noticeably faster on my MacBook Pro and iPhone. Seems to not lag at all now and is very snappy in the menu and to start movie. A+ upgrade to MAX
Title: Fast app and website

Content: The Blue is GOOD. But the design can be the UI design even more cooler and cuter and UI friendlier! Make it look cooler! UI Color customization for each profile? Maybe! Cute the new look up more!! Make it all more eye pleasing! Thank You. Excellent look So far!
Title: Fresh Look

Content: Great selection of movies/shows If they could just improve on making the app more seamless The downloaded videos cutout when losing signal On netflix.  When downloaded theres no issues with abrupt cutouts losing signal
Title: Great selection/poor app

Content: It’s sad that I just received an email about new features and it’s about Max taking away features. But, I guess it’s the same as raising prices. All the streaming services are raising their prices. We may as well go back to cable because the monthly payout is going to be the same.
Title: New features

Content: App itself works fine. Wha isn't is  the Price increase and library shrinking . Personally the added  Discovery, food network  & HGTV cheap produced television content is nothing I’m personally interested in since I sub to HBO for written/ drama content like Barry , succession , house of the dragon . I use to pay consistently monthly but I may change it to sporadically as of now.  Will try to keep a open mind .
Title: Grumpy doomsayer

Content: This app, and every other streaming service, are all getting worse as the days go by. Less features, less selection, more stupid exclusives, “tiers” of service for different fees….these apps were supposed to be a good alternative to cable, now they’re exactly the same thing. I get HBO max for free, but if I had to pay even a dollar for it, I’d cancel in a heartbeat.
Title: Thanks for degrading features and charging more

Content: Are you streaming your phone to the tv? Do you like to scroll through your phone while the show plays? Well you better not click back to the app during the show or else it will restart and having to go through the awful ads to find the spot they kicked you off from. Infuriating.
Title: Irritated

Content: trying to stream to a tv is nightmarish. app doesn’t remember it’s connected and so the controls stop working. also literally every time you stream to a tv the app shows a black landscape mode screen and you have to manually hit the back button. also alphabetic menus don’t know how to cope with “the” and so most shows and movies are under “t”. insane that something this bad was foisted on users.
Title: Glitchy

Content: The app is fine. But due to the app not working when my phone has no service is such a downside. To replace apps such a Netflix and prime video, the app should work while underground. As a commuter, i download and binge watch majority of my shows. So if the app doesn’t work while I’m underground or traveling it is pretty much pointless for me to use
Title: Okay, on other hand pointless

Content: Max has everything I need and want all my favorite shows that I couldn’t find before are on Max. And don’t get me started on the movies I just love them. Totally amazing I don’t regret getting it.
Title: Overall Amazing!!!

Content: Can we not start with this crap of slowly adding more and more ads into more and more of your content??? I pay for this service and I don’t want ads!!!
Title: How about less ads from a service I pay to subscribe to!!

Content: There was nothing wrong with the HBO Max app, literally nothing. And then we were asked to download this and there’s Been many issues. But the most absolutely annoying and time consuming thing about wanting to just enjoy some entertainment has to be that it CONSISTENTLY logs you out, on ALL devices and requires you login again. HBO never did that. Ever.
Title: Going Backwards

Content: I have no problem with the shows or movies on this streaming app but the original HBO max allowed screen play when FaceTiming and I’d understand with the new app they wouldn’t have the option initially but it’s been a while and nothing has changed
Title: Like it except for one problem

Content: People complained about this before it came out, but I have not experienced a problem with this app. I also very much enjoy the new variety of programs added by Discovery.
Title: It’s a good service

Content: Quality show selection and doesn’t make you pay more to watch it outside of your home. Definitely better than Netflix.
Title: Great

Content: Would really like to see them show me what I’m currently watching . Each time I log in , I have to do a search for the program I was in the middle of and this is annoying !
Title: Love max and …

Content: Nothing save to the “continue watching” section. I have to search the show, then find the last episode I watched. Really inconvenient. When I’m scrolling for new films/shows it doesn’t even show the full title. I’m happy that they combined & added more shows, but that shouldn’t come at the cost of user capabilities or user experience. HBO Max worked like a charm. MAX is far more inconvenient from user perspective.
Title: It got worse

Content: I understand merging companies means more content (which is a perceived value at no additional cost), but I didn’t ask for hundreds of awful reality shows - I was happy with HBO MAX. Now I have a new layout to sift through and it’s harder to find the QUALITY content that brought me here years ago. Way to go. You fixed something that wasn’t broken.
Title: If it ain’t broken…

Content: It could be easier to find moves that are more relevant to the one I just finished,,, other than that it’s a amazing app with loads of movies and tv shows
Title: Fix the search engine

Content: This app is terrible compared to HBO max. They made it harder to go through episodes of each season and I’ve had nothing but issues trying to select episodes and god forbid you want to restart an episode when it’s at the end because if you go to the episode it doesn’t give you that option to restart and goes directly to the next episode if you don’t hit rewind fast enough.
Title: Terrible

Content: Bro… my guy… the one thing that I’ve noticed off rip is that, when casting to the tv it’s significantly more responsive in a shorter time too. I feel like with the old app I was waiting legit FOR-EVER. But now I can eat dinner with all the time I’m saving! I EVEN HAVE TIME TO WIPE AFTER A BOWEL MOVEMENT !!!
Title: Max Review

Content: You make a new app and still dont add an option to adjust video quality. Its really annoying. This bug is so frustrating. I have high speed internet but your app still makes the videos 340p. I would forcibly change it but you guys refuse to add this feature! The only way i can enjoy the best quality is to download them before hand, but then I cant watch them on the tv!
Title: Video Quality

Content: The old app worked about 97% of the time but the new max works maybe 25 to 30% of the time. Aggravating I love a lot of shows but if it’s not fixed within a reasonable amount of time going to have to cancel it I would rather buy a download for the shows I want to watch, then to have to sit through a consistently crashing application. pitiful. I’m not the only one having trouble.
Title: The new app is not working

Content: Everytime i click off the same show, no matter how far i am into it, the show disappears from my continue watching, it has happened with many of my shows and you need to fix it. it’s annoying having to search for the show and finding where you are on what season and episode everytime you open the app
Title: Randomly takes shows off of contusion watching

Content: This app finally shows the power of Warner. All their amazing IP under one roof. Much easier to find new shows. The only problem is I don’t have enough time to watch it all.
Title: Simply the best

Content: It has all the old shows that I love and a lot of good movies. The only thing is my ‘continue watching’ list doesn’t have my show that I’m watching so I have to go back to the season and figure out which one I was on. Little issue, nothing major.
Title: I live HBO max

Content: Clearly the devs of this new app had nothing to do with the HBO Max app. Completely different. A-Z search stops at A. Hubs are gone. At least it brought over my watchlist (which used to be an actual sortable list, not a load of icons to endlessly swipe through). Wish I’d added more to that list in the HBO app before being forced to use this instead since it’s such a mess finding stuff I know exists… Also - Apple TV app - fix HDR/Dolby Vision. Seriously…
Title: Terrible

Content: In full screen on iPad Pro the white bar at the bottom of the screen never hides. sometimes the clock and top bar with battery info doesn’t either until you minimize to a window and restore full screen. poor experience to try to watch a show with a glowing white bar at the bottom of the screen. other apps don’t have this issue hopefully they’ll fix it.
Title: Does anyone test the app?

Content: I don’t know what happened, but the Max app is harder to use than the HBOMax app, which makes no sense. All you have to do is use the previous app and change the appearance, but now the app is less convenient than the previous version. Who makes their new app harder to use than than their old app?
Title: Hmm, did they forget they had a decent app before?

Content: So far it’s been a good experience having MAX. My family & I enjoy all the documentaries we’ve been seeing & what we call in our house “trash tv” xD I love this app better than Netflix. Better things to watch!!
Title: Loving it

Content: This app has actually everything when I need to watch something I go to max bc they have so much i watch so many good shows on here and it’s honestly the beta investment I’ve ever made
Title: Amazing

Content: I never write reviews but I just had to, I was literally about to cancel my subscription because the app was so buggy and annoying. So glad this app came out
Title: So much better

Content: Not sure why so many are having such a bad experience? I didn’t even have to sign in, opened app and was automatically signed in. All my previous HBO Max shows right where I left em.  iPhone 14
Title: Works great

Content: Just as good as HBO Max. Nothing’s really changed. I think dropping “HBO” from the title lessens the premium reputation - but not really. As a DC fan, I’m primarily here for all things detective comics. Keep the great live-action and fantastic animated movies coming. So far so good. I miss the magenta color.
Title: Name change

Content: I stream to avoid commercials I’m straying away slowly because bout everything you have on here I can watch else where with other apps
Title: Why is there commercials

Content: First off love that I now have other channels to watch. But when we can’t just go through A-Z movies anymore and have to go by genre it’s awful. Loved being able to not know what I want to watch and then finding something that looked good. Now I have to sit and say ok what genre. It’s super annoying. Bring it back and stop the side scrolling too.
Title: What did you do to our beloved HBO app??

Content: The HBO max app which has worked fine for years was force upgraded and this new app forced me to not only log in again but change my password and then had streaming issues. Absolute hot garbage. i don’t know how many different App HBO needs to push out. This is like #4 since they’ve started a streaming service. Here’s a tip HBO: Don’t release Apps until they are well tested and don’t make the user experience of the new App horrible.
Title: Hot Garbage

Content: I love hbo max. I do wish they recommended things that are alike to movies and shows I watch daily on here; instead of a computer generated of what the majority of  users watch. But all in all would highly recommend.
Title: How I feel about the app

Content: This app is absolutely horrible casting to tv. Tried to put on subtitles and it restarted the movie. Sometimes I don’t even know what happens and it just restarts the movie. I have no problem with any other app doing this, so I know it’s not anything else but the app itself. Love the selection of stuff to watch but this needs to be fixed.
Title: Casting to tv

Content: It’s one of my favorite apps to watch movies on but lately it’s been signing me out and the when I try to sign back in it tells me I don’t have a subscription when I do or that I have the wrong provider
Title: Great most of the time

Content: Easy to download a movie and watch without internet connection, I appreciate that during my recent travels.
Title: Downloads work during flights!

Content: The HBOMax App was terrific, easy to use, easy locate things. So Warner Brothers decides to take all the GOOD features, remove them from the App, add a lot of GARBAGE Mental Midget phony reality shows and rebrand it as MAX.  This App is a steaming pile of garbage, clunky, repetitive, difficult to find things, SLOW, poorly designed. And to top it off they removed the marquee HBO name and decided to use the crappy MAX which makes everybody think of Skin-O-Max. Good move!!!!!  Warner Brothers screwed up big time.
Title: Garbage

Content: I installed the new MAX on my Sony Bravia TV. The app opens then crashes. I have to uninstall and reinstall to get it to open. Next day, same thing. I’m canceling HBO MAX. This is too much work! You shouldn’t of changed the name and app if you weren’t going to get it right or better. **update. Now that I’ve uninstalled MAX from my new SONY BRAVIA, the tv actually behaves better. It was making me turn it on twice. Now it just turns on. Terrible app for the Sony.
Title: Buggy

Content: A large catalog with many of my favorite shows. I wish they would just dump the entire season of new shows. I don’t get this weekly model release.  I would like for all Adult Swim series to be current. I looking at you Venture Brothers.
Title: Good start with room to grow.

Content: Interesting to read about a post that Netflex  was dropped for Max….. issue is and it continues to be content. Max just can’t compete with the variety and number of options….Max dosen’t come close. 🤷‍♂️
Title: Content

Content: This app is awful. All we wanted to do is upgrade to have ad free service… because with the standard service they play the same exact same 4 ads on loop. They have made it literally impossible to make any changes to the account. We love HBO, we just want to pay them more money… hilarious that they make it this hard to do so. Shout out to Max for making me want to smash my phone into a million pieces.
Title: Terrible

Content: Do you like pop ups when you’re trying to watch a show? Then Max is for you. Want to continue watching a show or movie, but want it to start at the beginning every time? Then Max is for you.  Seriously, it’s like they launched before it was ready, skipped research, or executives rained crap from on high until the team gave up.
Title: Good content, bad app

Content: Absolutely love being able to watch some of the older movies and most importantly the ad free tv so far keep it up at this point ion even use the others as much
Title: Amzaing

Content: I honestly really like this app! I have had no problem with it and I think it works really well. You don’t need a ton of Wi-Fi for it to work and it has a bunch of shows on here to watch for free!
Title: Like it!

Content: Very good but there is one flaw and that is the price for it, even tho we’re already paying $16 we still get ads. But i guess that’s how it is with all these amazing shows. Very good app and i recommended
Title: Hbo max

Content: I’m on an ad supported plan that was originally with HBO max. After the run around from Max customer “support” and literally having to call Apple, I’m told I can’t UPGRADE my plan to yearly no ads because it’s too far from when I signed up. Like sorry but I’m trying to pay you MORE MONEY. What tech company doesn’t allow users to upgrade to a higher priced plan? And furthermore why they can’t do it for you?
Title: Won’t let me upgrade my plan

Content: Shows are enjoyable plus being able to watch all of dc newest movies come to a streaming service quickly is a bonus
Title: good shows

Content: I love this app and everything but why change it it just takes up space and kids can’t watch the anime’s anymore on there page but it worked on the other app so are you ganna fix that

When you rewatch a show it starts the next episode at the credits as it thinks you’ve already watched it this go around. Even if the the episode that you just ended you had clicked restart on. Really my only complaint with the app but it’s a big annoyance.
Title: Rewatching shows is a nightmare

Content: Max is one of the best things to watch horror movies and other dramas like that, but I really think that y’all should make more good horror movies. No offense but I kinda don’t like the horror movies on here they are boring well that’s only some.
Title: About max.

Content: my hbo got hacked some years ago and the guy changed the email, so when it logged me in automatically i was stoked as i thought I had lost my hbo account. this was all i cared about
Title: Can’t complain

Content: Until this is fixed I cannot give it more than 1 star.   It doesn’t matter which device I’m on, iPhone, Roku, firestick, it’s all the same. It doesn’t tack your watch history properly. So you can not continue where you left off or even on the episode you were on. And it’s 90% doesn’t even show up on “continue watching” whatsoever. If you search for the show it still doesn’t show where you were.   I’ve tried the work around and they don’t work or they work. And frankly no one should be doing a work around. They worried about meeting a deadline with the change from HBOmax instead of creating an app that works!   Extremely disappointed!
Title: Continue watching

Content: This new app is terrible. Logs me out every time I exit the app. Continue watching doesn’t work. I have to manually search for shows that are currently airing instead of them being in my up next. This is the most expensive app I pay for and it’s worse than the free ones I use. The five star reviews are either employees, bought and paid for or they’ve never actually used the app.
Title: Horrible

Content: App is much more reliable and responsive than the “HBO Max” app. But I’m also at this point that I’m sick of having to get a new HBO app on all of my devices every six months, and then sign back in to all of my electronics. Please for once can we just stay with “Max” for at least a year
Title: Much Better! Now just be still!!!

Content: I hate I was forced to switch to another app to where I couldn’t keep using HBO. Then I leave for my vacation where I know I will not have good service so I download episodes of the lengthy show I was currently watching just to eventually find out that it is unavailable in my region right now and that they are working on making max available everywhere. Should have just kept HBO.
Title: Forced to switch then is unavailable

Content: I found the English version of the studio ghibli movies and I’m very happy I was only seeing Japanese audio at first then I found out where the English version was Now to say I’m very happy I found it
Title: I found the English version

Content: Steady and consistent quality streaming service.. User friendly in navigating  Max.  Now just one question.  Can you please bring back another season of Succession? Please.
Title: Great content with the software to match

Content: You can’t even start a show without it crashing smh this should have been fixed before launch 🙄
Title: Stop the crashing

Content: My shows that I’m watching aren’t saving. I always have to search for them and then it wants to start at episode 1 even though I am well past that now. I then have to try to figure out what episode I’m on as it doesn’t even tell me which ones I’ve watched.
Title: Not saving my shows

Content: I have a Roku tv and every time I’m done watching a show the vampire diaries I can’t even figure out where I left off it resets my entire progress on the show other than that it’s a 4 star please fix this bc it happens very often
Title: Saving issues

Content: awful !! i hate when apps make unnecessary changes like this. incredibly difficult to navigate, ESPECIALLY on roku. autoplay only works sometimes, shows will randomly disappear from my "continue watching", packed full of bugs. sadly, i will have to continue using this awful app because i'm autistic and cannot part from doctor who.
Title: terrible

Content: We typically love HBO but now considering getting rid of it due to the new update. It will no longer hold your spot when you’re in the middle of watching tv series.  You have to search through all the episodes to find where you left off. Now, you have to remember where you left off at and have to find it each time you watch. It was better before this last update.
Title: Worst update ever!

Content: The platform was average before but did its job. The update to”Max” was messy some devices auto logged in some didn’t. Series I had been watching are not up-to-date with where they were. The new app doesn’t track watch progress really at all. I have the app auto move to the next episode and it’s not tracking any subsequent episodes which is awful for picking up where one left off.
Title: Not great

Content: I prefer the purple better it gave a more distinct look now every app is blue also the profile icons could use some more characters from different shows in it.
Title: Color

Content: The name change is cute and all, but the purple you had is far superior to this blue. It made y’all unique and now you look just like every other streaming service.
Title: Go back to purple.

Content: I love HBO but this new app is such a downgrade. I’m not sure why they made this change anyway. It’s not the end of the world though. I will say it looks like the added a lot more shows & movies, so that’s a plus, and the app runs smoother than the previous one.
Title: HBO is still the best

Content: The whole rebrand is stupid that is a given, but the fact that they can’t just upgrade their existing app instead requiring people to download a whole new app is stupid. I also liked how the old app let you upload your own image for your profile picture, which was just a nice little touch that this app is missing.
Title: Unnecessary

Content: HBO Max application was bad. This new one is even worse. With all the money that Warner brothers make. They can't even make a good app. Every time I wanna fast forward in an episode or go back. The app shuts down by itself! Or stop working! And It all depends on the app Mood!! If I am lucky I can watch something today but if the app is not in a good mood. It won't let me watch anything!!! Put more millions on apps developers!!
Title: Worse than before

Content: There’s no share option to send a link to what you’re watching on the HBO network app. It would be nice if we could send links via text or other platforms- should be an option!!!
Title: Please add share option!

Content: Would highly recommend this streaming service it’s one of the first to get a movie after it’s out of theaters it’s way better than Netflix
Much better than Prime and Netflix apps with ease it facilitates finding your downloads, shows or movies you’ve flagged or ‘liked’.  Just better.
Title: Much better

Content: I’ve been a long time fan of HBO even back when it was hbo now. The new max keeps adding more and more great shows and movies. There’s no other streamer like it. Definitely worth the 5 stars
Title: Best Streaming App

Content: For two years, even when it was HBO AND HBO Max, this app logs me out and does not let me log back in because it says it can’t find my provider. I have an account but it does not allow me to login and it just goes to deny me access. I have spent countless time calling and chatting with customer service and it is an unnecessary ordeal to go through every time it logs me out. Please do something about this Max.
Title: “Can’t Find Provider”

Content: If i so much as look at the app wrong it plays an ad and starts the episode over. Its so wildly frustrating. If i pause it, and then resume it plays an ad and starts the episode.
