If i try to seek back to where i was and it plays an ad and restarts the episode. Takes me close to 5 minutes to get back to the same spot in a 25 minute episode. The headache makes it impossible to enjoy the content.
Title: Chromecast nightmare

Content: So max is kinda good HBO max is wayyyyy better HBO has simpler ways to get to channels and max has so much errors and bugs this is my 4th time getting logged out and I was on Max on the same day and then I got back on it and I got logged out and it just so stupid and dumb PLEASE!!!!! bring back HBO Max
Title: Kinda goofy

Content: Everyone I click on the app on my phone it asked me to download the app. So I do, it opens and I’m logged on. But should not have to download every time I want to watch.
Title: Works great but won’t load

Content: I own multiple streaming services but by far this is the one I use most. I keep a majority of the services for my kids, but if it was up to me I’d just have Max and Apple TV.
Title: Favorite streaming service

Content: When I start watching a show or movie for some reason if I exit out of it, it doesn’t save my progress. When I play it again it starts from the begging. It’s getting a little annoying how I have to keep forwarding to the scene I last left off on.
Title: Doesn’t save progress

Content: The reason Max is better, is the quality of movies and shows. Also 4K is not an added charge.
Title: Better than the rest!

Content: Why is it every time I log in to watch any show I have to turn off the subtitles every single time?  Please fix. Don’t be scared, it’s not that hard
Title: Fix subtitle problem

Content: It really good to finally to see my favorites to see these and it the best app when your looking for something but some is not there but it ok aleast there others you like ! :D
Title: Favorite shows/movies

Content: This app is amazing I can watch all my favorite shows movies cartoons it’s just amazing thanks to max I can watch on the go in my living room in my bedroom anywhere I want thank you for making this amazing app
Title: Great app

Content: Ever since it switched from HBOmax to just max, the app has been unreliable on our Samsung tv. Works just fine on the tablets and phones.  It will lock up during a show or even while loading. Only way to get it unstuck is to unplug the tv from power.. Other than that we still love and watch it daily.
Title: Works when it feels like it

Content: this is my second review bc they deleted my first one?? this app is honestly trash, it glitches , it’s hard to navigate , it’s slow, and it keeps kicking me out of the app entirely. I can’t even go 10 minutes without being reminded how terribly functioning this app is , I’m not sure why they changed HBO max to this.. but they seriously need to change it back bc this app is trash
Title: I don’t usually write reviews but ..👎

Content: This is such a spectacular app with so many movies and shows to watch that a lot of other platforms don’t have would definitely recommend!
Title: Great app

Content: Yes the app works well on its own but whenever you try to cast your favorite show on the tv the audio will randomly switch to another language after playing for a few seconds in your main language and it won’t give you the option to change the audio it’ll stay stuck in Spanish for example. Good app not so great otherwise
Title: Terrible compatibility w chrome cast

Content: Why would you replace a well functioning app like HBO Max with this garbage? I consistently run into performance issues with the new Max app, from bugs to audio delay, to straight crashing. Not to mention the horrendous new user functionality that replaced the well tuned version of HBO Max. All in all, bring back the old app and yo’d be better off for it.
Title: Constant Performance Issues

Content: Closed Captioning doesn’t stay on. Have to keep toggling on and off to get it working every time I start the app. Half the time when casting to my TV the show doesn’t load up on my phone to make changes to sound or skip ahead. Have to close and restart app. Had none of these issues with the old HBO Max. ☹️
Title: Worse than before

Content: I would give it a 0 star review if I could. This app doesn’t keep track of the shows you watch so every time you go back to the menu you will have to search for your show and go to the specific episode because it won’t remember that either, it can’t even keep track of the shows I put on my list. The interface on this app is absolutely terrible
Title: Worst streaming app

Content: Everything is fine except Home Bar remains visible during playback.  Is this being addressed? It is definitely an app issue as home bar on iPad is not user configurable. Disney + had same issue but was resolved with update.
Title: Home bar remains visible on iPad Air.

Content: I have to say that the selection of movies and tv shows don’t compare to any other platforms like Netflix or prime because the selection is not that big on Max and majority of their selections are old or not popular
Title: It’s okay overall

Content: They somehow made it run even worse than it already did constantly lags and stutters doesnt keep track of previously watched episodes of whatever your watching ui is also ruined navigating this app is such a bad experience still havent fixed major bugs thats been here since release
Title: Terrible ui and optimization

Content: Several problems that I didn’t have using hbomax. When binge streaming it has often failed to go from one episode to the next. When this happens it the app won’t show your show progress, so you have to search for the next episode which is a problem if there’s 25 episodes in a season
Title: App needs improvement

Content: Love this app! However after the change to Max it now constantly makes me resign into my account every time I want to watch. This is kind of a time consumer obviously so hopefully it can be fixed!!
Title: Login in and out

Content: The app makes me log in every time. I don’t know how to fix it, there is no box that says “stay logged in” because after I select my provider it lets me in. But I still have to select my provider and it has to verify me before letting me in the app. Can this be fixed?
Title: Login??

Content: Such a dumb change, HBO was the brand! Also, pretty buggy right now, not gonna lie. More than anything I wish it was jsut called “HBO.” But would be nice if they could also get the app running smoothly
Title: Dumb change

Content: so first you make people download an entirely new app when you could have just updated the old one (presumably so you could offload a bunch of content for another tax write-off because you’re scum), and then you don’t even have shareplay enabled when 2 of your most popular shows are airing their series finales???? who thought of any of this???? does anyone at the corporate level of WBD have an IQ higher than a baker’s dozen????
Title: no shareplay????

Content: A new year, a new hbo app. Apparently their dev team is not able to make updates to an existing app. At least they carried over the history this time.  Issues so far: - not able to access downloaded shows when offline - no option to skip the intro of a show (at least a downloaded one)
Title: Issues with new app

Content: I like the new app but the only thing that I miss is SharePlay. Me and my Fiancé are trying to watch movies together, but since we separated from each other, this is the only way we can watch movies together. Soo I’m pretty upset that we can’t SharePlay on Max.
Title: Very impressed but

Content: So they recently forced everyone that was using HBO Max to switch to MAX… Instead of just updating the app. With this forced switch the new app has a lot of issues. For one, the movie/shows pages are super buggy and sometimes stop scrolling. Second, the app is not supported by shareplay but is somehow the “editors choice” by apple… I used to really enjoy HBO Max now I am thinking about cancelling my subscription.
Title: Doesn’t even support SharePlay…

Content: why was there the need to change and create a whole separate app. tried watching succession on the tv and it kept switching to this static in the episodes and when i’d start a new one. each time it did this i have to exit out of the episode and go back in. extremely annoying. i hope they regret doing all this cause netflix just messed around and found out. 🙄 QUIT TRYING TO RUIN STREAMING!!!!!
Title: awful

Content: They said nothing was going to change but that is a lie! So far you can’t have your own personal picture. The app loads weird on my tv. All of my saved shows keep disappearing and when you add it back it starts from the beginning episodes instead of where you left off😡 so not happy with the change!
Title: Go back to HBO max

Content: It stays connected to Wi-Fi better. But skipping ahead scenes causes it to get stuck on buffering. Need to fix Picture in Picture mode, though. When a new episode starts, PiP disappears but it still plays in the background so you have to open up Max to get PiP back
Title: Little better than previous app

Content: How come I’m not able to make my profile picture a picture from my camera roll, why would I want a picture of a random person from a random tv show as my pfp. And the default profile is ugly, why would I want a fat bubble as my pfp. The original was better! Other than that idrc. But what was the point of removing HBO from the max😭😭
Title: Profile photos

Content: I personally love this app and all its new features. I also admired the fact that you don’t need to have the new IOS update to watch. Thank you again truly!
Title: Amazing

Content: I didn’t have 2 active subscriptions on my account before downloading this app. Now I do. It’s a viscous circle trying to find information on either subscription, and trying to cancel at least one of them. the hyperlink to the iTunes Store crashes. iTunes doesn’t have any information on the subscriptions. When I do finally figure it out, I’m done with HBO because this is honestly nonsense.
Title: This new app is garbage.

Content: I have a yearly plan for HBO Max which was paid through the Apple App Store. The new Max app is not recognizing that subscription.  When I press restore purchase, it says my subscription is not active. There is no selection to sign in  with Apple, iCloud, Apple TV, etc. I’m not sure how to get access to my account using the new app. Any help would be awesome or a credit for the unused balance that would cover the next 6 months….
Title: Unable to sign in….

Content: The HBO Max app had grown to be highly functional with its hubs, the way it was organized and how intuitive it was. This Max app feels half finished and does not feel like it’s user driven, but rather an App designed to push what the platform wants you to watch. Honestly they should have just reskinned the HBO Max app and called it food because this Max app is sorely lacking.
Title: Needs a lot of improvement

Content: I have 2 Samsung smart TVs. One tv will play app but loaded so so slow. It will not let me fast forward or rewind because it’s so slow, I just give up.  The other TV is worse. I have to unplug my TV and plug it back in just to get the app to come back on because it freezes every night. There doesn’t seem to be a way to restart the app it just freezes with no response.
Title: Need to fix the bugs on Samsung TVs

Content: At first I thought it was a little pricey but the app is one of the best running streaming apps. Works well on all devices and there is a lot of quality shows.
Title: Overly impressed

Content: I enjoy this app and the shows but I find that it’s very temperamental. It doesn’t work have the time on our smart TVs which are some of newest TVs available so I have to use airplay from the app on my phone to watch on my TV. Very annoying. The shows are great though.
Title: Good but could be better

Content: every single time i open the app while watching the show, the episode restarts from the beginning and i need to find where i am in the episode again. i do not have a smart tv so i can not clear cache. i have deleted and redownloaded, turned my phone on and off, signed in and out, and updated. i can not even turn up the volume without the ep restarting. HOW DO I FIX THIS
Title: unfixable bug

Content: Has a lot of my favorites in one place, I will say sometimes the app can be frustrating when it doesn’t register what episode you left on.
Title: My Favs

Content: The great content with the new enhancements made to MAX makes it a winner no matter what! Some people around me are asking for more Spanish translations for series like Lucifer because more and more Spanish speaking people are subscribing. ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
Title: MAX

Content: When I watch TV shows all the way to the credits. I would like the episode to restart from the beginning the next time I watch that particular episode, because clearly I watched the whole thing. Thank you for listening
Title: Love the format but

Content: For the most part my max runs normally. Sometimes it doesnt give me sound though. Or the volume of the show or movie is so low i have to turn it all the way up & mute the commercials (which also, why am i watching commercials in the middle of a movie, that’s annoying) i had no issues before HBO max became just Max… 🧍🏻‍♀️
Title: Volume & connection

Content: Max has a sweet balance of original content and a library that almost always delivers. 4 not 5 stars because MAX needs to generate more, even a little more original content, which is so sweet. But even as is, definitely worth it IMHO.
Title: Worth it

Content: the good stuff like "Ready Player One" has  a lot of rewatch value. The app needs more adult cartoon and independant content. they should really add newer more big name titles instead of all the old timey stuff
Title: You have to look really hard for the good stuff

Content: Not only do I have to sign into the app every time I open it on my IPad, sometimes it doesn’t it even accept my saved password. It take several times of signing in before it recognizes the password. Very frustrating. I tried deleting and reinstalling. That didn’t work. Anyone else have this problem?
Title: Not Liking the new App

Content: Don’t get me wrong, it’s good it’s like hbo but i wish they could bring back the feature where you can see what movie/show will be removed or what new thing will be added
Title: it’s okay just one little thing

Content: Max does this confusingly stupid thing where if I click on an episode of something I’ve watched before it starts me at the place I last watched… which was the credits…. So it plays the same “next episode” bar at the bottom and starts the next episode…. HBO apparently contributed the logic to the video playback. Absolutely dumb.
Title: Silly User Design Changes

Content: HBO MAX worked great- minor issues but they were very far and few between that it was fine. Then they changed to just MAX and it’s a nightmare!! Constantly logged out then told to reset my password to use it every 3 days. Don’t know what “bugs” they thought they fixed but you missed a very big one!!
Title: It was fine until….

Content: HBO Max was fine, typical streaming app, no issues.  I’m fine with the rebrand, but you can rebrand without creating a whole new app.  So now i have to download a new app on every device instead of simply updating like every other company does their rebranding.  AND, this is a big one, the new MAX app (easily confused with cinemax, but that’s probably their intent) requires me to login EVERY TIME I OPEN THE APP.
Title: New app for no good reason, no i have to login every time

Content: Ever since the switch from HBOMAX to just MAX, there have been glitches where it doesn’t save progress on whatever I’m in the process of watching and I have to memorize which episode/minute I’m at. I also think that the previously mentioned switch was a dumb decision, but that’s not what I’m here to criticize.
Title: Great, except…

Content: Selection of shows and movies is great. Nice to have the additional networks added since changing to Max. Only thing I don’t like is I can’t download content for traveling.
Title: Lots of shows and movies!

Content: The iphone app is awful at casting and streaming simultaneously. I get unexpected error trying to cast content message constantly. I’ve updated my chrome casts, I’ve updated the app. I also find it super weird that in order to play something I have to hit the play button quite a few times before it plays.
Title: Terrible performance.

Content: It was easy to set up from HBO max. Only  thing now is to project this from phone to my new LG tv Love the choices because I have a variety of genres to  look at.  Would like to see more of new series like  Sistas.
Title: Max

Content: App seems to work fine but doesn’t retain my login information. Makes me go through the entire login process each time I want to use it. Picking my provider, then skipping to the correct section, then I have to manually type in my password because it doesn’t recognize the saved password on my phone. Bleck!
Title: No Save

Content: I actually like it. It’s a faster and more updated version of HBO Max. However, there are some minor but noticeable bugs, like lag when I try to skip or fast forward.
Title: Max

Content: It technically works, but it’s viewer hostile.  I watched the finale to Succession and as soon as the credits hit, it shrunk down to a tiny box to show a glaringly white Industry add.  Let me digest what I just saw, or at least, don’t show me something with such bright colors.  Barry too.  No time to take in what you want. They just want you to stay engaged and all that.  Also, pay the writers!
Title: They made everything worse to a previously mediocre app.

Content: HBO Max had vastly improved their accessible content, especially original content. You will lose a vast majority of your sight-impaired subscribers if you cannot be inclusive on your Max originals content. Your Discovery+ content is practically unwatchable if you need any sort of visual assistance.  Do better.
Title: Do better with Accessibility like Audio Descriptions

Content: I loved the HBO Max library, hated the phone app. Was hoping for a better experience with Max app but I can’t even access the library on this one. When searching by genre the menu pops up and then immediately collapses, and there’s no way to get it back, just back all the way out only to try again and run into the same issue over and over. Useless.
Title: Worst app than HBO Max and that’s saying something

Content: Love the new app so far. Some criticism I have is that it closes unexpectedly after signing in on your account and there is a message saying something went wrong with signing in.
Title: Looks great

Content: I loved HBO max I was okay with it changing names I wasn’t exactly stoked considering that the name “Max” is the most generic name ever but hey whatever. Little did I know that I’d have to download an entirely new app. The blue color is WAYYY overdone like every single steaming service is blue now the purple was so fresh and beautiful now I guess the generic name “Max” fits with the generic blue color. So lame they should’ve just kept HBO max the way it was if I could give it negative stars I would.
Title: HBO max was so good this is just ugly.

Content: With the change to Max from HBO Max, the amount of ads I’ve gotten has skyrocketed. It makes some things almost not worth watching for all the jarring breaks in the action due to the ads. I’m really disappointed that HBO would make this decision to severely increase the amount of ads. It makes me much less likely to enjoy or recommend this service to others.
Title: Went from minimal ads to way too many

Content: The user chooser UI feels like a cheap demo app. I mean come on. HBOMax had a much better UI feel, especially on Apple TV. The Apple TV version is almost embarrassing to use or even highlight compared to other apps because it drowns the screen in blue. Also the interface is very sensitive to touch remote unlike other apps.   Videos do seem to load faster which is nice.
Title: UI Downgrade from HBOMax

Content: the titles of max are great as were hbo max titles but the issues of it lie in the ui. the user interface isn’t near as good as hbo max, it is clunkier and a little slow, and they got rid of the shuffle button. biggest problem right there. the shuffle button was one of hbo max best features for the large amount of episodic non-linear story shows. good stuff but needs interface tweaks, also the blue is not a good color change. too many blue streaming service apps should’ve kept the purple. made it feel special
Title: good but not it’s predecessor

Content: Max has even more witch is good also not many glitches over all not much the app did just release not so long ago but so far it’s great   MAX don’t F this up you got something here
Title: Better then HBO max

Content: This is the best streaming app out there! I’ve had it for 2 months and there are so many channels it encompasses and good stuff, too!  I like having a yearly option.  Super happy with it.
Title: Best streaming app out there

Content: This app used to be very good before the HBO Max app re-branding. Now it has a nasty bug/glitch that resets  anything you are “casting” to another device  from the beginning ( like a tv show episode or a movie) once you awake your phone in order to pause, forward, and whatnot. Even with Background app refresh enabled on settings.
Title: Used to be great

Content: If I want to share my account on different devices to watch great shows and content I can without having to verify my IP address every time
Title: Customers come first

Content: Love Max! Has super good originals. Really digging winning time rise off lakers and peace maker at the moment. Giving 5 star because of the content. Will say wish they added more new movies but solid source for entertainment.
Title: Love Max

Content: Need to work on the interface a bit.   Make it a little cleaner and easier to distinguish the different channels not just shows, movies, genres.
Title: Interface help

Content: Whether I’m using the Max app on my Roku stick, Firestick, or smart TV, the advertisements trip up any show I’m watching. It constantly and randomly freezes, causing me to force quit the app and trying again to watch. However, I have to fast forward shows in which it usually just gets stuck again. It’s a constant pain and it’s unfortunate that this never happened with the HBO MAX app.
Title: Unhappy with new app

Content: My children love it the only downside is whenever I’m watching a scary movie on here the people come through my screen☹️ I hope you all will fix this in the future
Title: Wow

Content: The app on tv keeps skipping. The scene plays but voices and actions don’t match up. I have to keep rewinding or skipping ahead 10 seconds every time it happens. Happens way to often. It’s annoying having to keep fixing it. But overall there is a great selection to choose from.
Title: Skips

Content: okay, so i love this app so much, it has a lot of my favorite movies, and there’s no adds. the new update is kind of unnecessary tbh, the reason i think  this is because, when i go to watch my tv shows, it doesn’t say continue watching, or restart episode instead, it says watch season 1 episode 1. this could be fixed but if it doesn’t get fixed i wouldn’t be mad. this is a really good platform to watch movies and tv shows. 👍
Title: i love this app

Content: I had hbo max on my iPad mini 2 and it was fine until it updated to max and now it requires an iOS version that’s not available on the iPad mini 2
Title: Update to max knocked app off iPad mini

Content: I know it’s happened a lot but I appreciate the constant effort put in 🤷‍♂️and I love the discovery stuff that’s been added. More of you need to watch Avenue 5 so they’ll make another season.
Title: The name changes

Content: As most of you know HBO was cancelled. As it was replaced by MAX. When i say this, I thought it was going to be amazing. But the first red red flag was big 🚩 and it was the placing and design. It feels weird to me the al the channels are in the search, and the sections are at the top. Just yesterday i turned to the sidebar confused looking for the channels Thats all i have to say. Thank you for reading. 😏
Title: HBO should have stayed.

Content: Okay, I get you guys rebranded for WHATEVER reason, but you guys have ruined my experience with the app. If you haven’t used the app recently, you have to sign in. I don’t care the first time, that’s what should be expected. But EVERY TIME I USE THE APP?! AFTER I checked “Keep me signed in?” Until you fix this, it’s a 1 star. Update: Now I can’t login with my TV provider. Definitely not gonna recommend to anyone
Title: Sign in every time you use the app

Content: i LOVED hbo max. but the minute it updated and changed to max it went downhill. it freezes up on both phone and tv. laggy. won't save episode progress. doesn't let you add a custom picture to your profile anymore. won't add my RECENTLY WATCHED shows on CONTINUE WATCHING.  absolutely horrible. HATE HATE HATE this streaming service so much now.  thanks you have lost a person who once loved this streaming service👍🏻.
Title: worse streaming app ever.

Content: It’s so sad to see HBO and max brake up💔💔 I hope they can move on and live better lives. I hope this was for the better. Sending my regards to both of them 💔💔💔🙏🙏🙏   Ok but seriously it’s the same thing so far so🤷🏻‍♀️
Title: I can’t believe they broke up 💔💔

Content: Everytime it goes to commercial, the show comes back with a wide green bar across the bottom of the screen. Only happens with this app. Sometimes to fix you can exit and reopen, but it doesn’t always work and you end up watching 3 sessions of commercials in a row. Why did they change from hbo max?? Will be canceling my subscription if this doesn’t resolve in the next few days.
Title: Garbage.

Content: Why did this app even happen? The hbo/max app was great. This one is less user friendly and the most irritating thing is the swipe bar on the bottom of the screen that doesn’t disappear when watching. Hope glitches and feedback are being considered and improvement is in the near future.
Title: Not happy

Content: While there is amazing content, the UI is a little confusing and the playback tools are awful. Fast forward, rewind, skip 10 seconds either way is very delayed and needs some improvement.
Title: Great Content, frustrating functionality

Content: Don’t subscribe to this unless you want it forever. They make it almost impossible to pause or cancel. I had to contact them directly they still tried to distract me and get me to stay 3 times! I like to be on an app for a year or so pause and then come back later when new stuff has been released. But never again will I come back to hbo after that battle .
Title: Battle them to cancel

Content: Ever since the change to Max none of the shows I’m watching show up in my “continue watching” queue. Not one show. So I have to open the show and hopefully remember where I left off. Not worst thing in the world but frustrating none the less.
Title: Was my favorite streaming app

Content: Please bring back grid view when viewing the episode catalog for a show. I don’t like scrolling vertically for different episodes when I was able to see them all on one screen on the HBO Max app.
Title: Grid View

Content: The transition from HBO to Max is terrible! Especially for two large streaming giants! The continue watching feature worked for one day. It doesn’t keep track of shows you’re watching. I created a dummy profile to be able to rewatch shows that I’ve already watched before but the new Max dumped the show after one day. My patience for keeping Max is quickly running out!
Title: Merge from HBO Unacceptable

Content: I thought the HBO Max app couldn’t get any worse…. Until they debuted Max. Don’t get me wrong, they have a lot of content. The organization is terrible, it’s FULL of glitches, and it both doesn’t remember that I’m watching a tv show, and also starts episodes at the end because I’ve “already watched them.” Huge disappointment from what could have been a great opportunity to improve. Get it together.
Title: Downgrade

Content: HBO had many episodes from many shows in Spanish and now that T is not happening tried to fix it in settings but seams that it got removed
Title: Please add Spanish to audio

Content: Hate it already. Hate the CEO and all the stoopid management and board who thought it would be a great idea to junk up a great service with reality garbage. Prestige TV combined with tra$h tv. Shameful. And already glitched on role out. Like many people who were attracted to HBO Max content, I'm wondering how long before I bail. Stoopid idea all around. And btw thanks for getting rid of prestige children's shows in exchange for tra$hy reality shows that are inappropriate for the whole family. 🙄
Title: Hate it

Content: Formatting is worse than before. Roku is worse than app, frustrated by the change of avatars, change of episode selection format, you have to not only resume the episode you left off on like before, go back, go to details to restart an episode from the credits. Horrible horrible update! The only good thing from this update is the lag has been corrected.
Title: Horrible update!

Content: Streamlined and works better than previous apps.  Really enjoy all the shows.  Access to new movies is also a great feature.  HBO never misses.
Title: Finding Movies is a lot easier

Content: Before the update to Max, you were able to see the full list of episodes, but now with the update you have to scroll to the episode, without looking at a grid of all the episodes. You also can’t restart an episode from the screen, you have to rewind to restart an episode.
Title: Episode list

Content: A wide variety of movies and shows, just about everything to enjoy a cozy evening at home with friends, family, or by yourself.
Title: Easy to navigate the app!!!

Content: HBO MAX easily had the best interface out of all the streaming apps and it wasn’t even close. The new MAX app unfortunately got rid of the things that made HBO MAX elite and better then any other platform. The side panels to get to DC or TCM, or Last Chance and Just Added have been eliminated. I’m hoping this is a trial run and that they will resort back to the hbo max interface!
Title: If it’s not broke don’t fix it

Content: This new update is ridiculous first of all how are y’all going to take away the personalized profile pictures like putting an actual picture of your self rather than knockoff netflix tv/movie characters. That was one of the few things that made y’all stand out from the rest. Brah bring it back. The “max” no one’s going to call it that it’s going to continue to be called hbo max. Minimalism is a disease
Title: The new hbo max

Content: I literally use this app every day! I watch all my movies and shows on it! ITS AWESOME! This is  great. I find all things that I need to watch on it. This is literally the best movie app ever. I would recommend it..
Title: Best movie app for ever!

Content: I completely enjoy Max!! They have great selections with awesome recommendations. New and old classics. My favorite is the horror movies, they are outstanding. I recommend it! Now’s the time to subscribe during the month of Halloween October!!!! Best of luck.
Title: Great selections.

Content: I’m enjoying Max because of the good selection of movies that are available to watch and or view.  Also,  Max has vintage movies and animation  that I enjoy watching.
Title: Better Movies Selection

Content: Great content and high quality when it works. Works for me on my TV about 30% of the time. Randomly get the sound with no picture when Netflix and all other apps work just fine. Internet is fine, performed all updates and still glitchy. Its sad and disappointing.
Title: Still intermittently glitchy

Content: The content on Max is great but the app freezes almost every time I use it. In order to get past the frozen screen, which appears to be loading, I have to completely close the app, reset my phone’s internet connection, and then opening the app. Not fun and I’m kind of getting tired of doing it.
Title: Content is great but the app…

Content: I’ve never had an issue with HBO Max until it became Max. We have reword every troubleshooting step we possibly could. When streaming max in our tv some movies will randomly not play but the sound is still going. It’s stupid and we’re probably just gonna cancel the subscription since the stuff we want to watch will show with a green or black screen with sound.
Title: App Glitches

Content: Constantly lagging and crashing on multiple tv I have, if it wasn’t for some of the title Max has that no one else does, I would have gave up on it a long time ago.  Ready for a long over due upgrade……
Title: Worst streaming service that you have to pay for.

Content: You guys are always great, but I was trying to share a documentary with a friend of mine and I wasn’t able to share the link. You guys should work on that.
Title: You guys are always great but…

Content: Every other time I open the app on my phone I have to re-sign in. It’s nothing detrimental but I figured that if I’m having this issue others could as well. Hope it gets fixed.
Title: Sign in issues

Content: I don’t understand why you all changed your name it was very original the first time very complicated and confusing at the beginning but the apps ok
Title: HBO max was fine

Content: I don’t mind the app’s aesthetic changes and all of that, but the content itself is so dark on my iPad. It’s unbelievable. Whenever I start playing something, I keep trying to turn up the brightness, but it’s up all the way. I’ve never had this problem with the HBO app or any other streaming app… Just this updated Max version. I hope they fix this. It’s really annoying.
Title: So dark since it became MAX!

Content: I always used HBO Max for my streaming but I despise this new Max app as it now asks me to log in every time I use the app where as HBO Max never did. It’s also harder to search for content as well. Not sure why HBO is going backwards with their new streaming platform but hopefully it will get fixed.
Title: Why ruin a good thing!!??

Content: It has everything you can ever want from your favorite superhero to action to drama you might even to be able to find so cartoons you grew up with or tv shows you grew up by far one of my favorite streaming services
Title: Max

Content: I literally love this app, it literally has like too much and I love it but, I hate the name, why did they have to change it, HBO Max was fine before 😭. I love this app though but until they change jt back I’m keeping this at a 4.
Title: great but bad name change

Content: Since the max update it never saves what show I’m watching. Instead of it being in continue watching on the home page I have to search for it?? Beyond annoying. Also, the marketing of this merge is horrible. The app is cluttered and not good at showcasing/recommending things to watch.
Title: Bad Merge

Content: The only thing you need is more movies or series with Spanish language tracks or subtitles. Pleas!!! Include Spanish language tracks in The Flinstones.
Title: Spanish subtitles o tracks for your movies and on The Flinstones! You have a great service!

Content: I love the layout of this app. The organization is essential to a good streaming app, and MAX gets it right. So many streaming platforms apps make it hard to find your own list and with MAX it’s readily available.
Title: Great app!

Content: I ABSOLUTELY HATE THE NEW APP!  You guys should’ve left it the way it was it was perfect. The ‘continue watching’ is never what you were recently watching. If i go to the show/episode I was watching I have to start the whole episode over. It’s annoying. I can’t add a picture to my profile anymore. They should go back to the old version of the app.
Title: Horrible

Content: Every single time I want to resume a show I have to go search for the show, find the correct episode and restart. It isn’t logging everything under “continue watching.” This app is so buggy. Shows still freeze video when you start viewing for 5 seconds.
Title: Fix the “continue viewing!”

Content: So glad we pay for the streaming services only to still have ads. On top of that it’s all the same ads over and over again. I also feel like they purposely place the ads in the middle of the scenes instead of between the scenes to make them as annoying as possible to try and push you to pay extra for no ads.
Title: Ads are horrible

Content: The purple color of the HBO Max app was incredibly pleasing. I really wish they had chosen that color instead of the rather dull blue. Other than that, the app is excellent, and I've already “discovered” some new shows. But seriously, bring back the purple!!
Title: Bring Back Purple

Content: Ever since the site changed from HBO/MAX to MAX, we are getting the “not available in your region” error on Desktop. Terrible customer service online, where they seem befuddled by this. Never had any issues with the HBO/MAX site. Filed a ticket at the “App Response” site…received NO HELP at all except stupid form letter responses. Never really was investigated. Will cancel as soon as possible.
Title: “Region error” since switch from HBO/MAX to MAX, App Response site STINKS

Content: Same great shows, but the new app doesn’t always save properly in the “continue watching” section leaving, you to remember what episode/time you were at. Sometimes slow or glitchy depending what device you use.
Title: Interface issues

Content: I would give 5 stars if they change how continue watching works. Right now it removes shows from my continue watching unless I stop in the middle of an episode. If I'm between episodes, it disappears and I have to search to find it and hope I remember where I was on it. Very annoying 😡
Title: Annoying continue watching

Content: Klugy experience for rewatching shows. Doesn’t know where you left off, jumps around when going to the next episode, rewind gets stuck, options to start from the beginning limited. Hopefully they work it out
Title: Worse for re-watching shows

Content: The app on Roku & iOS fails to save the series/episode you leave off on (Continue Watching). A few other minor bugs here and there. However, overall it works faster & better so far than the previous app that was recently discontinued. Fix the Continue Watching and I’d give it 4 stars
Title: “Continue Watching” broken, other is OK

Content: I am finding that the app is not saving my progress for shows that I am watching. This means I have to look up the show and episode that I am on almost every time I want to continue watching something.
Title: Progress

Content: Everything looks the same pretty much. Only one problem. All my profiles, history and saved list are not there. It opened without me logging in, but no history was retained in the new app.
Title: One issue

Content: The new App is full of bugs and offers bad user experience on the Apple TV 4K: while playing, swiping up or down doesn’t show the options (like audio/subtitles), and apparent connectivity issues (when the box exists the sleeping mode or after a few minutes of inactivity), “my stuff” (what a bad naming, this Hulu-like terminology belittles the quality of the content) cannot be sorted alphabetically.
Title: Poor Engineering and bad UX

Content: My husband and I normally watch shows together via FaceTime calls and SharePlay while he’s in Iraq.  Since this has been updated we haven’t been able to do that and his sense of normalcy is slipping away without our show watching ritual. I’ve cried myself to sleep since I’ve been dealing with this. Please fix this bug as soon as possible.
Title: SharePlay???

Content: The app is new, maybe improved but there are things that need to be worked on. Whenever you want to skip past something, it pauses and takes a second to load. That’s just to name the only thing I came across. Thank you for reading.
Title: Delayed reactions

Content: The time and date and wifi and power, the three dots at the top, and the bar at the bottom, all continue to appear while playing a movie or show in the new "Max" player.  In addition, an issue that's remained true since HBO Max, Max doesn't work with my iPad's external keyboard. Ideally Spacebar would pause/play, etc.
Title: player doesn't work well with iOS

Content: The seems way slower than the HBO max. All the loading animations further gives you feeling that you are waiting for long time. I understand that it was supposed to give you the feeling that it is upgraded version of HBO max app but they should keep it simple. Also I was looking forward to see the discovery content but selection is disappointing.
Title: Slower App + Discovery content is disappointing

Content: Lost all my streaming progress as well as my list and recommends. Why they changed the name from the only company that makes quality content(HBO) to MAX is beyond me. Now instead of paying 15 a month for 4k I have to pay 20 cause of some channels added I’ll never watch, sick! The exec that made this decision should get a demotion.
Title: Quite possibly the worst rebrand in history.

Content: Usability is great and I feel like the movie and show selections fill out the space more here on my iPad, the only critique I have is of the app color changing. I have too many apps that are blue already, wish they would have opted to keep the purple.
Title: Usability Great; App Icon Not Great

Content: Been watching this network many many years and it’s always getting better keep up the good work
Title: Awesome Network

Content: No matter if I try to watch on a tv, phone, laptop, etc, I can’t watch for more than 5 minutes without receiving “something went wrong”. I know it is not my internet connection and I am the only person accessing max at one time. I can’t ever seem to get through a 20-25 minute episode without it quitting on me. This has been an issue for months. Please fix.
Title: “Something went wrong”

Content: Max is my favorite streaming app. I watch it during lunch everyday and while my son is at sports practices every night. But every single day, I have to sign in again. It’s really annoying it won’t just stay signed in like it does literally everywhere else.
Title: Please fix this!

Content: The app works fine on my phone. But for some weird reason I have Apple TV 4K the 2021 version. When I navigate through the menu for movies and tv shows the tiles fade in and out and do weird screen glitch. Idk if it’s easy fixbut definitely a bug or something hopefully can be patched or fixed in another update.
Title: Bug on Apple TV 4K

Content: I fell asleep watching a series. Woke up with an error message, and went to continue watching and it entirely disappeared from the app. This has happened like 4-5x all with different shows or movies. Fully updated app, tried troubleshooting, nothing works. The shows just randomly reappear after quite awhile.
Title: Shows disappearing?

Content: This streaming service is my #1 favorite because it has a great collection of horror and sci fi movies and is one of the few services that has some of the old Godzillas
Title: Great movie options

Content: The app was better.  Always hard to find episodes from easily from the menu, and doesn’t have preview scrolling.  Now the app restarts the show I am watching every time I open the app or forget it was the last app I had open when I unlock my phone.  Just bad getting worse here.
Title: Shows Restart

Content: You can watch a lot of shows and movies but a few you can’t like on Netflix Also still can’t see a few shows and movies max
Title: Max, I like it

Content: Seems like there’s a bug where when you open the app, it starts whatever show you’re watching over from the beginning when streaming to a google cast. This app has been clunky and I try to avoid it when I can.
Title: Glitch

Content: I never had issues with the old hbo max, but ever since they changed it to MAX, there’s ads non stop and it always glitches out. 9/10 times I use the app at some point in my watching it just stops and freezes. I than have to close out the app if it lets me and try it again. Horrible change, I liked the old Hbo so much better.
Title: Worst change from the old HBO max

Content: Since I don’t have cable it was a nice addition to see CNN added to be able to catch news every now and then, till I saw the massive CNN MAX logo.   My first oled panel had damage from a static logo and im not making that mistake again.    Why do networks insist on these tacky intense logos, at least dim it a little or make it more translucent, wont be watching.
Title: CNN static logo will kill your oled

Content: Every time I use Chromecast the volume starts at the max level. This only happens with this app and I did all the necessary troubleshooting but it still happens. Also, freezing is still a problem. Sometimes I have to manually turn off my tv. Again, these are problems I only experience with this app and I have done all the basic troubleshooting.
Title: Volume Problem

Content: Thank you, Max. The variety of movies and shows available can satisfy all viewers. I’m particularly fond of the way people can be added to the account.
Title: Better Than Netflix

Content: Since the changeover from HBO Max to Max, I’ve had nothing but issues. The issues are as frequent and recent as the last two days. Unfortunately, it’s always something new despite updates.   - Slow or frozen subtitles - Persistent loading issues on selective media, while are fine with others at the same time.  - App closes on iPhone during watching, while not disconnecting streaming, but unable to reconnect to stream. Video still actively streaming.  - App sleeps during play, then will not allow play/pause/stop functions with and without buttons present.
Title: Max App Functionality

Content: I like that you could now minimize the screen and do other things while watching Max on your phone
Title: Better than ever

Content: I like hbo the most as far as the streaming platforms go. Although I wish they would update the movies a bit more to keep up with Netflix.
Title: 5 stars

Content: Why am I constantly having to sign-in again, sometimes multiple times a week?!?! My account is generally used on a mobile device and I’m required to sign-in again all the time. This never happened before MAX.
Title: Signs out ALL the time

Content: The MAX app has been a disaster since it launched. A lot of the content included have audio syncing issues with the video on both the mobile and Roku devices. A new issue that cropped up today is that anytime you pause a film or a program the app doesn’t retain the stopping point and reverts back to the start the show over movie. This app needs some serious work.
Title: This app is clunky

Content: Max is the best it has so many different varieties of movies to choose from for instance I LOVE the Harry Potter movie and also The Hobbit and guess what they have ALL of the Hobbit movies and ALL of the Harry Potter movies I love this app I definitely recommend it
Title: The best I love it!

Content: I haven’t been able to watch anything normally since the app updated and I’m about to cancel my subscription. When streaming to a device it doesn’t allow you to change the audio setting and it wouldn’t let me turn off the spoken description thing that describes EVERYTHING that’s happening on screen. It’s I sufferable and I’m so tired of it.
Title: Horrible when streaming

Content: I really enjoy watching max there’s always a good selection to choose from. I will definitely tell people to at least try a free trial of it. They will absolutely enjoy it and subscribe to it.
Title: I love Max!!

Content: The day the app launched, all was good switching from HBO Max, but within a week or so, all my profiles disappeared, contacting support was told it was a known issue and it was being worked on. Well it has been weeks since then and my profiles are still gone. This is not a review for the content, merely the app itself.
Title: All profiles gone

Content: Has all the best content - both older movies/shows, and the best/most daring new and recent TV shows like Succession. App experience could be improved
Title: Has all the best content

Content: I like the HBO/Cinemax app now called Max. But I feel that they are pushing the pride agenda too much. A persons sexual orientation and preference is a personal thing. It’s out there to much. I dont care what you are or pretend to be or think you are.
Title: Pushing it a to much.

Content: For starters HBO Max had a great. variety of TV shows and it’s also really easy to find TV shows you want to watch on HBO Max. On my HBO max it has a great recommended for me and I feel like HBO max has a great understanding on what people like to watch from fantasy to science fiction.
Title: 5 star review on HBO Max

Content: Netflix has a system where you can like and dislike shows/movies. This allows for better recommendations. Please start this for Max as well. It would make the app much better.
Title: Please fix recommendations

Content: Their content is way too dark! Their employees and management must be depressed. Everything seems violent, fringe, urban, harsh, like it came out of a single guy in the city's head. They are COMPLETELY out of touch with women!!!! They want happy, feel good movies. Hire some different people and stop getting your influence from mainstream news, they are predators and don't represent real Americans.
Title: Too dark

Content: Definitely a huge upgrade in app performance. If you had HBO Max and got annoyed, they fixed a lot of issues I highly recommend download Max.
Title: Huge upgrade

Content: When I cast a show from my phone to the tv, the audio description will NOT turn off. However when I use airplay to make it go on the tv, it turns off. It doesn’t do it with other apps. Besides that, the app is just fine
Title: Audio Description Problem

Content: Still not sure why they rebranded to Cinemax which was always the stepchild. I can’t tell any differences other than being forced to install a new app. Would love ability to block series or movies I don’t want suggested over and over again that I have no intention to watch.
Title: ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

Content: The only plus that comes with Max compared to HBO is that max has a “my list” to save your favorite shows. Max rarely ever saves your place in the episodes. “Continue watching” is so buggy! Hate that I ALWAYS have to re-search up my shows and flip through all the episodes trying to figure out where I left off beforehand.
Title: Ehh.

Content: Do you want the pause button to be totally non functional while casting? Do you want to have your show start buffering during the most dramatic moments, despite a 200 mbps connection that's working well for every other app? Look no farther!  This app is trash, and it's a travesty that HBO is sending it out to paying subscribers
Title: If only I could've guessed that the new app would be worse

Content: Max added some good new content but the new apps have issues. Continue Watching either doesn’t advance shows to the next episode or it drops shows completely. Lost some nice features in Recently Added and Leaving Soon. The new app has some version of Just Added which doesn’t show the most recently added content. Comments apply to Roku app as well.
Title: Awful Max apps

Content: The quality of the shows and content simply are a league above the rest. Max just transitioned from the older platform so there a few hiccups here and there but for me so mad it’s a seamless transition and it’s amazing
Title: Max Supremecy

Content: Would be better if you looked up the actor in the search bar their movies would appear and a better navigation system would be better to.
Title: Navigating and assortment

Content: The interface overall is much simpler. Its not always a good thing. I gave it 3 stars because it has good shows, but the interface is terrible and my “continue watching” shows have not saved since it crushed to Max. The old app was good the way it was.
Title: Dumbed down version

Content: Every time I watch a show, the progress is never saved and it starts all over from episode one season, one whether I’m on my TV or my phone. It never saves progress of where I was while watching a show and it’s starting to become annoying.
Title: Continued Shows

Content: Wow I used to watch HBO shows and I always ended up with a headache. Frustrated, feeling like, why couldn’t that show have been dumber, and exactly the same as all the other dumb reality shows on tv/streaming…  well I’m here to tell you that the geniuses behind the new MAX! (Not like Cinemax, you silly!) have figured it out. This new network has all of things you thought you were paying to avoid!
Title: It’s like HBO, but the opposite!

Content: I can't adjust audio dynamic range compression from the non-standard HUD at the bottom of the screen. Failing to adhere to standard Apple audio and video conventions and preferences makes me dislike using this app. It's a disappointing downgrade from the HBO MAX app.   Please address these many issues so that we may continue to enjoy MAX content on our Apple TVs.
Title: Falls short on Apple TV

Content: Eh not really sure what they were trying to do but now the new Max doesn’t give notifications for new episodes for series you have added (HBO Max always updated on new episodes saved to your list). A little annoying but hope it gets fixed soon. Just glad I had apple tv to notify me.
Title: Made things harder

Content: I like everything but I kinda miss when you can put yourself as your profile picture :(
Title: Profile picture

Content: Fast, pretty good content and interface. I would like to be able to find the tv channels and genres faster especially on set top devices.
Title: Vast app with pretty good interface

Content: Wow, now I can actually log in on my iPhone, went 4 months without being able to login with the old app that was just terrible. This one seems much improved, I like the separation into “channels” TLC, Discovery, etc.
Title: Can Finally Log In

Content: It’s overall good but when I’m watching my show and turn it off and do something else and comeback on the app the show disappears off my continue watching and I have to search where I left off
Title: It’s mid 😀

Content: 1. Playing in the background  2. Previously watched episodes play from the end, not the beginning. If I’m opening something I’ve already watched, it’s not because I want to continue from where I’ve left.
Title: Gotta bring back some features

Content: I like that it tells you to watch again if you already watched it and there’s no ads and I really like that show Max is really good and there’s more movie options
Title: Rileey

Content: The creation of the new app is so stupid. If you’re going to rebrand why not just change the existing app instead of making everyone download a new app that’s the same?! Also ever since the change I have no “continue watching”. Every time I open the app I have to search my show and fast forward because my history is not saved.
Title: Rebrand messed it all up!

Content: I was wondering why HBO max app was so hard to navigate and laggy. It’s because y’all were working on this !! It’s so much easier to find new stuff and the selection is a scroll away . Blessed!
Title: Awesome!!

Content: Nice to have all the WB/Discovery content in one place, though I do wish it was easier to find the Investigation Discovery slate. I have to click through a bunch of pages or search to find my shows. Other than that, all good.
Title: New max app

Content: This! This is an app that actually has everything you could possibly need in streaming.  Huge movies, huge TV series, huge networks, all in one app.
Title: Finally

Content: I had bought hbo max premium because it would let you screen share and me and my bf would watch our shows on it at night on facetime, it was one of the only apps that let you do it and you had to pay extra but i was fine with it bc it was worth it to me. The new max version does not allow screen sharing and im extremely sad. Hopefully they fix this.
Title: screensharinng

Content: Hello, While I was watching “The Grim Adventures Of Billy And Mandy”, all or some of the episodes are mixed up! (Including seasons). Please fix the problem and put them in order. Thank you so much! :)
Title: Episode mix-up

Content: New launch a bust. The app allows me to login through my provider, then takes me to a start streaming page, every time I click it it gives an error message. I have tried uninstalling & redownloading 4 times & each time I get same error: An error occurred! Something went wrong. Please try again. OK”
Title: New launch a bust. Error after login through provider start streaming isn’t working

Content: They got amazing films from the best filmmakers that, for the longest time, weren’t on any other streaming platforms. Ingmar Bergman, Andrei Tarkovsky, Claire Denis, Won Kar Wai and so many others. Please for the love of god don’t change anything. Just keep adding good stuff
Title: Cinema

Content: Have a great weekend too and we will see your house in the next couple weeks so so I just don’t have a good day today or today
Title: Have you been

Content: I watch it every day best app to watch shows and movies on. And the hard part about it is the back and forward buttons it is very hard
Title: MAX

Content: Max is slower than HBO Max! The adding of Discovery app content was not wanted! Don’t care about 90 Day fiancé & other Discovery content! Don’t care for never reliable CNN taking up space that could be good movies! The recently add B/R content is just a head shaker! Not a NBA or NHL fan! It’s just more wasted space again! Discovery needs to be separated from Max! Do that & Return this app back to HBO Max with the content removed from HBO Max returned!
Title: Fact, HBO Max was better!

Content: I love that they have lots of show to choose from coming from a person who gets bored of shows easily
Title: Love all the options

Content: This is without a doubt the best streaming service you can possibly get it’s loaded on movies and tv shows. The amount of bangers they have on here is insanity. 5/5 easily
Title: Glitch in the matrix

Content: This whole app needs to be scrapped and rebuilt from the ground up. Audio for the blind plays and won’t turn off. It takes an hour and a half to watch a 50 minute episode because the show stops whenever the app is opened after a screen timeout. Just too buggy. I’m considering canceling my Max subscription just based on the app alone.
Title: Terrible functionality

Content: I have really enjoyed the HBO content, but if by month’s end they don’t stop trying to cut the creators out of profits, I’ll be canceling my subscription. Everyone should.
Title: Will ditch great platform to support writers/actors

Content: Max has more of my fave shows than any other streaming service along with a great catalog of old movies. I watch it more than any other!
Title: The best streaming service!

Content: Please for the love of God get a user experience designer for this app. Why when you finish watching something does it still show up on your continue watching list? And when you go to select another episode, it’s just a blank blue screen until you scroll through the episodes. Doesn’t flow well, clunky. Clearly designed by a software engineer with no usability training.
Title: Get a UX Designer!!

Content: I love the fact that it gives you different options for all the other stations!! pretty freaking amazing, I’m on there so much more now than what I was
Title: Love!!!

Content: Max is great but HBO max was better because it was easier to find her things so I’m not hating on it but it’s a lot worse than before but it’s still OK
Title: It’s great but why did you change HBO max to max

Content: There is so many ads the only reason I got this thing was so I could watch the vampire diaries and I can’t enjoy it because there’s 9 ads each for 5 mins it feels and when I try and skip to a part it makes me watch all the ads again NOT WORTH IT def cancelling my subscription I recommend you guys do to
Title: Not worth it

Content: Somehow with their most recent update that talks about bug fixes, this piece of garbage is even worse. It doesn't continue to play to the next episode. It hangs after an episode and doesn't play the next one until you close and reopen it. It sometimes just has a black screen with no video while audio plays.
Title: Just got even worse

Content: Max is already one of my favorite streaming services just one little thing is it possible to add more animated shows if you know what I mean like Naruto or like one piece demon slayer but it’s okay if you can’t cause this service is already a good one
Title: Anime??

Content: I think that this app has amazing choices to look through. I mainly use it for the DC shows but it’s all good. One thing that I would like to see is some more just audio stuff like the Batman audio that they have.
Title: This is great

Content: I love having to sign into my cable provider every time I use the mobile app or fire stick. The old HBO GO app would keep you signed in for years without the hassle of requiring you to sign back in, but not anymore. We have moved back a few steps with this one
Title: It’s ok

Content: The app is whatever i could care less that you guys designed a new app. However removing one of the features that actually made me want to have a subscription to hbo is ridiculous! I get the app is new but it would make it 10x more if you added back the feature that you took away. Please bring it back!
Title: BRING BACK SHAREPLAY

Content: I like the additional movie/series options but since I’ve downloaded this app my HBO films & shows glitch when I try to play them. The entire screen turns green but I can hear the audio. I have to exit and replay in order to get it to play properly. This happens on both my phone and tv.
Title: Needs to be fixed

Content: I like HBO max cause i can download any and everything I want and watch it offline. I’m finna be on a 4 hour flight so it really comes in handy. 5 stars 👍
Title: Best app to watch shows and movies offline

Content: I think it’s a terrible idea to get rid of the HBO name. HBO is iconic,, everyone knows it, and associates it with quality entertainment. Max as a word is meaningless. No one has a mental association with it. It’s confusing,, that HBO is gone (????). A very dumb choice, to change the name.
Title: HBO to max

Content: I had switched over from Netflix to HBO Max since a long time ago. But now that it is Max it is terrible. The screen zooms in and only shows close up of faces instead of the whole screen. Your shoes don’t leave off where you left so it literally starts you off from the beginning. I am seriously considering on canceling my subscription until this is fixed.
Title: Terrible

Content: I don’t get why they did this. Hbo max was fine and worked fine. All this did was add new bugs and annoying things, like constantly rotating my screen upside down then when I flip it, it just does the same thing over and over, there’s pop ups, and it crashes constantly, absolutely terrible and no reason for the change.
Title: no reason for it

Content: Can’t watch an episode because it keeps playing it from the last second of the episode! No start over button. The automatic landscape mode even with orientation lock on?! And this is what the 3rd iteration?! I saw LinkedIn posts of people fired from the previous app. Maybe it’s just as well for them because this app is ridiculous
Title: No start over button?

Content: Great programming * Streaming is smooth   The ONLY complaint and the reason it’s getting a single star is that the app only sporadically saves viewing progress. The “Continue Watching” option is as elusive as Spring in Texas. This is across all platforms used, Roku, iPad, and iPhone. I have to make notes so I know where to pick up the next time I’m watching. Super frustrating
Title: Make a note of where you left off

Content: They tout large numbers for episodes of shows, but outside of HBO and Discovery content, there isn’t much in the way of TV shows. Don’t get me wrong, HBO content is the best out there, but I’ve seen most of it. Discovery content is mostly garbage, some good stuff, but I’m not interested in most of it. That would be fine if there was some other stuff from Warner Television, but there is almost nothing.
Title: Lacking Content

Content: Food network and discovery are a nice addition but live channels of both of those along with a Game of Thrones channel and a Sopranos channel would be nice. Always a good app and always my go to but ADD LIVE CHANNELS!!! HBO runs all since the old days of cable and in my opinion always will.
Title: Needs live channels

Content: Excellent! Just need more content in Spanish. For the area of Puerto Rico. I speak and understand. But a lot of people don’t. Like member of my family. That the only reason why they are not using the app.
Title: Love this app.

Content: We were watching Harry Potter in Spanish a few days before we were forced to switch to this app… downloaded the new app and the only options for Audio Language now is English only with subtitle options for English and Spanish only. Lost a customer until they fix this issue and bring back ALL the audio languages back, it’s unfair to foreign customers
Title: Audio Languages

Content: The best blockbusters, now easier to find them by genre. Also the app doesn’t crash if you scroll down the choices. Thank you!
Title: Amazing choices!

Content: Unfortunately, on my iPad the white bar at the bottom of the screen doesn’t fade away as it should, and as it does on other apps used for viewing content like TV shows and movies. This essentially ruins the experience. This is basic stuff that you got right with the HBO Max app. This is a big step backwards.
Title: White bar at bottom

Content: I don’t really like how they changed their app thing to the blue color instead of the purple and how they changed it to just max. But it still has exquisite shows/movies and a plethora of choices to watch. Overall good streaming service.
Title: Max

Content: When scrolling through episodes of a season of a show on the max app on Apple TV it does not show episode descriptions despite having tons of room below the picture of the show, you have to click on every single episode to see the description which makes it impossible to find which show you want to watch
Title: Apple TV app needs to show episode descriptions

Content: In my personal opinion, it’s better than Netflix. I can watch my old shows on here and I love it so much ! 10/10 would recommend !
Title: It’s the best

Content: Downloaded and opened it. It says hello and my name and to click to start streaming that all my stuff is there. I click on the button and get a message saying “An error occurred. Something went wrong. Please try again.” It has an “ok” button to hit but even that doesn’t work! I’ve tried multiple times and still get the message. So glad they “upgraded” 🙄
Title: Doesn’t work

Content: Thumbnails have stopped working except for the “Continue Watching “ ones. Haven’t been able to browse unless I click on each one individually just to see what’s the movie.  I’ve refrained from using it just cuz of the hassle
Title: Thumbnails won’t load

Content: Just got the notification that my account is going to be downgraded. Reducing number of active streams from 3 to 2 and more importantly removing access to 4K content. I hate when companies downgrade the plan you have in a play to try and force you to upgrade so you pay more money. *thumbs down*
Title: Downgrading accounts is a greedy play.

Content: When playing downloads from phone to tv vis cable, audio lays but tv screen remains black. App is updated, did not resolve. Have not uninstalled yet because don’t want to lose downloads as I don’t currently have wifi.  Only plays image when playing alone on the phone. Problem persisting.
Title: Issues

Content: Ever since I’ve had Max, I haven’t had any problems with connections or anything by far. They’re the best treatment service I have at the moment thank you so much.
Title: Good afternoon

Content: When I start streaming the TV volume gets set to 100%.  My other streaming apps don't do this on the same setup.  And I couldn't find any relevant articles in the App Support pages.   Older versions of the app did not have this problem. Otherwise, the app looks great and there is plenty of content.
Title: Max volume sound issue

Content: I had to cancel my TV service it got so high and I'm on disability. Then I found out with my ATT account I get Max for free. This has been a life saver for me without cable. Thank you so much MAX!!!
Title: Happy ATT gives this to us.

Content: I have always loved HBO Max but I hate that every time I start watching a show where I left off it starts it over and sometimes it starts a few episodes behind where I’m actually at and it’s getting annoying, it happens every single time!🫤
Title: Love it but…

Content: HBO Max has the best content hands down, BUT when it first came out it lagged, buffered and restarted. Then it got better. Perfect even! Now an update happened adding a bunch of stuff I don’t want and it’s worse than it was to start. I’ve tried to watch Game of Thrones and so far I’m on the 2nd episode and I’ve had to restart 4 times!!!!! I wish they would’ve left well enough alone!
Title: Update is a downgrade

Content: Overall I’m happy with the content on the app. I do still miss how the old app handled recently added movies. I don’t understand why they didn’t transfer that feature over to the new app.
Title: Lots of good content!

Content: This is the 4th update that I have had to download with in the last 6 months!!???? Can you just keep 1 app updated and not have the users download the “new” updates every single time. Cause at this point I might just cancel the subscription
Title: Why do I constantly have to download the “new” updated app.

Content: I paid for my subscription and now you’re charging me again. I can’t get past the renew subscription screen. This is so frustrating. I’ve had nothing but problems since I downloaded your MAX app! Should have kept the old one and just updated it. This has been nothing but frustrating
Title: Paid my subscription can’t get past renewal screen

Content: There are a lot of bugs happening. When i go to download a show my screen turns black & i have to restart the app but then it does it again. It’s also showing that i don’t have anything downloaded when i do.
Title: Downloading shows

Content: This has my fav childhood shows I’ve been wanting to watch since ever! Keep up the work and may I suggest if possible add more childhood demand shows
Title: Favorite childhood shows

Content: I have it on my tv and forgot my login stuff. So that’s the only place I can watch it. I was watching the Big Bang Theory and I forgot was season and episode I’m on. It only gave me one notification before to update the app. No it won’t load and it doesn’t say anywhere that I need to update it. And now I’m stuck with no clue we’re I left off on my shows. So to sum it all up Max is awful now.
Title: I hate it

Content: I really love the content and stream it on multiple devices, including my iPad, iPhone, and TV. However, one annoying bug is that it logs me out on my phone every couple of days. I have no idea why I’ll open up the app and I’ll be logged out.
Title: Keeps logging me out on iPhone

Content: What I love about this app is they have a lot of my favorite TV shows on there plus a lot of my favorite TV shows are descriptive audio. That’s very important to someone like myself. I am totally blind.
Title: My review

Content: Downloaded the app and tried to get in through the provider option (as I always did with HBO Max). I put my email in and hit continue but it did not work. There was completely no response. I refreshed the app, deleted and downloaded it again, but it still wouldn’t let me in. How can I use an app if it’s so buggy that I can’t even get in? :/
Title: Won’t let me log in

Content: Some of the Discovery product is surprisingly well produced and beautiful. I am enjoying the product more than i anticipated; I thought it would be less “HBOish”.
Title: Enjoying The Merge

Content: You have to remember where you paused your show/movie when you’re casting because the app won’t do it after 8-10 minutes. Whatever you’re watching will start over with an ad and it’s frustrating. I love how much is available but this seems like a basic detail to have.
Title: Casting issues

Content: Hey hb…sorry max…changing your name every three months is getting old. Hbo app, about go,hbo max, now max… why….I’d like to update this to a negative 5. Now, I can’t sign in even. It’s saying I have to reset my password through xfinity and the hbo account, then won’t let me. It’s working on 1/2 of my devices and not the others. Can’t even sign in now. Way to go guys, you could mess up a 1 car parade
Title: New name same issues

Content: This app works much better than the old hbo max app. I am watching the same content, but functionality is better.
Title: Much better app than old hbo

Content: How are you making us switch, to app that has so many bugs. Get your budget in order, fix this glitched out app
Title: Fix the app

Content: It kept all of my shows and movies there. Also finally got to watch Villainous. Do recommend.
Title: Same but a little better!

Content: The days of Covid HBO Max are over. No more great films every month. The new shows are pretty mediocre at best. The app upgrade is somehow worse. The HGTV/Food Network shows are a nice add but feel out of place on the main hub. Feels like an odd paring. Should have kept the hub model and left the HBO shows on the main page. Also the app is completely broken on Roku. Big ups on some of the Magnolia network stuff really nice paring.
Title: Icon to Reality

Content: I give this a four-star, because when you open a movie, it takes a whole five seconds for it to load up. Now I don’t know if it’s a problem with my phone or your app.
Title: Review form Jonathan

Content: The load times are insane. I’m literally writing this as the show I am watching has frozen trying to load. How was this not just a simple name change on the same app. I get the reasoning to change the name, but what was the point of switching apps and causing more bugs to appear. Not well thought out planning.
Title: Loading….

Content: I'm incredibly annoyed with the new app, it won't save my place in shows I'm currently watching and shows I've finished won't leave my continue watching. This is frustrating and I'm sick of fast forwarding to get to the spot I left off at.  Fix the stupid glitches and stop making me download a new app every couple of years.
Title: MAX is glitchy and won't save my continue watching

Content: Max is like a sign of disrespect to what was HBOmax, hbo was way better but they had to ruin it with the prices and bad movies of max, they should go back to what used to be Hbo max there was no point of adding more. The organization was so bad and the design too now it looks cheap and like every other app, used to look so much better than other apps but not it became a bad design app and became like every other app.
Title: Go back to HBOmax

Content: I don’t do woke and seems MAX will be even more woke than HBO. Taking a pause to see what future releases they have and if the movies and shows offered are not full lefty propaganda.
Title: Just Canceled Subscription

Content: Was worried about the app switching over to max, especially a week before my SUCCESSION comes to a close over the weekend, didn’t want any hiccups but seems like smooth sailing! LOVE HBO and it’s content!!
Title: Smooth sailing!!

Content: Doesn’t run smooth, when running PiP on mobile in between episodes it closes and plays in the back ground. you can still hear it just can’t see it. You have to open the app back up to resume watching the video.
Title: Clunky

Content: It’s like they didn’t even try. I haven’t been able to log in even though my email and password are correct, I even reset my password thinking it was wrong but no. At first when I was able to watch in the app, the subtitles would be all wrong and the show would glitch out before sending me back to the home screen. This is a hot pile of garbage.
Title: Horrible

Content: It wasn’t full screen, and when I keep putting the movie on in the iPad screen and removes it from it when it ended so I am angry for the feedback
Title: Not it

Content: Not sure what everyone is crying about. All I had to do was download the app and I was good to go. It’s literally the same thing, just blue instead of purple. Must be the John Campea fanboys that are bummed out about the name change.
Title: Love it

Content: App’s UI is pretty user friendly. There’s others who are still figuring it out (peacock, paramount plus) but Max has it down.
Title: Decent selection of content

Content: It’s ridiculous that this was allowed to launch without supporting TV app integration, and without supporting 4K on Apple TV. It’s almost like this company doesn’t understand how to build software. Apple should have held their app from release until the basic issues were fixed, which is exactly what would have happened to a smaller developer.
Title: Missing features, broken app ok launch day

Content: I signed in with my provider account and when I hit the start streaming button I get an error and an “ok” button with no way to recover, fix, or even log out of the app. I can’t even tap on the ok button. I have to force close the app to enter the perpetual error cycle again. Even deleting the app to start again doesn’t allow me to sign out and sign back in.
Title: I keep getting an error

Content: Max is like HBO Max, but with a bunch of reality TV and basic cable tackiness, which used to be below the “prestige” of HBO, now sharing the bill with movies and original premium programming.  It feels like a downgrade.  And renaming the “Hub” as “Brand Spotlight” is prioritizing marketing over the quality of my experience.
Title: Where “prestige” went to die

Content: The only way I could see the picture is by looking in my phone to find it on the
Title: The only

Content: HBO managed to screw the pooch on the new Max app.  Everything worked perfectly before and then they rebrand and it’s been a disaster.  They need to fire their entire IT department.  App wouldn’t save your place before and now it restarts the movie every time you open the app back up.  Need to pause it, then you need to find your place again after it restarts from the beginning.
Title: Terrible

Content: The Max app is the only streaming services that seems to buffer constantly when casting. I’ve followed all the recommended tips and it still does not work. It is not an internet or streaming device issue as I’ve tested those. After being on Reddit it seems this issue is happening all over. Fix your app or people will start canceling.
Title: Constantly Buffering

Content: Why would you download content? Probably because you’re going on a trip where you won’t have access to wifi. Well, with this app, you can’t actually access your downloaded content unless you’re connected to wifi 🤦‍♂️
Title: Can’t Access Downloaded Content Without Wifi
