Content: Max is fine probably better than a lot of streaming services but a far cry from the glory that was HBO max seeing as they removed a lot of content and killed a lot of shows and studios I think this app has done more harm then good should’ve just stayed how it was
Title: Bring back HBO max

Content: I just wish there were a few more shows or movies but other than that it’s a good service
Title: Pretty good selection

Content: a shame because HBO has such great shows and movies! But the app doesn’t track what episode I’m on, doesn’t ever cast correctly, and you can’t pause or rewind a show without it starting back at the beginning or even starting a different episode. Endless technical difficulties when I just wanna binge!
Title: This app doesn’t work??

Content: The app can’t coordinate between 2 phones and one tv. It can’t keep place in a series. Freezes. Just straight up frustrating all the times I use it. Content is pretty good though.  But if there are playback problems all the time, the experience is less good. And yes, customer support is only designed to be awful enough so I give up in less than 2 hours.
Title: App blows

Content: It continuously tells me I don’t have a subscription or can’t renew my subscription and I have a reoccurring automatic pain subscriptions through Apple! Really frustrating when you want to use a streaming service that you’re paying for and you’re unable to use it!!
Title: Subscription issues

Content: They have great movies both old and new. And they have tons of cartoons both old school and new school. You could never be bored and it’s at a great price. You won’t regret it
Title: Great App

Content: Loses track of my shows, tells me there are new episodes when I have seen them already, screen goes black during credits when it shrinks to show me “other” stuff, continue watching shows episodes I have run to the very very end. HBO max app was better user experience.
Title: How did the app get WORSE?

Content: I used to really like Max, but recently the app is completely broken. I can’t watch anything or even browse the collection. The only thing on the app is seeing max’s different collection groups, that’s it. Not even the movies or shows in that collection. My app is completely updated, I’ve tried to delete and redownload and nothing. Simply broken.
Title: App is broken

Content: This app at least works on iPhone, but it doesn’t work at all on google tv. Doesn’t play at all. It also repeatedly flickers on my fire tv over and over so it is basically unwatchable.  On iPhone there are always quality drops and buffering problems. The app really is the worst streaming performer on all three devices I have.
Title: This app is at least functional on iPhone.

Content: This is one of the worst user interfaces. They should have kept HBOs interface. For one thing why does the “continue watching” list disappear when I scroll towards it? I have to do a new search to find shows that I want to continue watching. It’s so frustrating I hate it.
Title: Horrible Interface. They should have kept HBO’s

Content: I adore Max, I watch it day and night, I haven't slept in 318 hours, my life has strictly become watching South Park for multiple hours at a time 🥰 10/10 I enjoy Max on an intimate level
Title: Yes, my little butterfly

Content: Was super excited when the new app was released because I was constantly having issues with the old app. Well, nothing changed. I am unable to sign in through my provider (xfinity). It just brings up the my account page but doesn’t actually connect. iPhone app works but I cannot get in on my iPad. Devs, where you at??
Title: Thought the new MAX app would be better

Content: Our family is really enjoying the shows.  We have had fun.  Stuff for all ages and a great blend of genres. Yes, I too hope that they quit changing the name & design.
Title: Smooth- Great Content

Content: I thought that the HBO Max app was payed out pretty well but this new one is much better.  Everything seems out in the open which is nice.
Title: The organized set up is nice

Content: My only complaint is that I constantly have trouble with it remembering the episode i’m watching. I constantly watch from Max on different devices, but it appears to be that it cannot keep up.
Title: Nice but…

Content: Since upgrading to the new one, I can’t get rid of the the clock or battery meter at the top and that gigantic bright white task switcher bar att the bottom of the screen. It’s so distracting and seems like something that should have been caught in the first round of UAT, or before. Otherwise it’s got some shows that we watch.
Title: Was happy with the old app

Content: I’ve had the new app since they asked for me to download and I love all the new movies and shows I’m willing to see the only problem is when I click on the shows they either don’t show or I can’t hear anything I genuinely believe it’s an issue with the app itself but yeah they really need to fix that
Title: Bug fixes

Content: Constantly changing the service to make it as much of a headache as possible. From the name, the ui, the settings. Can’t even sign in the my account to make changes without being forced to download the app.  The only reason pirating isn’t as popular is because streaming services were slightly more convenient. Not so much any more.
Title: Change for the sake of change.

Content: This app its way too bad, so many issues of connections with chromecast also doesn’t have available the option of another languages although the bottom is present only subtitles, is too slow to connect to the tv and after connecting show like it’s not connected and  show resume button, at the end of the day its a crap…
Title: Back to the worst

Content: About 50% of the time when I try and watch something, I get an “unexpected error” message.  If I restart the app it may play the show but the message still appears. I have tried removing and reinstalling the Max app but it keeps happening.
Title: Unexpected error message in Samsung tv

Content: I don’t know why it happened Max but if you want some attention you should’ve made some new like your own portal steaming monitors. But it’s nice to see you where’s HBO
Title: The Change

Content: When I go to continue watching a show or movie it’s not in my continue watching so I have to search for it again. I finally realized I needed to ‘add’ it to my stuff and then it starts it from the very beginning and when I go to fast forward it takes forever.  I do like you have lots of options for Avatars.
Title: AWFUL!

Content: I haven’t had to reinstall HBO Max in ages… I’ve had to do it 4 times today. Should have been worked out before the launch.
Title: Restarting Again

Content: It is not saving my most recently viewed program on the home page top menu in “Continue Watching”. I have to use the search function to find my way back every time. Why bother rolling this out? HBO Max was just fine. Another rebranding failure. Sad.
Title: Buggy

Content: Everytime I seem to start something new it never shows up on my continue to watch list! That’s kind of a big deal, because then I have to go and search for it every time. Also where did have the side tabs go for easy access to parts of the app? Like genres etc.
Title: HBO MAX was way better

Content: Everyone on the internet hated that you were going to change it to MAX yet you still thought it would be a good marketing strategy and now we have to download a separate app. The blue is unappealing where as the purple was calming and different compared to other apps. Overall not the smartest idea from a company that’s been HBO for decades to completely rebrand to a name NO ONE is ever going to call it.
Title: MAX is stupid.

Content: I loved HBO Max. Rarely had any issues and I absolutely LOVED the shuffle option on TV shows. I wish that was the case for all series shows. And now with Max the shuffle option is GONE!  I really hope that you “bring it back” and that you include for ALL TV series.
Title: Why the change?

Content: First thing I noticed is that the subtitles and audio selection doesn’t work, it says to go to Settings, but there’s nothing in the Settings. Also, it shows that I have downloaded data, which is probably left over from the old HBO app (shouldn’t that have deleted with the app?), but my download list is empty. How do I recover that used space?
Title: New app needs a lot of improvement.

Content: I really liked that each episode had it’s own page with info in the HBO app.  Please bring that to the Max app. I wish HBO would have just started with the HBO Max app, removed all instances of "HBO" leave "Max", change take the app's main color from purple to blue and left everything else alone.
Title: HBO app was better

Content: I started a new show and it’s never on my continue to watch. On top of the it never says which episodes I’ve watched so I spend like 10-20 mins trying to remember which episode I’m on and fast forwarding to where I had to stop.
Title: Does not show continue to watch

Content: The Max app is very valuable. Not only do they have a great movie and tv series selection. All of their content is updated very frequently. You will not be wasting money!!!!
Title: Max app

Content: I’m completely upset at how y’all changed the app name and everything on it. I had a profile picture that I personally added and now with the update it removed it meaning I can’t put it back on since everything has changed. Rather then updating most of these shows up to date and doing better you made it worse.👎not a fan. At all.
Title: I hate it

Content: Developers thought about this a lot. I’ll give them some credit with watch history. Except, why a new app? Lost all my downloads. You either should’ve made both apps available for X amount of days or rebranded the HBOMAX app. After all, it had more content anyway.
Title: They didn’t think about downloads

Content: Netflix makes it better because of this one issue
Title: I can’t watch on browser

Content: My last review was about having to turn off the subtitles every time a new episode comes on and every time I watch a movie. I turn them off the app should remember to keep the off. The developer responds and tells me to restart my modem or router and do some troubleshooting. Don’t you think I’ve done that? Fix the bug and I’ll fix my review.
Title: Issue still not Fixed

Content: Easy to use, you’re able to download movies, and I love all of movies are free, where as to other platforms you have to pay for them, like Harry Potter and White Chicks

Almost any show you want and no adds!, you can download any episode or movie to watch on the go it has ALL the harry potter movies too!! And 2000s mystery thrillers like vampire diaries pretty little liars and gossip girl!
Title: Amazing!

Content: Edit: This is actually an awesome app. I LOVE the addition of AMC and Food network.  Original: The sound and the video will not sync up. I pay for this and can’t watch anything. It’s bulls**t!
Title: EDIT: great app!

Content: Over and over, without fail, while steaming an episode from iPhone to tv via chrome cast, when I go back to the app to pause or rewind, the stream comes to a stop and at best starts over at the beginning of that episode, but just as often, goes back to the beginning of an earlier episode. Is Max not mean to be compatible with chrome cast?
Title: Please fix this app

Content: Ads are 2 minutes long and creating glitches over shows that leave the ad timer and parts of the Ads over the show. No option to fast forward. This app has been terrible lately and we were charged without warning that our year subscription was renewing.
Title: Ads have gotten out of control

Content: The app is smooth for the most part, will get occasional buffers that will never complete leaving me to manually reset the show/movie.
Title: Great but buggy

Content: The shows are good but I don’t want to have to download an app. I would like to just have it on safari and watch it there. And the clone high reboot was bad but that’s just one show ok
Title: I wish I could watch it in browser

Content: The app is really no different than the older version other than the fact that the app on Roku and on apple always logs us out. Having to keep logging back in is such a pain to do. Definitely needs work on that. Otherwise, it’s great!
Title: I miss the old HBOMAX

Content: I enjoy using your new max app it’s so easy to find something your interested in watching including your calming app thanks for updating to your new max app😀
Title: New app

Content: It has all my favorite childhood shows, and tbh I don’t think 17$ is too much for it. You pay for more and you get more.
Title: Honestly better than Netflix.

Content: I recently downloaded multiple episodes of a series to my phone for a long flight and they’ve suddenly disappeared. Also every time I try to open your app, once it opens and I click something to watch, it now crashes. This is after several resets and none of my other streaming apps crash.
Title: Constantly crashing

Content: One of my favorite things about MAX is that they have most of the original Cartoon Network shows. However, they’ve recently been removing content such as Ben 10 alien force/ ultimate alien and over the garden wall.
Title: Quit cutting exclusive content

Content: Has all of my favorites and new episodes and you can download things and watch them with no Wi-Fi

I can barely hear, so I have to use subtitles. But it doesn’t help me to watch anything when the subtitles are 5 minutes before what the people are saying. I’ve deleted the app, redownloaded it, logged out, everything I could. Subtitles don’t work. Doesn’t seem like u care about everyone around here.
Title: Subtitles don’t work.

Content: I don’t know what people are talking about, Max has everything I and my waive and our son want, it really is better than anything else out there
Title: Best Streaming app

Content: Finally one of the best streaming apps out so much to choose from that one could get lost for days with all the content! Highly recommend this app well worth the price of admission
Title: Wow O Wo

Content: I miss the shuffle button that was available on shows like South Park, it made rewatching the series more interesting. Now that HBO MAX is now MAX, it’s no longer an option. I also wish there was an option to automatically skip intros on shows.
Title: Bring it back pls

Content: I cut the cord, and Max is one of the many apps I use to cast to my television for entertainment.  All my other apps work perfectly fine.    Except this app is almost useless to me now. I’m using my iPhone SE with Google Chromecast, and I can’t turn off the English audio descriptions no matter what I do.  Examples where this happens are the movie Confirmation and the series Spy/Master.
Title: Can’t Turn Off English Audio Descriptions!

Content: I’m so tired of this “let’s make a new app exactly like the old app, but let’s waste everyone’s time with a janky website relogging in on every device” plan.   Get it together hbo. I work all day and want to watch tv. But no, I have to spend 20+ minutes downloading new apps and signing in to 9 accounts and switching between tv and internet and apps. Holy cow it’s annoying
Title: Again? Another new app?

Content: It’s has all my favorite things but the only thing it’s missing is probably SpongeBob because kids will watch that for hours…
Title: Max is great

Content: So I loved the old app even though it would crash now and then but this app is horrible. Any show I try to watch says “unexpected error loading/playing this content” and then won’t play it or it will play it and that error message stays on the screen. My app is up to date. iPhone XR is compatible and it’s garbage. About to cancel my subscription
Title: Loved the old App this one is trash

Content: Watching on an iPad Pro, the status bar and “home” line never go away, and they are so bright its hard to enjoy / see the content in a dark room.. when viewing in full screen, the status information should disappear. This is an easy fix, hopefully its resolved soon.
Title: Viewer needs work

Content: So many more movies and tv shows to watch!Also Makes the experience better with the amazing quality.
Title: Amazing!

Content: I’ve absolutely loved watching South Park on here and i am able to use the same account as somebody else at the same time without it bugging out
Title: Wonderful ✨

Content: I like watching my favorite movies and shows. But why does HBO max have to go. I really don’t understand why HBO is getting rid of HBO max and replacing it with max, which is basically HBO just with new shows and movies.
Title: No tile

Content: Interesting changes I suppose… I am, however, glad there was a smooth transition with the sign in process. The new app picked up as if it was expecting me. This was entertaining.
Title: Ahh forget it

Content: I have unsubscribed to this new MAX, I don’t want it and I don’t need it. It’s been a week and I can only sign into 1 tv and 2 phones. My laptop and second tv have “error incorrect password” which is ridiculous. Life is too short to wait for MAX to get it together, they won’t be getting my money 💵 ever again! By the way their customer service is a complete disaster.
Title: 🔥Flames on the side of my face!🔥

Content: This new app is almost the same as the old app but excludes multiple useful features like syncing with the AppleTV app.  Beyond this, I am now paying more for less content. They removed a number of originals I enjoyed. And canceled full-finished projects which were about to release. I am also furious by the way this company treats their creators and supports abusive actors.  Be cautious…
Title: WBD isn’t what you think…

Content: So this app is smoother than its predecessor. And quick to load menus. Overall I think I’ll use the app more often going forward for this reason
Title: Smoother

Content: M6 favorite feature in HBO was that you could choose your profile from your camera roll. I have no problem with anything else, except for that. Thank you
Title: Would rate a 5 star but..

Content: Ever since HBO Max switched to Max it has been spazzing out on me. Everytime it goes to commercial it won’t continue playing the show/movie I was watching. Very frustrating bc even when I cut it off & back on it still picks up from before the commercials even if I already watched them through. I know they gotta work out the kinks but it’s been days of this now
Title: Issues

Content: I’ve seen a lot of reviews about how the new update is really bad but it’s honestly not even that different other than the name and the fact that there are now more shows. I honestly do not understand why people are so upset.
Title: People are being dramatic.

Content: HBO Max worked just fine but then we i had to download max there was a connection issues where it would work for 15-20 minutes and then start loading then tell me that the connection is not available
Title: Why max?

Content: Out of all the streaming apps out there I must say, this is definitely the best one. Reason being, they have something for everyone! And I mean everyone. Old, young, middle aged. Pre-school, grade school and even grad school!!! Tune in! 😉
Title: THE BEST STREAMING💻APP📱 EVER! 🔥💯💫

Content: As other said, doesn’t play well with Apple TV.  But mainly, the new MAX app is a poorly organized mess.  The HBOMax app was easy to search in and dive deep into content not being pushed.  This one is convoluted, perhaps by design.  Even allowing for understandable growing pains, it’s hard to know why what was good about the other app wasn’t carried over.
Title: All that and less

Content: I downloaded max and I just instantly got signed in, without having to lift a finger! Just a press of a button! But When I downloaded w on My tv It also worked Great!
Title: The app is so great!

Content: “Hey our last app was working fine so here’s one that’s messed up on the back end cuz things were running too smoothly but we needed to rebrand so here it is!” iPhone, Samsung TV, or PC, doesn’t matter. Just crashes a bunch of times no matter what. Stop fixing what’s not broken
Title: I like the part where it crashes 3 times per episode

Content: Why change?! This one doesn't remember what I'm watching so I have to search for the show every time and then go through to find the right episode. There's a lag to get to the seasons so it even more annoying. There's no recaps either. The previous App was fine. If it ain't broke... Once I'm done with this show, you'll be lucky if I come back. Worst platform ever.
Title: Previous App Much better

Content: 1. Revert back to purple. Stop it. 2. Why did we have to download a new app? You couldn’t just rename HBOmax? 3. Hbo max app is close to perfect and this one is buggy. My continue watching doesn’t update anymore, we paused and it sent us back to the beginning of the movie. 4. Really gotta focus of the blue here, it’s an unsettling hue. Hate The blue back to purple, it set you apart.
Title: App is buggy

Content: Overall the new app is good. Pretty much the same as the HBO Max app was. I wish they would add in a foreign film section or at least an easier way to search for films in other languages.
Title: New App is Fine but Missing Features

Content: Have always had a great experience with this streaming service. I love that they keep up with the holidays and add scary movies during Halloween and Christmas movies during Christmas time.
Title: Review

Content: The new app is a few steps back in basic functionality. While it mostly works, there are annoying hi things they need to fix, like making the system UI elements like the clock and status bars fade when playing video.
Title: Needs to fix the basics

Content: Congrats you successfully downgraded your product. There was no reason to do this. The new platform is ugly glitchy and has less features than the original app. It’s more annoying to navigate and it just looks aesthetically bad. This goes for the phone and PlayStation app. Fire whoever thought this new platform was a good idea cuz you just spent millions making your product worse
Title: Awful

Content: If you subscribe to max will will not be disappointed. They have every show and movie you would need. Worth every penny.
Title: Worth the Money

Content: There are some elements of this UI that are just beyond frustrating. Let me sort my watchlist by movie name instead of just the order in which I’ve added them!
Title: Frustrating UI

Content: Great show and movie selection and love the leaving soon row. But takes too long to load episodes after rewinding a little bit.
Title: Loading after Rewinding

Content: Latest update has a bug where every time you open the app it restarts the show. On iPhone! Please fix
Title: Bug

Content: Whenever you connect to a chromecast from your phone and then leave the app while playing a tv show, when you return to pause, it restarts the whole episode. It’s a weird glitch and makes it hard to pause and rewind while watching. Please fix the bug.
Title: Chromecast bug

Content: I love HBO Max and the program on it. My biggest frustration is having depress the pause button twice or the play button twice.
Title: Love this but…

Content: I have a few things for sure you can help us for next weekend but I will be home for
Title: I have a few

Content: I was on the fence with keeping my sub. Now I’m 💯Keeping it because it’s worth it with the addition of CNN Max. I hope prices do not increase do to the addition. Thanks HBO.
Title: 5 stars with added CNN Max

Content: It doesn’t work. Well it does, after staring at the loading screen forever or freezing on an ad. So I called customer service. They did absolutely nothing. Max is just horribly ran and I DO NOT recommend it. It’s a waste of money and they won’t do anything to fix the issues. Just don’t give them your money, you’ll regret it.
Title: Waste of a streaming service

Content: I never watched Discovery before.  They should have kept all the Discovery programs in their own streaming service instead of ruining and watering down HBO MAX. Difficult interface, hard to find stuff. HBO used to be the gold-standard programming service. If it ain’t broke…..
Title: Max is OK. HBO MAX was better.

Content: If I am streaming on my iPhone the app works fine. When I stream to the tv with Chromecast audio description is enabled and I can’t turn it off.  I checked my phones settings to make sure I didn’t accidentally have it set to auto enable.  I don’t, and this only happens with the Max app.  It’s very annoying.  Cancelled my subscription.
Title: Audio description enabled when I use Chromecast

Content: I still fail to understand what the point of moving from one app to another was. On the old HBO Max app I could SharePlay shows with my fiancé which was convenient since we are both in the military and serving overseas in different countries. With the new Max we can’t even do that. Why are you going backwards in user friendliness? Did you want to lose customers?
Title: No SharePlay

Content: The level of entertainment is off the charts. Top notch shows, plethora of movies, old and new. DC stuff galore. Get lost every night on the big screen or your device. This is, MAX.
Title: Rich indeed

Content: Thoroughly impressed with all of the great shows and movies. HOWEVER there seems to be a huge amount of unnecessary buffering. Costs could also come por favor!
Title: Great Stuff

Content: This apps has all the good movies and I most definitely rate it a big fat juicy ten because they are absolutely the best app in the universe and I'm not over exaggerating thank you hbo max 💜
Title: My opinion on hbo max

Content: The App is easy to use or navigate. You can add to my list. Plus remove a continue watching show with just holding.
Title: Max is Great has HBO plus TCM, Food Network and More

Content: I think it’s very nice because that’s amazing. Shows all my favorite can watch on my iPad on my phone. It’s amazing because if your TV down just use download this. And.😲😲😲😲😲😲😲😲😲
Title: Amazing, Max

Content: I love the mixture of movies to series to documentaries HBO’s latest line up and expansive options is a hit. I can’t say I have ever enjoyed any other streaming network as much as I have enjoyed HBO Max.
Title: Amazing content

Content: The theme is absolutely perfect. Max also comes with the perfect mix of movies and TV shows. Max even started coming out with some cool originals, classics and well known Hollywood actions films. 10/10 recommend.
Title: Perfect App!

Content: I love HBO MAX as I have all the recent HBO streaming apps since before Covid.  I religiously pay my MAX ( hbo) bill every month.  MAX (formerly HBO GO, HBO NOW) has great content, intriguing mini series and documentary features.  I AM HERE FOR IT !!!!  Ohhhhhhh…. And awesome cartoons
Title: Current tittles and great classics

Content: Updated the app twice already but am still not able to stream on my phone late at night, so server load can’t be an issue. Just keeps buffering with a dark screen and no content. No idea why they thought a new app would help when it has ONE job: streaming, and it fails to do just that.
Title: Doesn’t load, keeps buffering, all week

Content: I am currently watching succession very good show. I do my yearly we watch of the Sopranos on HBO has great shows such as Silicon Valley south, bound and down and boardwalk empire. And I am about to watch the animals, so this is a dub.
Title: Whatever the name of the app it’s HBO

Content: I always find this one of the best streaming services when it comes to the movies that i enjoy 10/10 would recommend!!! 👌
Title: Very good

Content: I bundle with AT&T but Max is titular to my experience at my carrier. Load in through them and everything, super simple, on point show selections. Worth every cent
Title: Realistically worth every penny

Content: Such good content usually streaming services get boring but max just hits different and so much content to watch when I’m bored and expect more enjoyable things
Title: Max review

Content: I had been using HBO Max for the past 2 years, before the switch to Max. I never write reviews but this is insane. I pay for the premium version of Max and not a single movie will play on my Sony TV. It glitches out not even 5 seconds into the movie. About to cancel my subscription in a couple of days because of this weird glitch. Please fix.
Title: Genuinely so disappointed.

Content: App constantly crashes, it glitches out every time I use it - meaning it freezes when I try to tap and play something, if I’m watching a series over again it ALWAYS skips to the next episode rather than the one I select. Previous version was much better.
Title: Needs a lot of work

Content: I get bored with so many streaming services…Max always has something I want to watch. Movies, TV, or otherwise - truly the best selection anywhere!
Title: Best selection!

Content: Making lgbtq or whatever it is and only black movies or shows stand out on their own is ridiculous. I just want to see them all together or not at all.
Title: My opinion

Content: This app has been very unstable. While watching shows that would have had commercial breaks it will get stuck in a loop between segments requiring the user fast forwards manually. It freezes and crashes requiring restarting. Have experienced this on both iPad and TV.
Title: Freezes often

Content: Most things work appropriately on the app. The issue I keep having is that it won’t save the progress on the shows I’m watching so I’m repeatedly having to search for the show I’m currently watching and duffle through the episodes.
Title: App issues

Content: Downloading does not work. It says I have download limit reached although I have zero downloads on current devices. The problem is that downloads done with the old HBO app or old devices are still counted, although they cannot be accessed or deleted. Customer service has been no help
Title: Downloading does not work

Content: I was forced to use it and its worse than hbo max app was, plus willing to bet they are going to price raise for all the added “features” but hey what other choice do I have? F me
Title: Forced to use

Content: The app works well. It is basically just HBO Max (why didn’t they just update the app?) the problem j have is that it makes me sign in on my phone almost every time I use it and that’s really annoying…
Title: App works well but makes me sign in almost every time.

Content: When I opened up an app there was some statement about my subscription not being about to be used so I canceled it and renewed it to start after the current one ends. They charged me twice. The app has also been super glitchy for me. I hate the ads. I’ve basically paid $20 for a glitchy app. I am awaiting a refund for the second charge.
Title: Glitch caused me to be charged twice.

Content: Love the app. Have always had HBO for years and subsequently HBO Max so I’m thrilled to now have Discovery shows as per of my choices! So many new shows I’ve never seen before that now I’m hooked
Title: Love the new MAX!

Content: I installed on my firetv and it’s taken me 3.5 years to open it and watch whitehouse plumbers. Content is great, works fine on my phone - hbo max works fine on my firetv but max is sllllllloooooooowwwwwwww all my other apps work fine on my tv fwiw
Title: I have a broken iPhone that’s faster than this app

Content: Every time I try to restart an episode of a show I watched, it starts from the very end of the video instead of going back to the beginning! I have to keep pressing the reset button just to get anywhere! This is very problematic and it deeply affects my viewing experience, so I would like this fixed as soon as possible.
Title: Videos not playing correctly.

Content: I attempted to cast a show from the Max app to my chrome cast and kept getting the error message: “unexpected error trying to cast the content.” I’ve tried shutting down the app, reinstalling it, restarting it the chrome cast, and the error message remains. My other apps are working so it’s not the chrome cast. This is very annoying.
Title: The app  can’t cast to tv

Content: Max is a great streaming service. I get to watch my shows and movies without ads or spending too much money. The only issue I have is the constant change in their logo, but other than that, it’s good
Title: Max is very good

Content: The switch from HBO Max to Max is not an improvement. Media that I am watching doesn’t show up on my currently watching queue, and the series will start from s1e1 even though I’m on season 7. There is nothing easier about this update, and in my opinion it has made this app harder and less user friendly. It’s an easy solution- unsubscribing. It’s a shame since hbo max was great.
Title: MAX update

Content: This update has apparently removed ability to use personal library photos as account icons and is no longer working properly for the continue watching option on series. Hoping for some bug fixes soon
Title: Not as expected

Content: The interphase is a little much easy than the old one. I wish they add TNT, TBS and truTV on the list. And I wish they bring back other cartoons like Infinity Train and Close Enough. I didn’t have a chance to watch them1
Title: It’s better then ever before…but…

Content: App is overall pretty good. Noticed a few bug fixes from HBO Max so that’s good! However, chrome cast doesn’t work at all with the app now. Works fine on every streaming platform I have except this one! Please fix soon.
Title: Pretty Good

Content: I like having all the discovery+ content, too bad when I return to the app after watching a show previously, it doesn’t remember the shows or to what point I’ve watched them
Title: Doesn’t remember where I left off on shows.

Content: I’ve used this app for years and it has always been the most consistent. Worked well every time I used it. Now, it’s full of errors and the closed captioning no longer stays on episode to episode. That was my favorite feature. No other app was consistent with CC. Super disappointing. Pay your engineers more so they actually want to fix these errors.
Title: What happened?

Content: The transition between HBO Max and just Max was seamless.   The movies they’ve got plus things like adult swim cartoons, cement it as my third favorite and I will never get rid of it.  Whether it is called HBO or Max I’m happy.
Title: Yep, Third Place but will never get rid of it.

Content: The rotating mechanism is sort of bothering me because I like to hold my phone a certain way and it changes I hope you can fix that
Title: The rotation

Content: The app forgets what I’ve recently watched, and because episode synopsis aren’t visible, you hope you remember you remembered what you were watching, or god help you navigate while having to watch the commercials IN CASE you found the right time/episode.
Title: Great Content: Bad Memory

Content: Really don’t like the new app.  With the new Max app, my iPad shows the three dots for the multitasking feature over the video of whatever I’m watching. It’s distracting and annoying. When I watch Netflix, or Peacock - or when I watched the old HBO Max app, while I’m streaming a show it hides everything but the show I’m watching. This kind of ruins the app for me.
Title: Can’t hide the multitasking dots on the iPad app. It’s a dealbreaker

Content: The whole change of the interface is actually not that bad but did they really need to change the subtitles so they now take a big space in the screen? No
Title: What a way to mess up something that was already good

Content: I just spent 2 hours trying to fix a problem with my subscription and they continue transfer me to different agents and at the end the only answer they provide me was “don’t worry they will contact you and with your case number we see what we can do” I really enjoy hbo max but this new it’s the worst version ever don’t recommend the app.
Title: Worst customer service ever

Content: Works great…The apps sign me in …At&t signed me right in …I didn’t have to nothing..no email address no password it took everything’s off the HBO max and putting into the new app
Title: Works great

Content: Honestly, I’m not sure why I kept this subscription, but this failed rebrand finally gave me the motivation to part ways. There are so many glitches it’s unbearable.   Also, you’ll have to sign into each device again, which is irritating given HBO didn’t invest the money into OAuth technology allowing you to sign in with your phone.
Title: Thanks for giving me the motivation to cancel

Content: HBO max had its issues but it was getting better and better slowly. Now to scrap that and move to this, is insane. But I do work for a SaaS company so I know it was the typical disconnected executive level that has no idea what they are doing, and have no interest in connecting with developers, users or anyone that would have clued them into their horrible ideas.
Title: Why fix what’s not that broken

Content: When going through episodes include original date episode aired. Also, include option to control lighting when playing video.   Also, unsure why requiring Nickname to label Review, but allow anything even if it is taken.
Title: Missing

Content: HBO Max allowed us to clear out our “Continue Watching” list, and we could customize the appearance of closed captioning. With the new Max, we can do neither of these things. Why would someone market something as being an improvement on their old product and then unnecessarily remove useful features?
Title: New app has less features than the old one

Content: New app is just plain, disorganized, and lacks any form of creativity for good ideas. You guys ruined something decent for something that came out smelling like trash. I’d have to use google just to find something on this app and they would be the one sending me your link for a stream. Can’t even navigate the app without wanting to punch one of your employees in the face.
Title: From decent to incinerator

Content: Improvement over the HBO Max so far, and it’s great to have a “HBO” hub on the main screen. Hope to see them continue to put out quality scripted shows from Max.
Title: So far so good

Content: HBO Max update is the best I love it it’s blue and everything looks better I just hope that they take all the old shows all of that in black-and-white and put shows good times, Stanley and Stanford and so on.
Title: HBO Max

Content: I’m glad I downloaded this app. There’s lots to see from original shows I’ve never heard of to replays of events. A few Live tv channels would be nice too.
Title: Lots to see

Content: I think HBO max is the best because you can watch shows movies I just love it because like I get to watch movies I can’t find anywhere else and it’s just really awesome.
Title: HBO’s the best

Content: Recent update logged me out of all devices. Now, attempting to reconnect to tv provider (DIRECTV/AT&T) does not work and just sends you in a loop. All customer service responses to others here with similar issues point to web pages with zero relevance and/or ask them to submit a review without any attempt or way to actually solve the issue.
Title: Does not connect to tv provider

Content: Max is a very good website to watch movies and tv show and I almost watch all of them and I hope who every seeing this have a good day
Title: This is why I love max

Content: The  best streaming services I own love all the shows and channels that they have added, since they rebranded highly recommend you looking into this
Title: Max love

Content: Great movie app  You’re able to find super entertaining movies or shows. I’m able to have this app thank you my phone carrier provider :)
Title: Great movie app

Content: Loading up Max while on FaceTime, I get the message that the content will be shared automatically, like you’d expect when you are using SharePlay, except in the case of the Max app, it doesn’t actually load the video for the other user. Is this feature broken? I’ll switch my review to 5 stars if I can get SharePlay videos to load.
Title: Does this app support SharePlay or not?

Content: New app is easy to navigate and use. Also the content is top quality.
Title: Quality shows

Content: 3 min left in blackhawks at bruins and you take the game away because it’s 10pm?  Why would you show love sports if you aren’t going to show the entire game!
Title: If you are going to show sports show the entire game!

Content: When I connect it to my chrome cast, it will play audio description no matter what I do unless I completely start the episode over and shut down the app a few times. It’s so annoying.
Title: Good but needs to be fixed

Content: This has been the most glitchy app from hbo. I can’t get into the seasons or episodes of a show without the app crashing. I would have thought after 4 versions of hbo apps they would have a handle on things in the app world. Get with the times and have a working app. I’m probably not going to renew my subscription because of this.
Title: Worst version of this app

Content: Worst app I’ve seen. Has kicked me out while watching a show. When I try an sign back in I have to several times. Keeps saying can not verify subscription. Download shows then app won’t pull up when you have no service what’s point in downloading. Just updated the app and downloads are now gone. If this wasn’t included in my AT&T plan I’d want a refund.
Title: Bad

Content: I’m loving the choice of movies I just wish the the movies that I have in my list was in Alphabetical order like it was with HBO MAX IF possible can you make that happen please
Title: Alphabetical

Content: This show has gotten better and better! It takes me right back to the original Sex and the City! Bravo!
Title: And just like that

Content: I love the max content but since the switch form HBO the interface has been a little glitchy, although it’s already improving.
Title: A little glitchy, still love the content

Content: I have max through my Comcast xfinity plan. I’m trying to log on multiple times. As soon as I get to enter my password I keep getting errors that something went wrong. Can never actually sign in through my phone   What a frustrating experience.
Title: This app is buggy for provider sign in

Content: I really want to like this app. It’s a good app. Great shows and movies from great companies. The problem with this app is that the people at the top are idiots. Canceling shows that people love and not paying people what they’re owed. It’s very bittersweet.
Title: The app itself is great

Content: Friends, West Wing, HBO Originals series’s, shows and documentaries, movies covering every genre you might be feeling that day, just the perfect option for streaming.
Title: Everything you want in 1 place

Content: Great job  I love watching my favorite 🤩 shows on max so I am very pleased 😀 everybody should come and download it pls it is the best I would recommend to you guys if u get the app cutthrought kitchen okay great job makers 😊
Title: Excellent

Content: This is very ridiculous!! You make us switch apps, then when we get on the new app it doesn’t show what we were watching and how much progress we have made on the show. I can’t go back to HBO to see either. Do better.
Title: Ridiculous.

Content: I have close caption, set to enabled on my Apple TV, yet I have no way of turning on close caption via my remote. During playback on my TV, once I hit settings in the Max app, it’s set to English, but yet there’s no way for me to toggle close caption to on. How the heck do you do this?
Title: Closed caption not working on appletv

Content: Download the max on Sony tv but it just keeps going back to HBO MAX  and the other day we watched Avatar the way of water and had a green line on the bottom of the screen what do I do?
Title: Puzzled

Content: Year 2023 and I can’t skip around the video like any other video player ever.  Amazing; tech companies are so lazy.  Is rewind and reverse locked behind the higher subscription tier?  Wouldn’t surprise me.
Title: 2023 and can’t fast forward or reverse

Content: I’m just upset because it keeps making me log in every time I leave the app. I just want it to keep me signed in and I would be a lot happier
Title: It’s alright

Content: This app doesn’t have the frustrating issue where a previously watched episode or show gets stuck on the splash logo.   It does seem to have issues with closed captioning. I have to select it every time I start a new movie or episode. It is rather annoying.   This is a huge issue since it impacts peoples with disabilities. Minus 2 stars for this.   This app could be 5 stars. Except for one other thing - the audio seems to fluctuate before a new episode. Why have previews or “previously on…” if one can’t hear them? I have stereo HomePods. Could this be the issue?
Title: Fix closed captioning

Content: I have been streaming my american hbomax account in Spain for over a year now and with this “upgrade” I can no longer stream outside of the usa until they decide to make Max international. How the heck is that an upgrade when you literally block your paying customers from accessing the service they had no problems accessing for years?!!
Title: No more international

Content: Frame rate switch issue after you play a video on Apple TV, the frame rate of the whole app will switch up 24p. Make UI lagging. It fix frame rate hdr, mapping issue but lead to other problem. The new app cannot even make basic thing correct which is hilarious. They even charge 5 bucks more for very limited 4k library, and previous served for free. Shame on HBO.
Title: Frame rate switch issue

Content: This new app will not keep track of all the shows I’ve been watching.  They won’t all be in my “continue watching” so I have to search for them.  Then it hadn’t kept track of which episodes I’ve watched.  Super annoying.  The old HBO Max app would keep track of were I left off no matter which device I logged back on to to continue.
Title: Not impressed

Content: The new set up seems glitchy or something. Makes it really frustrating to cast the shows/movies to your smart tv. Controls after it’s been casted are missing or glitching or just not popping up.
Title: Difficult on phone for casting

Content: I live so many of the shows in this network. Can’t wait till season to of House of Dragons
Title: Great shows well worth my subscription

Content: Why when I play a movie/show on my iPad, the borders are as bright as the video? The time and date with the battery and Wi-Fi symbols in the corners are way too distracting, IT’S BRIGHTER THAN THE VIDEO! HBO Max had a better interface to navigate. It was even more aesthetic as well I don’t see the purpose of all of this.  Overall L…
Title: User friendliness and annoying bug

Content: Basically, the main reason I have HBO Max is so I can watch Friends. Since I've already watched the series, it won't load into the continue watching section. So I have to go and search for it and replay it every single time. it's really annoying.  And I liked having my own profile photo as well which I cannot do any longer.
Title: the app is rubbish

Content: Max I love and I just wanna say thank you for every joyful feeling you make me feel god bless you always in the name of Jesus Christ I blessed this platform amen🫶🏻🦉
Title: Thanks for everything your the best in the entire galaxy

Content: love the service they do and what shows are on there idk why but i feel like hbo max just had a better ring to it. plus they also allowed you to put any pfp you wanted even from your photo gallery off of whatever device your using, kinda sad now we’re limited to just using maxs pfp but it’s honestly not a huge deal. still good to use, still like it
Title: kinda odd they changed it to “max” but idc

Content: App moves a little slow sometimes but other then that same as all other streaming services
Title: Could always get better

Content: I love the app and all of the movies, but for some reason it keeps flipping the screen around on my phone, so it plays upside down partway through a movie
Title: Not bad

Content: Logging to watch movies and was required to download new app.  It is awful!  Took forever to get the error message off the screen.  Finally after 15 minutes, I got my movie to play.  Then 15 minutes in the pesky error message hit the screen again and I was done!  Seriously!  Test in dev before moving to production people.    One Star rating.
Title: New Max App Is Terrible!

Content: Movies are interrupted every few minutes and then continues. Only service that this happens .
Title: Too Many Stops To Catch Up

Content: I thought with the merge I could watch new programs from HGTV, Magnolia network, food network, etc, the next day they aired. But it is a mess. They only release a few shows. Others are no in sync with the TV schedule. Not worth the price increase (or the decrease on resolution).
Title: Discovery+ merge really poor

Content: Does not save my last show played or where I left off. I wish you would have never changed because to be honest it’s so frustrating that I may have to switch just because.
Title: Having issues

Content: I LOVE  ALL the updated features and new network channels that were added as well as all the different and new content all is welcomed and I thank you for all MAX has to offer!!
Title: Awesome!

Content: It’s not horrible but most of the English audio has been removed on like half of the anime’s witch isn’t bad I will still enjoy it but now I have to pause whenever I need to get my eyes of the subtitles Not a fan of that….
Title: Not bad.

Content: This app was a god send with SharePlay and long distance relationships but it’s not there anymore. Some of the shows lag when you’re watching them and scrolling through some selections. I miss the drop down menus with the different hubs in the corner but that’s not there. Overall I miss the way the app used to be but glad there’s more content I guess.
Title: New selection but miss the old :(

Content: Why did you change the color? From a beautiful purple to a jarring blue, my eyes are screaming bloody murder. I can’t support this change. And why name it MAX. How unoriginal. HBO was the best it was and the best it will ever be. HBO is prestigious. Max…? Not so much. Like trash on the side of the highway. When someone says HBO, you know what it is… max sounds like a dead dog in the pet cemetery. It doesn’t call for respect. Get rid of the blue. It’s too blue.
Title: You took away my happiness

Content: The same shows I used to watch seamlessly are now buffering up to every 10 seconds. It’s maddening. I’ve already deleted and redownloaded the app but the problem is ever present. I hope this gets fixed quickly.
Title: So much buffering

Content: I don’t understand who makes apps like this. They removed all the hubs and mixed all the content into the same categories. That means you can’t quickly go to tcm and only browse tcm movies, or adult swim content - you have to scroll through EVERYTHING! Seriously, who creates apps like this? Will probably cancel hbo and just subscribe directly to the providers I want.
Title: Terrible downgrade from the hbo max app

Content: I was worried originally that my shows on hbo max would be gone, but I’ve been pleasantly surprised by the amount of content on this app! No doubt one of the best streaming services out there!
Title: Great app!

Content: I’ve been using HBO Max since it was released really love the app but this new app removed the ability for me to share play like the previous one when I’m on FaceTime. Great new interface but don’t remove features
Title: ADD SHARE PLAY AGAIN

Content: Thanks for making a new streaming app the exact same as HBO max, making me have to sign in again, where I don’t have my log in things memorized. Not only that but to download it on my tv, I have to sign in on my Samsung account, which I don’t know, making me unable to watch on the tv anymore. There is absolutely no point in this existing and Is just a waste of time.
Title: Why does this exist?

Content: I liked HBO for so long. I loved how you could add your own personal touches to your profile and now you can’t. No photos which is super annoying. It’s harder to navigate. They removed a bunch of shows and movies. And they changed it MAX!? Who calls it that?? No one says MAX. Everyone only ever refers to it as HBO… now there are shows I can’t even finish because they are gone. Hate this new update!
Title: Annoyed

Content: Just had to go out and change the name and create a new app…What useless big wig executive came up with this novel idea to go from HBO Max to MAX. Why don’t you pat yourself on the back for this one, great job!!!! Now I went from having a fully functioning app to one that crashes none stop and when it does actually work has a big error message in the middle of the screen.
Title: Steamy pile of garbage

Content: I had to redownload the new app on everything, and I mean EVERYTHING. It logs you into a dummy account, so you have to logout and then log back in. I don’t get why they couldn’t just update the hbo max app to be MAX. It’s been an incredibly frustrating experience. I have kids who have devices too. Not to mention I live with my parents and we have 4 tvs and Apple TVs not to mention all the devices
Title: Worthless

Content: User friendly and a great large collection. Easy to binge shows and a great collection of horror movies among other things.
Title: Many Options

Content: I love the selection that is offered on Max, and my family and I use Max often. I do with the price would stop increasing…making it hard to justify keeping the service.
Title: Great Selections, High Price

Content: App sometimes won’t open— freezes up . Doesn’t bookmark well between devices. If you start a show on device it will not start at correct spot on another device.
Title: Kind of Glitchy

Content: The content is great and the app works but it can have a more creative design. I would love to see an easier way to find content.
Title: App Interface needs improvement

Content: I get Max for free as part of an internet package. I would not pay for Max. It release one (1) very popular movie every 4-6 months. Other than that it’s old movies that everyone has seen, and superhero movies. New releases are not new movies they are  also old movies, new for Max.
Title: I get it free

Content: Loving the new “all-inclusive” app experience from Max. The playback has improved some which is good! My only complaint is that the app has removed personalized profile photos which made HBO Max so fun. Could we bring this feature back? Thanks in advance!
Title: Great App So Far!

Content: They’ve just recently modified the app to force you to sit through extremely annoying ads before it lets you see the program you came to see.  There’s no way to skip being forced to wait for them to finish playing before you get to what you actually want to see.
Title: ONE STAR  Awful new forced advertisements can’t be skipped

Content: MAX HAS BATMAN ON LOCKDOWN !!!!🖤 A total must if you want to access the Legendary  BAT Vault to see Batman on his most epic journeys !!! Michael Keaton is the best Batman. IMO !!! No one can touch his depiction !!!  Besides that max has the best original shows and all the good SciFi movies  I want to watch!!!!
Title: =(BATMAN)=

Content: The only downside to this app is you have to wait every week for a new episode in a series. I thought the point of on demand streaming was so you can watch it when you want..
Title: You have to wait every week for new episodes

Content: I have all the streaming services. This is the only service that freezes. I can jump back to any other streaming app on my TV, to make sure its not my connection. they always all work fine. its just Hbo max that constantly freezes. Especially when (God Forbid) I rewind or forward something Im watching.  I have an LG TV and Samsung TV. Does it on both.
Title: The only one to fail

Content: Two days ago I can see the videos I downloaded in the app. Today the page shows up blank. If I look in my phone storage, it’s shows 24GB being taken up by this app. I have seen this issue off and on over the past month or so. Not sure what fixes it, but it’s annoying when it breaks.
Title: Unable to see downloaded shows

Content: For someone reason I always end up getting logged out from a device, other than that l love the variety of movies they have
Title: Kept getting logged out?

Content: I love the selection, but extremely disappointed about legendary being cancelled.  That show was the reason I signed up for this app.   Please reconsider.
Title: Awesome choices

Content: When I pause a show and press play it reverts to five minutes previously and their rewind/fast forward set up makes is difficult to get back to your initial place. When I come back to a show it won’t say resume it will just say ‘watch again’, like what?
Title: Pause is irritating

Content: This app is very useful, do not feel any unreasonable place for the time being, highly recommend. Love it.
Title: highly recommend

Content: I've been a huge DC fan since i was 3 so having a cheap app that lets me watch all my childhood shows with no ads is the most incredible feeling i'm very grateful🙏🙏
Title: Thank God for HBO

Content: You honestly can’t complain with MAX. The interface is so modern and clean. Along with the great shows and movies. Decent price. Can’t complain at all.
Title: Can’t complain

Content: Hey can you please get this app and tell me how much I love it when you are free in Life get it ok and you get it you I know you will love it 🥰🥰🥰🥰😁🥰🥰🥰🥰 good
Title: I love this app so much more than Naflix and I love it so much more peacock lol I love this app

Content: I have no problems with the name change but ever since the switch the app has been super buggy. It will randomly exit after starting a movie or a show. It will take a long time to load and won’t show the shows you are in the middle of watching you have to search for them. Just annoying to deal with.
Title: Miss HBO

Content: I love a lot of shows here, but they keep canceling or deleting them, so I’m considering canceling max in return to be honest. They can put out quality stuff, but they can’t hold onto it.  Do better, Justice for all infinity train and all the others lost.
Title: Stop removing all the good stuff

Content: Has a lot of good movies and shows, quality is very good, like that it doesn’t have a lot of chick flicks, and not too many weird shows. Just a wonderful app to watch tv on!
Title: Yes! Yes! Yes!

Content: Disappointing that even when a title is available in multiple languages it's not actually able to be changed into those languages. When I reached out to customer support they were rude and unhelpful.
Title: Languages not accessible

Content: This is the worst streaming app there is. Every time you try to cast from your phone to your tv it automatically switches to an audio description version. I called on it and was told if you start the video first and then cast it, it’ll work fine. That worked once. I’m to the point of canceling the subscription if there’s not a fix soon.
Title: Won’t cast correctly

Content: Only problem is sometimes it does keep up with what episode I am on  Small glitch but only problem I have
Title: Love it

Content: Not sure why you had to take a perfectly working app and change it! I literally have spent the last 40 min trying to watch a show that will not play. It’s either completely scrambled, no sound or freezes! I just gave up. Every time I try to watch something there’s an issue!! Fix it - this is ridiculous!!!!
Title: The worst

Content: I love HBO. Has great movies and tv series. Has great throw backs. My only complaint is not being able to rate movies and shows. I really think they should add that feature. It’d be a lot easier to find more thing I was interested in if they know what I liked and didn’t.
Title: Great app

Content: It’s just so chill. Don’t like that I had to download a whole new application to get the same experience as HBO MAX but… whatever… all my favs are still on it so I can’t complain. 🥸
Title: Chill app

Content: The new max is really good , everything is better then the old app but , they need to add it to FaceTime , whenever I screenshots it doesn’t give me an option to show.
Title: MAX!

Content: None of the devices are listed. Also, the icon itself is not there. You can still click the empty space but the icon doesn’t exist and none of my devices are listed. They still show up on Netflix
Title: Casting doesn’t work

Content: Why is there no continue watching it showed up for a day and gos away I have to restart or try to remember we’re I left off in an series ver inconvenient why is this. Fixxxx Still not fixed why it’s there one day gone the next come in I will not pay after my year is up still JUNK !!! There’s go it’s 1s and 0 what’s so hard about fixing
Title: Continue watching

Content: Instead of updating your old app you created a new one? It’s not even a good one, i just spend 3 min fighting your app to start an episode that i had already watched. The app won’t let you re watch it. I had to click the episode before the one i wanted, fast forward to the end, sit through 4 add breaks, then finally start the one i wanted.   Awful app.
Title: Max glitches

Content: I’m leaving this review to let you know why I have canceled and deleted this app. I like this app a lot I had it for Harry Potter and game of thrones it worked fine but recently when I open the app it has banners and pop up ads of lgbtq+ garbage I refuse to spend my money with any company that supports this garbage and not only supports it but shoves it in my face constantly
Title: My money will not support this

Content: HBO Max was downloaded onto my Firestick with no problem. When Max came out, I was told to delete HBO and redownload the new app. Now Max won’t install. I’ve called Amazons help center and they’re clueless and gave me no help (I’ve cleared caches, done software updates and even a factory reset) and still this one app won’t install. I even called the help line for Insignia TV and they were clueless as well.
Title: A nightmare to download

Content: Why did you “fix” what was not broken? This is so hard to use. The shows will not save in the continue watching. I have to start over every time I go back in. I have to search through every season to find which episode I was on. This is the worst streaming app out there. I am not sure I am going to continue paying for it.
Title: What happened?

Content: You know how on every single streaming service out there, you can pick up where you left off? Well on this App it doesn't always work, especially with shows/movies you have watched before. Incredibly frustrating and the "Contact us" and troubleshooting options lead absolutely nowhere.
Title: Continue watching doesn't work

Content: Why did they change how it was before? Nothing on this app works well. It doesn’t keep your show/movie un ‘continue watching’. Doesn’t keep your place in the program either! If you’re on it for too long the volume cuts out. It lacks the basic functionality of a streaming app, and for how much we pay, this is unacceptable!
Title: Horrible App

Content: The new max app is so much better plus the shows I watch every day so much my phone broke so I got a new phone just so I can watch max on the go, good job!
Title: Amazing

Content: Still glitchy, particularly when casting content. It often freezes on the phone side, preventing me from pausing or skipping around. Content is good. Loading speed seems good.
Title: Glitchy

Content: It’s exactly like HBO Max I don’t see any difference. I have one complaint about Max and it’s the fact that it does not save your content. If I watch a show and try to pick back off where I left off it’s not saved or listed in the continue watching section. Other than that it’s fine.
Title: It’s just ok so far…

Content: Not being able to sign in through AT&T unless connected to my home WiFi is just absolutely insane. I got signed out on an overseas trip and lost access to my downloaded content. This app is a regression in every possible way but they are laughing all the way to the bank by paying for 5 star bot reviews. What a joke.
Title: Unable to sign in unless at home

Content: Seems exactly the same as before. Which is fine.
Title: Seems the same

Content: The app is very user friendly and show and movie options are excellent. Looking forward to future Max original programming.
Title: Simple to the Max

Content: The merge with discovery is absolutely incredible and amazing! I recently quit my subscription with Discovery+ I’m so glad I did since this merge with Diiscovery+ plus my Cell Service Cricket Wireless offers Free Subscription to HBO!! Truly Amazed!

Content: Before this version, it was a lot easier to browse and find different things to watch, since HBO Max was really user friendly. Yet with Max, it has downgraded in a terrible way to where I might just cancel my subscription, which I've been a subscriber for about 4 years. Very inconvenient on all platforms that I've tried using it on.
Title: Newer isn't better

Content: Now whit the new version we have to many issues…whit loading,commercials, log out the account etc.
Title: No max

Content: Only issue right now is the app doesn’t save progress of watched shows so you have to keep track of what episode you’re on. I’m sure it’ll be patched but otherwise all good.
Title: Still great but

Content: Please fix shows like “how the universe works” there are a few others also. The sound isn’t synced correctly & about 15-20 min into episode it stops with error. Also some shows not saving under “continue watching” constantly have to find episode I stopped on

Content: Everytime i log back into MAX i have to search what i was recently binging. My place is never saved when it comes to TV shows. it’s very tedious at times because I forget where I’m at.
Title: Recently watched

Content: I think that is is idiotic that they want everyone to download a brand new app and change services. This app is also more difficult to use and has less menus to help you decide based on genre. And the worst part is they transitioned to a worse app when all it really did was cosmetic and organizational updates.
Title: Why change a perfectly good app?

Content: This is such a huge downgrade from the HBO Max app.  I’ve tried on iPhone, iPad and tvOS because I have no choice now to get HBO content.  Items are no longer in up next, where is the integration with the Apple TV app?? It used to be there!?!  With HBO contents it a now a huge pain to access the extras, behind the scenes, etc.  the could be the worst steaming app on the store at the moment
Title: Is Max paying people to write reviews?

Content: I just downloaded max thinking “ oh this will be trash “ but its pretty good ! on mobile it finally has a second screen for it to play :D ( which I watch south park on ) Overall Its awesome !
Title: Tbh pretty good!

Content: Everytime I use the app sends me to download it   at my App Store and on my tv and phone when it’s been updated and when I go to my App Store it says open 🤷🏽‍♂️
Title: Update

Content: I think that we deserve custom profile pictures again
Title: Custom Profile Pictures

Content: No one, absolutely no one who ever watched HBOMax wanted to have any boring crap like HGTV, Property Bros, or any of that other TLC junk as part of this app.  You literally added all the stuff from channels that we skipped when we had cable to this app.  Separate the apps!  Put all the great HBO shows, movies and entertainment in one app called MAX and put the “reality” based shows like Ghost Hunters in another app and call it MAX-Boring.
Title: Worst update ever

Content: Max needs to keep the features that made HBO MAX the best streaming app (studio tabs, as well as what is coming and leaving each month [with dates they are leaving the service], which was in my opinion the best feature of HBO MAX). They change a few things here and there and they’ll have my money for a full MAX subscription.
Title: New App is Meh

Content: I have still have yet to be able to login. I spent over an hour I chat with customer service. They couldn’t do anything for me and told me they couldn’t figure out a solution. They told me next week to try it again. They said they’re having problems with the migration and don’t know the solution. Whoever develop this app should be embarrassed.
Title: Horrible app

Content: For people who are good with technology this isn't a big deal but my ENTIRE older family is calling wanting to know why HBO max doesn't work. I then have to walk them through a whole new app installation, password attempts at sign in, and all for basically the same content. They shouldn't have made their clients download an entirely new app for this rebranding. So dumb.
Title: Requiring a new app = dumb

Content: I don’t understand why companies do this. They had a perfectly good working app going that we all knew. Only for them to roll out a multi day disruption for no reason. For $18 a month, two days loss is a huge deal. For someone who was considering canceling before the new roll out. These terrible features, lags, and disruptions only solidify that choice
Title: Why break what’s not broken

Content: I’m giving two stars on the new “Max” because it’s unbelievably slow. The app has now crashed a total of 3 times when trying to load in and goes completely black. The loading screen takes forever and the setup is a little janky. I get its a new app since the transition but man :/
Title: Such a mistake

Content: With the app change subtitles are now WAY lower on screen and much smaller. Please switch it back to how it was or offer options like other apps to increase size and position. Not sure why you changed this. Watched same show and same episode as I did 2 days ago and subtitles are completely different and hard to read.
Title: Subtitles aren’t same.

Content: Amazing almost never have trouble with it get this app super amazing just recommend getting new moving in max as fast as possible
Title: Max

Content: first of all, why was the house of hammer documentary added to the streaming platform when the lies are catching up with them? you’d think you wouldn’t want a baseless defamatory documentary on your platform but i guess money is more important. second of all the name is arbitrary, no one is going to call it max. let’s be real. third of all, the layout is ugly. the original HBO max was far better than this.
it’s the same as HBO max i don’t know why they had to switch it but i wish we could still customize our profile pictures i loved mine and now their gone that’s the only bad thing
Title: Max or HBO max 🙀

Content: The profile picture was something that you used to be able to customize before HBOMAX turned to MAX. Now you can only choose from certain avatars for profile pictures and it’s boring. Way to be basic like Netflix…

Content: I am loving the integration of the other services into this one service/app. Makes life so much easier when it’s time to be lazy.

Title: It’s amazing

Content: It’s awful. Episode will reset almost at random. Anytime you open the app while an episode is playing it will reset. If your phone goes to sleep while the app is open and you open your phone, the episode will reset. It’s awful and borderline unwatchable. And now with the addition of the discovery app it’s almost pointless.

Content: Half the features in the app don’t work well. The auto play next episode doesn’t work.

Content: They have some great shows on here, but they frequently remove max originals. So many amazing shows just erased from streaming because they don’t want to pay the writers!

Content: I don’t know max is very slow to load on Roku i have all updates installed. This is the only streaming app i have issues with. Plus i have to go through a whole junk I don’t watch to get to the shows i do watch.
Title: Slow

Content: I have max on my phone, my Roku, and Xbox one and the app does fine on all but the latter. Buffered a lot to the point I nearly turned it off but since I was just playing something for background noise, it was fine I guess.
Title: Buffering issues on Xbox one

Content: The response time for fast forwarding, rewinding, playing etc in comparison to your competitor apps is disturbingly slow. Plus, I have to touch the screen once just to be presented with the options rather than a quick double tap to either side. You can do better.
Title: Response time

Content: After a recent app update, all my downloaded episodes vanished. iOS shows that the Max app is still using GBs of storage, but nothing shows up in “Downloads”. So the files are apparently there, but totally inaccessible.  Ruined our plans of finishing Succession together on our vacation :(
Title: Lost all my downloads

Content: All my other streaming apps work flawlessly. We constantly switch off of hbo because the streaming is HORRENDOUS. It’s unwatchable to have the stream buffer every 30 seconds. It’s really sad too, because we like a lot of the shows. And the developers response is to …. Restart my modem?! It doesn’t work. Don’t blame the consumer for providing a faulty service.
Title: Terrible streaming quality

Content: ps Gothem knights is a really good show i can’t wait for the second season.
Title: when is gothem knights season 2 coming out this is a really good show and has a lot of potential 💯

Content: Great content cut I wish they brought back the channels section that they had when it was HBOmax. For example a DC channel that had all the DC stuff together.  UPDATE… They DO have a section devoted channel under the “Brand Spotlight” area.  CooooooooL.  Thanx Max 👍

Content: Content is decent and it has some of my favorite shows and movies, the only reason for the three stars is that the app constantly crashes and logs me off every time, it is frustrating and annoying

Content: To say the least affordable and great quality plus with so many different films and tv series to choose from!!! Well worth it!

Content: On my phone, the app constantly crashes and I am unable to go back to my original show I was watching, it brings me to a constant reloading screen. On our PlayStation, app constantly crashes every few minutes and you have to reload it. What is the point of even having this app to people if it’s unusable?

Content: I really think that HBO-max really didn’t need to change. Everything was going swell tell I see the app has changed?? And some of the features are gone. Like wth?!

Content: I am on the $9.99 plan a month. The commercials are constantly buffering/ freezing. My Internet does not have this issue with any other apps like this. Every time I hit a commercial, I have to back out of the app and then back in to continue watching content. Please fix this.

Content: I love HBO max there movies and show are so great it has great quality  And you don’t have to worry about Ads! And it’s easy to sign up and you don’t have to do no test or go through puzzles I love HBOA

Content: In the past few days I’ve been able to watch Max on my phone. Watching a film called, 1000 Words with Eddie Murphy really touched me. Content: Not sure which corporate stooge came up with the idea to drop the hbo and re invent the wheel with this latest garbage, but now my continue watching list is full of titles I’ve already watched and when I remove them they just come back like an std.   Hbo max stood out before with its 1 price tier now it’s just a Nutflix clone wanting you to pay extra for content in 4k ultra hd.

Content: This new layout looks like it could be an older version of HBO Max 💀I definitely prefer the look of HBO Max over Max’s. the icon for the app; the profile screen; the colors- it just looked better in my opinion. But it still works the same so whatever 🤷🏽‍♀️

Content: I highly recommend Max. The amount of great tv shows and quality movies pays for the subscription alone monthly.

Title: Next episode button should shows up late

Requires logging back in constantly on my iPhone, loses 30 downloads and requires them to all be done again. Pure, unadulterated garbage.

I wish I could give this app negative stars.

Content: If I go to a series (in my case, “Winning Time”) and try to scroll down to download the episode, the screen immediately goes black and I have to force-close the app entirely. I saw an app update today and hoped it would fix the issue, but still can’t scroll…

Content: Back with HBO max I loved the suggested shows and movies that would be presented with to me.   Now with Max it feels like all of my suggested content are the Trashy reality shows that are on TLC. I wish there was a way to update preference to hide all of these terrible new shows.
Title: Content suggestions

Content: Audio description automatically turned on any time I cast. Have to stop, restart, play, quit again, play something else. Basically trick it to turn it off. Want subtitles? Gotta work for it, the app wants you to go in browser to make changes. Wanna go back 10 seconds? 1 minute later you’ll regret it. Max is just as bad if not worse.
Title: Janky

Content: I paid for the ad free plan through Apple and was given ads the entire time, no one from Apple or Max could resolve the issue since it was third party billing. Just cancelled the subscription since they were all pretty useless and will probably subscribe through the website.

Content: I gave the app feedback saying I couldn’t find something that was right in front of my face

IF NOT FIX YOUR APP MAX. It only happens when I stream max onto my tv.

Content: I really was disappointed with the forced viewing of commercials for questionable products, such as monoglyohsphate (Roundup brand “weed killer”) which is likely responsible for large scale environmental destruction and the loss of habitat of species worldwide.   Since the paying subscribers does not have the option to flag nor skip a commercial, I found the choice of content even more questionable by HBO.

Content: I was going to watch hbo then I had to download max, not a big deal had to re sign in just to watch the show I love come to find out it’s not even on there. Why would you take off a show that only streams on hbo? (For not an extra $30 to your subscription) are they going to put it back on max or will it just be another useless provider?

Content: It’s the best way to watch HBO, period.  Everything you need at your fingertips.  Never miss a show.  Quality is magnificent, with no buffering and issues.  I love it!

Content: Ima keep it short and simple, ever since this new version (Max) came out I realized that when I watch a show it won’t save and let me continue from where I last watched the episode, so now when I’m about to go, I need to see what season and episode I left because it won’t even show the bar to see how far on the episode I was on.

Content: I loved HBO Max, I would use it everyday to watch all my favorite shows and cartoons, but out of the blue (No pun intended) I can’t use that app anymore. No hate to Max, I just preferred the overall look and browsing of the old one and I can’t use it anymore, which is a slight disappointment.

When I click on the 1st episode it goes straight to the end and then to the next episode. And it didn’t save to my continue watching menu. I guess I just miss the ending to episode one?

Content: When streaming through my Roku it will not pick up where I left off I have to locate the program and the episode and guess where I was at in that show and start watching. It does not seem to do that when I cast through google chromecast, though.
