Content: Now that max is here be ready to lose your place in all your favorite tv shows and the ability to not use your email account and use a complete fake login id and name because you can’t use your actual one from your old account. Please fix this garbage and go back to the old app.

Content: So great to use the app and see HGTV shows.  One suggestion is to make them discoverable by the network so that I don’t have to search them individually

Content: It’s going to take me time to get used to something new , that’s just me though. All I know is I’m already having fun . I trust the max/hbo  team with my entertainment . Love you . Thank you .

Content: By far the smoothest migration to a new brand and platform of seen in years! It’s looks great, works fast and has a massive library of quality content!

Content: The  app itself is great but the technical issues keep popping up. The continue next tab never seems to have what I was just watching.  Movie selection is okay, love the Tostito Mifune movie selection, but sad about losing adult swim shows.
Title: Continue watching

Content: I went through process to login through Xfinity as prompted. Saw the checkbox showing it was successful. Now all I receive is a message saying error occurred and nothing else. When trying to contact HBO through app prompts you get a USELESS chat bot that does not work on an iPad. Maybe spend time testing. I have no way to get support now. Time to cancel.
Title: HORRIBLE Implementation can’t sign in

Content: Obtained new app from the App Store per prompt from HBO. Every time I back out of the app, the new “max” icon reverts back to “HBO max” icon then proceeds to repeat the process each and every time you enter or exit the app.  I’m fairly certain my 1 year old iPhone is extremely outdated by now, but this issue seems almost too preventable by not releasing a beta version as a finished app?
Title: Nearly unusable

Content: Love the app, it offers a variety of entertainment for the whole family. Login was also easy.

Content: It’s the best ever because I can find the best movies ever. I don’t need to search it up on some other app and it’s really nice to find the movies I like.

Content: Why not just keep HBO Max as it’s own thing and don’t do this. HBO max with its purple and it’s better logo was cooler, and had such a great interface. No more custom profile pictures, no special characters in the names
Title: HBO Max

Content: Why would they make us download a new app and price everything higher? Why would they add a bunch of shows I didn’t want? There’s a reason I subscribed to HBO and not Discovery - we wanted HBO content. MAX just adds unnecessary fluff. Looking at all the new content it’s so much random content just because of a merger that didn’t need to happen. What a shame.

Content: I paid for a year long subscription for HBO Max via the Apple Store a month or two ago. When trying to restore purchase once installing the Max app it states there is no subscription. I hope this can be changed or updated in the near future.

Content: I signed up with MAX mainly so I could watch FIXER UPPER and some of the other HGTV shows.  Then I began to explore some of the other available series, shows, and movies.  Now I’m watching MAX more than Netflix. MAX is WONDERFUL!!!  I ❤️ it!!!

Content: Better visibility, easier to navigate are the only two issues I’d like to see improved. Other than that, I’m happy.

Content: Lately when I’m casting onto my tv and try to go back to the app to pause it restarts the show from the beginning. Also it frequently resets the volume back to max volume after turning it down. Can’t seem to fix it.

Content: I will say I prefer the set up of the old HBO app. I wish I could browse movies A-Z but it only lets me do that within genres. Not saying that’s bad, but in addition to I would like to scroll through all movies available.

Content: It’s good, miss the purple, it helped it stand out more and looked better. Too much agenda driven content has ruined this platform like many others. The DC content has suffered, one of my fave shows was Young Justice, I don’t even recognize it anymore.
Title: Alternative

Content: Before my travel to a different country I downloaded a few seasons of the show I wanted to watch during my travel. I watched some on the plane. The second I connected to the local Wi-Fi at my destination everything is deleted. I would not recommend this app if you plan to use it during your travels.
Title: Deleted downloaded show

Content: This app is truly horrible. Why there was a decision to change what was working for this????? I rated it 4 stars so that the rating will go to the top and be seen. I never write reviews but here I am frustrated writing.
Title: Why?????

Content: Closed captions for My Brilliant Friend are no longer working on Apple devices (more broadly?).  The Voice Over feature is too clunky to be useful: it includes superfluous information like stage direction and does not reduce the volume of actor dialog, making it impossible to isolate the voice over from the actors and background music / noises
Title: Closed Captions no longer working

Content: Yoo whoever brought back adventure time with crossovers or multiverse needs a raise made me feel soo young like smh lol but greatest show ever y’all gotta bring back old shoes no kizzy
Title: I forgot I was paying hbo max

Content: My personal favorite streaming service. Fantastic content on top of a very easy to navigate user interface.
Title: Fantastic service

Content: Every time I use the new Max app, my Sony Bravia television blasts the program at full volume. It’s ridiculous and no other service does this. It is also impossible to find app settings for closed captions. Thus app is far worse than the HBO app was.
Title: Bellowing volume

Content: The only issue I have is that the search feature lags. Otherwise it’s great.
Title: Good app, search slow

Content: Why in the world would a long press on a show remove it from your queue instead of give you the option to go back to the show page and select another episode?
Title: Fine but Apple TV interface confusing

Content: If someone said to me I could only have ONE subscription TV provider, without question, it would be HBO MAX. No other streaming service comes close. Thank you, MAX, for improving my life.
Title: HBO MAX ROCKS!!

Content: I cast this app to one of my TV and I always have to restart the entire app if I pause a show or movie. It’s very frustrating. Please fix.
Title: App is buggy

Content: I love Max and it has my favorite shows and movies but may I ask why they haven’t included all of the episodes of Impractical Jokers?? Why does it skip from episode one to 10 in one season?? Please explain and fix!
Title: Give us all the content!

Content: New update will not allow for auto play of next episode and when you do play the next episode, the screen is black. You have to force close the app and restart to actually see the next episode. Please resolve.
Title: New Update

Content: More diversified choices from old classics to modern day films and television shows!  Terrific documentaries and much, much more! Everything you’d want to watch!  Thanks Max!!
Title: Max, More bang for the bucks!

Content: This has happened several times to me, I download a series of shows and some point during the flight the app goes to a blue screen and stops working. I try shutting down the app my phone and nothing works till I get back online and have to re-sign in again.  This keeps on happening
Title: Offline downloads don’t work

Content: In My opinion Max has the best collection of shows and movies and has such a wide variety of titles, genres and even extras. Overall best streaming app today!
Title: Max to the Max

Content: Love the app. Shows are great and being able to watch award winning shows anywhere. Don’t like they changed the name.
Title: Great shows

Content: HBO/max offers premiere programming, films and documentaries that share a timeless aesthetic. Thank you for constantly creating stellar content for us to enjoy!
Title: Quality content and service

Content: The original app was poorly optimized, lagged all the time, and especially on tv never seemed to work. The new Max app is GREAT! No issues! Finally!
Title: Far better app.

Content: I love Max so much but why don’t we just have HBO Max I kinda liked it more but Max is kind of better but can we just please have HBO Max and Max and I’m really glad that you put on South Park I love that show
Title: I love HPO Max and Max

Content: HBO Max is broken on iOS, iPadOS and Roku. My wife and I like to watch HBO series and Max cannot remember which show we’re watching, which season or which episode. It does occasionally work but it may not remember where in the show we were. We’re paying for a “premium” service and getting a lousy product. Either fix it or go back to the previous version.
Title: They broke HBO

Content: Hoping for a clean transition from HBO Max. HM had a little cleaning up to do and I hope this version is clean and polished. Looking forward to it. There have always been a good selection of movies. Ready to give this five stars soon.
Title: MAX

Content: HBO max was way easier than this. Max is not user friendly and neglects to have a section for shows and movies you are still watching. It probably wasn’t ready to drop yet with the amount of bugs it has still. Hopefully updates help in the near future!!
Title: Should’ve kept HBO max

Content: I’m really liking the app but what really really bothers me is that the time on the bottom left has been removed. How are we supposed to know what time we’re on if we can’t see the time?
Title: Timestamps

Content: Please fix your audio, connection, and network bugs before making us switch. Even worse than HBOs app with less buffering. Please deal with the bugs so I can enjoy my all time favorite content
Title: Needs pesticide

Content: It’d be great if I didn’t have to keep signing in every time I open the app. You would think a streaming service as big as HBO max wouldn’t have this issue, but guess again. Every time I open this app on my phone it asks me to sign in. A little ridiculous coming from a streaming service of this size.
Title: A little bug fix goes a long way

Content: I’m not sure what the developers were thinking. But you can’t access the app without Wi-Fi, even though you’ve downloaded movies… Found in this the hard way on a four hour flight.  Either fix it or I’m sure you’re going to lose subscribers.
Title: Downloaded content doesn’t work without Wi-Fi connection… Very poorly thought out app

Content: On the phone no problem on the tv doesn't appear the option to change languages
Title: Doesnt let me change language or subs on the tv

Content: From what I’ve seen so far, this could have just been an update to the original app. Not only that I don’t like the blue as much as the magnificent purple that the previous app had, but it is what it is.
Title: Why did I have to get a whole new app for this?

Content: From old favorites like Real Sports to enjoyable films and series that show a world, not so long ago, that still had a sense of humor. I just want a little entertainment and for me the varied volume here fits the bill.
Title: MAX has it all

Content: I’ve tried all of their on-line suggestions. I can get the captions to tell me who is speaking, but not what they are saying. So, I am halfway through an Italian drama, I cannot finish it, and apparently we are not able to go back to the old app. I am very unhappy.  UPDATE:  No developer response or other help.  I bought my show on iTunes and cancelled subscription.
Title: Captions do not work

Content: I love how there are more options now but I only watch movies and shows with my friends and using SharePlay has a huge part of that. Now that’s it’s not featured in it anymore we have haven’t been using max
Title: Better but no share play

Content: I do not understand why they switched this. HBO was my favorite streaming app and they have switched to a subpar platform. Accessibility and layout of the app is far worse. I do not understand why they did this. Even if there is a good reason for the change I do not know why they made the app far worse. Terrible for the brand.
Title: Worse than the original

Content: Latest version on May 26 (iOS 14.5.1) once I stream to Chromecast and close and reopen app while content plays, the bar at the bottom of the app does not display a play bar, play button, skip buttons. Pause function on bottom bar is unreactive. This was an important feature of HBO Max and it ruins the experience of watching on MAX.
Title: Cannot control content once I cast

Content: HBO MAX used to include ALL the movies and shows that were leaving, now MAX just has a small section. I now have to go to third party websites and inconvenience myself to see what’s about to leave so I can watch it before it goes. If I don’t know what’s leaving, I don’t prioritize watching. If I don’t watch, I figure I don’t need the service and will cancel. FIX THIS!!!
Title: Last Chance & Just Added GONE

Content: Very good update, feels like the downloads and offline watching is a great improvement
Title: Better than before

Content: Experiencing more issues than ever before.  Screen won’t go into full screen mode and I’m just watching part of my movie or show and can’t see any characters.   Stopped loading twice in the last hour I’ve been trying to watch something. Continue to have to exit out and re load the app.   How annoying.
Title: Awful

Content: HDR10 and Dolby Vision has been removed from subscribers that paid a yearly plan. Not even movies that were previously offered in Dolby Vision and HDR10 (think The Last of Us) have maintained this offering in the new app.   I understand having to increase prices, but don’t understand why legacy and loyal subscribers have to have features removed from their services in this new app.
Title: HDR10/Dolby Vision REMOVED from Legacy Customers

Content: there was no reason to make a completely separate app, let alone change the name. but since they went through with it why not just update and rename the same app?? it’s not like anything else changed about the streaming service. they just made a worse looking app with the same content, just rearranged to give the appearance of freshness and a sanitized corporate aesthetic. ugly color scheme, less intuitive ui (hub logos, section titles, movie and show grouping, navigation, etc). the only things that feel good are the my list tab, the responsiveness, and the variety of profile icons.  the overwatch 2 of streaming services.
Title: abysmal decision

Content: I guess all it requires is a brand new app to fix the problem where I can never log into hbo max on my iOS devices lol.
Title: I can finally log in

Content: I recently got a new max app, because they allowed me to find the anime movies with subs and dubs in the same format. Also, they got a lot of dc universe of the justice league.
Title: Much better than hbo max

Content: I love my Subscription, I wish they would have kept the Fear of the walking dead, Big disappointment, but overall I love MAX
Title: Fear of the Walking Dead

Content: “ Request blocked. We can't connect to the server for this app or website at this time. There might be too much traffic or a configuration error. Try again later, or contact the app or website owner.  If you provide content to customers through CloudFront, you can find steps to troubleshoot and help prevent this error by reviewing the CloudFront documentation. “
Title: Can’t log in

Content: The display zoom option hides the movie title pictures in the scroll areas of the app.  Used to work…within the last few weeks it no longer does.
Title: Display zoom breaks the app

Content: When trying to sign in with the provider, the app simply takes me to Xfinity‘s homepage instead of an authentication page. There is literally no possible way for me to sign in with my provider. Why do we even bother paying for this subscription if we can’t watch?
Title: Never had so much trouble trying to login

Content: Max has a wide range of the best viewing material . My family and I are happy to have purchased Max . We know you will too.
Title: Viewing

Content: When I cast onto my TV, the volume suddenly increases to 100 which is extremely annoying. Even after muting my TV beforehand, as soon as the movie I’m watching begins, the volume turns back on and raises to its highest volume!! Please fix it.
Title: App is Buggy

Content: I like the shows that’s not the problem. The problem for me is that the quality is so blurry doesn’t matter on what device. You’d think they would have fix it by now.
Title: Okay…

Content: Wish the “watch list” would hold everything-it seems to only hold 20 things
Title: Love the app-wish my “my list” would hold everything!!

Content: It is amazing to me that HBO had a fully functioning app and replaced it with this buggy trash app. I can’t open the app or look at my phone while casting something without the app glitching out. It doesn’t track which episodes I’ve watched or mark where I’ve stopped if I stop in the middle of a show. It is practically unusable.
Title: Impressively bad app

Content: App works fine, had some bug issues they fixed.
Title: Good app to see favorite shows

Content: Max has the best choices of unique documentaries, that are actual documentaries! And you can’t beat their series line up! The included HBO Originals like “Euphoria” and “House of Dragons” can’t be beat!!
Title: Best Choice

Content: Came for this show and only this show, announce season 2 then we’ll maybe talk about you getting 1 more. Also when you pause a show it plays at a previous point when you restart.
Title: Fionna & Cake

Content: I only watch tags on my iPad while at the gym.  Unfortunately the last update did something where I can’t login to a third-party provider to resume watching the shows that I was watching before a new update logged me out and I have to log in again.  I’ve had this issue with this app number of times throughout the years and I just have to wait until another update hopefully fixes the issue.    If I could report the problem and get technical support, I would. However there is no clear way to do this.
Title: Can’t use if trying to connect to a 3rd party provider on laptop

Content: I have to re-download the app everytime I watch something because audio subtitles are always on by default. The settings area is glitched when I try to turn them of, no they don't work. Also, there's no extra settings in my profile to control them like the app mentions. Pleae fix this bug!!!
Title: Please fix audio subtitle settings

Content: They need a recently watched and recommended section at the top. I struggle to find shows I have been watching easily. Step it up HBA! Otherwise solid.
Title: APP OK BUT….

Content: When the app closes it it signs me out of the connected service provider, requiring me to re-sign in every time I open the app. If it would stay connected it’s a great app.
Title: Signs me out.

Content: How interesting that HBO max changed to just max. My favorites are always going to be home remodeling wish you had more of it!                        I am streaming Kendra sells Hollywood love it
Title: More Home remodeling

Content: Tried using the new app for iPad and keep getting that it’s not available in my area. I live in Washington D.C. Old app worked fine.
Title: App doesn’t work

Content: HBO Max had SharePlay, the new MAX app is missing this feature. SharePlay is one of the best ways to virtually watch shows/movies with friends and family. This is a huge miss and should be a relatively easy feature to implement. It almost surely is coming down to negotiations. Do the right thing for users.
Title: Bring SharePlay back

Content: Look at how many recent reviews for this app are clearly bots giving it 5 stars.  It’s an embarrassment for HBO.  When I use Chromecast.  The app will only allow sound from the audio formats spanish and audio description English.   I literally can’t watch my shows on the TV without a narrator describing everything.    When I go to see if others are having similar issues I see, 14 reviews in a row that give 5 stars and just say nice from accounts like “jjj zz.” And that was just one group of reviews, I saw hundreds of fakes as I scrolled through new reviews.    This is a joke and will impact my subscription.
Title: Fake reviews for buggy app

Content: I know even though I live in the sticks if I have a good signal MAX is about the best app to go to to watch great movies and series with great quality and I’m so glad we have it
Title: MAX

Content: I have to try to log in multiple times with this new app. It is so frustrating that I get logged out and have to try several times to get logged back in. Fix it please.
Title: Log in issues

Content: Max is my favorite app. It has all my DC/WB content you can’t find anywhere else. I just bought a new LG Oled and the picture quality that Max provides is breathtaking.
Title: Best App Ever !!!

Content: The library is choked with Discovery channel garbage. Exiting a show during the credits doesn’t record that episode as completed, so my ‘continue watching’ is full of episodes the app has decided I still need to finish. Every time I start a show or movie, the video plays for a sola it second before buffering and restarting at high resolution.
Title: Unusable

Content: Great movies and I love that just about everything has the Spanish audio option.  Only bad part is that the app is soooo slow to load.  It was way better before they redid it.
Title: They do need to improve their service

Content: It has so many movies and shows, my favorite being Steven universe franchise. I recommend getting this if you love watching movies and shows.
Title: Amazing

Content: I like MAX I think they need to develop a faster more user friendly app. Out of all the streaming platforms I pay for, MAX is the slowest and least user friendly. Still purchase max if you are hesitant just write a review in hopes max develops a better faster app
Title: I like max “HBO MAX”

Content: Logs me out periodically on my tv and on the app it says I have to sign in every time I want to watch something. Also I don’t like how if you finish an episode, the show gets taken off of your continue watching and you have to find where you left off.
Title: Bugs and Features

Content: It’s also impossible to log in on a browser while using older iPads. While trying to sign in one both Safari & Chrome you are automatically directed to download the app which doesn’t work. So Max can no longer be viewed on older iPads. Absolutely Shameful customer service.
Title: Horrible App doesn’t work on older devices!

Content: Even though I feel like the name and color change was unnecessary, I'm glad they left the content alone.
Title: Great content

Content: The max that is more of the best apps available
Title: This and Netflix are the two that are worth having for sure!

Content: Im having issues with the audio settings I normally watch with english but recently when I went to watch a show that i like the audio is the english (audio description) one. Tried everything i can. Even switching to the actual audio description but that messed up too? Could you please fix this
Title: Glitch?

Content: HBO has the best original shows. Period. Took it down a star due to all the unoriginal trash that has been added to the platform now. Makes it feel like Netflix and not elite.
Title: Best streaming service

Content: Love the content on HBO/Max, but the new app is too unpredictable. Rarely saves progress properly on series, consistently resets series to episode 1, kicks movies and shows out of the watchlist, “cursor” (or highlight to select) disappears in the Roku version.   Again, great content, terrible app.
Title: Glitchy for now

Content: Was forced to switch from the HBO app. Auto logged me in. Not issues. Other companies should take a lesson on how to handle a switchover. Well done Max team.
Title: Nothing but positives

Content: I’m literally unable to use this app with my HBO subscription with YoutubeTV.  Request sign in with my provider, Google makes me authenticate my account by task switching to their app, and when I task switch back to HBO Max app it says there is and error.  Rinse and repeat.  Completely useless app.  Do they test anything before releasing it?  Can’t even get the basics right.
Title: Can’t authenticate with provider

Content: Since the update and the move from the HBO Max to the new app, I’ve had a repetitive issue. The new Max app continues to sign me out in between uses, and requires me to login every time I use it. Never had this issue with the old app. Very frustrating, I hope they fix it soon.
Title: Bugs need to be fixed

Content: I can no longer login on iPad. Support is useless and blamed me. Didn’t believe me when I said I was trying to log into max and not the old app. You literally can’t, the login is gone. I doubt it will get fixed. Should have just changed the name and logo on the old app and spared me the headache. I want a refund for the 3 months I have left since I can’t watch.
Title: Huge fail

Content: Omg so GOOD!! I paid for no adds and it was definitely worth it. i love how when we download the max app it instantly logs you in your account!!!! definitely worth it. best streaming app ever.
Title: Max

Content: I love the new Max App! Like everyone else I initially thought this was pointless but I was surprised to see the app setup was identical to HBO Max but the app seems to run much smoother and faster.
Title: Much Better

Content: missing episodes. changed the episode selection layout to one single row. and now instead of having all your favorite shows and movies all on the home page, you have to scroll through 1,000 awful filler shows the original hbo demographic will never watch such as Dr. pimple popper and a million of the same fixer upper shows.
Title: Zaslav ruined HBO

Content: Major UI/UX fixes needed. For example, the only things in my “continue watching” section at hbo shows and movies that i already finished. It doesn’t save my spot or even acknowledge that I’ve watched episodes/shows from other networks. Will pause my subscription until you are prioritizing your users.
Title: Don’t quit while you’re ahead

Content: The new Max app isn’t good. It only saying when you left off in a movie, it will not tell you where you left off in the series. If you already started watching the series, it will leave you at the end of episode one every single time and it is very laggy and is very glitchy.
Title: No good

Content: You guys are the worst, and most worthless company in the world when it comes to putting out an online app. It barely works and when it does it misses contents like subtitles, and the sound is all off. What a joke of a company, you and your engineers should be embarrassed. You guys should send your intern to Netflix to try and gain some knowledge on how to build an online platform.
Title: Worst app ever

Content: I need to download a new app on all 4 my devices and sign in for what customer benefit?   HBO is now Max…  There is this interesting concept your company might consider next time. A string change to the name… or assuming there is some technical reason for this time the release with some actual customer value being delivered at the same time.
Title: Product Manager What are you doing?

Content: It looks well, but I shouldn’t have to fast forward to pick back up where I left off on a episode of a show. In addition, My app on my and tv are not synchronized at all. I go to the phone app and it’s not even starting me from where I left off when I watched it on TV last. Bad app overall, should’ve kept it like it was.
Title: Needs a lot of work

Content: Almost everything in this app is slow functions take to long to load comparing to other apps which each function happens as soon as I touch it
Title: Slow

Content: Unfortunately (on Apple TV) this app is far worse than HBO Max.  The video player is extremely glitchy. It returns a reliable error when scrubbing and skipping the timeline. The preview window on the timeline does not work. The scrubbing sound (same as the keyboard sound?) will play when not actually scrubbing.  Features such asking Siri “what did they say?” and having it automatically rewind and enable caption for that sentence do not work with the new player. I’d much rather have the Apple Player as HBO Max did.  Dear HBO: please revert this meaningless name change and bring back the stability and features of HBO Max.
Title: Unstable, Glitchy, & Missing Features

Content: Am I going to have to choose my user name every time I open the app?    I haven’t downloaded the update yet. I’ve opened the app twice. Both times I have had to choose my user name. The first sure. But then it should know it’s me on my device.   Also I agree with the comment that purple was more unique and made it easier to find on my device screen. So many apps are blue.    We shall see… the articles all say many features are gone.  Let’s see which ones affect me. 🤔
Title: Update one hour after I download

Content: Ever since the merger it got even more and better shows!! This app truly has something for everyone

Contin is awesome. However, the app can be sluggish, and kind of hard to navigate. It's not very intuitive and once you click on some thing if you want to get back out to where you started it's tedious.
Title: Great content, not great navigation

Content: Thank you for putting the Meg 2 I have been meaning to watch it but never got the chance to in theaters thank you so much
Title: Thank you

Content: MAX has a great selection of movies and shows to watch but wayyyy too many adds interrupting watch time. I swear this is a new feature.
Title: I love, but there are too many adds

Content: Tried to watch a movie for the first time in a few months, and I had to switch to the new Max app.  I can’t get connect as the app says “my time is out of synch.”  Using an iPad and have the time set automatically and time zone set to my time zone.  Frustrating.  I have rebooted the iPad, and have deleted and re-installed the app.
Title: Unusable since the app became max

Content: Best app for watching movies and shows amazing I love South Park the most it has all of your favs and non favs such a good app with a good selection of movies and shows
Title: Good quality good shows and movies

Content: For some weird reason every time I go to more information on a certain tv show the screen goes completely blank
Title: I cant choose which episode I want to watch on most shows

Content: It would be nice if you updated or added new movies, the same movies have been on the app for the past 4 years. Is that by design. What’s the point of paying the price for the app every month for the same experience. Do better, as you see; even Netflix lost billions for overlooking customer requests.
Title: Same movies since 2019

Content: Every time I pause it for 2 minutes plus it restarts from the beginning. Doesn’t matter if it’s on my phone or tv. It will restart the movie or tv show from the beginning if you pause it.
Title: Please update!!

Content: Really enjoying all the monsterverse and dc movies, also the new app feels a lot smoother for streaming to a tv 👍. You guys need to get season 7 of Rick and morty when available 🙏
Title: Review

Content: This app just lags way more than you’d expect and sometimes the app takes forever to load up the menus when you are looking for a show to watch. Love the content of Max though for sure.
Title: App lags a lot

Content: App crashes and freezes all the time.  Also, cannot always access downloaded content, which can be very frustrating when offline.  When the app is actually working correctly, it is good.
Title: App crashes all the time

Content: Wonderful entertainment for the price and the variety you have is amazing. Please keep us enthralled and excited for what’s next. Thank you!
Title: Expectations

Content: The app is pretty good but they’ve cut too many animations, anime especially. A big reason I even bought the app was for a great show called Close Enough made by the creator of Regukar Show. However, it’s been cut since the merger, and SHOULD BE BROUGHT BACK!!
Title: Bring back Close Enough

Content: There should be no advertisements we pay a subscriber fee every month why ads? Love the shows
Title: Max

Content: I love that I can watch my favorite shows on this new & improved platform. I love it I have shows of my other streaming services don’t.
Title: Loveee

Content: The UI is much less easy to navigate now and is more suited towards those who are looking for something specific versus those that like to look around for new movies or shows.
Title: Previous version of HBO Max app was better

Content: Please bring back screenshare so I can watch with family and friends who are far away from home. Thank you!
Title: Screenshare

Content: It’s not a bad app, it just has no ability to hide shows/ topics that I have zero interest in. Then I have to spend time scrolling through those every time I log in.
Title: No ability to hide shows

Content: It would be really nice if the space bar and arrows on my ipad Magic Keyboard would pause and jump back/forward respectively!
Title: I just wish the keyboard controls worked

Content: Please fix the Roku overheating issue. Can’t watch 10 or 15 minutes of something without getting the overheating message. I understand others are having the same issues.
Title: Roku issues

Content: HBO as a company makes far too much money to make such a lackluster, milquetoast app. Casting from my iPhone to my tv is so buggy: can't access subtitles, default volume is set to 100, picture quality lag. Navigating the app through the tv is a nightmare. It's time to stop focusing on competing with other apps and start investing in good quality development
Title: Hire better developers

Content: Quality is crap as if standard definition and can’t be adjusted.  I have the same internet I’ve had for years and have Netflix, had HBO without quality issues.  I have to download what I want to watch and then stream it to get HD.  I’m hoping to cancel after two days without getting ripped off for a whole month.
Title: Quality is crap

Content: the thing with the other apps are so annoying DO YOU LIKE THIS APP and sends me to the App Store but max understands how annoying it is
Title: Love the movies,and it did not get me out of the app to rate it.

Content: It literally has almost every movie you can think of. It’s definitely worth paying for, im never bored when i open HBO Max.
Title: My favorite app is HBO Max

Content: Also can you add like a live Tv button where you can watch hbo channels and stuff I bet more people would like it
Title: It’s good

Content: Every day you have to log back in and select your provider and then some days even after all that and resetting your device you still can not watch anything! This is not worth the money, time or energy. I’d rather have 5 other apps to watch my shows than the unreliability of this one.
Title: Streaming non existent

Content: I am disappointed with the introduction of max as it does not keep track of the shows and movies. When I watch a tv show, I cannot simply watch from where I had previously left off. I also annoy believe that max took off my favorite category which is romance. Aside from the icons for each member HBO max was more organized and user friendly.
Title: PLEASE UPDATE MAX ASAP

Content: The tv shows and movie are excellent! I’ve been looking for most of the shows forever! I can’t stop logging on and watching!
Title: Awesome!

Content: The audio on some shows is not synced to the video and this makes it really frustrating to watch. And I know it is not an issue in my end because it only happens on certain shows. Pls fix this I love the show selection but I won’t be paying for this if I can’t even enjoy the shows
Title: Audio sync issues

Content: The new app is completely unfriendly for users. There is no way to find everything uploaded at the beginning of each month. Their algorithm is forcing reality shows we have no interest in onto the top of our feed. We used HBO Max daily. We are debating unsubscribing from Max because they seem to not want us to use it.
Title: Awful Experience

Content: It’s at least less glitchy than HBO Max was. The app could still use work, and the new layout is surprisingly underwhelming. It’s hard to find the things I’m interested in.
Title: Meh

Content: Has lots of titles to choose from, only negative is on return playback the title never goes back to last location left off.
Title: Good streaming experience

Content: I travel a lot to South America, specially Ecuador. I loved HBO Max, for it catalog, now i am stuck with max and it it not available when i travel, at least if you are gonna change functionality don’t change availability! Some people like streaming platform because we travel.
Title: Less availability in the world

Content: App keeps signing me out. Won’t finish downloads. Won’t go to correct profile even after selecting it after sign in. Lots of bugs that need to be addressed especially for a new product launch
Title: Issues

Content: Loving all of the content but very disappointed that my continue watching does not remember what episode I’ve left off on and starts all series over from season 1 episode 1 each and every time I try to watch. Worked fine when it was HBOMAX.
Title: Love the content but disappointed

Content: Unbelievably bad UX that was obviously rushed, and it shows. Where do I begin? For one, it’s a terrible idea to mix shows from different channels in the same place. Then there’s the odd choice of not even showing the year, cast, director and other basic information about shows. Finally, most of the shows are dull. I’d rather spend more time on books.
Title: Unbelievably bad UX

Content: The quality of the audio sounds horrible when bluetooth headphones are plugged in. Developers need to fix this problem as the app is basically unusable with headphones, overall the app is decent.
Title: Audio Quality

Content: So much better than the HBO app!! The one thing I’m unhappy with is that if you turn the subtitles on, they don’t stay on for the next time. So every time it goes to the next episode, you have to turn them off and on again.
Title: Subtitles

Content: The new app has a bug. The stream will freeze after the first add starts. Then you get a black screen. I reached out to support team 2 times and no one taking any action and issue still available. Will cancel the subscription. You dont want to pay a subscription to look at a frozen screen
Title: Streaming will freeze after  add

Content: You can't hear the Harry Potter movie, you have to turn the volume up to 100 and you can't hear it
Title: volume problems

Content: The addition of the Discovery content has turned what was a nice app into filtering through trash reality shows. I never realized I’m how crappy Discovery content is.
Title: Discovery Content is Trash

Content: I gave this app a one star because one it doesn’t have the fifth Harry Potter movie two It doesn’t have the seventh Harry Potter movie three it doesn’t have the fourth Harry Potter movie and for I’m just really mad at him for not having all the harry potter movies so fix it. Oh and it also doesn’t have part one or part two to the seventh movie😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡
Title: This is why I don’t like Max don’t get mad at me😡

Content: After the rebrand from HBO Max to just Max, the AppleTV app stopped using the native Apple video player and uses some custom player that isn’t as good. There’s a noticeable lag when trying to skip forward or backward 10s and the scrubbing isn’t as smooth. And the related options (captions, etc) aren’t as easy to get to
Title: Revert the AppleTV app to use the native Apple video player!

Content: Like the content in max. But it is harder to manage my hbo max account. HBO max website is directly jumping to the app and the app is missing the subscription payment tab
Title: Good content. Like more help with account management

Content: I love the new upgrade I can go on discovery and watch all the episodes of naked and wild keep up the great job and more upgrades coming soon
Title: Max

Content: I was watching a show and not most of the episodes are gone. Seriously?
Title: Half the name, half the content

Content: Not sure why HBO hates me so, but it sure seems that every time they try to “upgrade” to a new app (remember HBO Now?) they find new ways to break my appleTV and send me into the depths of a new purgatory with slow response times and crashing apps. I was going to cancel Netflix for the next 6 months and keep HBO but given how awful this app is it looks like it’s time for HBO to go.
Title: Another downgrade by HBO

Content: Navigating content is fine, maybe even better than the HBO app.  However the main event watching content is terrible. If you do anything but starting and pausing the app basically doesn’t work.   Somehow the app developers managed to make basic features like skipping back and forth not work like every other TV app.
Title: Terrible video player

Content: Personally, I find this streaming service to be one of the best. Although some of their content is questionable, the sheer vastness and variety present provides most people with good entertainment.
Title: Always fast

Content: I think before they decided to change hbo max it worked perfectly fine, I didn’t have a lag nor did it cut off half the movie titles when I am scrolling through them. With max I have experienced a lag and cutting off half the titles to tv shows and movies, I am using it on my ruko tv and just an irritating experience
Title: Performance

Content: Literally where is the continue watching tab???? Th app doesn’t even remember where you left off in a series or show the episodes you’ve fully watched through. Destroys the whole point if you can’t remember where you left off in a series and have to figure it out off pure guess work. Makes no sense????
Title: Continue Watching?? Hello

Content: Please let us upload pictures for our profile pics again!
Title: Profile picture

Content: Please implement a similar category system like the one used for hbomax, so far things are hard to find like Netflix.
Title: Categories

Content: Was trying to watch robot chicken. Season one shows all the episodes, but season 2 only shows two episodes. I went through to see if it was happening to the other seasons and it did. So season 2 through season 6 are missing the rest of the episodes.
Title: Season 2 through season 6 missing the rest of the episodes

Content: I like to watch with the reduced window so I can google or play a game. When the show ends the audio still plays but it closes the window for video so I have to reopen it with every episode. HBO Max didn’t have this issue. Not impressed.
Title: Video closes

Content: The HBO Max app for both my phone and TV had no issues. But then due to the company’s switch to Max, I had to install new apps and sign in to everything again. That is annoying because everything for me was fine - and then one day it stopped working. This change was unnecessary and removed the recognizable purple HBO logo. A blue logo that says “Max” is boring and unmemorable. 🥱
Title: Unnecessary

Content: My lists of shows that I am watching either restarts from the beginning episode or is erased from my watch history altogether.  Never had this problem with hbo go or hbo max.  I hate that I now have to find my show and look for what episode I was on every time I turn it off.
Title: Erases watch history

Content: I don’t know why you guys changed it but if at least it the same then I’m okay with it
Title: Why you change

Content: Ipad status bar (battery level, headphones, WiFi signal) aren’t going away when in full screen.  Otherwise at first glance looks like an improvement in content.
Title: Better content, small issue

Content: After signing in, app says “unknown error requesting service, please try again later
Title: Unable to open App

Content: I would have thought they learned their lesson the last time they tried to switch to a custom video control. Using custom controls means I have to learn the behavior of another app. Whereas apps that use stands controls are easy. I HATE apps that can’t stick to the device standards. Not sure if I’ll continue the subscription.
Title: Doesn’t use standard video controls

Content: The rebrand to "Max" is not good. If you look anywhere throughout other platforms talking about this change, I can personally assure you at least 93% of people completely dislike the name change. Because "HBO" is added with "Max" it gives a feeling of official ness. This gives me a feel of offbrandness. Take it from whom youre advertising to. This is not good.
Title: The Title Change.

Content: I don’t know why you had to create a new app to begin with. You could have just kept the same app, update the logo and call it good. But I’ll play.  The app is the same. Except you eliminated one very important feature: the “all” category for movies and series. So now I’m forced to look at the lists by genre, there is no way for me look at the entire list in the catalog without moving from one genre to the next.  Thumbs down for that.
Title: Meh

Content: I recommend this service for those who can appreciate some comedy.
Title: My favorite streaming service

Content: I love this app.  The amount of content is almost overwhelming but I can always find something to watch.
Title: Great Experience

Content: At first, the ads weren’t excessive, but it seems like they’ve become more constant and annoying.   They’re also election ads, which is really annoying. Then the ads lag, lol.
Title: Definitely get the ad-free version

Content: Max  has been a big downgrade from what they use to have.  I watch friends every night and every single night I wake up to it saying there was an issue and it stops the show.  Every single night.  It won’t do that with scooby but for some reason it does with Friends. I’m really tired of this issue.
Title: Never works right

Content: Max stopped working on my phone and tv a few months ago, had to talk to customer service for hours to be told “IT will email you if they fix it”. No email, no refund. Tried to sign in today and it got ANOTHER $9.99 that Max says didn’t happen even tho I have proof, and will not refund me. DO NOT USE THIS APP PLEASE.
Title: Will not let me sign in, watch, or anything, stolen $45

Content: I’ve tried connecting Max to my chromecast several times over the past few days, but have been unable to get it to work. I’ve tried other streaming services and have been able to get those to work.
Title: Unable to chromecast

Content: I’ve shuffled through a plethora of services, and nothing has movies as good as max does. Despite the occasionally sudden shift in library, max is the perfect streaming service to date.
Title: Best of the streaming services

Content: Loving this new Update was annoyed at first because  It was just fine , plus  nostalgic cause it’s always been HBO, but sometimes change is Good.
Title: Macmommy Woodknow

Content: If I’m casting something to my tv and leave the app, every time i come back the show/movies starts back over. When I try to go back to where I left off, or move cursor at all, I have to sit through another commercial. There’s no point in watching anything on this app if I can’t control it.
Title: App is glitchy and impossible to use

Content: I can watch movies and shows with ease.  I will update if my opinion changes.
Title: Just purchased. Like the app so far.

Content: Max is no better than the HBO Max app when it comes to the blurriness. It always takes a few minutes to refocus and lately it's taken even longer. It's a shame because there's really great content.
Title: Blurry vision

Content: I had to reinstall because it was broken. I guess that action deletes your review? I tried to watch something but it would only show a black screen. I closed the app then went back and clicked on it again—black screen. After reinstalling it worked. I blame both Apple and Max. -1 million stars.
Title: My last review got deleted

Content: I believe the application was better before the switch. It’s won’t load anything, Max on my Xbox shows all the movies and tv shows with a BLUE BORDER! Like what the heck, why a blue border? I can’t even switch that off. So now I’m trying to play it on my iPad. IT WONT EVEN LOAD ANYTHING!! And I have a good wifi service! Would never pay for this subscription again
Title: So dissatisfied with app

Content: Whenever I watch something on the phone, the “Something went wrong” message pops up at some points.
Title: Something went wrong

Content: Original HBO Max had a lot more menu options which made it easier to find stuff, especially for stuff just added or about to leave.
Title: Easy to Use but Missing Some Organizing Features from HBO Max

Content: For iOS, the original HBO app was good, then came the updated HBO Max app which was not good, and now the Max app is not much better. But, the iOS Max app is just fine compared to the Apple TV Max app… on Apple TV, the Max app is horrific! The interface is not easy to use and the video controls are unusable. Just use the native Apple TV video controls, they’re sooo much better! Thanks
Title: Max Apple TV app is horrific!

Content: Overall it’s amazing. I gave it four starts because sometimes the servers will be really laggy and it will take a minute to load but other than that it’s great.
Title: Max

Content: I have a hard time being able to watch my downloaded shows when I don’t have phone service nor Wi-Fi.
Title: Downloads

Content: Hbo Max used to be available in romania, Max isnt. If youre going to change something (that didnt need changing) at least try to make it available in the same countries. Im not going to spen money in a vpn just to watch shows. Pleases make this available in more countries, or at least the same countries at before, them ill change my review.
Title: Available in what countries

Content: Max has all the shows that I really want and the price is actually better than Netflix

Content: So far I’m loving it , it has my favorite shows and some of my favorite movies kinda wished all the purge movies were all on there tho. No complaints

Please get your developers to fix this.   Also, people come for HBO, the head honcho that said let’s change the name is lost.

Content: I am watching a series on this app and whenever I finish the episode, it automatically gets taken off of the “continue watching” list. Sometimes it does this when I stop in the middle of an episode too! It does this on my phone and Roku as well. Super frustrating. Get this fixed please!

Content: Loving it - I’m at max because it has the Harry Potter films which I love and also DC content. The last of us as well. Simply a good service with good content. Would recommend

Title: Won’t stream to tv anymore…

Content: Doesn’t even work. The rating system on Apple TV is making people vote five star with no choice. Purchased this before Xmas with a year because of Supernatural, and DC content. Most of the content is now Discovery Shows. Talk about fraudulent

Content: Idk why they had to change the whole app cause this is the same exact thing but it’s cool

Then max has no live customer support and makes you press buttons to chat with a BOT. Extremely cheap and lazy of them

Content: The update to Max is so irritating and it’s impossible to sign into my account. I’ve tried resetting my password and uninstalling and reinstalling the app but nothing works. Content: I like the new update, but I like the original better just the color theme and how it opened was just so beautiful

They did this once on a redesign of HBO Max that lasted about two weeks before they switched back to Apple’s

Title: Consistently bad. Please fix the restarting bug!

Content: Lots of forced updates, minimal consistent desirable content addition, bad UI (did they stop using the native Apple TV player, could it be to get better tracking of our use?). Obviously I will keep paying for it because I have tons a money to waste, you do too so keep using it!

Content: This app works horribly when streaming to a chromecast. I constantly have to reconnect the app to the chromecast device. Reconnecting causes the show I’m watching to restart. Pausing, rewinding, etc all cause the show to restart. Sometimes I can’t even pause at all without something bad happening, like the app crashing. Please improve!!

Content: GREAT APP!! But it’s to expensive for us but still great had to cancel get back soon tho when we get more money👍

Content: Why am I not getting what I payed for? I payed for hbo max with NO ADS Which is more then the regular and I still have ads… can y’all do something about this?

Content: I’ve had several issues with the app, freezing, and having issues where it crashes, and I have to reinstall. I love the selection and the ease of finding things however, the app itself does not run very well.

Content: Good and all but I just wish u can add allow screen share to see with my friends on FaceTime

Content: This app has such wonderful options for series and films, and its interface is so user-friendly.

Content: I like how they integrated all of the platforms and really easy to navigate. It’s does not perform well when there is not a lot of service. If I want to use the download episodes I have to disconnect from the cellular data.

Content: Some shows are good. Overall all the new shows coming out are  woke shows that have little to no real script to the overall development. Hbo also likes to start a show and cancel it which makes it hard to want to start a new show when they probably won’t pick it up for another season.

Content: I miss being able to swipe down to see how many minutes are left. Now you have to pause to see. I hate that the episode stays at the end when finished. If you fall asleep and have to watch again the next day, you have to rewind it. Blockbuster vibes.
Title: So Generic

Content: what's even the point of a streaming app that will just randomly decide to not carry the stuff you're watching or want to watch anymore with no warning or notice?  might as well just buy the stuff I want to see from apple tv, at least I'll know it'll still be there later

Content: This all does not work on my ps4 and it’s not my ps4 when ever I try to watch a movie with my family it doesn’t work or just loads forever on whatever I click on. this wasn’t a problem with HBO max only max
Title: Ps4 playing

Content: This is the worst streaming app I have ever used. It doesn’t ever remember what you’ve watched, every time you start a show, it doesn’t go to recently played or continue watching. It forgets what episodes you’ve watched. It won’t let you sign in sometimes. This latest update from hbo to max broke an already sub par app. Not worth the money

Content: Has everything you could want in a streaming service!!

Content: Use to live Hbo max. now max itself has been a bother and annoying. everytime i want to go back and watch my show where i left off i can’t.. it starts over from season one episode one everytime. PLEASE FIX THIS. i never had an issue until now.
Title: Won’t save last episode watched

Content: The app on all my tv’s and phone does not save anything I watch. Continue watching does not come up and every time I want to continue my series, I have to go search the show and manually try to remember what episode I was on and where I left on in that episode in applicable. This is AWFUL! It was fine before. FIX THIS!!!
Title: No “continue watching”

Content: Since the update, the app has only let me log in twice and logs me out after every use. I still haven’t been able to log in on my TV, it just kicks back an error.  Even when it did let me log in it kept skipping or restarting episodes so i had to manually choose each episode.
Title: Won’t let me log in.

Content: Significantly worse user experience compared to the separate applications merged to create “max” -ADA accessibility decreased by having to turn on closed captioning - per episode or movies in sequential viewing -Overlapping play in sequential episode viewing (audio from previous plays over next with user intervention (play next) engaged) -Inconsistent experience in episode rewatch -Impaired navigation by unique/inconsistent user input response compared to previous/existing apps (e.g. holding the Apple touch removes from recent viewing versus taking you to series Home Screen)  A mess overall from an app (non content expansion perspective)
Title: Rushed to market

Content: Come on do you really have to ask it’s HBO for crying out loud it’s a wonderful streaming app with shows from old days and new so much memories
Title: Come On

Content: I moved to jp about a year ago and I knew that hbo worked in jp I also had hbo since euphoria came out but due to this unnecessary rebranding I am now paying for service I can’t use because it’s going take a year to fix something that no one had problems with until now and for what ?  I rather go to tubi

Content: For how prominent of a company HBO is, this app is clunky, poorly optimized, and glitchy. My streaming quality is poor, when my internet connection is not an issue. And any time I close the app and open it back up while casting a show t my TV, it restarts at the beginning. Real shame…
